
1a1(mdo 'grel): mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos 'chi med mdzod ces bya ba paN+Di ta 'chi med seng+ges mdzad pa bzhugs/ /
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a ma ra ko Shar nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'chi med mdzod ces bya ba/ thams cad
1b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi mkhyen brtse'i rgya mtsho ni/ /gting med sdig med yon tan rnams/ /mi zad
1b3(mdo 'grel): rten gyi blo ldan rnams/ /de yi dpal dang bdud rtsi'i phyir/ /rgyud gzhan rnams las bsdus nas ni/ /so sor legs sbyar
1b4(mdo 'grel): mdor bsdus pa/ /rdzogs par brjod do sde tshan gyis/ /ming dang rtags kyi rjes bshad pa/ /shes bya pho mo ma ning la/ /phal
2a1(mdo 'grel): cher gzugs kyi dbye ba dang/ /'ga' zhig lhan cig spyod pa dang/ /'ga' zhig de yi khyad par sgrub/ /dbye ba bshad
2a2(mdo 'grel): phyir zlas dbye dang/ /gcig gis lhag par ma bsdus shing/ /'dir ni rtags rnams med pa dang/ /ma bshad go rim spangs byas nas/ /
2a3(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi rtags la gsum zhes bya/ /'khrig pa'i tshig la gnyis zhes bya/ /rtags bkag lhag don bu mdza' dang/ /a tha dang po
2a4(mdo 'grel): sngon cha min/ /mtho ris 'god med bde 'gro dang/ /skyo med gsum rtse skabs gsum gnas/ /lha yi 'jig rten rol gnas mkha' //
2b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis mo ma ning gzhi gsum pa/ /'chi med rgas med skabs gsum lha/ /rnam par sad dang bcud ldan dang/ /tshigs bzang pa dang yid bzang dang/ /
2b2(mdo 'grel): gsum rtse dbang ldan mtho ris gnas/ /mi sbyin mkhas spyod legs par bris/ /mi sbyin dga' dang A di'i bu/ /ri yig bu dang rmi lam med/ /mi
2b3(mdo 'grel): 'chi ba dang bdud rtsi zas/ /mi yi zhal dang mchod sbyin zas/ /dag gi mda' can lha min dgra /tshogs bzang ba dang lta rnams nyid/ /skyas 'bri 'am ni
2b4(mdo 'grel): lha mo nyid/ /nyi ma sna tshogs nor lha dang/ /dga' ldan dang ni 'od gsal rlung/ /rgyal chen rigs dang bsgrub bya dang/ /drag po dang bcas tshigs kyi
2b5(mdo 'grel): lha/ /rig 'dzin chu skyes gnod sbyin dang/ /srin po dri za mi 'am ci/ /sha za gsar ba grub ba dang/ /'byung po 'di rnams lha las byung/ /lha/
3a1(mdo 'grel): min byin skyes bcud mi ldan/ /gzhu skyes sbyin byung dbang po'i sgra/ /pa sangs slob ma sbyin byed bu/ /sngon gyi lha dang lha rnams smod//
3a2(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen/ /chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das/ /bdud 'dul 'jig rten rgyal ba
3a3(mdo 'grel): po/ /mngon shes drug ldan stobs bcu pa/ /gnyis med gsung dang rnam par 'dren/ /thub pa'i dbang po dpal stug dang/ /ston pa thub pa nyid rnams
3a4(mdo 'grel): so/ /shAka thub shAkya'i seng ge dang/ /don rnams grub pa zas gtsang sras/ /gau ta ma dang nyi ma'i gnyen/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras rnams so/ /
3a5(mdo 'grel): tshangs pa bdag skyes lha las rgan/ /mchog la gnas dang mes po dang/ /gser gyi mngal dang 'jig rten dbang/ /rang 'byung gdong bzhi byed po
3b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /pad+ma'i skye gnas nyes can dang/ /sna tshogs sgrub byed pad+ma'i gdan/ /'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag po dang/ /rig byed rnams byed sna tshogs byed/ /khyab 'jug nag po nA ro'i bu/ /a shwat+tha thos rtul
3b2(mdo 'grel): mo'i bu/ /dbang po'i dbang phyug me tog lto/ /sgra can gsod dang sgrang gi bu/ /rang skyes sbyin dgra bad dkar mig /mkha' lding rgyal mtshan glang rdzir grags/ /mi 'dzag gos ser rwa gzhu can/ /sna
3b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs sde dang 'gro ba 'joms/ /steng gi dbang po dbang gzhan skyes/ /lag pa bzhi pa 'khor lo'i phyag /pad+ma'i lte ba sbrang rtsi'i dgra /'dug gnas lha dang gom gsum gnon/ /lha ma dga' ba dpa' 
3b4(mdo 'grel): bo'i rgyud/ /dpal gyi bdag po skyes bu'i mchog /me tog phreng ldan stobs ldan 'joms/ /'khar ba'i sgra dang 'og dbang skyes/ /kun 'gengs lha min 'joms pa dang/ /rdeb byed dpal gyi be'us mtshan//
3b5(mdo 'grel): nor lha'i bu dang de bzhin du/ /a na ka yi rnga can no/ /stobs bzang dang ni rab 'phyang gsod/ /stobs lha mi 'dzag sngon skyes dang/ /nam gru'i bdag po dga' byed dang/ /'dod skyong gshol gyi
3b6(mdo 'grel): mtshon cha dang/ /tA lAs mtshon dang rtun shing gshol/ /legs 'gugs dang ni thong pa'i lag /klu 'joms pa dang stobs ldan no/ /myos byed yid srub gsong byed dang/ /rab stobs dang ni nya yi
4a1(mdo 'grel): tog /tshangs bcom snyems dang lus med dang/ /'dod pa dma' lnga dran pa dang/ /sdom pa'i sgra dang yid las skyes/ /me tog mda' dang gzhan ma skyes/ /me tog gzhu can dga' ba'i bdag
4a2(mdo 'grel): chu srin rgyal mtshan bdag las byung/ /tshangs spong i dang 'gro ba'i tog /ma 'gags pa dang u ba'i bdag /mtshon byed pad gnas pad ma can/ /gos sngon can dang snar ma'i bu/ /chur rgyan
4a3(mdo 'grel): dpal mo 'phreng byed yum /dud can lnga skyes dpal mo'i bdag /'khor lo legs mthong can dang ni/ /sa mos byug pa ral gri dga' / /sa rnams rten byed nor bu'o/ /'dab bzangs dug 'joms skar
4a4(mdo 'grel): rmig gu/ /'dul skyes mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dang/ /khyab 'jug shing rta klu mthar byed/ /gser gyi 'dam ma ltos 'gro za/ /bde 'byung phyugs bdag zhi ba dang/ /mdung thogs dbang phyug chen
4a5(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /dbang phyug gsod byed dpal ldan dang/ /bde byed gtsug na zla ba dang/ /'byung po'i dbang po dgra sta'i dum/ /ri dbang ri smod tshim byed dang/ /'chi ba las rgyal gzig gos can/ /skyo med
4a6(mdo 'grel): gzhu dang 'joms byed bdag /drag shul rol can dpal gyi mgrin/ /mgu la nag thod pa 'chang ba dang/ /g.yon phyogs lha dang lta chen po/ /sna tshogs mig dang mig gsum pa/ /me yi khu ba
4b1(mdo 'grel): kun mkhyen dang/ /ral ba'i khur can sngon dmar can/ /'phrog pa dran 'joms 'joms byed po/ /spyan gsum grong khyer gsum mthar byed/ /gaM ga 'dzin pa lod pa'i sgra/ /khyu mchog rgyal mtshan mchod sbyin 'joms/ /nam mkha' i skra can srid dang 'jigs/ /gnas byed
4b2(mdo 'grel): du byed u ma'i bdag /chus gang dag byed ral ba bcings/ /skyo med khyab dang sgra ldan gzhu/ /de yi 'khor ni 'joms byed dang/ /tshangs pa la sogs ma mo rnams/ /khyab bdag khyab byed dbang phyug la/ /chung ngu la sogs brgyad dang ldan/ /dka' bzlog kA bta'i bu mo
4b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ser skya nag po gangs ldan bu/ /dbang mo zhim srid ma dang/ /drag mo gsod ma kun la shis/ /ri skyes snod gnas lo ma med/ /tshim byed gtum mo 'gro ba'i ma/ /log 'dren bgegs kyi rgyal po dang/ /ma gnyis ba dang tshogs kyi bdag /mche ba gcig pa ha la gnas
4b4(mdo 'grel): lto ba 'chang dang glang po'i gdong/ /smin drug bu dang sde chen dang/ /'dam bu'i tshal skyes gdong drug pa/ /ri skyes dga' byed skem byed dang/ /sde dpon me skyong sbed byed dang/ /mang po las skyes sgrol byed 'dul/ /gtsug bud can zhon sa ga skyes/ /ma drug pa dang mdung
4b5(mdo 'grel): thogs dang/ /gzhon nu dang ni khrud khrud 'joms/ /khyab stobs smin bya 'joms par byed/ /rgan po la nyan shis brjod nyan/ /gang bo 'bod dang grong 'joms dang/ /rgyal byed nus ldan legs bris gtso/ /mchod sbyin brgya pa mtho ris bdag /legs skyob
4b6(mdo 'grel): ri 'joms rdo rje can/ /dbyig ldan 'phel 'joms char 'bebs dang/ /gnas kyi bdag po lha yi bdag/ stobs ldan drag dang legs brjod dang/ /rmugs byed 'joms dang 'phros byed rta/ /mtho ris rgyal po grol med 'joms/ /yang dag du dang bzod
4b7(mdo 'grel): dgas rangs/ /gzhan snyems bzod dang sprin la zhon/ /kun 'joms mig stong ri skyes ldan/ /de yi gnun mo sbugs gang skyes/ /legs brjod ma dang dbang mo'o/ /grong khyer mche ba med ldan dang/ /rta ni mtho nyan kha lo yi/ /ma ni yid grub dga' ba'i
5a1(mdo 'grel): tshal/ /khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed dang/ /rgyal byed dang ni smin 'joms bu/ /sprin gyi glang po mtsho skyes dang/ /sa srung bu dang chu 'dzin glang/ /sgra sgrogs rdo rje mo ma yin/ /lag ldan 'bigs byed thog dang ni/ /rtse mo brgya ba sgra can
5a2(mdo 'grel): bde/ /sgrogs zhum za byed gnyis dag go mkha' thog mkha' gnas mo ma yin/ /lha yi drang srong mi sbyin sogs/ /chos bzangs lha yi mdun sa dang/ /btung rnams bdud rtsi bde bar 'thung/ /chu bo dal 'bab mtho ris klung/ /nam mkha' i gaM gA bcud ldan ri//
5a3(mdo 'grel): lhun po ri rab gser gyi ri/ /rin chen brtsegs pa lha yi gnas/ /lnga po lha yi ljon shing ste/ /manda ra ba rgya mtsho skyes/ /legs khyab dang ni dpag bsam shing/ /'phrog byed tsan dan skyes bu 'am/ /tshangs pa'i gzhon nu rnam byed bu/ /mtho ris smin pa ma
5a4(mdo 'grel): rta'i bu/ /sna skyes tha kar skyes pa dang/ /kun mkhyen tha skar skyes gnyis dag /chu skyes mo ste mang po'o/ /mtho ris smad 'tshod dbang chen sogs/ /sgra ngan spangs dang dbyangs 'dems sogs/ /gnas skabs gsum na dri za'i glu/ /'khyog 'gro med
5a5(mdo 'grel): dang rnyed za dang/ /byin za nor las rgyal ba dang/ chu yi skye gnas 'bar ba?/ /skyes thob lus mi skyong ba dang/ /shing 'phel skems byed lam nag dang/ /'bar ba'i skra can snga dro sad/ /rten za 'od zer chen po dang/ /chung byed smin byed mtsho byed   
5a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rta dmar rlung gi grogs po dang/ /gtsug bud can dang rtswa zan dang/ /gser gyi thig le bsreg rdzas za/ /sreg byed mtshun gyis thob byed dang/ /'od bdun nyer zhi mya ngan byed/ /sna tshogs 'od zer 'od nor can/ /dag byed chu 'khris zad
5a7(mdo 'grel): skyes dang/ /rgod ma skyes dang ma rta'i me/ /lha mchod gnyis po 'bar ba dang/ /me lce yal me 'bar me dang/ /nyal ldan 'di ni mo yin no/ /gsum rnams me stag me skar dang/ /shin tu gdung ba tshad can mtshungs/ /chos kyi rgyal po pha gshin
5b1(mdo 'grel): bdag /mtshungs 'jug gshin gyi rgyal po dang/ /mthar byed ya mun yi spun/ /zhi byed gshin byed rgyal po gshin/ /grangs can dbyug 'dzin mtshun gyi lha/ /nyi ma'i bu dang mdza' can no/ /srin po ro zan sha rjen za/ /sha za khrag 'thung kun du rgyu/ /mtshan mo rgyu dang
5b2(mdo 'grel): nam la spyod/ /sna tshogs mdog can gsod bdag skyes/ /'gro 'dzin bsod nams skye bo dang/ /bden bral rjes 'jug srung ba pa/ /mchog sems mchog sbyin zhags pa can/ /chu skyes bdag dang chu bdag go /dbugs 'byin reg ldan ma mos 'phel/ /rtag 'gro rta
5b3(mdo 'grel): lan dri len dang/ /dri 'ded rlung dang myur 'gro dang/ /skye 'gro'i srog dang 'gro ba'i dang/ /nam mkha' i bdag po 'gro ba pa/ /gang byed gang ldan rab 'joms so/ /srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang/ /gyen du rgyu dang khyab byed rlung/ /'di rnams lus la gnas pa'i
5b4(mdo 'grel): skyod byed rgyug byed myur 'gro dang/ /mgyogs 'gro shugs ldan de nas ni/ /myur mgyogs la gor skyen pa yud/ /cig car ma thogs de ma thag /skad cig mi 'gor dar tsam mo/ /kun du rgyun tu ngal med dang/ /mtshan med par med rgyun mi 'chad/ /rtag tu ltos med
5b5(mdo 'grel): res dga' min/ /de nas phul 'byin 'bad pa dang/ /shin tu drag po'i te bor dang/ /'bung brdo mthar byed shin tu gzhung/ /nan tar nges par brtan pos kyang/ /tsam med bri med ngas 'bad dang/ /sems med myur sogs mi nang ngo/ /sems yod rnams la gsum kar
5b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /las ngan dang ni mig gsum grogs/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po gsang bdag dang/ /mi yi chos ldan nor sbyin dang/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal po gter gyi bdag mi 'am ci dbang rnam thos bu/ /'od yangs tsha bo mi la zhon/ mchod sbyin mig skya e la'i rgyud/ /dpal ster bsod
5b7(mdo 'grel): nams skye bo'i dpung/ /sna tshogs shing rta de yi tshal/ /bu ni dpal mos mtshan ba can/ /rtse ba'i gnas dang grong khyer ni/ /mkha' gnas me tog can yin no/ /mi 'am ci dang ci skyes bu/ /rta yi gdong can 'gro mgyogs so/ /gter dang mdzod kyi dbye ba la/ /pad can
6a1(mdo 'grel): dung can la sogs gter/ /lha rtsen rol gnas gnyis po mo/ /'gro med kun khyab rgyas byed dang/ /sgra sgogs mkha' dang bar snang dang/ /kun 'gro mdza' med lha lam gnam/ /mi g.yo ba dang khyab 'jug gnas/ /kun gsal rnam   
6a2(mdo 'grel): grol skyes bu 'am/ /phyogs dang nyi ston gsal gnas dang/ /kun khyab 'phrog byed nyid kyang ngo/ /snga dro gung dang phyi dro'i phyogs/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs ni steng yin no/ /phyogs rnams gsum pa rnams su 'gyur/ /dbang po med dang ma gshin
6a3(mdo 'grel): bdag /bden bral chu dang rlung dang ni/ /lus ngan dbang ldan bdag po rnams/ /shar phyogs la sogs rim bzhin gnas/ /mtsho skyes pad dkar phyir log khrus/ /sa mos gsal byed me tog so/ /sa kun la grags cha 'dzes te/ /'di rnams phyogs kyi glang po'o/ /
6a4(mdo 'grel): blang po chu 'dzin dmar ser dang/ /ser skya dpe med rim pa las/ /zangs sna ma dang so legs ma/ /yan lag mdzes dang gsal byed do/ /ma ning mi zad phyogs min rnams/ /phyogs dbus phyogs mtshams mo yi rtags/ /nang dang phyi rol min pa la/ /'khor yug
6a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni mu khyung can/ /chu 'dzin chu 'bebs chu khur dang/ /sgra sogs chu yi bzhon pa dang/ /rgyu 'dzin rlan 'dzin glog can dang/ /chu sbyin gsher 'dzin tsha zer 'joms/ /chur tsar dgar byed chu 'gyed dang/ /du ba'i skye gnas chu skyar gnas/ /sprin gyi phreng ba zhes
6a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /sprin skyes sprin las byung ba gsum/ /'brug dang sgra chen sprin gyi sgra/ /sgra can nyid la sogs pa'o/ /bde 'thung dang ni sgro brgya ba/ /sgra 'gyed chu skyes skad cig 'od/ /glog dang rnams gsal 'khyug byed dang/ /skyod byed sdod med nyid lkyang ngo/ /thog gi
6a7(mdo 'grel): sgra dang rdo rje'i sgra/ /sprin gyi 'od zer chu 'dzin skyes/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha brgya byin gzhu/ /de bzhin drang 'khyog ces bya'o/ /char pa zhod dang de yi gegs/ /then chen tshar 'gog mnyam pa'o/ /rgyun 'bab yongs lhung drag char ro/ /char rdul chu rdul chu yi zer//
6b1(mdo 'grel): rdo rje'i char dang ser ba'o/ /sprin 'khrig nyin mo ngan byed do/ /mun po 'thib pa'i skyes bu 'am/ /mi mden ma gsal ba dang ni/ /bsgribs pa dang ni g.yogs pa dang/ /mi snang ba dang khebs pa'o/ /bsil zer sim byed ka bur dang/ /dbang po ku mud gnyen byed dang//
6b2(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi'i 'od dang 'od dkar can/ /rtsa yi dbang po mtshan mo'i bdag /'tsho byed zhags byed rgya mtsho skyes/ /'grib byed cha gter ri dags mtshan/ /gnyis skyes rgyal po ri bong 'dzin/ /rgyu dkar rgyal po mtshan mor byed/ /cha dang dum bu bcu drug go /gzugs ni mo
6b3(mdo 'grel): min dkyil 'khor gsum/ /dum bu cha nus dum phyed dang/ /phyed ma mnyam po'i yan lag can/ /zla 'od kun phan sim 'od do/ /rab dang rab tu gsal ba dang/ /bdag can nyams can mtshan ma can/ /rtags can mtshan nyid mtshon byed can/ /kun mdzes
6b4(mdo 'grel): mchog tu mdzes pa dang/ /mdzes sdug legs ngo mtshar ba'o/ /char skya khu 'bangs gangs skyes dang/ /mchod byed nas kha ba spungs/ /de yi tshogs pa gangs yin no/ /bsil ba'i yon tan de don 'dra/ /bsil dang bser dang grang zhing 'khyags/ /lhags pa
6b5(mdo 'grel): lhags dang lhags dar dang/ /bdun po gzhan gyi rtags can no/ /brtan gnas dang ni rkang steng bu/ /ri bo 'phangs dang bum pa skyes/ /grogs po lha mi bu de bzhin/ /zil gnon rgya can chos mnyam ma/ /mi lhung 'gro byed 'od can dang/ /skar ma dkar po
6b6(mdo 'grel): 'phur byed mo/ /gsal ba'i bu mo tha skar sogs/ /skar ma rta ldan rgod ma can/ /sgrub byed nyid ni sa ga'o/ /rgyal ni grub pa tsham? byed do/ /mon gru mnye dang nor ldan yin/ /khrums dang ba lang rkang pa mo/ /mgo ni ri dags mgo zhes bya/ /de la lo yi dang po'o
6b7(mdo 'grel): de yi steng phyogs gos 'gro ldan gyi/ skar ma rnams ni gnas pa'o/ /lha bdag la yi slob dpon dang/ /dbyangs bdag blo ldan lha'i bla ma/ /'tsho byed phur bu sma ba'i bdag /sna tshogs gtsug pud can gyi bu/ /mya ngan snyan dags lha min bla/ /'od can pa sangs
7a1(mdo 'grel): snyan dngags bu/ /mig dmar sa skyes sa las byung/ /lus dmar dang ni sa gzhi'i bu/ /zla bu gza' lag snar ma skyes/ /mnyam dang nyi bu dal 'gro sben/ /mun pa sgra gcan mtho ris mdzes/ /seng ge'i bu dang zla ba 'tshe/ /'od zer 'gro
7a2(mdo 'grel): byed la sogs pa'i/ /drang srong bdun po sna tshogs dang/ /khyim rnams shar ba dus sbyor te/ /de ni lug dang glang la sogs/ /nyi ma 'od 'gyed bsten bya dang/ /mi sbyin skyes dang bcu gnyis bdag nyin byed 'ong byed snang byed dang/ /rab tu gsal byed rnam gsal
7a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /'od ldan mig gzugs rta bdun pa/ /rta ljang can ni tshe zer can/ /rnam 'gyur mchod 'os mngal na sdug /char 'bebs 'od 'gro gso bar byed/ /nam mkha' i nor bu sgrol? byed bshes/ /sna tshogs 'od zer rnam snang byed/ /'od kyi nor can gza' yi bdag /'od
7a4(mdo 'grel): zer bdag po snang byed bdag /'od can 'joms byed 'od stong pa/ /gdung byed 'od 'byin 'od zer gzugs/ /gnas byed dmar sar dbyug can gyis/ /nyi ma'i 'od la yongs su bskor/ /nyi ma'i kha lo skya rengs dang/ /brla med 'od srung khyud sngon skyes/ /yongs
7a5(mdo 'grel): bskor yongs su bkris pa dang/ /nye ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can/ /'ded byed 'od byed nam mkha' 'jal/ /phyogs 'gro 'od 'gro chu 'thung phod/ /gsal ba 'od byed srin bu gsad/ /mo dang skyes bu gsal byed mo/ /'od dang gsal ba snang ba sgron/ /snang gsal
7a6(mdo 'grel): 'od mdangs 'od zer dang/ /'od dangs gsal sgron ma ning ngo/ /mun sel mun 'joms mtshan mo sel/ /cung dro bag dro dro tsam dang/ /dro ba de ldan gsum yin no/ /tsha ba rab tsha tsha drag go /de bzhin smig rgyu ri dags sred/ /bgrang bya dus dang slar byung dang/
7a7(mdo 'grel): nye bar 'gro dang de nas ni/ /phyogs rtsa 'phel 'grib 'di gnyis mo/ /de sogs tshes dag gnyis dag go /mun bsal nyin mo bya spangs bsal/ /yang na ma ning rtse gnas 'jog /mun dangs nyin dang rab sad srog /nam langs pa dang rab snga gsal/ /nyi ma'i mdza' ?
7b1(mdo 'grel): dang dgongs mo dang/ /bsam gtad dang ni pha skyes so/ /snga ngo phyi dro nyi ma gung/ /mtshams gsum de nas bya bral dang/ /bsam gtan gnas dus mtshan mo dang/ /thun gsum ngal ster bsam pa spangs/ /snang bzlog nam dang rdul dang ni/ /thun sbyor chags dus snang
7b2(mdo 'grel): med dang/ /mun mtshan mun pa'i nam dang ni/ /snang mtshan zla ba dang ldan pa/ /ma 'ongs da ltar gnyis ldan pa'i/ /mtshan mo de ni phyogs ldan no/ /mtshan mo tshogs pa zhags rnams dang/ /mtshan mo'i dang po nam gyi gdong/ /nam phyed mtshan phyed gnas pa gnyis//
7b3(mdo 'grel): thun dang mel tshe gnyis dag mtshungs/ /tshigs dang mtshams dang tshes gcig dang/ /bco lnga yi ni mthar thug pa/ /phyogs kyi mdza' ma bco lnga gnyis/ /zla ba gang ba 'jal byed rdzogs/ /cha nyams rjes 'gro gang ba dang/ /mtshan byed mtshan mo mthong bar
7b4(mdo 'grel): byed/ /gnam stong lhan cig byed dang mthong/ /nyi ma zla ba lhan cig gnas/ /zla mthong zla ba gzhon nu'o/ /zla ba nyams pa cha nyams so/ /nyer 'tshe gza' ni 'jug par byed/ /nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan gzung/ /nyer sgyur bya byed spangs pa'o/ /mi yis bsregs dang
7b5(mdo 'grel): dar bzhin sgyur/ /gcig tu sbyor bas me tog ldan/ /nyin byed mtshan mo byed pa po/ /mig 'dzum bco brgyad de yi gnas/ /de ni sum cu cha shas so/ /de yi sum cu skad cig go /de ni bcu gnyis yud tsam yin/ /de ni sum cu nyin zhag go /de rnams bco lnga phyogs
7b6(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /phyogs ni sngon ma phyi ma ste/ /de gnyis zla ba dkar nag go /mchu sogs zla ba gnyis gnyis ni/ /dus tshigs de gsum bgrod pa'o/ /nyi ma lho dang byang bgrod ni/ /lo gcig la ni gnyis yin no/ /nyin mo mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dus/ /nyin mtshan mtshungs
7b7(mdo 'grel): dang dus mnyam mo/ /me tog ldan pa'i zla ba nya/ /rgyal gyi zla ba gang yin de/ /ming ni rgyal yin mtshungs la sogs/ /de bzhin gzhan ni bcu gcig go /ri dags mgo can nus ldan mgo /smal po zhes bya gsum yin no/ /me tog rgyal zla nus zla gnyis/ /dka' thub mchu
8a1(mdo 'grel): zla de nas ni/ /'bras zla dka' thub sbo zla'o/ /nag pa 'dod pa dus sbrang zla'o/ /sa ga sbrang dus me tog can/ /gtso bo snron zla gtsang ma dang/ /chu stod zla ba gro zhun dang/ /nam mkha' dang ni thos zla'o/ /sprin bzang khyu mchog rkang
8a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /ba lang rkang dang khrums zla mtshungs/ /tha skar ltad mo'i zla ba dang/ /klu dbyangs zla ba smin drug dang/ /mang po 'dzin dang smin drug zla/ /dgun stod dgun smad ma mo yin/ /dpyid dang me tog ldan dus dang/ /bde byed so ga tsha dus dang/ /nges
8a3(mdo 'grel): par sregs dang dro ba'i dus/ /drod phebs drod 'ongs che ba'i dus/ /mo/ dbyar mo mang po'i tshig char 'bab/ /de nas ston ka mo yin no/ /dus tshod drug po 'di rnams ni/ pho/ mgo sogs zung rnams rim pa las/ /lo dang bgrang bya 'gro 'ong dang//
8a4(mdo 'grel): 'dor byed mo min ston dang mtshungs/ /nyin dag dang ni zla bas 'gyur/ /bu yi lo yis lha rnams kyi/ /lha yi zung ni stong phrag dag /gnyis ni tshangs pa kal pa ste/ /de dag mi rnams kyi kalpa/ /mtho ris rnams kyi zung rnams kyi/ /bdun cu rtsa gcig /
8a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig pa'i kalpa pra la ya/ /nyal dang zas dang kalpa'i mdza' / /mo min reg 'phel skyes bu srung/ bya ngan 'thung dmangs byed dag mdzad/ /rgo byed bzang po spangs sdig pa/ /nongs pa nyes spyod nyes byas so/ /chos ni mo min bsod nams dang//
8a6(mdo 'grel): dge ba legs byas khyu mchog go /dga' mgu rangs dang spro ba dang/ /yi rang dgyes dang mnyes pa dang/ /nyams dga' sdig zad zhi ba dang/ /mi dge? spangs dang legs sgo'o/ /dge dang bsngags 'os zhi ba dang/ /bzang po phan thob bkra shis legs// 
8a7(mdo 'grel): skal pa skal thob 'dod thob dang/ /ngan sel bde legs mo ma yin/ /bstod 'os de nas gsum dngos po/ /sdig dang bsod nams bde la sogs/ /shin tu bzang dang phul byung dang/ /rab dang mchog dang ltad mor che/ /'di rnams mnyam pa
8b1(mdo 'grel): can zhes brjod/ /skal ldan dge ba bsags rgya ba can/ /lhas bskos lhas bstan skal ba dang/ /mo sngon byas las dang sngon las so/ /rgyu dang byed po sa bon no/ /nges ldan thog ma'i byed pa'o/ /zhing zhes bdag dang skyes bu ste/ /gtso bo rang bzhin mo yin no/ /khyad par
8b2(mdo 'grel): dus byas gnas skabs so/ /yon tan snying stobs rdul dang mun/ /skye ba skyed po skyes pa skye/ /nyer bkrun nye bar 'byung rnams so/ /srog can sems can skye ldan dang/ /skye bo skye dgu lus can no/ /sems dang sems pa snying dang ni/ /sgrog byed 'phrog byed yid byed yin/ /blo
8b3(mdo 'grel): gros yid 'dod spobs pa can/ blo dang shes rab nyal slong dang/ /yid ldan mthong dang dmigs ldan sems/ /legs rtogs go shes bsam pa'o/ /mi brjod 'dzin nus dran bzang po/ /rtog pa yid kyi las dang ni/ /sems kyi longs spyod yid la byed/ /dpyod
8b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'grang byed rnam par dpyod/ /lhag par dpyod dang rtog pa dang/ /sems dang the tshom som nyi dang/ /ne mnur dang ni yid gnyis so/ /de nas mtshungs pa gtan phebs nges/ /log par lta ba med pa pa/ /gnod sems 'tshe ba pa dang ni/ /mtshungs pa grub mdza' bzung ba'i sems/ /'khrul pa leg? shes nor?
8b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems/ /khas len phyogs bzung dam 'cha' dang/ /nges pa mnyan bya yang dag thos/ /bdag gir byas dang khas blangs dang/ /so sor mnyan bya ting nge 'dzin/ /thar dang blo dang shes pa gzhan/ /rnam shes bzo dang bstan bcos so/ /grol pa ma 'dres
8b6(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das/ /rab bsngags nges legs 'chi med dang/ /thar pa dang ni spangs pa'o/ /de nas mi shes ma rig dang/ /rnongs pa dang ni dar 'dzin blo/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang/ /yul 'di sbyod yul dbang 'dod rnam/ /yul can yul dang dbang po dag?
8b7(mdo 'grel): las kyi dbang po ba la sogs/ /yid dang mig sogs blo yi dbang/ /chu rten bska ba mo yin no/ /mngar dang lan tshwa tsha ba dang/ /kha dang skyur dang ro rnams ni/ /skyes bu de ldan drug po 'ang gsum/ /rnam nyid sbyad spos dri dang ni/ /bskye? pa'i?  yid 'phrog kun mos
9a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ring 'gugs brjod bya'i yon tan min/ /mtshungs pa 'bong byed ring du khyab/ /dri zangs sna tshim 'dod dri dang/ /dri zhim lags 'thul kha la chags/ /rul dri dang ni dri ngan no/ /mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o/ /dkar po dge
9a2(mdo 'grel): byed dkar gsal dang/ /mdog dkar gzhan gcod dkar snum dang/ /skya bsang dag mdog yid bsdebs dang/ /mdog dkar mig stobs dkar dang sgrub/ /skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o/ /cung skya dang ni 'o la kha'o/ /nag po sngon po dkar min dang//
9a3(mdo 'grel): sngo bsangs mdog nag nag lhang dang/ /ser po ser shang yung nga mdog /ljang khu ljang ser lo ma'i mdog /dmar po le brgan khrag gi mdog /dmar ba utpal dmar po dang/ /mi gsal dmar rtsa skya rengs mdog /dkar dmar 'dres pa dmar
9a4(mdo 'grel): skya'o/ /ser nag dang ni nag ser ro/ /dmar nag du kha mchin la'o/ /gser mdog gser skya skyer kha dang/ /dkar ser dur kha 'gi haM mdog /sna tshogs zal po 'dres ma dang/ /khra bo kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /yon tan dkar po la sogs po/ /yon
9a5(mdo 'grel): tan rtags can de ldan 'gyur/ /tshangs byung b+ha ra ta yi skad/ /sgra dang brjod pa dbyangs can dang/ /tha snyad gsung dang smra ba dang/ /gtam dang lo rgyus tshig ces bya/ /zur chag dang ni sgra nyams pa/ /rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni/ /ting su pa'i mdza' 
9a6(mdo 'grel): can tshig /bya ba 'am ni byed ldan pa/ /thos pa mo rig byed man ngag /gsum po de ni chos su sgrub/ /snyan dngags nges brjod mchod sbyin te/ /'di gsum rig byed gsum pa yin/ /slob sogs thos pa'i yan lag go /oM yig pra Na bo bdag mtshungs/ /sngon rabs
9a7(mdo 'grel): sngon du byung ba'o/ /u dAt+ta sogs gsum dbyangs rnams/ /rtsod pa dang ni chad pa'i lugs/ /rtog ge rig don bstan bcos dag /gtso bo'i ngag ni bka' lung ngo/ /snying po'i mtshan nyid lnga yin no/ /rab sbyar rtog pa gtam rnams dang/ /brda yis ston dang go dka' 'o//
9b1(mdo 'grel): dran ba chos dang bcas pa rnams/ /legs par bsdus dang bsdus pa'o/ /tshig sdud pa dang bsdus pa'i don/ /gang zhig brjod dang skye bos thos/ /gtam dang lo rgyus kha skad dang/ /bka' mchid yin te de nas ni/ /ming dang zhes dang mtshan dang ni/ /mngon par brjod ba du? mig
9b2(mdo 'grel): brjod ming/ /'bod pa dang ni skad gtong dang/ /yang dag 'bod pa mang pos bos/ /rnam par rtsod dang tha snyad dang/ /nye bar 'god dang smra ba'i sgo/ /nye bar 'jal dang dper brjod do/ /mna' dang gros 'don skyes bu'o/ /'dri dang rjes sbyor shes 'dod do/ /slar smra ba dang ldan
9b3(mdo 'grel): tshig mtshungs/ /lag par sngon sbyor ngan brjod dang/ /de nas log smra sun 'byin mngon 'dod dang/ /legs smra sgra ni rjes chags skye/ /mchod tshig grags pa yang dag shes/ /bstod tshig bkur tshig bsngags pa smra/ /sbyor tshig gnyis gsum brjod pa'o
9b4(mdo 'grel): sgra gsang mthon po skad po che/ /gcod skad mo dang rnam 'gyur dang/ /mya ngan 'jigs sogs las byung sgra/ /ma bsngags sdigs tshig nges par rgol/ /yongs smod sun 'byin khro tshogs dang/ /gshe dang smod dang brgyad pa dang/ /rngan char dang ni tshig rtsub dang
9b5(mdo 'grel): mngon smra tshig ngan rma 'bebs tshig /gang de skyon ni nyer dmigs pa/ /de la yongs su brjod pa'o/ /de la g.yo ba gang yin pa/ /A kro sha ni 'khrig tshig yin/ /khams bde dang ni 'dri smad do/ /la ba lo ba don med tshig /rjes su smra ba la yang smra/ /mya ngan tshig dang gdung ba'i tshig /tshig
9b6(mdo 'grel): 'gog 'gal ba brjod pa'o/ /phan tshun brjod dang smra ba dang/ /'gal ba dang 'bral/ /shin du legs smra legs par brjod/ /gsang tshig gsang ba'i gtam dang ni/ /tshig gi skyes dang tshig spring dang/ /dag gi dbye gsum phyi ma la/ /mi dge'i tshogs ni sdig pa yin//
9b7(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i tshogs ni legs pa'o/ /shin du mnyan dang zhi ba dang/ /legs par smra dang yid la 'bab/ /khro ba'i tshig ni tshig rtsub pa/ /mtshar 'phru ba dang 'chang slong ngo/ /drang gtam dga' byed bden pa dang/ /de nas 'gal dang rang tshig 'gal/ /phan tshun brdoms
10a1(mdo 'grel): par bya ba'i tshig /yig 'bru tshig mi gsal dang rig /tshig stabs myur du brjod pa'o/ /chu 'thor gtam dang mchil gtam mo/ /'brel med dang ni don med gtam/ /yi ge med dang brjod bya bral/ /don stong tshig dang brdzun don can/ /de nas
10a2(mdo 'grel): mi gsal mi mngon tshig /de nyid med dang slu ba'i tshig /bden dang de bzhin mi slu dang/ /yang dag 'di rnams gsum de ldan/ /sgra dang ngas sgrogs grags pa dang/ /sgrogs pa ca co ku co dang/ /lhang tsher sgrogs nges smra ba dang/ /ding 'ur dang ni shu sgra sgrogs//
10a3(mdo 'grel): smros grag skad 'don dbyangs rnams so/ /de nas shod sgra shwad sgra ni/ /gos dang lo ma rnams kyi sgra/ /rgyan rnams dang ni sril khrol sgra/ /pi wang sgra ni ni kA med/ /mi gsal kwa med kwa med sgrogs/ /pi wang sgrogs pa la sogs pa/ /mi gsal pra kwa med la
10a4(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /ca co dang ni ku co dang/ /dud 'gro'i sgra ni bA i taM/ /mi ni sgra brnyan brag cha'o/ /glu dang glu dbyangs 'di dag mtshungs/ /'khod nyan drang srong sa 'dzin dang/ /drug skyes par na/ /blo gsal dang/ /lnga pa zhes bya bdun po 'di/ /rgyu dang
10a5(mdo 'grel): mgrin las skyes pa'i dbyangs/ /kwa ka lI ni sgra cha phra/ /mi gsal brnyan pa d+ha ni'o/ /sngags ni zab mo'i dbyangs yin no/ /tA ra mthon po gsum po gsum/ /sa ma nwi ni tsha la gcig /pheg/ pi wang sgra ni ba lA kI/ /rnam par spro dang
10a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan pa ni/ /rgyud bdun yongs su bsgrags pa'i sgo/ /pi wang la sogs rgyud kyi sgra/ /rda la sogs pa spubs kyi sgra/ /gling bu la sogs bu ga'i sgra/ /sil snyan sgra ni cha lang sogs/ /rnam pa 'di bzhi rol mo'i sgra bA ti tra to zhes bya'o/ /snga po 'dir
10a7(mdo 'grel): dbye ba/ /rnga rings urd+ha ka gsum dang/ /ba d+ha ka dang d+ha ka rngar grags/ /'jigs byed rnga dang rnga bo che/ /rnga rnga mo mig /ko Ni pi wang la sogs sgra/ /pi wang dbyug pa pra b+ha la/ /rtsa ba'i shing 'khyog /ke lam pa ni khob pa'o/ /thag pa'i gnas dang
10b1(mdo 'grel): 'ching ba'o/ /rol mo'i dbye ba rnams/ /Da ma ru dang maN+Du dang/ /DiN+Di dang ni rdza rnga dang/ /rnga/ klu rnga dang ni gzhan yang ngo/ /gar ma dang ni rol rtsed mtshungs/ /dal dang myur dang par mal/ /ta twaM o gto g+ha na rim/ /las cha la/ /bya ba'i dus kyi tshad la ya dang ni sa
10b2(mdo 'grel): mya'o/ /de nas mo min gar dang ni/ /zlos gar ro la rtsod bre dang ni/ /rtsed 'jo dang ni 'cham pa'o/ /rnga gsum gar dang glu dang ni/ /rol mo gar bya 'di ni gsum/ /mo gzugs b+h+ru kut+sa dang ni/ /b+h+ru kut+sa dang zhes bya ba'i gar/ /skyes bus bud med
10b3(mdo 'grel): gzugs bzung na/ /gar gyi tshogs can ardzdzu ka /srid mo'i bdag po A buta to/ /b+hA ba zhes pa rig ldan no/ /de nas A bu ka ni pha/ /rgyal tsha pa gzhon nu nyid la ni/ /b+ha ra Ta dA ra ka zhes so/ /rgyal po b+haTTA ra ke lha/ /de yi bu b+har TAM dA ri ka /lha mo gang la dbang bskur ba//
10b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan rnams la ni b+ha NI TI/ /a prahma N+ya gsod mi byed/ /rA dza sh+yA la mnga' ris so/ /am ba ma 'o de nas ni/ /byis pa pA pu zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa la ni ma ri Sha/ /srid mo che ba an+ti ka /niSh+ThA zin pa yin te mtshungs/ /haN+De ha ny+dza ha las bod/ /dman dang g.yog mo grogs
10b5(mdo 'grel): mo so sor ro/ /aM ga ha ro yan lag bskyod/ /byany+dza ka ni chul dag mtshungs/ /zin pa'i yan lag dag ni gnyis/ /gsum ni aM gi ka dang ni/ /sA twI ki mi dran pa'o/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang/ /rnga ma dang rgod dang 'jigs su rung/ /mi sdug drag shul dang ni gsum/
10b6(mdo 'grel): sgeg pa rtsang dang 'bar ba dang/ /spro ba 'phel ba dpa' ba yin/ /snying rje thugs rje brtse ba dang/ /dbang byed gtong dang rjes su brtse/ /rjes su khro ba nyid kyang ngo/ /de nas dgod dang bzhad gad mo/ /mi sdug mi legs dag ni gsum/ /'di gnyis ngo mtshar rmad byung mtshar che dang//
10b7(mdo 'grel): phul byung dang ni de nas ni/ /'jigs rung mi bzad 'jigs par byed/ /dngangs byed skrag byed 'jigs pa dang/ /'jigs sde 'jigs can 'jigs par byed/ drag po dang ni drag shul gsum/ /bcu bzhi/ /dngang skrag nyam nga bag tsha dang/ /sAd+hA sa ni 'jigs pa'o//
11a1(mdo 'grel): yid kyi rnam 'gyur b+ha ba yin/ a nu b+hA ba rnam 'gyur go /mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal khengs/ /dar byed sems nyid khengs pa'o/ /mi gus yongs smon zil gnon dang/ /mi rtsod zhum byed mi mchod dang/ /mi gus mi shes
11a2(mdo 'grel): brnyas dang smod/ /mig dman 'tsher ngo zhum pa dang/ /'dzem dang ngo tsha de gzhan 'dzem/ /bzod pa dang ni nus pa'o/ /brnab sems pha rol nor la chags/ /mi bzod pa ni phrag dog go /yon tan nyes sgo a stu ya/ /'grangs dang 'ga' 
11a3(mdo 'grel): dang rnam par 'gog /yid gdung mya ngan gdung ba mo/ /phyi nas gdung ba rjes gdung dang/ /rnam par rnyil ba 'gyod pa'o/ /khro ba 'khrul ba tshig dang khros/ /mi gnas gzhan spun khong khro mo/ /gtsang mar spyod pa tshul khrims so/ /smyo
11a4(mdo 'grel): ba sems ni rnam par 'phrul/ /dga' dang mos dang yid mthun dang/ /sems sbum dga' dang de nas ni/ /'jo dang 'dod dang mngon 'dod dang/ /kam dang re ba 'dod spro dang/ /mngon 'dod yid kyi shing rta dang/ /'dod dang
11a5(mdo 'grel): mngon zhen sred pa dang/ /u pa d+hi ni chos sems skyes/ /a d+hi yid kyi gdung ba'o/ /sems dang dran byed bsams mno'o/? /yid gtsegs shin tu sems pa mtshungs/ /spro ba dang ni dga' ba'o/ /de'i brtson 'grus shin tu nus pa'i cha/ /ngan
11a6(mdo 'grel): g.yo mo min sgyu dang brdzu/ /khram dang ngan thabs zog dang ni/ /zol dang ngan g.yo bcos ma'o/ /bag med pa dang shes bzhin med/ /ya mtshan ngo mtshar ltad mor che/ /mtshar che ba/ bud med rnams kyi 'jo sgeg dang/ /rnam 'gyur rnam 'phrul rol pa dang//
11a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin skul dang zur gyis ston/ /'di rnams bya ba hA pA'o/ /de rnams las skyes sgeg pa'i nyams/ /rtsed mo kyal ka bzhad gang dang/ /ku re min log rtse 'jo dang/ /snyad ka 'khyog tshig mtshon pa'o/ /byis rtsed rtsed mo kyal ka'o/ /lus 'bab sos dang
11b1(mdo 'grel): rdul yin no/ /bra la yin sems nyams so/ /snyad smra rnam 'gyur sped pa'o/ /mtshungs pa tab tob 'tshabs pa dag /ga chad rgod dang kun nas dga' / /yid rgod 'dzum dang par yin 'dzum/ /spu langs pa spu dga' ba'o/ /dud mo 'tshe de 'chi ma 'dzag /g.yal ni gsum ste dzri b+haM NaM
11b2(mdo 'grel): slu tshig bi samgA? da'o/ /nyes pa dang ni 'dreng ba mtshungs/ /gnyid dang nyal dang gzims pa dang/ /rmi lam legs phab ces kyang bya/ /shin du gnyid log rab tu myos/ /smin bsdus bzhin bsdus khro gnyer mo/ /khro bas lta ba mig log go /yang dag grub dang rang
11b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin dang/ /rang gzugs ngo bo nyid dang dngos/ /de nas g.yo ba dang ni 'dar ba'o/ /de nas skad cig nyer dga' dang/ /mchod rten dga' ston ltad mo'o/ /mtho ris kyi sde'o// ? //'og sa rkang 'og stobs ldan gnas/ /bcud 'og klu yi 'jig rten no//
11b4(mdo 'grel): bu ga blo bug skar khung dang/ /khung dang bu gu phu gu dang/ /pad+ma'i bu ga gsal ba dang/ /mthong ba rlung 'byung mkha' dngos dang/ /sa'i mthong bug sgo sa'i sgo gsum/ /mdong byed mo min mun pa dang/ /snang med rab rib smag dang ni/ /mun nag mun 'khrigs
11b5(mdo 'grel): shin du sdug /mun mdangs she mun za zi dang/ /kun khyab dang ni mun khyab bo/ /ri gnas kA dru'i bu dang ni/ /de yi dbang phyug lhag ma dang/ /mdza' yas nor rgyas sprul rgyal dang/ /de nas/ ba lang sna dang thig le'i sna/ /dong gnas nyal byed rlung zas gnyis//
11b6(mdo 'grel): myur 'gro dang ni chu sprul lo/ /mtshungs pa/ gral ris dang ni dug med sprul/ /bri can dang ni rkang bzhi dang/ /shun pa rjes dang go cha grol/ /sa la 'khyog dang sa la 'phye/ /lag 'gro myur 'gro gya gyu 'gro /'phye 'gro mche dug dug 'dzin dang/ /'khor lo 'khyog 'gro ni?
11b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang/ /'khyil pa rkang spas mig gis thos/ /lto 'phye gdengs can zar bu mgo /rgyab rings zas ngan khung du nyal/ /brang 'gro skad gis 'gro ba dang/ /'phel ka gdangs can rlung gi zas/ /gsum yin sprul las byung ba ni/ /gdengs ka dang ni pha ni
12a1(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /dug dang rus pa la sogs so/ /mtshungs pa sprul lkogs shun pa'o/ /mi gsal rdub dang khrag gi dug /skyes bu ma ning kA ko la/ /dug /nag po'i phung po dug hA la/ /dug dug dug tshangs pa'i bu dug /rab tu
12a2(mdo 'grel): gsal dang 'joms byed ster/ /bu ste dug dbye 'di rnams dgu /dug gi sman pa dug sel dang/ /sprul 'dzin dang ni sprul khas 'tsho/ /dmyal pa dang ni ngan 'gro'i thil/ /'dod 'bras bral dang ngan 'gro 'ong/ /de yi dbye ba tsha ba sogs/ /mnar
12a3(mdo 'grel): med dang ni ngu 'bod che/ /ngu 'bod bsdus 'joms thig nag sogs/ /sems can dmyal ba las skyes ni/ /yi dags rab med chu bo che/ /dpal min pa dang phun tshogs min/ /gzhan gyis 'khyol dang ngan khyab po/ /mnag dka' mi bzod
12a4(mdo 'grel): tshor ba sngo/ /zug rngu zug gzer na ba dang/ /sdug bsngal yid 'grogs skye las skye/ /bro 'tshal gcod sbyor 'jigs pa len/ /de rnams gsum du dbya bas 'gro/ /rgya mtsho chu 'dzin zla bas 'phel/ /pha rol 'grib dang chu klung bdag /chu srel
12a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni 'bab ldan dang/ chu can mtsho chen dug can mtsho/ /rin chen 'byung gnas chu gter dang/ /chu srin bdag po chu bdag go /de yi rab dbye 'o ma'i mtsho/ /ba tsha'i rgya mtsho de bzhin gzhan/ /chu ni mo ste mang po'i tshig /gzhi can dang ni thul du
12a6(mdo 'grel): du ltung/ /'dod byed 'gru phan nor ldan dang/ /btung bya chu dang mi 'chi dang/ /'tsho byed 'byung byed rten gnas dang/ /lus 'ching 'dzag dang gso byed dang/ /rgyas byed kun sgo bsnyen byad dang/ /btang 'gro skyong byed ltung bya dang/ /za byed ltung byed bde
12a7(mdo 'grel): ba mchog /sprin gyi me tog sprin gyi bcud/ /gsum gnyis byed pa rnam 'gyur ro/ /dpa' rlabs gnyer ma khrem gnyer rim/ /de nas klong dang dpa' chen 'khrug /steng 'phar dang ni rab 'khrug yin/ /'khyil can 'khor chu chu 'khor dang/ /chu thigs thigs ba chu
12b1(mdo 'grel): 'thor go /chu yi zer ma mo yin no/ /rgyun 'khyog dang ni gya gyu 'gros/ /yur ba dang ni rnang ma'o/ /'gram dang 'gog byed chu ngogs dang/ /'jugs dogs dang ni chu 'gram gsum/ /pha rol tshu rol phan tshun ngogs/ /de yi bar na rgyun lam mo/ /chu po gnyis ldan mo min zhing//
12b2(mdo 'grel): bar gling gang? la chu 'gram dbus/ /chu bos nyar bzhag de ni rgang/ /bye ma'i dogs dang bye ma'i thang/ /'bying byed rdzab dang 'dam dang ni/ /mo min 'dam dang 'jim pa'o/ /chu bo sgyur ba chu 'bab sa/ /bu dang shwa zhes bya ba'o/ /glu rab rtags gsum gru sgro las/ /mo gru dang sgrol byed sta ri'o
12b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal dang rtsa la 'phyan 'dzin no/ /rgyun dang rab 'bab 'bab chu'o/ /gru tsas mnyan pa'i gla yin no/ /chu lung dang ni shing 'bab chu/ /gling gzhan rgyu dang gru yi tshong/ /rna ba 'dzin dang gdos pa 'dzin/ /bya ra ba dang grus 'gro ba/ /steng na yon tan shing las so//
12b4(mdo 'grel): gru skul dbyug pa 'phan byed yin/ /gru skya dang ni g.yob byed do/ /gru sbyar mo shing gi tog rtse'o/ /chu gzhong chu 'thor snod yin no/ /gting med gsum ste gtsang dang dangs/ /'dam khung mi dangs rnyog pa can/ /gzhol dang zab mo gting rings so/ /de bzlog dang ni chang
12b5(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /gtong med mthil la mi reg go /rgyal chen chu mi nya pa'o/ /dol dang nya yi rgya yin no/ /lcags kyu dang ni nya 'bigs so/ /spu rings nya dang dzha Sha nya/ /'gro ldan rnam par skyong ba dang/ /sgong skyes rnam 'phyo go cha can/ /de nas 'gro ldan sha ku lA rb+haM ka /mche stong ldan
12b6(mdo 'grel): dang nya tha dang/ /steng 'phyo byis pa gsod dag mtshungs/ /na la'i nya dang tsi li tsim/ /proShthI nyra sra ba char gnyis so/ /sgo nga'i nya phran tshegs pa la/ /po ta d+hA na de nas ni/ /nya snar ma/ nya yi nya yi nya gral nya/ /rdo rje can dang ti mi nya/ /nya ming la sogs de nas ni/ /yA dI sin chu
12b7(mdo 'grel): skye bo/ /de yi dbye ba phyis gsod dang/ /sram dang shang+gu/ /chu srin sogs/ /sdig ba dang ni karkaT/ /gul 'gro ru spal kats+tsha'o/ /'dzin 'khri chu yi srin rings so/ /na kra chu srin sbum pa'i mgo /sa yi 'khri shing sa srin ta la/ /rab byig go d+ho ka mtshungs so/ /khrag 'thung sren bu bdag go?/
13a1(mdo 'grel): mo ni mang tshig pang pa'o/ /mu tig skye gnas mu sto mu tig phor/ /dung ni kam+bur yin mo/ /dung phran dung gi sen mo'o/ /'bu lkogs can dang smugs pa'i bu/ /'phyo 'gro sbal pa dbyar skyes dang/ /shwa ltung rgyal
13a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan dngur/ /sa 'bu phra mo tal phran no/ /spal phran dang ni tshar skyes 'o/ /ru sbal phra mo du lo'i// /nye yi bye brag dga' ma rwa can ma/ /nya phyis nya skyogs zhes bya'o/ /chu yi gzhi dang chu nya'o/ /de la gting mang chu h+ra da'o/ /chu yi skyang skyong lteng ka
13a3(mdo 'grel): 'khyil/ /khron pa chu nyal skyes bu'o/ /khron chu 'brus chu gu pa'o/ /chu dong yang na pho yin no/ /khron pa'i rtsig pa ti ka'o/ /pI nA/ ha ni kha khyer ro/ /rdzing dang de yi chu la ni/ /A khA ta dang lhas bskad dang/ /pad+ma'i 'byung ldan sgra ldan no/ /mo min/ chu yi snying ldan rjid
13a4(mdo 'grel): dang mtsho/ /lteng ka rdzing bu ltang lteng dang/ /rdzing mo cha dang rdzing rings dang/ /'o bab dang yongs su bskor ba'i chu/ /drongs pa'i chu dang yur chu dang/ /btsug shing chus bskor bskrun shing chu/ /de nas gtsang po 'bab chu dang/ /rba rlabs can dang nya lci bas can/ /dogs can
13a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni sgra ldan sgrogs/ /'bab ldan dang ni gling ma can/ /gzho la 'gro rgyun ldan mtshor 'bab bo/ /ga gA khyab 'jug rkang pa dang/ /dza h+rUI bu mo lha yi chu/ /shing rta bu mo lam gsum 'gro/ rgyun gsum 'jigs byed bu mo dang/ /nyi ma'i bu mo ka lindu ni/ /zhi ba'i
13a6(mdo 'grel): sring mo ya mu nA/ /de bA dang ni na dmar/ /zlas byung ri bo'i bu mo dang/ /lag pa'i chu bo rtag tu 'bab/ /dpung ba phyin dang dkar 'bab bo/ /chu bo shi ta brgyar gyis dang/ /zhags grol bi prA Ta ni mo/ /sho Na gser gyi lag pa yin/ /drangs chu lung chu chu phran dang/ /'dam bu can
13a7(mdo 'grel): dang spa can dang/ /zla ba'i cha dang dbyings can dang/ /kA ba rI dang 'bab ldan no/ /gzhan yang dbye ba chu 'dris 'dres/ /gnyis po wa ti chu khang ngo/ /gsum rnams phyi ma dag la'o/ /lhar bcas rdzing bu'i chu la ni/ /dA pika dang sa ra bo/ /dri bzangs chu tshim 'phro ba dang/ /dmar
13b1(mdo 'grel): po yi ni mtshams yin no/ /ud+pa la dang stobs ngan no/ /de nas sngon po chu skyes dang/ /ind+hi pa ra utpal sngo/ /dkar po ku mud ge ra pe/ /shA ltu ka ni de rnams rtsa ba yin/ /chu yi lo ma bum can dang/ /chu yi sngon po sha kA la/ /chu'i sde'o/ /ku mud tshal dang ku mu dkar ra ba
13b2(mdo 'grel): dang ni sdong? du'o/ /de la sogs pa pad+ma'o/ /yang na phan pad+ma'o/ /sdong bu skyes dang rtsibs 'bigs dang/ /utpa la chen 'dab stong dang/ /chu rgyan 'dab ma brgya ba dang/ /chur nyar 'dam skyes chu yi ro/ /chu skyes mtsho skyes drar pa skyes/ /ze 'bru'i phreng ldan bus ka ra chu
13b3(mdo 'grel): 'khungs/ /puN+Da ri ka chu skyes dkar/ /de nas chu skyes dmar po dang/ /utpal dmar po pad+ma dmar/ /sdong bu dang ni dar pa dang/ /de nas ma min rtsa ba dang/ /pi sha chu skyes la sogs rtsa/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba mo min no/ /ka ra ha Da pad+ma'i skogs/ /pad+ma'i skra dang ka shar//
13b4(mdo 'grel): mo min no/ /'dab ma 'khyil dang lo ma gsar/ /sa bon mdzod dang ze 'bru'o/ /bshad/ mtho ris mkha' dang phyogs dus blo/ /sgra sogs gar dang bcas pa dang/ /sa 'og gdengs can dmyal ba chu/ /de rnams kyi ni chags bcas bshad/ /sa 'og gi sde'o/ /'chi med
13b5(mdo 'grel): seng ge zhes pas mdzad pa'i ming dang rtags kyi rjes su bshad pa las mtho ris la sogs skabs dang po yan lag dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //sa yi sde tshan grong khyer dang/ /ri bo dang ni nags tshal dang/ /sman dang ri dags la sogs
13b6(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /mi dang bram ze rgyal rigs dang/ /rje? rigs dmangs rigs yan lag bcas/ /nye ba'i yan lag bcas 'dir brjod/ /sa gzhi skrun byed mi g.yo ba/ /mdza' yas bcud ldan sna tshogs 'gengs/ /'gyur med 'dzin byang rtan byed dang/ /'chang
13b7(mdo 'grel): byed g.yo byad rgyal byed dang/ /'od srungs byin dang gnas dang ni/ /kun bzod gser ldan nor 'dzin dang/ /yang can dbyig 'dzin chu skyob dang/ /sa dang sa gzhi skyed byed bzod/ /sa chen zhig gor mchod byed do/ /sa dang mri ti ka zhes so/ /rab dangs sa bzangs//
14a1(mdo 'grel): yid 'ongs/ /sa gshin 'bru kun skye ba dang/ /sa ngan dang ni tsha'i sgo can/ /ba tshwa can dang tshan can dang/ /gnyis pa dag kyang gzhan gyis rtags/ /thad dang byas pa'i thad ka'o/ /mtshungs pa mya ngan thad dgon pa/ /gnyis te ma bskos ma
14a2(mdo 'grel): smos mtshungs/ /gsum ni de nas 'gro ba dang/ /'jig rten dang ni gnas rten dang/ /sa brten skye 'gro 'jig rten no/ /'di ni b+hA ra ta yi yul/ /sa rA ba ta'i chu gad las/ /de phyogs dang po shar dang lho/ /dang po dang ni steng gi phyogs/ /nub dang byang dang/ /mdza' 
14a3(mdo 'grel): 'khob dang ni kla klo'i yul/ /yul dbus ma ? dang ni/ /'phags 'khrungs bsod nams sa gzhi dang/ /'bigs byad gangs ri dag gi dbus/ /mnga' ris dang ni skye ba'o gnas/ /yul phyogs dang ni nye 'khor ro/ /gsum ni lhas kyi mthar thug pa//
14a4(mdo 'grel): 'dam bu phar char 'dam du can/ /ku mud ldan ba ku mud mar/ /spa yi tshal ni sba mang po/ /lo ma rtsa skyes ? ba dang/ /'bru skyes pa ni pang gi la/ /chud mar chu dang ldan pa'o/ /pho/ mu khyud ldan pa de bzhin sgrug/ mo ni gyo can rdzaM du can/ /gseg ma dang ni
14a5(mdo 'grel): rde'u can/ /de la sogs pa'i yul rnams te/ /de bzhin gzhan yang shes par bya/ /bye ma can dang gtsang shod yul/ /char 'bab 'bru rnams phun tshogs skyong/ /gtsang po'i ma dang lha yi ma/ /ji ltar rim pa/ rgyal po bzang ba'i yul dang ni/ /rgyal po
14a6(mdo 'grel): bzang po dang ldan dang/ /gzhan la rgyal po can zhes so/ /bal b+has ni gos thA na ka/ gau Sh+ThI na ni sngon byung lhag /rnam grangs de rnams sa'i zhor la/ /rdzing dang yur ba mo dang pho/ /gro mkhar grog tshad grog mo 'khyim/ /skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo/ /lam dang 'gro bya
14a7(mdo 'grel): bgrod bya dang/ /shul lam 'jug bya goms dang lam/ /'khor bya dang ni rkang gcig ga/ shin tu 'jug bya lam bzangs dang/ /bden lam mchod par bya ba'i lam/ /lam ngan sdug 'gro ba pa thA/ /g.yon lam kI pa tha ni mtshungs/ /lam med a
14b1(mdo 'grel): pa tha yin no/ /lam 'dom sa rang bzhi mdo dang/ /mdza' dang ring po lam stong dang/ /dgron pa bgrod dka' i lam dang ni/ /gabyu ti ni mo rgya dgrags bzung/ /na lwa khru ni bzhi brgya'o/ /dril bu'i lam ni khral ba'o/ /de ni grol khyer nyer grol lo/ /sa'i sde mtshan no/ /
14b2(mdo 'grel): grong khyer mo ste skyong byed dang/ /rgyal lam 'bab gnas tshed bdal dang/ /'jigs med dang ni ma bskyod gnas/ /gzhan gang rtsa ba'i grong khyer las/ /grong khyer de ni lo ma'i grong/ /smad 'tshod gnas dang 'jug gnas skye bo'i gnas/ /kun 'jug ha ste
14b3(mdo 'grel): tshod 'dus dang/ /tshod lam dang ni srad lam dang/ /srad dang tshod khang rgya 'grems sa/ /ra ba'i rmad dang 'gram mo min/ /ra ba bskor ba lcags ri dang/ /rim pa/ 'obs tshal mdza' ya mu khyud do/ /rtsig pa mo dang brtsegs pa dang/ /rtsig pa'i bar rus
14b4(mdo 'grel): kAM ka saM/ /khang ba khyim dang gnas dang ni/ /'jug bya chags dang gnas gzhi dang/ /mtshan mdza' nges 'gro rtag pa dang/ /gnas khang phibs 'og 'dung nas so/ /'dzin gnas skyes bu mang po'i tshig /skyabs 'og dang ni khar khyim dang/ /'dug sa khang
14b5(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis dag go /gnas sa dang ni khyim rnams so/ /khyim bzhi yod pa bgro ldan no/ /thug rnams lo ma'i spyil bo dang/ /rtsa skyes skyil po mo min no/ /mchod rten mchod sbyin gnas dag mtshungs/ /rta yi ra ba rta khang dang/ /A be shan zo yig mra? pra? pa'o
14b6(mdo 'grel): ma tha slob grar la sogs gnas/ /gany+dza tu ni tshad ma'i khyim/ /garb+hA gA raM nang gi khyim/ /a riSh+Ta ni pu bcas khyim/ /glo sker khra ma ga bAk+Sha/ /'dun sa ma min skye bo'i gnas/ /bsil khang la sogs nor ldan gnas/ /khang bzangs lha dang sa
14b7(mdo 'grel): bdag khyim/ /zhal khang mo min rgyal po'i khab/ /'du khang rgyal po'i pho brang dang/ /bkra shis ma dang kun bzang dang/ /g.yung drung 'khyil ba la sogs kyang/ /dbang phyug rnams kyi pho phrang gi /bkod pa'i rab tu dbye bar 'gyur/ /sa
15a1(mdo 'grel): bdag pho brang mdza' mar ni/ /btsun mo'i khang pa srung ma can/ /dag pa'i mdza' can srung ma can/ /ya them ya phubs mo min no/ /sgo drung sgo mdun sgo rtsa ni/ /phyi rol sgo  yi khyams yin no/ /sgo kha sgo phibs 'jug pa
15a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /yan lag bzhi mdo srang mdo dang/ /shing ? rdo yi ma them dang/ /re bzhi de yi steng du gnas/ /glo'i sgo mdza' ma'i sgo yin te/ /phyogs mdza' i sgo ni rtsibs sgo'o/ /chu babs thog gi tha ma dang/ /de nas thog dang chu skyob dang/ /gdung sgur shing
15a3(mdo 'grel): 'khyog thog shing skra/ /phug ron skyong dang bya skyibs can/ /skyes buAm ni ma ning ngo/ /mo/ sgo dang srung byed sgo mo dang/ /stegs bu dang ni snam bu dang/ /rta babs mo min sgo yi phyi/ /grong khyer sgo dang sgo mo che/ /mnga' yab grong sgro glang po'i sen/ /de
15a4(mdo 'grel): las gsum yin no/ /sgo glags sgo rnam mnyam pa'o/ /sgo gtan 'phreng gtan ma ning mo/ /'dzag skes dang ni tham skas so/ /skas ka dang ni ya gang ngo/ /phyags ma dang ni dag byed yin/ /rdul dang phyag dang des 'phangs so/ /sgro bdun skyabs 'gro
15a5(mdo 'grel): nges 'jug dang/ /nges 'gugs so/ /mtshungs ba grod par grong mtshams so/ /khyim gyi sa gzhi khang pa dang/ /mo min no/ grong mthang nye ba'i grong zhes min/ /mtshams dang so mtshams gnyis po mo/ /'brog khyim rtsa yi khang pa yin/ /'cher byed sha
15a6(mdo 'grel): ba ri yi khyim/ /grong khyer gyi sde tshan no// //sa 'dzin rtse can sa gzhi 'chang/ /mi 'phrogs 'dzin byed tshigs can dang/ /ri bos skyob gyen du 'gyur/ /ri dang mi g.yo brag ? brtsegs/ /'jig rten snang ba khor yug dang/ /ri bo sum brtsegs/
15a7(mdo 'grel): rtse gsum mtshungs/ /nub ri phyi phyogs sa 'dzin no/ /shar phyogs sngon ma'i ri yin no/ /gangs ldan dang ni 'gog byed dang/ /'bigs byed dang ni mA lya ya/ /yongs su bskor dang sbom dang ldang/ /sa lko ma la mo/ mai nA ke/ ke lA sha(mdo 'grel): shA nu mA na pi/ krau NA trA/ manda ra/ a'i/
15b1(mdo 'grel): shA na(mdo 'grel): kiM shu ko/ tsiSh+Tu she shwa ra/ /'di rnams ri yi bye brag ste/ gzhan las 'byung ngo/ /gzhan yang gangs ri rtsegs la sogs/ /mi 'gro/ rde ba sbed byed gor ma dang/ /ba cog bo rdu bo rtun dang rdo/ /brtsegs pa mo min rtse dang rwa/ /ltung gnas g.yang sa ri gzar dang/ /ri zhol
15b2(mdo 'grel): mo min ri rtsa dang/ /ri lte ngas bang rim ri ltongs dang/ /mo min no/ /chu can chu dang ldan pa dang/ /chu 'bab chu sgra can dang sgrogs/ /ri sul dam grog mo min no/ /lhag nas khyams dang phug dang khung/ /rgyu dang ri ni nyil ba dang/ /shwa dang ri yi bud ces bya'o/ /rkong sa mo ste
15b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung khungs yin/ /ri yi rkang pa ri phran no/ /ri rtsa ri 'og sa gzhi dang/ /ri steng dang ni sa gzhi mtho/ /ro bo'i khams ni ldong ras sogs/ /btsag ran dang ni khyad par can/ /nags ri nags tshal ma ning ngo/ /khri shing la sogs rnams kyis g.yogs/ /ri'i sde'o// //
15b4(mdo 'grel): 'brog dang dgon pa stong pa dang/ /sdug po dben gnas nags tshal dang/ /dgan pa tshan po nags stug po/ /khyim dang tshal dang nges 'gro dang/ /skyed mos tshal yin/ /nye 'khor tshal dang byas pa'i nags/ /de bzhin gang du smad 'tshong dang/ /tshogs can khyim dang nye ba'i 'tshal/ /shing
15b5(mdo 'grel): gi ldum ra can/ /skyes bu rtse gnas skyed mo tshal/ /rgyal po'i gzhi dang nye ba'i tshal/ /yin no/ /de ni lha yi rab dga' tshal/ /grong khyer mdza' yi bkod pa'o/ /tshang ma phreng ba gral dang ni/ /khrigs chags bkod pa gral rim mo/ /nags dang tshal ni tshogs pa yin/ /myu gu dang ni zha lu skyes
15b6(mdo 'grel): shing dang sa skyes yal 'dab can/ /ljon pa rkang 'thung chur mi ltung/ /'gro 'gog shing dang lo ma can/ /sdong po ljon shing shing 'gro med/ /nags ni me tog mdza' mar 'bras/ /me tog med pa'i 'gras ldan nags/ /sman ni 'bras smin mthar 'jig pa/ /'bras bu 'dzin pa mo
15b7(mdo 'grel): sham min/ /mo sham 'bras med shing thog med/ /'bru ldan 'bras can shing thog can/ /rab shar nyer bye yang dag rgyas/ /sbub grol rnam phye 'phro ba can/ /me tog kha bye rnam rgyas yin/ /mo sham min sogs gsum yin/ /sdong du ma brtan po rtsa gog dang/ /yal ga rtsa
16a1(mdo 'grel): thud k+Shu ba'o/ /sdong po ska ba mgul ba dang/ /'khri shing 'gu gong lcug ma dang/ /'khri shing lo ma yal 'dab dang/ /lcug ma dang ni tshang tshing ngo/ /'gro med la sogs bskyed pa ni/ /stod dang sgreng dang blang ba'o/ /mo min mgul dang
16a2(mdo 'grel): stod rkang ni/ /rtsa ba yal ga las byung shing/ /mtshungs pa yal ga lcug ma ste/ /sdong po'i yal ga yal 'dab dang/ /rtsa phran dang ni ral ba'o/ /yal ga'i rtsa ba 'phyang ba dang/ /rtsa las 'khri shing rtse mor son/ /mgo dang rtse mo co do ni/ /yang na po'o/ /rtsa ba
16a3(mdo 'grel): rmang dang rkang pa'o/ /snying po rkang mar mtshungs pa'o/ /lpags mo lkogs shun mo min no/ /me shing shing? bu 'tshong shing de/ /yam shing 'om shing sreg shing mo/ /khog stong nad can yang ni pho/ /gang bu dang ni skye ma mo/ /ltung byed lo ma grib byed dang/ /'dab
16a4(mdo 'grel): ma shing lo lo 'dab po/ /yal 'dab mo min yal tshogs dang/ /rgya chen go lang mo min no/ /shing sogs rnams kyi 'bras bu 'bru/ /brin taM skye gnas rab tu bcings/ /ma smin 'bras bu sha la Tu/ /me tog skam po bA na ste/ /'di gnyis rtags gsum//
16a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur dang sbal min ma ning ngo/ /gzhon nu dang ni gsar bu po/ /la bye ba dang gyes pa dang/ /bu che tshigs 'chas mo min no/ /mo/ yid dags puShpa me tog dang/ /ku su ma rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /me tog bcud dang me tog ro/ /me tog rdul dang
16a6(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong rdul/ /gnyis dman 'bras 'byung kun/ /a du ra sogs mo yin no/ /A shA dtha dang bai Na pa/ /plak+Sha dang ne ya gro d+he/ /eng gu daM ni 'bras bu 'bru/ /'dzam bu'i 'bras bu rngaM b+hun+tI/ /dzaM bu dzam pa lam yin no/ /me tog rigs la sogs
16a7(mdo 'grel): pa rnams/ /rang gi rtags/ 'bru dang 'bras bu/ /bidArya la sogs pa rnams/ /rtsa ba me tog ma ning ste/ /pA Ta la/ byang chub shing dang lo ma bskyod/ /pip+pa la dang glang po'i zas/ /a shwadtha 'o de nas ni/ /skyur rtsi urd+ha rd+hi t+tha dang/ /so rtse la
16b1(mdo 'grel): gnod skyur mo'o/ /de la zho 'bras me tog 'bru/ /so rtse nyams byed ces pa'o/ /u dum bA ra 'dzam bu'i 'bras/ /mchod sbyin yan lag gser 'o ma/ /yongs 'dus brtol rnga yab can/ /ku mud lo ma 'dab zung can/ /lo ma bdun po shun pa mthug
16b2(mdo 'grel): shA ri dA dang dug lo ma/ /dong kha dang ni rgyal po'i shing/ /zhi byed sor mo bzhi pa dang/ /'khor lo dang 'dra nad 'joms dang/ /me tog phreng byad lo ma bzang/ /skyar rtsi chen po so rtse dang/ /skyur mo dzaM b+hirdzam+b+ha la/ /klu shing chu shing dkar po dang//
16b3(mdo 'grel): lo ma kha dang gzhon nu'o/ /skyes bu klu shing skyes snga dang/ /mtho dang ge sar lha yi 'dab/ /yongs bzang dang ni nim pa'i shing/ /manda ra dang mchod yon 'dab/ /ti ni se dang syanda no/ /mu khyung shing dang shing rta'i shing/ /shin tu grol dang snod shing dang/ /sna
16b4(mdo 'grel): tshogs byed dang de nas gnyis/ /pI ta na ka bi ta no/ /a mra ta'i shing ngo/ /sbrang rtsi mngar ba'i me tog can/ /sbrang rtsi shing dang pAM pra s+tha/ /ma d+huSh+ThI lau/ /ri skyes ma d+hu la ka'o/ /pI lo 'bras mngar sran sri'o/ /de la ri byur a kO Ta/ /karbar lo gnyis yin no/ /g.ya' shing
16b5(mdo 'grel): lus bo za bar byed/ /pA lA sha dang ki shu ka /lo ma bA ta bo tha dang/ /de nas sman shing shing rta dang/ /sprin gyi me tog bi du la/ /dkar po bI na rbany+dzu la/ /gnyis po pa ri bya d+ha dang/ /be du lo dang nA de yI/ /skyur mo dang ni ta ru shi/ mdzes pa'i mig sman shi gru
16b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dri sno mig 'dra grol ba can/ /me tog mngar dang shing gru mngar/ /a riSh+Ta dang phe ni la mtshungs so/ /bilpe shAN+Di lya dang ni/ /shai lu Shau dang mA lu ra/ /dpal gyi 'bras bu nyid kyang ngo/ /bAk+Shai ra tsanprko Ti/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang rkang mangs dang/ /ba Ta'o//
16b7(mdo 'grel): zhu mkhan sA ba ra lo d+hA'o/ /twi 'i rI Ta ti lwa nyed byed do/ /a ma 'dzag byed ro ldan no/ /lhan cig byed pa A mra zhim/ /bu mkhan ltu kha la ke ma ning/ /kau shi ka gug gul 'gengs/ /se lu bad 'joms dkar po dang/ /de yi 'dab ma lan
17a1(mdo 'grel): mangs po/ /rgyal po byin dang pi yA la/ /san+na kru Du d+ha nu ba ra?/ /zab mo kun bzang ka shtsha ri/ /sprang lo ma/ /dpal gyi lo ma bzang/ /kA sh+na dya dang yang de nas gnyis/ /rag chung shing dang skyur shing ngo/ /ko ba li/
17a2(mdo 'grel): ko lam stobs ngan phe ni le/ /sau bA riM ba dang raM g+hoNA dang/ /de nas swA du ka N+DaM ka/ pi ka ka ta sgang bzang shing/ /tshigs mang ba dang stag gi rkang/ /er ba ta na rang ga /skar? rtsi sa yi dzam+bu'o/ /dandu ka dang sphur dza ka ka /kA la skand+ha rkang mar nag/
17a3(mdo 'grel): kA kenda ku la ka /kA ka pi lu ka /bya rog tindu ke /goM lI Dho dza Dha la/ /g+haN+Ta pA Ta li/ /thar dang grol ba can/ /ti la ka dang k+Shu ra dang/ /dpal ldan no/ /zha mo bi tsu la dzhA pu ka /dpal gyi lo ma ku mu di ka/ /kuM b+hI ke Da rya ka Ta'i 'bras/ /zhu mkhan
17a4(mdo 'grel): paTTi ke khya yin/ /zhu mkhan dmar po rgya skyegs dangs byed do/ /nU da pU Sha kra mu ka /tshangs shing tshangs pa'i dA ru dang/ /mtshungs/ nI pa dags byed ki daM bA/ /gshol ldan dga' bar byed pa'o/ /dpa' bo'i shing dang a ru Sha kar//
17a5(mdo 'grel): me sdong dang b+ha l+laDa ki gsum/ /garha b+haN+De ka? h+dA? sA la/ /ka pI ta na su pA rShA kA(mdo 'grel): /pla kI tan+ti DI da nga ba se yab shing/ /skyur mo caM? bzhur kra rtsi shing/ /a sa na banra ka'i me tog dga' byed mtsho byed do/ /spos dkar/ /kra rtsi kra rtsi bog dang rna ba can/
17a6(mdo 'grel): a sya saM ba ra/ /gtsang po'i sra shing dpa' i po'i shing/ /dpa' bo'i shing dang? ka ku b+ho rdzun/ /rA dzA de? pA lA d+ha k+She ka'o mi shing de nas gnyis so/ /aM gu dI tsha ba shing/ /stag pa ri ga shud pa mnyen/ /pi ts+tsha la dang snying pa dang/ /grol
17a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang ni tshe brtan dang/ /shalma li ni gnyis/ /bi ts+tsha tu shA la/ ma lI/ /tse Ta Te/ ro tsa na phung pa shAlma li/ /tsir bi la na ku ma la/ /kardza dang ka rany+dza ke/ bri kI rya pU ti ka ra dza/ /bwu tI ka dang ka li kA ra ka /ka ratsdza b+he dang tshogs drug mo k+kaTu//
17b1(mdo 'grel): i? gA ra dang bal+la rI/ ro hI ro hi ta ka mtshun dgra /se 'bru'i me tog go /seng ldeng byis pa'i nu ma dang/ /ba di ra danda d+hA da ba na/ /a ri med do sdug pa seng ldeng ser ldeng dang ni seng ldeng dkar/ /zla ba'i yal ga nyid kyang ngo/ /de nas stag 'jug dri za lag /
17b2(mdo 'grel): a? u ru bri ka /ru tsu ka dang ri mo can/ /tsany+tsu dang ni sor lnga pa/ /a maN+Da 'phel ldan bya da? sra ka /cung zad zhi dangs sha mir/ /sha mi sa ku'i 'bras bu zhi ba paN+Di ta go /ma ru ba kashtsa sa na ka ra hA Ta ka sha lya chang gi shing/ /brgya byin rkang 'thung
17b3(mdo 'grel): yongs bzad dang/ /shing bzang dru ka li si/ /shing ser shun pa tshi can shi/ /bdun po de ba dA ru yin/ /de nas gnyis po skya nar dang/ /pA Ta ma lA dang don yod dang/ /kA ra s+tha li 'bras bu'i shing/ /me tog rtsa nag lus ngan mig /khro rgod bud med ming
17b4(mdo 'grel): can dang/ /'khri shing pa la phyag 'tshal dang/ /bre dang bri yang gu dang ni/ /'bras shing dang ni 'bras bu can/ /sna tshogs sde dang di yi 'bras/ /kA raM b+hA dang dga' byed do/ /spal pa'i lo ma ba tro rA/ /gar byed ka d+haM ga dang ni/ /Tu Na ka nang gsher shing ngo/ /ne tsho sna
17b5(mdo 'grel): dang skar ma dang/ /kam tog /mgul rings kuTana Ta/ /sho Na ka dang a ra lo/ /ti sh+ya'i 'bras bu skyur ru ra/ /gsum yin bdud rtsin chod med/ /rtags gsum pa ni ba ru ra/ /mig dang tshim byed karSha'i 'bras/ /'byung po'i gnas dang rtsod pa'i shing/ 'jigs
17b6(mdo 'grel): med nad med phan pa can/ /na chod mi 'gyur med chi can bdud rtsi dang/ /a ru ra dang gser ldan dang/ /sems byed dpal dang zhi ba dang/ /ljon pa ser po thang shing/ /thang chu shing zhes pa yang ngo/ /de nas utpal shing dang ni/ /lte ba can/
17b7(mdo 'grel): dang yongs nad dang/ /la ku tsa dang li gu tsa/ /u tu tu/ pa nas dang tsher 'bras can/ /ni tsu la dang chu skyes chu shing/ /bya rog u dum+ba ri kA/ 'bras bu gur ma pa pUr dang/ /rje par 'bras can/ /a riSh+Ta dang kun la bzang/ /shing
18a1(mdo 'grel): kun 'dras dang dri ma can/ /'joms byed dang ni nimpa'i shing/ /de nas pits+tshu nA dang/ a ga ru/ /shiM sha pa dang skya bo dang/ /thal ba'i snying can zhes bya'o/ /shi ri kha dang chu 'thung dang/ /g+haN+DI lo yang nod nas
18a2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /tsaM be yang dang tsaM pa ka /gser gyi me tog tsampa'o/ /de yi 'bras bu ka li kA/ /dri yi 'bras bu de nas ni/ ke ba re dang ba ku la/ /pany+dzu lo ni mya ngan med/ /mtshungs pa se 'bru dA Di ma/ /tsampe ya dang ke sar can/ /nA ga ga sar gser ming
18a3(mdo 'grel): can/ /rgyal dang rgyal byed rtog pa'i dgra /nA de yi dang rnam rgyal shing/ /dpal gyi lo ma me gtsug shing/ /zhi ba dang tshogs byed rgyal ba'o/ /de nas bcad skyer brgya byin shing/ /bu yi shing dang ri yi phreng/ /de yi
18a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu ka ling+ge/ dbang po'i nas dang nas bzang 'bras/ /'bras nag smin pa bi sh+na/ /su She NA dngal ga nyid do/ /nag po'i phur/ bo tA mA la/ /min pany+tsi dang de nas ni/ /sindu ka sindu bA re/ /chang gi dang po ni rguN+Di/ dbang
18a5(mdo 'grel): can yang ngo/ /lan bu kha rA ga rI de ba tA/ /Do sprin zhes pa yang ngo/ /dpal gyi lag pa d+hu ra N+Di/ /rtswa rtse shing dang mal+li kA/ /sa'i rkang pa sha ta b+hi ru dang/ /sai bA spha tA na gas la byung/ /she pa li ka legs 'bab dang/ /
18a6(mdo 'grel): ni rguN+DI dang sngon po can/ /si ta sau de pa? dkar po dang/ /ro zhim 'byung po 'jug /de nas mA ga d+hI ga Ni kA /pU thi kA dang a mASh+Tha/ /de ser gser gyi me tog can/ /shin tu grol dang puN+Da ka /spyid ldan sbrang gi shing 'khri shing/ /me tog
18a7(mdo 'grel): sna ma yid dga' dang dzA ti'o/ /'dab bdun gzhon nu'i phreng ba can/ /chu zla me tog kun pa'o/ /dmar ba me tog band+hu ka /band+hu dzI ba yin no/ /nus ldan gzhon nu ta ra Ni/ /am lA na dang nus ldan che/ /de la dmar po ku ru pa ka /de la ser po ku ru Na
18b1(mdo 'grel): tha ka /sngon po dzhiN+DI gnyis dang mda'/ /bran mo tsA rtu sha la sa/ /sai rI ya ga dzhiN+Da yin/ /de la ku ru ba ka dmar po dang/ /ser po ku ru ba ka dang/ /dzhiN+Di de la lhan cig spyod pa gnyis/ /rda mi ma tog dza ba dang/ /rdo rje'i me tog ti laM gang/ /pra tI hA sa brgyar gyes dang
18b2(mdo 'grel): gtun po rta bsod lag pa dpa' / /ka ri re dang kra ka da?/ /tshigs pa dang gnyis so/ /smyo byed dang ni ki ta bo/ /gdul dka' yi d+hu rku ra/ /gser gyi me tog ces pa'o/ /mA tu la dang myos byed do/ /de'i 'bras bu mA tu la bu tra ka /'bras bu gang ba bI dzA pU ra/ /mdog
18b3(mdo 'grel): mdzes ma tu lung+ga ka /sa mi ra Na ma ru ba ka /bra s+tha me tog pha Na dzdzha ka /dza mwI ro dang de nas ni/ /par+Na ser dang ka Thiny+dza ra ku the ra dkar po ardzu ka 'di pA thi khra bo ma'i ming can/ /arga zhes pa ba su ka /a spho Ta tshogs pa'i gzugs mand+ha ra dang arka'i ?
18b4(mdo 'grel): 'di dkar phongs larka bra tA bas/ /zhi ba'i me tog phyugs bdag dga' / /shing gcig spra ba bsu'o/ /banda shing la za ba dang/ /shing skyes 'tsho ba nyid kyang ngo/ /bu zas bcad skye sle tres dang/ /rgyud ldan bdud rtsi 'tsho byed dang/ /zla ba'i mgul
18b5(mdo 'grel): ba yangs pa can/ /spad? gi lo ma nyid kyang ngo/ /myur ba lha mo sbrang gi ro/ /mo ra Ta dang 'od ldan thos/ /ma d+hu li ka gzhu shing dang/ /sh+re ta go bar+Ni dang/ /bI lu bar+Nwa? nyid kyang ngo/ /bA thA ma nu spos dkar dang/ /bi d+hwa kar+Ni gnas
18b6(mdo 'grel): can dang/ /rten dang ro ldan sdong bu gcig /sdig pa'i bram mo bra tsI nA/ /nag la mo can/ /tsha ba tsha bas gang ba dang/ /mya ngan med dang spor dang ni/ /tsha ba'i spor dang nya khris dang/ /nag dbye 'khor lo'i yan lag dang/ /bya'i zas/ bdag sped dzA Da a d+hu Na Da//
18b7(mdo 'grel): g.ya' shing b+ha bri ShA ya NI/ /ri Sh+ya brok+tA shu ka shi ma bi/ /ka bi ka ts+tshu sh+ya ma k+kaTTi/ /ri mo nye ba'i ri mo can/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang khu ba ldan/ /sdom pa dang ni char 'bab dang/ /bra tya ka sh+re NI su dza sh+re NI/ /raN+DA byi ba'i rna ba'o/ /yang 'og lam
19a1(mdo 'grel): she kha ri ko dang/ /d+hA mArga dang rma bya dang/ /bra tya ka lo ma kI sha'i 'dab/ /ka Ni h+rI dang bung bu'i snyi/ /phany+dzi ka dang tshangs ma dang/ /pad+ma dang ni b+ha rgi dang/ /tshangs pa'i mchod sdong me mdag lo/ /bA le ya shA ka bartha ra bar+d+h+wa ka /rtsod dang bi kas dang ni/ /rdzing gi
19a2(mdo 'grel): yan lag mtshungs pa dang/ /sbal pa'i 'dab ma b+haN+Di ri/ /b+haN+Di dpag tshad Na 'khri shing/ /gze ma ra ma go ya pA so/ /reg bya sdug dang chu med skye/ /ka NA pa ka dngu byed shu/ /byed dang mdza' med dang/ /rgya mtsho'i mthar skye reg par dka' / /pri Sha Ni lo ma thag lo/ sna
19a3(mdo 'grel): tshogs 'dab ma g+h+ri bal+li kA/ kroSh+Na bil+la seng ge 'jug /ka la si dang d+ha ra ni gu ta/ /ni da gwi kA spi shI stag mo bri ta tI/ /kaN+Tha ka brA tso da nI ku li/ /chu ba reg dga' yul skyes kyang/ /rams shing nag poklI ta ki kA/ grong skyes sbrang gi 'dab ma can/ /'tshong byed dpal gyi 'bras
19a4(mdo 'grel): bu dang/ /tun tha tu NI do lA dang/ /sngon por mas so/ /gso ma rA dzA so ma rA dzI dang/ /'dab bzang zla ba'i sdong bu dang/ /kA la me Shi 'bras nag dang/ /bA gu dzI dang rus 'bras can/ /bi pi ling dang nag po dang/ /bai da hI dang ma gad+hI/ /g.yo byed zegs ma sreg par byed/ /grog rked
19a5(mdo 'grel): drod sman ko la'o/ /de nas ka ri pi bya lI/ /ka bi ba l+li/ /sh+re ya sI dang rtsa shir pho/ /dbyi mo stu tsa bi kaM dang/ /kA ka tsi gu ny+dza nag po/ /pa laM ka sha dri sno khyi yi mche ba dang/ /ro ldan tsher ma go kaN+Ta ka /go k+Shu ra ka nags kyi rA/ /zhes pa yang ngo/ /bong nga dkar po blar dug dang//
19a6(mdo 'grel): i ti bi sha nye ba'i phug /a ru Na/ rwa can dang ni snan tshen no/ /de nas 'o ma 'o ma mtshungs/ /rtsa ba brgya pa skud mangs dang/ /b+hi ru rindA rI ba rI/ /ri Sh+ye bshad pa a b+hi ru/ /nye shing ba yan tri dang ni nA ra'i bu sha tA ba rI a he ru/ /de nas skyer pa ka le ya ka khu ba
19a7(mdo 'grel): ser po dar bI/ /pa tsi pa tsa shing ser dang/ /ba rdza nI yang ngo/ /chu thag dri rtse 'dud pa drug /go lo mI dang tshigs brgya ba/ /dkar po gangs dang ldan pa'o/ /sman pa'i ma dang seng ge dang/ /bA sa kA dang khyu mchog dang/ /a Ta rU Sha siM ha sya/ /ba sha ka dang ? yis so/ /a
19b1(mdo 'grel): spho tA ri'i phreng/ /'jug gnong dang ni gzhan las rgyal/ /nor shing dri ldan kAN+De k+Shu/ /khu byug mig dang k+Shu ra k+Shu rA/ /shA le ya dang ts+tshi ta shi pa/ /gdugs dang mngar ldan mi sI dang/ /si stre yA dang de nas ni/ /shI ri khaN+Da rdo rje'i shing/ /sdug? sna h+ri gu Da thams cad 'o ma can//
19b2(mdo 'grel): byi dang ga dang don yod dang/ /sna tshogs 'bras/ /tan? la dang srin bu gsong/ /bi DaM ga pho ma ning/ /ba lE bA TyA la ka dang/ /dril bu'i sgra dang shA Na'i me tog /dgun 'brum pa yin nu ma dang/ /drA k+ShA ro ldan sbrang gi ro/ /kun mdzes 'byung dang sa b+hA hA/ /thu gsum dri bri tA
19b3(mdo 'grel): tri pri ta/ /dum bu gsum pa re ba ni/ /sngon po dang ni ba li d+ho/ /su Sha Ni pe nag po dang/ /san chung 'dab ma zla ba phyed/ /kA la me Sha kA/ shing mngar dang ni klI ta kaM/ paSh+Ti ma d+hu shing mngar yin/ /rnam 'joms 'o ma dkar po dang/ /bur shing dri dang kau/ Shi Tu tsa ya si tA/ /'o
19b4(mdo 'grel): ma nyung ngu rnam 'joms dkar chen dang/ /k+ShaM? gi dri can lA ga lI/ shArdI chu yi pi pya lI/ /bya'i zas/ rta rgod kA ra bI/ /sgron me rma bya'i mdongs/ /lo tsam stag sprul lce sngon po shA ri bA/ mdza' med utpal shi rI tsa/ /yo gya mri d+hwi gru pa dang/ /lak+Sh+yo dang ni rgan po'i ming//
19b5(mdo 'grel): 'di chu shi gA ra tsu sA chu shing grol a nad shu ma ta kaSh+Thi lA/ /mut+sa'i? lo ma mut+sa ha ta yang/ /baN+Da hiM gu lI sing+ga baN+NA ki duSh+Ta ha ra shi NI/ /na ku li dang ro zhim dang/ rA snA dri bzangs nab la dri/ /na ku la 'dod sprul mig pa/ /gdugs can dang ni legs par 'bab//
19b6(mdo 'grel): rnam 'joms dri dang aN+Da ma tri dang/ /sha yi'i mang ba dang gnas dang bstan/ /ras bal rgya mtsho'i mdza' can dang/ /gar sya si da ba de re/ ras bal rgod dang sna ba n+ya/ /ro can drang srong khyu mchog go /gA ge ru kI klu yi stobs/ /ri ShA hA swa ga d+he d+hu kA/ d+hA sArbba?/
19b7(mdo 'grel): ba sgra ldan yin/ /ma hA dza li me tog ser/ /dzyau da sni ba Ti li kA dzA lI/ /klu yi khri shing nyid kyang ngo/ /de nas gnyis skyes ha re N+Ta/ /re Nu ka dang kau na ti dang/ dmar skya ding na thal ba'i dri/ /e la bA lug me le yaM/ /dri bzangs ha ri ba lu kaM/ /bA lu kany+tsa de nas ni/ /bA
20a1(mdo 'grel): lad? kyang dang mu kunda/ /kunda kun du ru bA lam/ /h+ri be ra bar hiSh+Tha dI myaM/ /ke shAm bu yi ming can no/ /kA lA bu sar ya bri d+ha/ /shma'i me tog dkar zhi ba ni tu/ /she la yaM ta la'i lo ma dai tyA gand+ha/ ku tri mu rA gand+ha nI/ glang chen zas dang
20a2(mdo 'grel): legs 'bab dang/ /dri bzangs ro ldan ma he hla da naM? tsa/ /me 'bar dang ni su b+hi kE/ d+hA ta kI dang ma ma'i me tog /ka ko la dang zla stobs dang/ /e lA niSh+ku Ta mang? po/ /de nas su smel u pa ku nya tsi/ /ka tu t+tha rang gi thum po gsum/ /Tu Ti rus rta kuSh+Tha bA ri b+hA bya/ /byA pyAM
20a3(mdo 'grel): pA ka la rus rta'o/ /dung can kun ma'i me tog yin/ /skra can/ de nas be tun+na ka dzha? Ta ma lA/ /adzdzA Ta tA lI shi bA tA ma la kI ta tsi/ pra bauN+Di rI kaM baN+Da rya/ /de nas tun+na ku pe ra ka /ku Ni ka ts+tsha kAn+tA la ka /dga' ba'i shing/ /da nas srin mo gtum mo nor 'phrog k+She ma
20a4(mdo 'grel): du pu traM tshogs pa bzod/ /sprul gyi mtshon dang stag san dang/ ka ra dzi dang 'khor lo byed/ /spubs can byi ru 'khri shing phug ron rkang/ /d+ha ma n+ya dang dza na ke shI/ ha nu haDa bi la sI ni/ /shugti shi kha khur ko lad laM/ /sen mo de nas aTa kI kak+Shi mring mA ba'i
20a5(mdo 'grel): kA /mri tA la ka yul bzangs rnams su skye ba/ /li ga dur dang tre sha pur nags skyes pa ri be la baM/ bla ba go pu 'go nar dang/ /kye bar musta kA ni/ tsa/ /tsa ba tshigs 'dab shu kaM barhi'i me tog /s+tho Ne ya ku k+ka re/ ma ru nmA lA bi shu nA prik+ka lha mo'i 'khri
20a6(mdo 'grel): shing/ /la g+hu rgya mtsho mya mthar thug pa d+hu ko Ta barSha la kA pi ke yang ngo/ /dka' thub can ma ral can ma/ /spang spos spu can mi shI/ lpags pa'i lo ma su d+ha Ta b+h+ri ngag lpags pa ro tsa yan lag mchog /kartsu ra ko drA bi Da ka /kA lpa ka dang rig byed ldong/ /e sha d+hye
20a7(mdo 'grel): rigs tsam yin ra dzA ta ni kun la sman/ /shA kA khyi dang lo ma me tog sogs taN+Tu li yed chung ba 'phags pa bri sha lya dang ma'i rtse/ /mdza' med 'bras bu brgya byin me tog /ri k+Sha'i dri can ts+tsha ga lAn+tya ba gI rgan 'dzoms dzuM ga /tshangs mnya mig na tshod
20b1(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /zla ba'i 'khri shing lo ma gsal dang gser ldan dang/ /gser gyi 'o ma hi mA ba tI/ /rta 'jug gaM po dzI/ /sran ma'i lo ma bzod po che/ /tuN+De ke ri 'bras bu dmar/ /kiM bi ka dang pi lu par N+ya yang ngo/ /mthong ba bong bu me tog a dzu gand+hi ka /e lE'i lo ma legs
20b2(mdo 'grel): 'bab/ ra? sna yug ta ra sA/ /tsA ga rI dang tsu kri kA/ so rtse med dang skyur mo stong 'bigs tsu kro skyur mo brgya 'bigs kyang ngo/ /na ma skA ri gAN+Da kA li/ /yan mnyam seng ldeng kyang ngo/ /'tsho byed dzI ba nI dzI bA/ dzI ba ni yA ma mngar mo yang ngo/ /kurba shI She ma d+hur ka /ra can lus
20b3(mdo 'grel): thung? dzI ba kA /ki rA t+ti ga ta sa'i nimpa/ /a na ya ti gta de nas sapti dra me sA ta la b+hU ri he lA karma sh+yo si/ /bA so lI swA Tu ro na tshong gnas de nas ma dzu la ka ni kuM b+ha so ldan sre tye k+tsh+re N+Du u dum+ba rA lo ma/ /ra dga' lo ma drag po'i dri/ /bu tu darb+hA ya mA ni ka/ mU le bo ShA karka
20b4(mdo 'grel): sha ma ri/ /kha dze skyes dang pad+ma'i 'dab/ /pau Sha ka re/ e bya thA ti tsa ra pad+ma bATI/ pad+ma bA rI Ni/ /'dar byed rtsub mo zla ba dang/ yan lag dam pa dang mdzes ldan kyang/ /pra pun+nA Da stwe Da'i gling/ /da drug g+h+na tsa kra ma rnga ka/ pad+ma d+hA u ra nA khya/ /me mo dang ni rge'u dang/ /de
20b5(mdo 'grel): nas sman chen sgog skya dang/ /sgog pa a ri Sha Ta chen/ /ro gcig pa'o/ /pu na rna ba sho tha g+hi/ bi tu r+Na su ni Shan+na ka /bA ta ka dang bsal ba can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub a sha na'i lo ma dang/ /yA rA ba tA g+h+ri ka TaM b+hI yi N+Dra dang 'od kyi blo gros 'khri shing/
20b6(mdo 'grel): bArShi ka twa pa mA NA tna yan+ti stobs bzangs biShwa ka se na dga' byed gri Sha Ti bI rA hI ba da re yang ngo/ /mIrka ba dang b+h+riM ga rA dzI/ /kA ka mA tsi po gan no/ /me tog brgya pa gdugs dkar dang/ /gdugs bzang mngar mo mi si'o/ /dzA? ra nag po kA ra bI/ /sa ra Na dang rab tu
20b7(mdo 'grel): brkyang/ /de yi ka TuM b+ha ra dang/ /rgyal po stobs dang stobs bzang dang/ /dza nI dza tU ka ra dzA nI/ /dza tu byed dang 'khor los sgyur/ /reg bya bzang de nas sha TI dri rtsa ba/ /tshigs drug pa dang ka rtsu rA/ /bi pa la shA yang ngo/ /kA ra pe l+la ka Thi l+la ka/ su sha bI dang de
21a1(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /rig ldan pa To la ti ka dang/ /gsal kuSh+mAN+Da? ka pha ta si/ /ga gon karka TI mo/ /ku ba kha mo ka Tya tuM bI/ /ku ba la bu gnyis po mtshungs/ /ri mo can dang ba la mig /go dum+bA dang bI shA la/ /twi na bA ru Ni/ a rsho g+hA sU ra Na/ /kando ga ndi ra ni bra bo rgod/
21a2(mdo 'grel): ka laM byu di ka dang/ /mo min rtsa ba hi la mo tsa kA/ sne'u lo ma'i dbye ba yin/ /durba dang ra ni tshigs pa brgya/ /stong ldan brtson 'grus b+hArga byau/ /ru ha da ni mdza' med do/ /de nas sA si ta glang spu skyes brgya ldan brtson 'grus/ /gaN+Da lI bya ye mig /ku ru bi na dang sprin gyi
21a3(mdo 'grel): ming/ /mu sta mon lug mo min no/ /mon lug bzang po gun dra'o/ /tsu lA lA dang 'khor lo skyed pa/ /'dam lpags pa'i snying po dang/ /las shing shun pa mkhregs pa dang/ /rtswa yi rgyal mtshan tshigs pa brgya/ /nas kyi 'bras bu smug rgod 'ong/ /gling shing
21a4(mdo 'grel): sprin can spubs ldan dang/ /smyug ma dang ni rlung bud can/ /'dud pa tshigs pa dang ni mtshams/ /smyug ma mdangs ldan mda' smyug go /'dam bu na Da po Ta la ga /de nas kA sha ma sti yAM/ /bur shing dri dang po Ta ga la/ /phor mang po'i tshig la
21a5(mdo 'grel): lA lwa dzA(mdo 'grel): /ro ldan dang ni bur shing ngo/ /de yi dbye ba puN+Da dang/ /kAn+tA ra ka la sogs pa'o/ /rtswa bI ri Na Da bIrta raM/ /rtswa ba'i u pI ra mo yin no/ /'jigs med na la daM dang ni/ /sa bya ma mri NA lany+dza lA shA yaM/ /lo ma dzdza kaM la g+hU la/ /sa ba dA ha iSh+Ta kA pa The/ /'dam bu la
21a6(mdo 'grel): sogs rtswa rnams ni/ /garmu ts+tsha tra pA la g+hA/ /rtswa yi phreng ba sa yi rtsA/ /sha Sh+yaM rtsa ni gzhon nu'o/ /g+hA sa nas can sdong dang rtsA/ /rtsA rnams tshigs pa tri N+yA 'o/ /na byA 'dam bu'i tshogs pa'o/ /rtsa yi rgyal zhes tA la'o/ /nA ri ke rag shol ldan no/ /g+hoNa DA pU sha kranra
21a7(mdo 'grel): ko/ gu bA ka dang Tha pra ro/ /'bras bu mud+d+he g+ha 'di ni/ /tsa hi na ta la bcas pa gsum/ /kha rdzu ra dang ke ta ka tA lI kha rdzu rI ni rtswa yi sdong/ /nags dang sman gyi sde'o// //seng ge gdong lnga ri dags dbang/ /ral can 'phrog byed ha dya'i mig /stag dang
21b1(mdo 'grel): gung dang dri snom dang/ /dred dang ri dags za byed do/ /rdo yi sna can pha ga pa dang/ /sgra ldan ko la po tri dang/ /sa brko sa rlong mche ba can/ /sna ring spu langs ko Ta dang/ /sa rlog ces pa nyid kyang ngo/ /spre'u sgug mchod mchod byed dang/ /yal ga'i ri dags gnyer ma'i gdong/ mark+ka Ta dang mi
21b2(mdo 'grel): 'dra dang/ /kI sho dang ni nags gnas so/ /de nas dom dang b+ha la ka /kats+tsha b+hal+la dom mo/ /gaN bse dang khang+gi ni/ /chur 'dres sa nyal rta yi dgra /mahe dang ni se ri b+hA/ mo ni zhi bas la rgya/ /lce sbyad ma rungs ri dags sh+ri gA la/ /g.yon can kro Sha Nu re ru dang/ /ngan g.yo ba dang
21b3(mdo 'grel): dzam+bu ka? zhum bu byi la khrus mkhan dang/ /byi ba gsod dang byi ba'i zas/ /gsum po dbyig gau d+ha ra/ /go d+he ya dang bdag skyes so/ /gzugs mo dzu thur Sha lya'o/ /de yi spu ni sha la lI/ /sha lI la dang sha la'o/ /bA ta pra mI rna ba'o/ /'bar ba nags gnas khyi ri dags gsod//
21b4(mdo 'grel): ri dags sa lus rlung gi srog /khri snyan skyes gnas so/ /gzhung nag khri snyan sa le'o/ /ru ru kha sha raM ku/ saM pa ra rau hi ShA/ /ba lang rna bu Sha te e na sh+yA ro h+ra tA/ /g.yag ri dags dri za shar b+ha rAM/ /su ma ra ba men ri bong 'di sogs ri dags dbang po sogs/ /glang sogs
21b5(mdo 'grel): phyugs kyi rigs sogs rnams/ /byi ba rkun po 'bigs byed dang/ /ri byi byi ba gzhon nu dang/ /rtsangs pa kri ka lA sha'o/ /de nas tshangs phran khyim gyi rtsangs/ /sdom ni mo dang thags mkhan dang/ /ar+Na na b+ha mark+ka Ta ka mnyam gol go dang/ /rna ba'i chu skyes rkang brgya gnyis/
21b6(mdo 'grel): rta shig pa dang shU ka ki Ta/ /lci spur dru r+Nau bri shtse ka /phug ron dig mnyan ka po ta/ /de nas ri bong za dang khra/ /rna ring bya rog dgra dang 'ug /go go g.yag dang srin bu dang/ /byA g+h+ra Ta dang b+ha ra d+hwa dza/ /khany+tsa rA Ti khany+tsa na/ /rgyab dmar dang ni kangka yin/ /de nas tsa Sha ka kI di bi//
21b7(mdo 'grel): ka liM ka b+h+ri ga d+hU syA DA/ /de nas syA ts+tsha b+ha ta pa tra ka/ dA rbA g+ha Ta/ de nas khug rta chu nyung dang/ /tsA ta ka dang mtshungs so/ /khyim bya dang ni zangs ze can/ /kuk+ka Ta'i sgra sgrogs pa dang rkang pa'i mtshon/ /mchi la pa la bing+ga dang/ /de yi chu ma tsi Ta ka/ de dag bu ni tsA Ta kai ra/ /gzhan
22a1(mdo 'grel): gyis mtsho dang gtor ma za/ /bu mo tsa Ta kai ba? hi/ /kark+ka re Du srin bya'o/ /sreg pa kra ka rau dag mtshungs/ /nags na bde dang khu byug dang/ /ki ki la dang si ka yang/ /kA ka khwa ta 'chi ba med/ /gtor ma'i mchog ldan lan cig skya/ /sgra can sgrogs pa'i
22a2(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid can/ /bya rag nyid kyang ngo/ /pho rog dang ni kA ko lau/ /dA tyA ha dang mgrin nag po/ /'ol ba dang ni tsi lau/ /bya rgod dang ni gri d+hau 'o/ /ne tso kun 'gro mtshungs pa'o/ /khrung khrung dang ni krony+tsa 'o/ /de nas bya dkar kaM ka'o/ /bya khyung dmar po sA ra sa/ /dung ba 'khor lo tsakra
22a3(mdo 'grel): bA ka/ gnyis po shing rta'i ming can no/ /chu skyar ka la haM yin/ /utkra? sha kurra mtshungs/ /ngang pa bya khyung dkar po dang/ /'khor lo'i yan lag ma 'dros gnas/ /ngang pa'i rgyal mo mtshungs rkang dmar/ /ngang pa dkar po ma la nai dang phreng ba dzin zhes/ /yul
22a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang ni ngang skya'o/ /shaM rA? ri pA Ta re ni/ /ba lA kA dang pad zlum mgrin/ /ngang ba'i chung ma ba ra TA/ /mtsho dang mtshan nyid dang ldan lo/ /pha wang lpags pa'i 'dab ma can/ /pa roSh+Ni dang te la bA yi kA/ lci spur sngon po ma k+Shi kA/ sbrang ma dang ni sbrang rtsi skyes/ dog
22a5(mdo 'grel): mag but+ti ka yin no/ /sha sbrang nags kyi sbrang ma dang/ /za byed de'i rigs ra lyA yin/ /gno pa lI pa ra Ta gnyis/ /tshad 'bru b+hI gA ri dang ni/ /tsi rti dzhi? l+li ka dang mtshungs 'di rnams/ /ba tang+ga mtshungs phye ma ldeb/ /srin bu me khyer nam mkha' i 'od/ /sbrang 'gro
22a6(mdo 'grel): sbrang byed mi d+hu li/ /sbrang rtsi skyong dang ra yig gnyis/ /me tog 'thung dang bung ba dang/ /rkang pa drug dang b+hA ma ra/ /se 'gro rma bya mdongs ldan dang/ /mgrin mngos dang ni lag 'gro za/ /gtsug pung can dang rtse mo can/ /ke kI dang ni 'brug sgra'i gar/ /sgeg pa yang
22a7(mdo 'grel): ke kA bA NI rni bya'i sgra/ /mtshungs pa zla gam/ rma bya'i mdongs/ /gtsug pud rtse mo mdngos dang ni/ /mjug ma'i sgro dang ma ning ngo/ /mkha' 'gro mkhar rgyu bi ta ga /mkha' spyod bi hI ya sa dang ni/ /bya dang gshog ldan nus ldan dang/ /sha kun+ta dang sha ku na//
22b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis skyes 'dab ldan sgro can dang/ /pa ta ga dang pa ta ta/ /'dab ma'i shing rta sgo nga skyes/ /'gro med la gnas srin bu za/ /ba Shi ra dang lo ma gsum/ /nI Do b+hA bA 'dab ldan dang/ /bi ts+tsha na ta mkha' la spyod/ /de rnams bye brag ljang kha dang/ /maM gu kA raN+Da ba sla ba/ /srag pa ku
22b2(mdo 'grel): ku b+hyo lA go /shang shang tsa ko ra tsa/ /ko ya Sha Do gaSh+nI Ti b+ha ga /brka brti ka la sogs pa'o/ /bya spu gshog pa sgre dang ni/ /'gebs byed lo ma lus skyes so/ /mo ni dpung pa gshog rtsa'o/ /mchu dang gdong pa gnyis mo'o/ /gyen du 'phur dang thung ngu 'phur/ /thang 'phur de rnams
22b3(mdo 'grel): mkha' la byed/ /spubs dang mdzod dang sgo nga'o/ /bye tshang nI Da mo min no/ /phru gu bu tsha arb+ha ka/ bu phrug dang ni pri thu ka /gsar skyes shi shu zhes pa'o/ /po mo 'dus dang 'khrig pa dang/ /gnyis gnyis zung dang dor yu gam/ /tshogs la 'dus pa phung po dang/ /sando
22b4(mdo 'grel): ha dang bi sa ra/ /'tshogs pa 'phungs pa dang mi 'dus Ni kar dang prA ta tsA ru/ /yang dag 'dus/ /legs bsags sa mu dA ya'o/ /sa mu da ya sa ma pA ya/ /bsags pa dang ni ga Na mo/ /saM ha ti dang brin dang po/ /na ku ru ma baM kadmA kaM /de rnams thams cad tshogs pa'i rnam grangs so/
22b5(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa'i dbye ba sde mtshan mtshungs/ /dge 'dun lhan cig skye bo 'dus/ /de yi rigs dang mtshungs pa dang/ /dud 'gro khyu dang tshan pa ste/ /skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo/ /dud 'gro rnams kyi mtshungs pa'o/ /gzhan rnams kyis mA dza/ /ches mtshungs rnams la ni kA ya//
22b6(mdo 'grel): phung po spungs pa byur bu dang/ /brtsigs pa mo min no/ /phug ron khyu dang ne tso'i khyu/ /de la sogs pa tshogs pa'o/ /khyim chags bya dang ri dags rnams/ /Shtsha? ka dang khyim gnas so/ /seng ge la sogs pa'i sde mtshan no// /mi dang ming skyes ma nu'i pu/ /shes
22b7(mdo 'grel): ldan yid ldan na rla'o/ /skyes bu lnga skyes pu ru ShA/ /skyes pa ni na ra'o/ /bud med btsun mo stobs med dang/ /sbyor byed mi mo mtshams ldan ma/ /'ching byed zur lta g.yon ma dang/ /g.yo byed dga' ba'i sa gzhi'o/ /bye brag yan lag mchog ldan ma/ /'jigs can
23a1(mdo 'grel): gdong ma g.yon mig ma/ /rab myong sgeg pa yid 'dam/ /shin tu sems dang legs ma dang/ /dga' ba dga' byed 'khro byed ma/ /de bzhin du ni b+ha mi ni/ /rab skyes ma dang glang chen 'gros/ /mchog ldan ma dang kha dog mchog /dbang bskur
23a2(mdo 'grel): byas dang ma hi ShI/ /longs spyod gzhan la rgyal po'i btsun/ bag gsar lag na 'dzin pa dang/ /gnyis pa dang ni chos bcas la/ /'gegs byed skyed byed ma dang ni/ /tshig mang pho ste dA rA'o/ /gnyen 'dun ma dang khyim 'dzin dang/ /legs spyod ma dang
23a3(mdo 'grel): bden ma dang/ /mdzes ma bdag po yi brtul zhugs/ /gnyen byas khyim gsar bag gsar dang/ /rigs ldan ma dang rigs skyong ma/ /gzhon nu ma dang na chung ma/ /chung ngu gos med phyis 'gyur ba/ /bar ma rdul ni mthong ba dang/ /lang tsho ma dang dar ma
23a4(mdo 'grel): mtshungs/ /mtshungs pa'i bu chung mna' ma dang/ /khyim pa mo dang khyim gnas ma/ /'dod ldan ma dang chags can ma/ /'phyon ma dang ni g.yem ma dang/ /dben 'gro dus byas shar mor 'gro /'khrul byed chags byed 'chir byed ma/ /chags can ma
23a5(mdo 'grel): rigs myur ma/ /'dod 'gro dang ni sdig can ma/ /bud med mo sham a bi nA/ /mo sham bu ni gcig skyes ma/ /dga' byed ma dang rnam byed mtshungs/ /zla mo grogs mo na mnyam ma/ /bdag cag khyo dang bcas pa'o/ /mgo skya ma dang rgan mo dang/ /
23a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab ma dang mkhas mang dang/ /shes ldan ma dang blo ldan ma/ /dmangs mo dmangs rigs chung ma yin/ /dmangs dang do yi rigs kyang ngo/ /dmangs rigs chen po A b+hI rI?/ /rigs dang skye sbyor mtshungs pa'o/ /'phags pa'i chung ma rje rigs
23a7(mdo 'grel): chung/ /rgyal rigs chung ma rjes rgyal rigs mo/ /mkhan po'i chung ma'ang mkhan mo dang/ /slob dpon chung ma pi tsa swa ta/ /slob dpon ma ni skyes bu sbyor/ /'phags ma dang ni rgyal rigs ma/ /mkhan po'i chung ma mkhan mo dang/ /po nya? pho mo'i mtshan
23b1(mdo 'grel): nyid do/ /dpa' bo'i chung ma dpa' chung ma/ /dpa' bo'i ma ni dpa' skyes ma/ /bu skyes pa dang rab skyes dang/ /rab tu btsas dang rab tu 'khrungs/ /bud med gcer bu gos med yin/ /pho nya mo dang kun spyod mtshungs/ /kA tyA yA ni dar yol ma/ /ngur smig gos dang ldan
23b2(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /tha ga pha rol phyi ma sdod dang/ /rang dbang bzo yi las byed do/ /blon mo rgan min btsun mo yi/ phrin skyel pho brang spyod ma'o/ /ri mo can dang tshogs can ma/ /smad 'tshong ma dang gzugs 'tshong ma/ /de nas de yi gtso mo ni/ /ri mo byed pa'i gtso mo'o/ /dza ma
