23b3(mdo 'grel): can dang kha lo mtshungs/ /mo ma mig mthong lha shes ma/ /de nas rdul dang ldan pa dang/ /bud med chos ldan rkeng nad can/ /khrag dang phreng ba me tog dang/ /dus ldan ma dang zla mtshan can/ /rdul dang me tog zla mtshan mo/ /phru gu chags dang mig blo langs//
23b4(mdo 'grel): zla mtshan sangs dang nad med ma/ /mngal chags ma dang sbrum ma dang/ /bu che ma dang lus mi bde/ /tshogs can ma sogs tshogs rnams dang/ /sbrum ma gzhon nu ma tshogs rnams/ /slar byung bye ma gnyis grags ma/ /de la sogs pa bye ma'o/ /bdag po
23b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis skyes dang po di d+hi Shu/ /na mnyam ku Tu ma bi nI'o/ /gzhon nu ma skyes ko nI na/ /bu skal bzang pu ni skal ldan no/ /pha rol bud med las skyes ni/ /nal phrug go /pha rnams la rten pha la gnas/ /pha yi bu dang skyes pa'o/ /ma rnams la brten de bzhin no/ mi
23b6(mdo 'grel): mthun ma dang mi mdza' skyes/ /de nas 'phyon ma'i bu dang ni/ /nal phrug rigs nyams skyes pa dang/ /rigs 'tshol dang ni byi phrug go /slongs mos 'tsho zhing skyes ba la/ /de ni kau la Ti ne ya 'di/ /rigs bsgyur dang ni bdag skyes so/ /bdag skyes bde 'phel bu dang ni/ /khye'u
23b7(mdo 'grel): dang ni ngan 'gro skyo ba/ /'di rnams mo'o/ /bu mo phan byed thams cad ma/ /bu phrug bu tsha mtshungs pa'o/ /rang skyes ltos 'byung ma smad do/ /yab dang skyed byed pha dang ni/ /yum dang 'byung byed skyed byed ma/ /bu pho dang ni a tse'o/ /bdag po'i sring mo gnyid mo dang/ /pa
24a1(mdo 'grel): tyur? tsha bo tsha yug bu bdag skyes/ /chung ma sring mo sde mtshan gyi/ /yA ta ra ni phan tshun du/ /pra dzA ba ti skud po'i chung/ /zhang po'i chung ma mA tu lI/ /khyo shug ma ni sgyur mo dang/ /gyos po zhes pa pha'i yin no/ /pha yi spun dang a khu'o/ /ma yi spun
24a2(mdo 'grel): dang zhang po'o/ /sh+yA lA chung ma'i spun zla'o/ /bdag po'i spun tshang da ba rau/ /swa sh+ra ya ni sring mo'i bu/ /dzA mA tA? ni bu mo'i khyo/ /phas mchod pa yi pha dang mes/ /de yi pha dang yang mes po/ /phyi mo dang ni yang phyi mo/ /mtshul mchod pa dang rigs rgyud do/ /skye
24a3(mdo 'grel): gnas mtshungs dang ming sring dang/ /tshang ya lhan cig skyes rnams mtshungs/ /de yi rigs dang 'brel pa dang/ /nye du rtsa lag rang rig dang/ /gnyen 'dab rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/ /bdag gi gnyen da nye 'brel te/ /de rnams go rims tshogs pa'o/ /rab
24a4(mdo 'grel): tu tsha byad dga' byed dang/ /bdag po 'gegs byed rtsa lag byed/ /khyo po rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/ /khyo ma shi yi rtsa lag skyes/ /kuN+Do shi gso ga la ka /sring mo lcam mo las skyes dang/ /spun zla sring mo b+h+ra ti rau ni gnyis ka'o/ /pha ma dag ni pi ta rau//
24a5(mdo 'grel): pha ma dag go /gyos sgyag? dag ni shwa shu'rau/ /bu dang bu mo lu trau'o/ /bza' mi khyim zab khyo shug dang/ /chung ma khyo bo de dag go /bu rogs sham khru ma'o/ /bza' mi khyim thab khyo shug dang/ /chung ma khyo bo de dag go /bu rogs sha ma khru ma'o//
24a6(mdo 'grel): u lwa lany+tsa ka la lo mo yin no/ /skyes pa'i zla ba skyes dus so/ /mngal dang rum dang 'di rnams mtshungs/ /gsum po'i rang bzhin za ma dang/ /ma ning pho ma ning dang ni/ /byis pa bu tsha phru gu'o/ /dar ma lang tsho shed ldan mtshungs/ /gnas brtan dang ni rgan po
24a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rgan po'i tshogs pa rgan rims so/ /smin dang na tshod yol ba dang/ /skra la sogs pa dkar po'o/ /rgas pha dang ni 'khogs pa'o/ /btsas ma thag pa skyes ma thag /zho 'thung dang ni nu ma 'dzin/ /byis pa dang ni shed ma bye/ /gzhon nu na chung shar ba dang/ /sgang
24b1(mdo 'grel): yol gnas brtan bri d+ha dang/ /rnyings dang 'khongs dang rgas pa'o/ /lo ldan bcu pa rgan ches pa/ /sngon skyes phu bo dang por skyes/ /phyis skyes nu bo gzhon shos dang/ /rting skyes rjes su skyes pa'o/ /sha med nyams chung ring pa dang/ /stobs ldan mchog ldan yan lag rgyas/ /gsus
24b2(mdo 'grel): po che dang lto 'phyang dang/ /lto ldir rkeng sgom gsus rdzing can/ /sna nyeg dang ni sga nyeg dang/ /nyeg po dang ni sna gong med/ /skraM bzangs skra can skra lo can/ /gnyer go dang skogs gdong mtshungs pa'o/ /yan lag ma tshang yan lag nyams/ /mi thung 'ongs chur me'u
24b3(mdo 'grel): thung/ /sna smyung dang ni sna rings so/ /sna bcad pa dang sna bregs pa/ /rmig pa'i sna dang smig sna can/ /gom rlabs can dang rab 'gro bus/ /skyid 'khris dang ni pus mo 'byar/ /yas 'jog dang ni pus mo 'degs/ /rna ba 'on dang rna mi gsang/ /sgur po dang ni rgyab sgur ro/ /lag
24b4(mdo 'grel): sdum lag sor sdum po dang/ /mi chung lus po chung ba dang/ /zha bo dang ni grum po dang/ /skra me dang ni mgo rdum dang/ /mi g.yo ba dang gle bo dang/ /thed po dang ni gyol pa'o/ /'khogs pa man chad gsum yin no/ /sha khrag nag po sha mtshan can/ /sme ba dang ni nag thig can/ /nad
24b5(mdo 'grel): gtsong med dang nad bu med/ /gso sbyad sman gyi bya ba'o/ /rtsi dang smin dang b+hai Sha dzya/ /nad sel 'tsho byed ces kyang ngo/ /mod nad can dang khams mi bde ba dang/ /nyam mi bde ba dang tsha ba dang/ /na tsha dang ni mnar ba dang/ /khong nang skyem nad gcong can no/ /rkan skam dang ni sna skam mo/ /sprid pa
24b6(mdo 'grel): k+Shu ta sprid nang ngo/ /glo dang lud pa skyegs bu'o/ /skrags 'bur nag 'bur skrangs pa'o/ /rkang 'bras dang ni phol mig go /sha khra dang ni shu ba'o/ /g.yan pa pA ma rkang shu dang/ /khyi rngo za 'khrug rngo shu dang/ /'brum bu dang ni phol mig gsum/ /rma ni mo min rmas pa ni/ /ma ning rtsa
24b7(mdo 'grel): yi rma ni pho/ /shu ba'i nad dang dkyil 'khor can/ /mdze nad dang ni sha khra dang/ /dur nA ma kArShA si/ /chu 'gags pa dang chu nad dang/ /zas len dang khar mi 'ong nad/ /skyugs pa zas ldog skyug nad dang/ /skyes bu skyug pa mtshungs pa'o/ /nad kyi dbye bas bidra d+he:/ /mo rims
25a1(mdo 'grel): dang chu srin tshan par rdol/ /rde nad chu sri'i nad dang ni/ /khu ba'i sngon rnams rtags gsum mo/ /nad sel nad sel sman pa dang/ /'tsho byed dang ni gso dpyad mkhan /'tsho ba'i bar bsten kalpa'o/ /nad sos pa dang nad kyis btang/ /nad pa nad can gdung
25a2(mdo 'grel): pas gzir/ /zug rdu can dang byu d+hi dang/ /mi gsal ba dang sdug bsngal can/ /bro 'tshal ba dang mdza' mnyam dang/ /me dpal dang ni smyug shu'o/ /'brum bu rkong po rdo dang ni/ /'brum nad yug to a nas/ rlung dang rlung gi nad can no/ /khra skyug dang ni sgyu gzer ro/ /mig tshag tshag po
25a3(mdo 'grel): mig nad can/ /pi l+la klen+ne tshag po 'di yang/ /smon pa dang ni dran pa nyams so/ /bad kan bad nad ka phi'o/ /lte chen lte 'bur lte mtho no/ /sha khrag dang ni me dpal lo/ /long ba dang ni mdongs pa dang/ /brgyal dong dran nyams myos ba'o/ /khu ba zla ba thig le
25a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sa bon stobs ldan dbang por 'gro/ ma yu dang ni mkhris pa'o/ /ka pha dang ni bad kan no/ /mo/ lpags pa dang ni khrag 'dzin no/ /cha shas sha dang mAM saM dang/ /kru mas dang kra bya A mi Sha/ /sha skam shuska mAM saM dang/ /skams nyid ni gsum gyi
25a5(mdo 'grel): rtags/ /khyab gnas mi ltung khrag dang ni/ /dmar dang rma skyes rgyun ldan dang/ /snying dang skyes bu h+rid ya dang sems/ /tshil dang zhag dang snum bag go/ mgrin pa'i phyi rtsa ltag chu ba/ /bA bI rtsa ni 'bab ldan no/ /til skaM ni glo ba'o/ /klad pa dang ni klad rgyas so//
25a6(mdo 'grel): rgyu ma'i rdzas dang dri ma'o/ /mo min rgyu ma dang ni pu rI taM/ /mtshan pa dang ni blI ha pho/ /de nas tshu ba rgyus ba mo/ /mcher pa yang krita mtshungs 'di dag/ /ba chu mchil ma lA lA dang/ /mig nad mig gi dri ma'o/ /dri chu dang ni gci pa'o/ /'bab ldan khyabs
25a7(mdo 'grel): ldan dri ma dang/ /bshang ba phyi sa gu tha dad/ /lte snying dri ma biShA tha mo/ /thod pa dang ni ka bA la/ /mo min/ rus pa gdung dang g.yo byed dang/ lus kun rus pa kaM kA la/ /sgal rus ka she ru kA'o/ /spyi bo'i rus pa ka ro Ti/ /mo/ rtsabs logs rus pa
25b1(mdo 'grel): rtsib ma'o/ /yan lag dang ni pri ti/ /cha shas dang ni tshogs ba min/ /de nas tshogs ba lus dang 'dus/ /phung po thos byed gzugs po dang/ /rnam 'dzin sku dang khyab pa dang/ /ma ning dang ni skyes bu'o/ /mo ni mu rtaM ta nu gzugs/ /rkang pa'i mdun dang brad pa'i phyogs/ /'gro
25b2(mdo 'grel): byed dang ni rkang pa dang/ /skyod par byed pa mo yin no/ /de yi mdun sa long dang tshig/ rje ngar dang ni ngar gdong dang/ pus mo brla 'og tshig pa dang/ /rus tshe zhes pa mo min no/ nus ldan ma ning skyes bu brla/ /de yi tshigs ni dpyi yin no/ /bshang lam rkub dang
25b3(mdo 'grel): 'og sgo'o/ /'doms ni lte 'ag gnyis dag go /tshang ra dang ni 'phongs nyid dang/ /'phongs dang sho Ni ka kudma tI/ /bud med rnams kyi 'phongs kyi ni/ /phyi ma mi tsha ni tam pa/ /ma ning dza g+ha na mdun cha/ /kU pa kau tu ni tam+bas+thau/ /gnyis dman ku kunda re'o/ /mo ni rkub tshes
25b4(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ni/ /ka TO pro thA/ mo mtshan 'chad par 'gyur ba'o/ /b+ha gaM skye gnas gnyis dag go /rlig pa sgro ba me na nA kraM Do lag pa'i bar/ /brang dang nad? tshoms byad khog stong/ /phag pa dang ni lag mgo dang/ /dpung pa rnams ni mo min no/ /de yi mtshams ni dza
25b5(mdo 'grel): dru NI/ /lag rtsa gnyis po mchan khung ngo/ /rtsib logs mo min de dag 'og/ dbus dang rked pa bar ma ni/ /mo min gnyis po'i kha rol gnyis/ /spong byed 'bab byad 'jug byed leg par tshigs dang ni gru ma'o/ /de yi steng du bar lhu yin/ /lag par de yi 'og tu'o//
25b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrig ma lag ba'i mthe chung bar/ /ka ra b+ho dang ka gzhag go/ byed po lag pa yal ga lnga/ /sdigs mdzub rab tu ston byed do/ /ser mo lag pa'i yal ga'o/ /skyes bu mthe bong ston byed dang/ /gung mo ming med mthe chung rim/ /yang srid can dang lag skyes dang//
25b7(mdo 'grel): gcod byed sen me mo yin no/ /rab ston mthong dang ba la snang/ /mdzub mo la sogs rnams la'o/ /mthe bong mthe chung mtho la ni/ /sor mo bcu gnyis las mthil dag /thal mo thal lcag pra ta la/ /lag mthil sor mo brkyang ba'o/ /de gnyis tshogs pa ya ha ta 
26a1(mdo 'grel): la/ /pra ta lau ni g.yon dang g.yas/ /lag pa cung bskum khyor ba'o/ /de dag sbyar ba snyim pa skyes/ /lag dar lag brkyang khru yin no/ /khu tshur bcangs pa bcag khru'o/ /a rang ni ni mthe chung brkyang/ /de yi khru'o khu tshur bcangs/ /mdom ni
26a2(mdo 'grel): dpung ba lag par bcas/ /de dag 'phreng la brkyang ba'o/ /steng du lag pa brgyangs pa ni/ /mi gang lag bcas skyes bu gsum/ /ol mdud pa dang mgrin pa dang/ /de nas mgo stegs mgo 'dzin ste/ /kam bu mgrin pa ri mo gsum/ /ltag pa ltag khung
26a3(mdo 'grel): ltag chu ba/ /sma byed zas byed gsung byed dang/ /kha dang zhal dang smra ba'i sgo/ /ma ning sna dang dri bab dang/ /snom byed shangs dang nA sI ka/ ya mchu ma mchu zhal g.yogs dang/ /gcod byed kyi ni sgo zhes bya/ /de yi 'og tu kos ko'o/ /'khur tshos dbin
26a4(mdo 'grel): ka po la/ /de yi pha rol za 'gram pa/ /ldang byed gcod byed snyom byed so/ /tA lu zhes pa rkan yin no/ /ro shes ro myang lce yin no/ /mchu yi mdza' ma kha yi gru/ dpral pa rgyan gnas mig 'dzin dang/ /mig steng smin ma dag ni mo/ klur tsam smin dbus mo min no//
26a5(mdo 'grel): mig 'bras spyan 'bras hA ra ka /lta byed mig dang 'dren byed dang/ /mthong byed spyan dang tsak+Shu dang/ /gzigs byed dri Sha Ti zhes pa'o/ /mchi ma mig chu dus 'byung dang/ /a sra dang ni mchi ma'o/ /a paM go ni mi mdza' dag /zur mig dang ni yon por lta/ /rna
26a6(mdo 'grel): ba sgra 'dzin skyes bu dang/ /mo ni thos byed nyan byed snyan/ /yan lag mchog dang mgo bo dang/ /dbu dang steng dang masta ka /mo min/ slar skye 'khyel bskra dang ni/ /ral pa ke sha mgo skyes dang/ /tshogs pa skra ldan ke shi ka/ /rgyan dang skra lo 'khyil ba dang/ /de
26a7(mdo 'grel): rnams dpral ba'i bung ba dang/ /bya rog gshog dang gtsug pud can/ /skra bcings skra yi thor tshugs dang/ /de nas me tog bcings pa dang/ /sAM ya tA ka tsa me tog bcings/ /thor tshugs gtsug pud skra bcings so/ /brtul zhugs ral pa sa DA'o/ /lan bu
26b1(mdo 'grel): skra lan skra lhas ma/ /ral pa katse pi Sha de/ /pa Sha ? rta sta dang/ /rkalpa? rthA? de rnams ni/ /ka tsa'i pha rol skra tshogs yin/ /lus skyes bu dang ba spu'o/ /de rgan sma ra kha la'o/ /mdzes bcos brgyan bcings ne pa thyaM/ /sau yi bzo dang mdzes par byas/ /bcu po gsum yin rgyan byed dang/ /mdzes chos mkhan
26b2(mdo 'grel): dang chas mkhan no/ /mdzes byas brgyan byas bkod cing spras/ /gsal byed mthong byed snang byed do/ /rgyan gyi bya ba brgyan bya la/ rgyan dang chas dang legs byed dang/ /rnam rgyan sa dang maN+Da naM/ /de nas dbu rgyan ced pan ni/ /skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo/ /gtsug gi nor bu spyi bo'i
26b3(mdo 'grel): rin chen dang/ /ta ral ni do shal dbus/ /skra yi thag pa pA ri ta thya/ /phung skyu dang ni dpral ba'i rgyan/ /rna rgyangs tA la'i lo ma yin/ /kuN+Da lam ni rna ba'i rgyan/ /mgul 'ching dang ni ske'i rgyan no/ /'phyang 'phrul dang ni do shal lo/ /prA laM ni ka gser do shal/ /brang
26b4(mdo 'grel): gi do shal mu tig spras/ /do shal mu tig phreng ba dang/ /lha yi do shil bkod pa ni/ /khris ma brgya dang ldan pa dang/ /de shal dbye dang khris dbye bas/ /drug cu rtsa gnyis guta shA'o/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi guta shA phyed/ /ba yi nu ma bzhi yin no/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis nyer bzhi
26b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi/ /do shal phyed pa drug cu bzhi dang/ /nyi shu pa/ phreng ba gcig po yaSh+Ti ka/ rgyu skar phrad ba se mod do/ /mu tig nyi shu rtsa bdun no/ /gdu bu lag gdub ka Ta kaM/ pa la yo ni mo min no/ /ke sU ra ni dpung rgyan mtshungs/ /aM gu lI ya sor gdub bo/ /yi ge'i so
26b6(mdo 'grel): gdub rgya ldan yin/ /gser gyi lag gdub ka ka Na/ /bud med rked rgyan me kha la/ /gser ska bdun pa rked rgyan dang/ /de bzhin ma ning rked rgyan min/ /de nas skyes bu rked pa yi/ /rkang gdub zhabs gdub many+dzA ra/ /nU pu ra ni mo min no/ /dang pa can dang rkang
26b7(mdo 'grel): rgyan no/ /g.yer kha dril bu chung ba'o/ /lpags pa 'bras bu srin bu dang/ /spu la sogs pa gos kyi rgyu/ /bcu ni gsum ste zas ras dang/ /k+Sho ma la sogs 'bras byung ras/ /ras bal lo la dag dang ni/ /dar dang srin bu'i dbugs las byung/ /snam bu dang ni bal
27a1(mdo 'grel): gos so/ /gsar pa so ma btags so ma/ /gos gsar na ba aM ba re/ /u ta ga ma bI gos na/ /gang zhig bkrus pa'i gos bzung ngo/ /pa tra ur+Na dang gos dkrus/ /gos chan nor po che zhes bya/ /nang gsal du ku la yi ras/ /gyon gos sbyong
27a2(mdo 'grel): gos gsum yin no/ /mod tshigs mang po la gos gos dag /gnyis/ /ring po mA yAM A ro ha/ /zhing che bi shA la tA 'o/ /paTTa ts+tsha ra gos rnyings mtshungs/ /zang po dang ni dri ma can/ /gos dang g.yog ma na bza' dang/ /gcer skyob bgo rgyu oM Tha ka/ gos bzangs dang gos mo
27a3(mdo 'grel): min no/ /gos kyi phung po gos mthug po/ /ni tsau la ni smad gos so/ /mtshungs pa la ba snam bu'o/ /bar gos smad gos pA ri d+hA/ /sham thabs dang ni thang gos so/ /stong gos bla gos mtshungs pa'o/ /pri ha ti ka de bzhin du/ /saM bya na ni stod g.yogs so/ /'doms dkris smad dkris
27a4(mdo 'grel): bud med kyi/ /ba mo'i gos dang bu yi ngas/ /kha ba rlung po skyob pa'i gos/ /bud med mchog gi smad dkris ni/ /tsaN+Da ta ka'i sor mo sleb pa'i gos/ /pra ba daM hi sa ta do/ /mo min bla bre steng g.yogs dang/ /gur dang sgra zhes bya ba'o/ /yol ba dang ni sgrib g.yogs so/ /yod sa
27a5(mdo 'grel): bcos lus kyi bcas legs so/ /'dag chal khrus rtsi dag byed do/ /dri ma nyed ba ut+sa da ne gnyis po mtshungs/ /chur 'khru khrus dang snA? naM? dza? tsa ra tsa las la dri byugs gos/ /dri ma bsang dang dri ma sel/ /dri bzangs dang ni spos byug mtshungs/ /tA ma la 'dab
27a6(mdo 'grel): thig le dang/ /dpral bar dri yi khyad par bris/ /gnyis pa bzhi pa mo min no/ /de nas gur gum kha che skyes/ /me rtse pa dang mchog ldan dang/ /bA hi ka dang ser po dang/ /dmar po saM ko tsa bi shun dang ldan/ /tsan dan dmar po gur gum mo/ /rgya skyags rak+ShA
27a7(mdo 'grel): dzan+tu dang/ /ma ni/ yang rgya mtshos shing gi nad/ /li sh+rI lha yi me tog dpal/ /ming can/ de nas dza ba kaM kA li pa kany+tsa ka la nu sar pany+tsa/ /de nas nus ldan rgyud can dang/ /a ka ru dang rgyal mnyes byed/ /dmar po srin skyes a ga ru a gu ru nag
27b1(mdo 'grel): a gu ru/ /bkra shis phreng ba'i dri dang ni/ /mchod sbyin spos dang sra rtsi shing/ /spos dkar khu ba kun ldan dang/ /gzugs mang po dang de nas ni/ /pri ka d+hu ba sbyar spos so/ /tu ru Sh+ka dang pi shu ka /pi la yA ba na yang ngo/ /de nas phA ya sa dang ni/ /dpal gos pri ka d+hU ba dang/ /shI
27b2(mdo 'grel): yiSh+Ti dang thang chu'o/ /ri dags lte ba ri dags tshang/ /gla ba de nas ko la ka /kak+ko la ka spubs kyi 'bras/ /de nas ga bur mo min no/ /g+ha na'i snying po zla ba'i min/ 'od dkar kha ba'i bye ma'o/ /dri yi snying po ma la ya skyes dang/ /dpal bzangs tsan dan mo min no/ /tai la par+Ni
27b3(mdo 'grel): tsan dan dang/ /ba lang mgo dang ha ri tsan dan dang/ /mo min no/ /tI la lar+NI pa TaM ga /tshos byed tsan dan dmar po dang/ /tsan dan ngan pa de nas ni/ /dzA tI sbubs can dzA tI 'bras bu mnyam/ /ga bur a ga ru dang gla ba dang/ /kak+ko la rnams la mchod sbyin byug /lus kyi
27b4(mdo 'grel): byug pa brti'o/ /bar+Na kaM ni kha dog byug /phye ma gos dang sbyar ba dang/ /dri 'dzin gos ni gsum yin no/ /dri dang phreng sogs legs sbyar gos/ /lhag pa'i gos dang me tog phreng/ /me tog phreng ba spyi bo'i steng/ /skra yi dbus su garg+ha ka/ steng du 'phrang dang rtse mod 'phyang
27b5(mdo 'grel): mdun la pA ma kaM ngo/ /rab 'phyang drang por mgul du 'phyang/ /me tog ga shal se ral kha/ /gang zhig 'phreng bcings brang la'o/ /shI/ pwa swA nI spyi bor bzhag /bkod pa dang ni chas tsom pa/ /A b+ho ga ni yongs su rdzogs/ /u ba d+hA naM rgyas yin no/ /nyal ba
27b6(mdo 'grel): gzims pa sha yi naM/ /khri dang nyal khri gzims khri dang/ /kha gsum yA ni mtshungs pa'o/ /sngar 'bol chung ngu kandu ko/ mar me dang dbe 'bar ba dang/ /pi thA dang ni sdan yin no/ /za ma tog dang ga'u dang/ pra ti gra ha chil ma'i snod/ /skra shad dang ni so mangs dang//
27b7(mdo 'grel): me long ma gu ra dang dpe/ /rlung yab bsil yab ces pa'o/ /mi'i sde tshan no/ /? /rgyud dang rigs dang cha 'phrar dang/ /rus dang rtsa lag rjes skyas dang/ /baM sha rtsa khrid brgyud ba'o/ /bar+Na bram ze la sogs ma/ /rgyal rigs ra dza baM sha'o/ /sa bon las byung rus
28a1(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /rigs chen rigs bzang 'phags rigs dang/ /mchog dang skyes bu dam pa legs/ /changs bar spyed dang khyim gnas dang/ nags na gnas dang dge slong dang/ /rnam bzhi lag gnas mo min no/ /gnyis skyes sngon skyes sa yi lha//
28a2(mdo 'grel): tshangs pa'i bu dang bram ze dang/ /tshangs/ 'di dag las ni drug ldan pa/ /mchod sbyin la sogs nus pa'o/ /rigs ldan rnams gsal nyes pa shes/ /mdzes ldan blo bzang kun rig dang/ /rtogs ldan brtan po sems shes dang/ /shes ldan grangs can
28a3(mdo 'grel): shes rab can/ /paN+Di ta dang nyes ba shes/ /blo gros can dang dpa' bo dang/ /go ba can dang mkhas pa dang/ /grags pa dang ni rnam par dangs/ /ring po mthong dang ring po shes/ /thos ldan sdeb sbyor can dag mtshungs/ /u bA d+ha ya mkhan pa'o/ /mngal sogs sbram
28a4(mdo 'grel): byed bla ma'o/ /sngags 'chang byed pa slob dpon yin/ /A deSh+Ta 'dzin brtul zhugs can/ yA dza mA na mchod sbyin dang/ /zla ba btus pa'i dI k+Shi ster/ /mchod sbyin mang byas mchod sbyin ldan/ /ya dzwa mchod sbyin mtho ris 'dod/ /phur bu'i mchod sbyin tho ba
28a5(mdo 'grel): ti/ /zla ba'i chang 'thungs so ma pa/ /rigs byed kun la mchod sbyin byas/ /mtho ris kun gyi yon tan no/ /a nu tsA na rab brjod kyi/ /rigs byed yan lag dang bcas brlabs/ /bla ma'i bka' yi rjes gnang thob/ /sa mA bri tu/ su twA mngon par khrus
28a6(mdo 'grel): thob/ /sgrib byed nyer gnas slob ma'o/ /shaik+ShA dang por rtog pa bslabs/ /gcig pu tshangs pa'i brtul zhug spyod/ /tshangs par spyod dang bcas pa'o/ /sa tIrthA ni bla ma gcig /mi mdzes agni tsi ta'o/ /rgyud pa'i nyer bstan i ti hya/ /mi zad pa nyer shes dz+nyA
28a7(mdo 'grel): na mA ryA ngo/ /dz+nyA twA dang po rtsom pa'i rim/ /mchod sbyin sbyin sreg a d+ha ro/ /mchod sbyin dang ni rgyud bdun pa/ /glog dang sbyin bsregs gser 'ongs mchod/ /mtshun gsol ba dang gtor ma dang/ /de rnams mchod sbyin chen po lnga/ /tshangs pa'i mchod
28b1(mdo 'grel): sbyin la sogs zhes/ /tshogs pa 'khor mang 'dus pa dang/ /sa b+hA tshogs dang khru dang ni/ /phung po ma ning as+thA naM/ /ma mo ma ning 'dus pa'o/ /dang po'i rgyud pa dang po ba/ /'tshogs nas cho ga lta ba'o/ /tshogs pa spyi yi ming ngo/ /a d+ha ryu grA dri ho tA ro/ /mchod sbyin sa ma bi da
28b2(mdo 'grel): dam? pa?/ /agni d+ha la sogs pa yi/ /nor spyod mchod yA dzA kA/ rigs byed sa gzhi yongs su bcos/ /mtshungs pa sa gzhi gru bzhi pa/ /tsa ShI la ni phyugs brtags shing/ /bum pa shin tu bskor ba'i khyim/ /srog shing rtse mo tar ma'o/ /gtsub shing gtsub stan ar+Na
28b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /lha yi me dang khyim gyi me/ /ha bA nA yi me gsum pa/ /me 'di gsum la tre tA'o/ /pra Ni ta ni legs sbyangs me/ /me'i ming ngo/ /ho me rab tu sbyor ba'o/ /gang zhig khyim bdag sbyin bdag me/ /lho phyogs me ni pra NI ya te/ /de la sna tshogs bsdebs pa'o/ /de nas me mo
28b4(mdo 'grel): swAhA 'o/ /byin za mnyes par byed pa'o/ /me'i chung ma'o/ /bsreg rdzas yam shing d+hA bya'o/ /me'i sbar shing ngo/ /gla ya trI la sogs pa'o/ /bsreg rdzas smin byed tse ru pho/ /'o ma zho dang sbyar ba'o/ /rlung yab dang ni bsil yab ni/ /ri dags lpags pa dag las so/ /bri Sha
28b5(mdo 'grel): dA dzya zho mar bsres/ /par man+na 'o thug go/ ha bya ba bye lha mtshun zas/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar la sogs pa/ /zlum po gru bzhi zla phyed dang/ /zur gsum dgang gzar dbye ba'o/ /u pA kri ta dud 'gro ni/ /mchod sbyin ched du gsod par brtags/ /phan tshun
28b6(mdo 'grel): zhi dang bsang gtor byas/ /gsod pa'i ched kyi phyugs yin no/ /brjod bya'i rtags can prA mI ta/ /bsnyen rdzogs bsang gtor byas nas gsod/ /khrus bsreg rdzas me phud/ gsum mo ba She Ta byas pa'o/ /hik+ShA'i mdza' can mchod sbyin gtso/ /de las gsod pa
28b7(mdo 'grel): ya dz+nyi yaM/ /gsum/ mchod sbyin 'dod las sUrta kA tA tI'i las/ /bdud rtsi dang ni bi g+ha sa/ /mchod sbyin lhag ma zas lhag go /gtod pa 'bul ba sbyin pa dang/ /nye bar 'ged? dang gshegs pa dang/ /rnam byin brims dang bkram pa dang/ /so sor byin dang?
29a1(mdo 'grel): mngon du bstan/ /'bul ba yon dang me tog go/ gshin don ster ba gsum yin no/ /dyA dau d+ha da hi kaM/ pha gshin sbyin pa ni bA ya/ /dang pa de las bstan bcos las/ /spyir ba/ dus ston zla dus mchod pa'o/ /nyi ma'i brgyad char mchod
29a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /ku ta ya te mo min no/ /tshal? ba yongs su tshol ba dang/ /rjes su tshol dang kun tu tshol/ /gsol ba dang ni zhu ba'o/ /slong pa mngon par slong pa dang/ /yA tsa na dang artha ma/ /drug ni gsum ste mchod yon dang/ /yon chab don dang zhabs bsil
29a3(mdo 'grel): rkang khrus chu la'o/ /rim pa las na gron po glo bur gsar 'ongs skyes legs gnas/ /mgron po dang ni gsar 'ongs dang/ /mgron ni khyim du 'ongs pa'o/ /mchod pa rim gro rgyas byed dang/ /lags byed ri mo zhabs 'bring mtshungs/ /gus mchod zhes dang bcas
29a4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /ba kur sti dang ni bsnyen bkur ro/ /'gro dang 'khyam dang slar yang 'gro/ spyod lam dang ni 'gro 'dug go/ kha? bshal dang ni zhal bsil lo/ /de nas thub dang mi smra dang/ /mngon rjes mo 'am rim pa dang/ /go rim bzhin rim pa'o/ /go rim min dang bzlog pa dang/
29a5(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs ngas dang brtul zhugs mo min no/ /gso sbyong dang ni bsod nams gso/ /u ba bstam bsnyen gnas so/ /gol ba dben pa'i bdag nyid dang/ /tshangs spyod dang ni rig byed klog/ de nas thal sbyor rig byed klog/ tshangs ba'i thal mo sbyor ba'o/ /klog cing khu chu
29a6(mdo 'grel): 'thor pa ni/ /tshangs pa'i thig la'o/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor stan tshangs stan/ /rtog pa'i cho ga/ rigs so/ /gtso bo dang po'i rtog pa'o/ /rjes kyi rtog pa rjes brjod pa/ /'du byed mngon du 'dzin pa ni/ /nye bar byed dang thos pa'o/ /mtshungs pa
29a7(mdo 'grel): zhabs la 'dzin pa ni/ /mngon par brjod pa gnyis pa'o/ /dge slong dang ni kun tu rgyu/ /drang srong dang ni brtul zhugs can/ /dka' thub dka' spyod pha rol 'dod/ /mi smra ba dang thub pa'o/ /dka' thub dang ni nyon mongs bzod/ /dAn+to rigs ni tshangs par spyod pa'o//
29b1(mdo 'grel): drang srong bden par smra ba'o/ /khrus byas khrus kyi brtul zhugs can/ /dbang po dul ba sdom brtson des/ /thang nyal brtul zhugs bla bab med/ /gcer nyal dang ni Sh+N+Di la/ /de nas chags bral ta mas/ /nyon mongs dang ni bral ba'o/ /gtsang ma dag pa dri ma med/ /lta ba
29b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ba kun gyi rtags/ /pA lA shA yi dbyug 'dzin dang/ /chu stod brtul zhugs can dang ni/ /rAM pha stu dang myug ma 'dzin/ /mo min/ spyi blugs bum pa brtul zhugs snod/ /drang srong stan ni briShI'o/ /a dzi ni ni ri dags lpags/ /lpags pa 'dzin pa mo min no//
29b3(mdo 'grel): bsod snyoms pa dang slong mo ba/ /kha don dang ni bzlas brjod pa/ /khrus byas khrus chu sa ba naM/ /rig byed dang ni gzungs kun gyi/ /sdig pa 'joms pa gsum yin no/ /mthong pa gang dang gnam stong la/ /phyogs mdza' so so'i mchod sbyin byed/ /rtag tu lus sgrub lta ba
29b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /las gang de yin zhi ba'o/ /nges pa gang zhig rtag tu las/ /glo bur ba la bsnyen bkur sgrub/ /u pa pA ti tshangs skud ni/ /lag pa'i g.yas phyogs rab tu dkris/ /prA tsI nA pI g.yon du bkris/ /ni pI taM ni mgul du 'phyad/ /sor mo'i rtse mo rta rthaM lha/ /mthe chung rtsa
29b5(mdo 'grel): bar changs lha'i chu/ gung mo mtheb mdzub mtshun gyi chu/ /mtheb chen rtsa bar tshangs chu sbyin/ /sla ngas pa slar 'byung tshangs nyed/ /tshangs pa yang dag ldan pa dang/ /lha sogs 'byung ba de bzhin no/ /zad par dka' thub la sogs pa/ /bya spangs bya bral skyes bu'o/
29b6(mdo 'grel): phal cher/ de nas mnyams dang chu zos me/ /ku ha nA dang rnyed log dang tshul 'chos pa dang bcos pa'o/ /prA tyA legs sbyangs kyi sman no/ /lud med brjod par bya ba min/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan ral ba'i rtags/ /grags dman dang ni brtul zhugs nyams/ /nyi ma
29b7(mdo 'grel): nub nyal brtul zhugs dang/ /nyi ma shar langs brtul zhugs so/ /nyi ma ba dang grol med dang/ /shar la ngas ji ltar rim bzhin no/ /go log skyes bag ma ni/ /phu po'i bag ma ma blangs pa/ /pa ri bid ti phu bo'i'o/ /thag ma nye zung mtshungs pa'o/ /de bzhin
30a1(mdo 'grel): khyim thab gnyis ldan dang/ /u pA ya mA lag stams so/ /'khrig ba grod chos chags spyod mtshungs/ /sde mtshan gsum po chos dang ni/ /'dod pa dang ni don rnams so/ /sde tshan bzhi pa rnam thar ro/ /de stobs bzhi ldan bzang po'o//
30a2(mdo 'grel): dzA byA mag pa'i grogs po'o/ /bram ze'i sde tshan no// //spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bu/ /lag skyes rgyal rigs rnam par rgyal/ /rgyal pos bdag sa skyod dang/ /mi bdag sa srungs bzhi skyong dang/ /rgyal po ma lus kun gyis ni//
30a3(mdo 'grel): phyag byas lhag pa'i dbang phyug go/ 'khor los sgyur ba sa kun dbang/ /mi bdag gzhan ni rgyal phran no/ /dag gis rgyal 'dod mchod sbyin byas/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug bstan bcos dang/ /bka' lung rgyal po dag pa'i rgyal/ /rgyal po'i
30a4(mdo 'grel): tshogs ba rgyal po rnams/ /mi bdag rgyal rigs tshogs pa'i rim/ /bka' dbang? gros ba blon po dang/ /gzhan ni las dang lhan cig spyod/ /blon po chen po gtso bo dang/ /blon po dang ni mdun na 'don/ /nang blon spyan dang khrims gcod ba/ /gnyer
30a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni mig pa'o/ /sgo srungs pa dang sgo skyong dang/ /sgor gnas byar byed pa'o/ /srung ma'i tshogs pa sku srungs pa/ /de nas bka' lung blon po mtshungs/ /gnas brtan dang ni grod dpon no/ /gzhig ba gnyer ba btA? ri/ gser mdzod pa dang gser
30a6(mdo 'grel): gnyer pa/ /dngul mdzod? pa dang dngul gnyer pa/ /nang mi pho brang nang pa dang/ /nang na gnas pa'i skye bo'o/ /btsun mo'i sku srungs ra'i gu can/ /gnas brtan dang ni nyug rum pa/ /ma ning nyams pa za ma mtshungs/ /zhabs thog pa dang 'tsho ba ba//
30a7(mdo 'grel): yul mthar gnas pa'i rgyal po dgra/ de yi pha rol ba shes yin no/ /u da a'i na bar gnas yul/ /rtsa 'dzin dang ni rgyab gnas sa/ /gnod byed de 'gras dgra ba dang/ /brtse can zhe sdang nyes byed dang/ /smad byed dang ni mi thun phyogs/ /mi phyan
30b1(mdo 'grel): byed dang shes mi byed/ /dgrar 'dzin pa dang sha tral/ /mi 'dzub dang pha rol rgol/ /phyir rgol dang ni pha rol lam/ /na mnyam mtshungs pa 'gran zla dang/ /de nas bshes dang grogs po gnyen/ /byams pa bdun pa gnyen/ /rjes su 'gog dang kha 'gog pa//
30b2(mdo 'grel): lta nyul dang ni rtog mi pa/ /rtog dpyod ba dang nyul mi dang/ /ldom bu ba dang so rtog mi/ /bya gtong dang ni nang yan gsum/ /los shes rtsis mkhan lha shes dang/ /rtsis ba grangs shes yud tsam thang cig dang/ /dus shes pa dang rtsis pa 'ong/ /rgyud dang grub
30b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' shes pa dang/ /sbyin bdag khyim bdag mtshungs pa'o/ /'bris mkhan dang ni yig mkhan dang/ /yi ge ba dang le kha ka/ yi ge'i gzhi dang yi ge'i gnas/ /yi ge'i ri mo gnyis ni mo/ /skyes kha? ba dang bo nya dang/ /du tyA de dngos las yin/ /li sa tshongs? 'gron po
30b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /li 'grul dang ni 'dren lam dang/ /da drag po blon po thugs gces dang/ /mdzad dang yul dang rdzod dang ni/ /stabs rnams rgyal po'i yan lag rnams rang bzhin no/ /khab dang pho brang zhes pa dang/ /dum dang 'thab dang chas pa dang/ /drug ni yon tan no/ /nus
30b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni mthu stobs dang/ /dga' bar byas dang sngags bzlas dang/ /zas dang gnas dang 'phel ba dang/ /sde tshan gsum po lag? pa'o/ /dpung dang mthu brjid can dang ni/ /bang mdzod spya yis gang ba dang/ /dbyes dang sdud kha dums dang ni/ /spya 'jam thabs ni rnam
30b6(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi/ /khral dang spud dang dbye dang ni/ /phra ma skya mad nas mtshungs pa dbyas dang phra ma/ /u pa d+ha ni chos sogs kyi/ /gang zhig yongs su lta ba'o/ /lnga ni gsum mo mu drug min/ /gang zhig gsum sogs spyod tshul min/ /dkon dang skye bos dben pa dang//
30b7(mdo 'grel): g.yogs ba rgyun lugs med pa dang/ /de bzhin dgon pa dban pa gol/ /drags med/ pa ra ha de'i dngos po gsum/ /mtshungs pa blo thub yid ches so/ /nyams na dman dang ji ltar 'gribs/ /ma nyams rig pa rtog pa dang/ /bstan gzugs mtshungs par
31a1(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /rigs pa thabs dang thob pa dang/ /'os pa 'thang pa mtshungs bzhin dang/ /gsum drug/ sped pa dang ni 'chab pa'o/ /'doms pa nges ston nyer bstan dang/ /rjes gnang nyer blangs bka' lung ngo/ /lugs dang khrims dang
31a2(mdo 'grel): yus chos khrims/ /nyes pa nongs can skyon can no/ /mtshungs pa btson dang bcings pa'o/ /rkang gnyis 'gyur chad pa'o/ /thob bya dpya dang sdud kha'o/ /khral bar thob pa sho/ bam mo min no/ /'bul ba phyag rten skyes zhu rten/ /rnam gzhag
31a3(mdo 'grel): mdun 'jig?/ yo byad la sogs gang zhi rnams/ /sbyin par brtsam pa dang rdzas so/ /de yi dus la sbyin pa'o/ /phyi dus lan a ya ti/ /'di la mthod dang 'di yi 'bras/ /phyi mar mthod dang de yi 'bras/ /mthong med me dang chu la sogs//
31a4(mdo 'grel): mthong ba rang gzhan dgra po dang/ /sa skyod shin tu 'jigs pa dang/ /rang phyogs ma cu yis 'jigs pa dang/ /pra gri yin bka' yung ngo/ /rnga yab rab tu rgya chen po/ /mi dbang stan ni stan bzad do/ /seng ge'i stan ni gser gyi'o/ /gdugs dang bsil
31a5(mdo 'grel): gdugs rgyal po mi dbang mtshan nyid do/ /bum pa bzang dang bum pa gang/ /b+hI ga ra gser gyi bum/ /dmag khyim dam gar ma ning ngo/ /mel tshe ba dang nye bar bsrung/ /glang rta shing rta rkang thang rnams/ /dmag gi yan lag rnam bzhi'o/ /so ldan
31a6(mdo 'grel): mche ba stobs dang ldan/ /lag ldan mche ba gnyis pa dang/ /mang po skyod dang gnyis mthung dang/ /glang mo skyes dang dbyug 'dzin dang/ /nag dang ni sa lung nyal/ /glang chen byed can a'i b+ha dang/ /glang po'i mgon dang glang po'i rgyal/ /nags tshal dga' 
31a7(mdo 'grel): dang thig le can/ /glang po'i chad dang chad gi cha/ /ka la b+ha ni glang phyug go/ glang myos sgra sgrogs gdab zi dang/ /glang po smyon ba glang po rgad/ /glang chu tshogs ba glang po 'dus/ /glang mo ba dang ba lang mo/ /'gram ba ka Ta/ chad dang glang chad/ /glang po'i
31b1(mdo 'grel): na ?? dang yag ldan mgo/ bum pa dang ni glang 'bung gnyis/ /de dag dbus la be du skyes bu'o/ /a ba grA ta dbral ba yin/ /dI shi ka ni mig 'bras dag/ mig gi zung ni nirywa Na/ /rna pa'i rtsa ba tsu likA/ 'og tu bum pa'i pA ti t+thaM/ /pra ti mA nam rtse ba'i dbus/ /a sa ni ni
31b2(mdo 'grel): phrag ba'i phyogs/ /pad+ma ki ni kha chu'o/ /pa'akA? b+hA ga rtsi ba ma'i cha/ /don ta b+ha ga mchi ba'i rtse/ /shar nub rje dang la sogs phyogs/ /lus kyi pha rol rim pa las/ /to tra 'phred pa'i glang bu'o/ /mA lA na ni 'dogs pa'i rka/ /lcags thags andu ko dang sgrog/ mo min
31b3(mdo 'grel): lcags kyu mo min sh+ri Ni 'o mo/ /'dzeg? stegs dang ni ya gdod/ /rtogs ldan skye bo dam pa mtshungs/ /glang g.yogs la ba khabs dang ni/ /stan dang ku tha gnyis dag go/ bAM taM glang po'i 'dogs pa'o/ /'dren byed chu 'thung myur 'gro dang/ /'gro mgyogs rta dang gshog
31b4(mdo 'grel): ba can/ /rta dang 'gro byed ta ya dang/ /san dtu skyes dang bdun ldan dang/ /cang shes dang ni go ling ngo/ /rnam par dul dang legs 'gro dang/ /ba na'i yul skyes bA ra sI skyes/ /'dar byed skyes dang bAhI skyes/ /mchod sbyin rta dang me d+hi'i rta/ /bang ba dang ni lhag par rgyug/
31b5(mdo 'grel): rgyab ldan dang ni brten pa'o/ /gi la dkar pa karka'o/ /shing rta 'dren byed ra tha sya/ /rte'u dang ni thor bu'o/ /rgod ma dang ni marta'o/ /bA Da baM rta khyu dang/ /gsum yin a shwa naM ni gang/ /rta yis btan? gcig bgrod pa'i lam/ /ka sh+yan rta yi rkang pa'o/ /rta yi dbyangs/
31b6(mdo 'grel): ze rdog dang ni ze ba'i phyogs/ /rta yi tshogs brta khrom 'dre/ /'tshed 'gro phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang/ /yongs bskor mchod 'gro ring du 'gro/ /lnga po 'di rnams rta yi 'gros/ /rta mchog gtso bo mo ma yin/ /rta khrab dang ni kha lI na/ /mo/ rta mig ma ni rmig a po
31b7(mdo 'grel): rta 'jug mo min rnga ma 'jug/ bA la rta rta rnga? snying ngo/ /gsum ste nyer 'dre 'dra log dang/ /pha rol 'dre dang sa la 'dra/ /theg pa 'khor las 'gra ba dang/ /g.yul gyi shing rta yan lag brgya/ /'gro ba'i shing rta/ 'di na ma tog shing rta'o/ /'khor lo bzhin
32a1(mdo 'grel): ba yul 'jug gang?/ /rna ba'i shing rta rab 'bab dang/ /rta yis 'dren dang mtshungs pa gsum/ /ma ning shing rta sha ka Ta/ /mo min gaM tI la bas g.yogs/ /khyogs dang 'degs 'gro zhes pa dang/ /do la bra kha la sogs pa/ /mo gnyis po stan
32a2(mdo 'grel): g.yogs snyag can dang/ /stag gis g.yogs pa'i shing rta'o/ /la ba dkar pos g.yogs ba dang/ /syanda na dang la ba dkar/ /shing rta can la gas? la sogs/ /leb ba la sogs g.yogs pa'o/ /gsum po gnyis 'thung la sogs la/ /ra thyA shing rta'i chogs dpa?
32a3(mdo 'grel): lam/ /d+hU ni mo dang ma ning shing rta'i gdong/ /shing rta'i khod pa ma pas dkar/ /'khor lo shing rta'i yan lag dang/ /de yi mdza' dang mu khyud dang/ /mo yin pra d+hi pho/ /'kho lo'i lte ba 'khor lo bsrung ba'i gzer bu ni/ /gnyis te a NI'o/ /shing rta sgrib
32a4(mdo 'grel): dang 'thab ra'o/ /yugrna d+ha ra gnya' shing 'dzin/ /rjes su 'dren dang d+hA rba d+ha(mdo 'grel): s+thaM/ /gnya' shing 'chid zhing yu ga dang/ /thams cad bzhin ba theg pa dang/ /khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor bgod byed do/ /phan tshun 'bab dang len pa dang/ /mo min dang/ bzhen pa pa dang
32a5(mdo 'grel): glang po ba/ /glang chen steng na gnas pa'o/ /kha lo ba dang 'go 'dren pa/ /sna tshogs sna khrid kha lo bsgyur/ /gnas sded lho phyogs gnas pa dag/ shing rta'i gnyen zhes bya ba'o/ /ra thi na ni shing rta ba/ /a shwA pA hA rta ba'o/ /dpa' dang rtul phod gzhan bil gnon
32a6(mdo 'grel): sde spungs dang ni so ba'o/ /tshogs bsde ba 'dus pa dang/ /phud po dmag dpung sai ni ka/ gang zhig dpung ni stong yod pa/ /de ni stod dpon sa ha tra/ /bya ra ba dang mel tshe'o/ /dmag dpon dang ni dpon mgo'o/ /kany+tsa ka na gon khrab bo/ /gang zhig nang tshangs can dang ni/
32a7(mdo 'grel): bar? dang go cha lus kyi gas/ /de nas mgo khab che ma bu'i zhwa/ /rmog/ de nas lus gos khrab dang ni/ /ya lang brang khabs go cha khrab/ /ka ba can mo min no/ /go cha gyon dang chas zhugs dang/ /go cha bar mi tag go/ gsum ni ma grol la sogs pa/ /go cha dang ni go tshogs?
32b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rkang thang rkang dmag rkang 'gros pa/ /pA dA pi ka dang rkang rgyu ba/ /ba da ga dang pa di ka/ de nas rkang thang tshogs dang dpung 'u chud/ /mtshon chas 'cho dang mtshon cha ba/ /'khrug mi dang ni gsos po mtshungs/ /lag spyangs rab dgos khyad par can/ /skyes bu rgyu rtsal
32b2(mdo 'grel): mkhan/ /a pa bA dri bra Sha ta ko si lak+ShAdma shapsh+ya? ta shA pa kA/ d+ha nwI gzhu can dang/ /gzhu thogs pa dang gzhu 'dzin no/ /mda' ba dang ni mda''dzin pa/ /shAk+ti ka dang mdud 'dzin dang/ /dbyig pa can dang ber kha ba/ /dbyug pa dgra sta'i mtshon cha can/ gri bi dang ni
32b3(mdo 'grel): ral gri'i mtshon/ /mtshungs pa mdung can mdung mtshon can/ /tsa? rma'i lag na phub yin no/ /patA kI dang 'phyar dar ro/ /rjes 'jug phyir 'brang rjes su 'brang rjes su yod/ /rting 'brang ba dang mtshungs pa'o/ /sngon 'gro mdun 'gro dang por 'gro/ sA 'dor ba dang
32b4(mdo 'grel): gdod ma'o/ /manda gA mi dal gyis 'gro/ /myur 'gro ba dang rgyug pa mnyam/ /pad chen ba dang dzA g+hi ko/ mgyogs myur rgyug pa bang/ /rgyu dang ni rab tu skyong/ /rgyal dang rgyal nu dze tuM do/ /dze ya rgyal bar sems pa'o/ /rgyal pa dang ni dze ta'o/ /gang zhig dgra
32b5(mdo 'grel): yi phyogs 'gro ba/ /de ni ab+hya mi tyo'o/ /grogs dan ba dang skya lag go/ stobs chen dang ni gyad mi dang/ /gang zhig shin tu rtul phod pa/ /brad spyod u ba si lo'o/ /shing rta ra thid shing rta'i bdag/ 'dod 'bor dang ni rjes 'chags 'gro/ /rtag 'grod bzhi
32b6(mdo 'grel): rgyun du dgro/ /dpa' dang rtul phod ngo bo la gnon/ /brjid can dang ni rgyal byed pa/ /g.yul na brjid dang legs pa dang/ /mtshon chas 'cho ba la sogs gsum/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni bzhon pa dang/ /dmag dpon ru dar sde dang ni/ /dmig dang dbung ni chas pa'o/
32b7(mdo 'grel): stobs kyi snga dang 'khor lo dang/ /tshogs pa rnams ni mo min no/ /dpung chags rnams kyi bgod pa ni/ /da dbye dbyug sogs 'khrug shoms so/ /slar 'brang bkod pa phyi ma'o/ /dmag gi rgyab ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /glang dang shing rta re re dang/
33a1(mdo 'grel): ni rkang thang lnga/ /sa dA ti ka zhes pa'o/ /so so'i yan lag gsum 'gyur gyis/ /kun gyi go rim zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar phyi nas dmag gi sgo/ gul ma ga Nau bA hA nI/ /sde tshan gyi ming ngo/ /pri ta nA tsa mu/ a nI ki nI bcu rnams
33a2(mdo 'grel): la/ a nI ki byo ak+Sho hi/ /phun tshogs 'byor ldan dpal dang shis/ /phongs dang mi 'byor phun tshogs bral/ /mtshon cha lag cha rdag cha/ /rgyan cha de nas ma yin no/ /gzhu dang tsA pa d+ha nu dang/ /'dab za mda''phen ka rmuM ka/ mnga' bskyod de nas
33a3(mdo 'grel): kar+N+ya ta/ /kA la piShthaM mnga' yi lto/ /srid sgrub gzhu ni gAN+Di 'o/ /skyes buAm ni ma ning ngo/ /gzhu yi mchog ma a Ta nI/ /go d+ha lag 'brag lag gzan no/ /la sta ga ni changs pa'o/ /gzhu rgyud brang bu rgyud yon tan/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas
33a4(mdo 'grel): brkyang la sogs pa'i/ /gnas ni rnam pa lnga zhes so/ /mnga' 'phan mtshon cha la k+ShaM ngo/ /'phong slob u pa nA sa'o/ /mda' dang bA Na rtse mo can/ /drang 'gro mkha' 'gro myur 'gro dang/ /nags 'phran lam ldan 'bigs byed dang/ /gshog ldan
33a5(mdo 'grel): mda' dang gnyis/ /lcags mnga' nA rA tsA yin no/ /sgro dang mdab ma gsum phyis/ /ni rasta ni mnga' 'phangs pa/ /dug can mnga' ni li pA kau/ dong ba mnga' shugs du NA ri/ /brtsod rtse mda''dzin gnyis dang ba/ /ral gri gcod byed zla 'dzum
33a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /a si ral gri rdeg cha dang/ /maN+Dal rtse lag ba skyong/ /kri bA Na 'dra/ /se ru ral gri'i yu ba'o/ /ral gri'i 'ching thag me kha la/ /phub ni mo min pha la'o/ /tsarma g.yung du lag 'dzin pa/ /tho ba 'joms byed g+ha na'o/ /rkeng gri ka ra pA
33a7(mdo 'grel): li ka/ 'bigs spyod mdung dang mnyam pa/ /dbyug pa lcags bcings pa ri g+hA/ gnyis pa steng ri pa ra shu/ /dgra sta dang ni sta mo'o/ /chu gri gri thung tshu ri ka/ ral gri drug gu'o/ /'phang mdung sha lya gser mdung ngo/ /mnga' po che ni ta ma ra dang
33b1(mdo 'grel): mo min/ /thag mdung kun dang sngon ma mo min zhabs thog pa/ /sna mngor ko Ta pa ra/ /kun gyis chas byed sar po g+ha/ kun gyis go gyon sdogs byed pa/ /go gsar dang ni go cha bsgos/ /rgyal po dmag la mnga' gsol byed/ /gang zhig dmag 'gro de dbang
33b2(mdo 'grel): bskur/ /dmag thegs bskyod dang ldeg pa dang/ /zhugs pa 'gro dang ga ma'o/ /brkyang ba dang ni ru brgyangs dang/ /pha rol dmag dang 'jug pa'i don/ /nyam ming ba dang 'jigs med dang/ /g.yul du 'jug tshe sngon par dpa' / /bai tA li ka go byed pa
33b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo can dang ril bu dang slongs mo ba/ /rgyal rabs mkhan ni ma d+hu ka/ phyag dang stong pa mkhan po dang/ /g.yul 'phrod 'khrug dus g.yul ngor zhugs/ /rdul tshubs gnyis so mo ni rdul/ /rdul tshub gnyis te tshub ma dang/ phye ma dang ni k+Sho dA'o/ /nya
33b4(mdo 'grel): bar 'khrugs dang 'gyed pa dang/ /'dzings pa dang ni phyogs med dang/ /ba dan rgyal mtshan rtog dang ni/ /d+hwa dza dang ni mo min no/ /dur khrod 'khrugs pa'i sa gzhi dang/ /shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu ster/ /da snga da snga zhes sgrog pa/ /bdag sngon mo min//
33b5(mdo 'grel): mtshar can skyes bu grogs pa can/ /nga rgyal can zhes so/ /nga nga zhes smra phan tshun 'gran/ /gang zhig 'gran par byed pa'o/ /'tsho ma med thal 'gro rtul phod dang/ /stobs ldan dpal dang nyam nga med/ /nus ldan pha rol gnon pa'o/ /byang dang shin tu
33b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' ba' o/ /dpa' bo'i gtung ba gang zhig gis/ chang 'thungs yul gyi snga phyi ru/ /'khrugs pa 'gyed pa rgya ba byed pa/ /'joms pa rab tu 'joms pa dang/ /mo d+ha du byed saM khya dang/ /g.yul dang sAM pa rA yi ka /mtshon 'jings mnyam shing a nI ka/ g.yul du
33b7(mdo 'grel): 'thab ma bi gra h+ro/ /'phrog 'joms dge bral rtsod pa dang/ /shin tu 'dral dang si yug sa/ /mngon pa nyid dang rdeg gsod dang ngo/ /'thab rtsod 'khrug longs? sa mu dA ya mo/ /mi bod g.yul 'gyed a dzi dang/ /sa mi dru d+ha zhes pa'o/ /mtshan bral gyang kyi
34a1(mdo 'grel): dpung 'jings dang/ /tu mu laM ni g.yul du gsod/ /ca co? sgrogs pa seng ge'i sgra/ /glang mo'i bum pa'i sgra dang ni/ /dud mo ca co dang ding dang/ /'bru mang po dang glang po'i sgra/ /bi s+thA ra ni gzhu yi sgra/ /'khrug rda ram pa ro dag mtshungs
34a2(mdo 'grel): g.yo rgyu dan thabs ha tha'o/ /de nas 'khrul dang nor ba dang/ /mi shes ma ming ltas byung dang/ /nyer sgyur dang ni mtshungs pa gsum/ /brgyal dang myos dang 'bog pa'o/ /manra ba dang ni 'tshor ba'o/ /rmas pa dang ni lus nyams so/ /rgyal ba dang ni rnam par
34a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal/ /'gras dang rtsen dang slar byed dang/ /'khon zhugs pa dang sha 'khon zhugs/ /bros dang zhogs dang bur ba dang/ /sAM dA bA bi dra bo draM pa:/ /a ya trA mo/ /bros pa'i ming ngo/ /g.yul du bcos gzhan rgyal ba dang/ /'pham pa dang ni pha rol rgyal/
34a4(mdo 'grel): yib pa dang ni skyabs pa'o/ /'joms dang rdeg dang rdung ba dang/ /rnam 'tshe dang bsnun pa dang/ /bzhus dang nyer gtses mnar pa dang/ /nor ba nyed pa gos med dang/ /brdung rtag nges 'joms nges par gsod/ /skad cig dang ni yongs su spangs/ /nirthA ya
34a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ bi sha sa ni/ sA ra NaM pra ti g+hA ta naM/ ta twA saM na bra ma tha naM/ dra tha no/ dz+nyA sa nA ni tsa/ /a lam+b+hA bany+tsi/ rnam 'joms gtubs dang gcod pa dang/ /de rnams ni gsod gcod kyi ming gi rnam grangs so/ /lnga pa dus chod lta ba'i mdza' / /skal mdog? che
34a6(mdo 'grel): 'gro mdza' ma dang/ /chud mja' gnyis te che mnga' dang/ /'chi ba byed bcings mo min no/ /pha rol 'das dang lnga po rnyed/ /pha rol dang ni yi dags gnas/ /ro dang tshe 'das gsum zhes so/ /ro thab sgong phub tsi ti mo/ /ka band+ha ni mo min te/ /byed ldan
34a7(mdo 'grel): mgo med ro yin no/ /dur khrod dang ni gshin gyi nags/ /ro dang sha ba mo min no/ /gdon dang 'byung po 'ching byed do/ /kA rA tyA ni 'ching byed gnas/ /skyes bu'i srog ni pA NA 'o/ /de nas de bzhin 'tsho dang gson pa dang/ /tshe ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i
34b1(mdo 'grel): dus/ /skyes bu 'tsho byed 'tsho ba'i sman/ /rgyal rigs kyi sde tshan no/ /rlis byung rla skyes 'phags pa dang/ /rje rigs sa 'dzin rje'u'o?/ /kun 'tsho 'tsho ba bArta dang/ /gson byed so nan 'tsho 'tshis so/ /gsum yin rmo ko dud 'gro skyong/ /tshed dang 'tsho ba'i tshim
34b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya/ /zhabs thog pa ni phyi yi 'tsho/ /rmo ko dang ni phru rlog dang/ /ston thag dang no thon no/ /bya 'tshol dang ni slong mo pa/ /ji ltar/ bden pa dang ni tshong dngos po/ /'bun dang skyed dang bde 'tsho dang/ /don sbyor 'tshod dam 'tshod pa can/ /skyi ba dang ni g.yar
34b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /brje pa dang ni bsgyur bzlog go /nor gyi bdag dang bu lon pa/ /gnyis po rab sbyor lan mkhan rim/ /tshul min pa dang log 'tsho dang/ /'phel ba dang ni gyur 'tsho'o/ /zhing pa shas pa so nam pa/ /phru rlog pa dang rmos pa'o/ /zhing dang 'brus sha le
34b4(mdo 'grel): yaM/ 'bru dang sa lu 'byung ba'o/ /nas dang nas zhing drug cu pa/ /nas sogs 'byung ba'i sa gzhi'o/ /ti lyaM tai li mon sa gre/ /a ma a Nu b+haM g+ha dang/ /thog ra mauM gI ni/ krau dra bI Na/ k+Sha ma 'bras skyel khyad par sogs/ sa bon btsugs dang/ bskrun pa dang/ /
34b5(mdo 'grel): btab dang rmos dang bskyed pa'o/ /sum log dang ni lan gsum rmos/ /sum ldog sum rmos de la yang/ /nyis log pa dang nyis rmos dang/ /nyis dul nyis rmos pa sla'o/ /dro N+yA d+ha ka la sogs pre/ pre bo a d+ha ka la sogs khA rI tshad can khA rI ka /u tu
34b6(mdo 'grel): mar+Na la sogs gsum/ /skyes bu ma ning dang ni/ /sa gzhi k+She tra 'bru sa dang/ 'bru sa chu ma chu mig can/ /rmos zhing dang sa gzhi tshogs/ /bod pa sa sgong pho/ /kro Ti sha ni bod pa'i dbye/ /lcags dbyig to da na te traM/ /tog tse tang ni rko byed do/ /zor ba dang ni rnga byed do
34b7(mdo 'grel): band+ha yu ba yo ka tra/ /de nas gshol dang rmo byed dang/ /gshol dang ha la thod pa dang/ /sa gcod 'dral byed gshol dang ni/ /glang 'joms dang ne rtse mo can/ /gnya' shing gnya' pa'i phur pa dang/ /mda' dang gshol gyi dbyig ba'o/ /thod lcags dang ni
35a1(mdo 'grel): gshol lcags so/ /skyes bu rtod phur 'dogs thag dang/ /gang zhig phyugs rnams btags pa'o/ /'bru dkar 'bru dgar 'bru dang bA Ta la/ /nas dang a ba mnyam pa'o/ /ma smin pa ni ljang pa'o/ /sran ma sra twi ma ku dang/ sran ma'i ming ngo/ /ko
35a2(mdo 'grel): ra du Sha kro da ba/ /bkra shis dang ni san chung ngo/ /mon sran gre'u brgyad pa'o/ /nags sran ma/ /dkar dang yungs nags pa la khang ka tampa kau/ don grub yungs kar zas gtsang dang/ /gro dang yid legs 'gro ba'o/ /nas dang ku la ma Sha zhes so/ /tsa Na ka dang ha
35a3(mdo 'grel): ri man+tha skyes/ /gnyis ni dI le ti bskyes dang/ /ti ?? 'bras med do/ /skye rtsa k+Shu d+hA mngon skyes dang/ /rgyal po nag po lha min mo/ /khre dang pri yang g+hu ni gnyis/ /u mA zar ma a ta sI/ /mA tU la nI b+hAM ga yAM/ /'bru yi rab dbye a Nu skyes/ /gi shu ru dang snyi ma dang/ /snyi ma dang ni
35a4(mdo 'grel): dog pa'o/ /so ba lkogs can gongs ma'o/ /stam po gud po rtsa sogs 'bru/ /mgul ba ngar ba kaN+Da'o/ /pa lA la ni mo min 'bras med sogs/ /spun stong phub ma ma ning ngo/ /mo rkogs skyes bu phub ma'o/ /rtse mo mo min 'jam pa dang/ /rtse mo rno ba gra
35a5(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ /mtshungs pa gang bu gsum phyi nas/ /so ba'i tshogs pa d+hA n+yA'o/ /gtsang ma dang ni mang byas dang/ /sran ma la sogs gang bu'i 'bru/ /snyi ma'i 'bru ni nas la sogs/ /shA la ya dang ka la ma sogs dang/ /drug cu ba sogs pho 'di rnams/ /rtswa yi
35a6(mdo 'grel): 'bru dang ni bA rA/ /mo ni ga be durga be? d+hu kA'o/ /lcags rtse can dang rtun shing ngo/ /mo min/ rtun dang 'bru ma'i ma gzhi'o/ /slo ma mkhrab byed mo min no/ /khrol ma dang ni tshigs se'o/ /sge dang pha chi thub bo khres/ /rtswa thugs rtsa khres dag mtshungs so//
35a7(mdo 'grel): ro ldan g.yos khang tshang ma'o/ /g.yos dpon lag pa de'i dpon po dang/ zas? ma g.yos mthab kha pa/ /lag bde 'dren thang phyag tshang ngo/ /yon tan thab kha ba zas gnyer/ /zas byed pa 'di rnams gsum/ /thab dang skyed bu me thab dang/ /tsu li dang ni g.yos sa'o/
35b1(mdo 'grel): me yi gzhong pa me snod dang/ /me yi stegs dang me rdza'o/ /de nas mo min me mdag dang/ /me dang mul bu mu kaM zhes so/ /ma ning glang ba ther po dang/ /rdod gzhi sdong rdza dang/ ni me/ snod po che dang nor bu can/ /chu yi snod dang chu rdza'o/ /za rdza bco rdza g.yo snod snod/ /
35b2(mdo 'grel): bum pa gsum yin gnyis g+ha Ta/ /bum pa ni pA mo min no/ /kham phor dang ni rdza phor ro/ /snum zan ma dang dul ma'o/ /'khar ba mo min chad snod da/ /ku du(mdo 'grel): ko spubs snum snod do/ /ku ru chud ba skyes bu'o/ /kun 'jo snod ni b+haNdra'o/ /snod dang a ma tra snod
35b3(mdo 'grel): sbyong?/ /skyabs ba srub byed kha dzA kA/ bzar bu dang ni lag skyogs so/ /mo min lo ma sngo lo ma/ /dar ba sdong bu chu ba'o/ /spyod dang kha dog sgyur byed do/ /tin ti lI ka bse yab dang/ /shing skyur de nas pho ba ris/ /ma ri tsam dang ko la kaM/ nag po drod sman chos kyi
35b4(mdo 'grel): sman/ /dzI ra zi ra a dza dzI/ /zegs ma nag po zir bu thI/ /ka ra bI dang sa dang ni/ /rgya chen nag po ni ra nags/ /sgo bshed? dang ni rwa can no/ /de nas gdugs can 'u su dang/ /ku stum bu ru so ba can/ /de nas sga dang sman chen dang/ /mo dang ma ning thams cad
35b5(mdo 'grel): la/ /grong skyes bi shwa sman dang ni/ /rtsab mo skyur mo kra la mA ShA/ /thug skyur skyur? rtsi a ma la/ /skyur sbyar dang ni kany+dzi ka /stong 'bigs shing kun me ldan dang/ /hiM gu dang ni shing kun no/ /de yi lo ma kA rA bI/ /za ri nag po bA Sha pi ka/ ka ra bI dang rgya
35b6(mdo 'grel): chen no/ /mtshan mo'i ming can spung pa ser/ /hA ri dra dang yung ba'o/ /rgya mtsho gang zhig lan tshwa tsha/ /dbyid dus chags pa de dang de/ /rgya mtsho mo min dkar shing zhi/ /mA Ni man+tha sind+hu skyes/ /rau ma ke dang sbyar tshwa'o/ /smin tshwa kha ru tsha sbyar gnyis/ /tshwa ni
35b7(mdo 'grel): mi zad ru tsa ke /mar khu las byung me tsa ke /ka ra spu ba hwags dang ni/ /sharka ra dang ka ra dkar/ /'phrum dang 'i las sbyar ro/ /rA sA lA ni gnyis pa'o/ /chod ma dang ni ShthA naM/ /rtags pa/ sum bA sa yan chod do/ /rtse byas bsregs sha shU lyA'o/ /btsos pa'i
36a1(mdo 'grel): sha ni bai tha ram/ /gya nom ba dang phun sum tshogs/ /dka' bas bsgrubs dang legs par sbyar/ /ltar ltar dang ni mal mul lo/ /legs bsangs pa dang dag byas mnyam/ /snum brdos snum btsos sni gwaM/ 'dra dang 'khar ba pA saM ta/ /ma
36a2(mdo 'grel): smin pa dang bsru bu zas/ /'bras yos skyes gu mang po'i tshig ma nyams pa/ 'bras yos bi bi Ta ka/ yos dang nas brdos mo yin no/ /rdob bu chang bu changs pa dang/ zho zan zho dang sbyar ba'o/ /zan ni mi min b+ha kA/ zas dang an na o da no/ /mo min bza' pa zhes
36a3(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /bza' ba dang ni lto zhes so/ /ro kun dang po khu ba mo/ /'bras bu tsA ma khu ye dang/ /thug pa khu ba zan las byung/ /ya bA gu dang 'bras thug go /thug pa skyo cha ta ra lA/ /ga bya ma gsum yin pa las byung/ thams cad pa dang ba lci dang/ /pa yi rang bzhin mo min
36a4(mdo 'grel): no/ /lcu skam dang ni yar dge mo/ /'o ma k+ShI raM ba ma mtshungs/ /'o ma las byung zho da d+hi sogs/ /dra spyaM ma chags zhes so/ /zhun mar zhun ma bsreg rdzas mar/ /ma bzhu ba dang mar gsar dang/ /de ni he ya b+hA bi ni/ /gang zhig khar chang pa bzhos mar//
36a5(mdo 'grel): dbyug snum dar ba zho dpyad dang/ /chu skya chab? skya dar ba'o/ /ma thi taM ni chu rkang gcig /chu phyed phan? ni rdza lam/ /zho kha chu ni zho las byung/ /pri ni 'o ma gsar pa'o/ /zas 'dod zas 'dod ltogs pa dang/ /grA sa dang ni kham gyi don/ /chu bcas zas dang sA pI
36a6(mdo 'grel): to/ /sa gi d+ha bud med dang lhan cig za ba/ /chu 'dod btud 'dod kha skam mo skam/ /bzhes pa gsol dgongs gdugs tshong dang/ /mtshal ma za ma zas dang ni/ /kha zas zhes pa dang yang ngo/ /'grangs dang ngoms dang tshim pa dang/ he la sder zhabs lhag ma'o//
36b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa rab 'dod gdung ba dang/ /zhen pa tshags pa sred pa'o/ /'brog pa phyugs skyong ba lang 'grang/ /pa 'jo? zho mkhan lcags thogs so/ /ba lang ma he la sogs pa/ /rkang ldan nor ldan gnyis ni phyug phyug go /ba ldan go mI phyugs ltas 'cher dang ba lang
36b2(mdo 'grel): rgyu/ /nog can bzang po stobs ldan dang/ /glang dang khyu mchog bri sha dang/ /'dren byed ba lang 'gro byed do/ /nog can chags pa uk+Sha kaM/ ba khyu ba tshogs ba lang 'dus/ /ba'u be'u bA t+ma ka/ grus ma'o/ /khyu ba nog chen ma ho k+Sha/ /pri do uk+Sha glang rgan no//
36b3(mdo 'grel): nog skyes pa dang gsar nog 'chas/ /gnya''dul glang gsar 'dra ba'o/ /sha bcang ma ning sbyor ba'o/ /ma ning mkhan po ba dwi ra/ /dpung ba'i phyogs ni ba ha'o/ /sa sna ske yi lkog shal lo/ /snA thag dang ni kha thag go /rgyab len 'gro dang khur 'gro ba/ /gnya' shing la
36b4(mdo 'grel): sogs Dho d+ha ra/ /gnya' shing glang 'dul ba dang shing rnga 'dren/ /rmod byed gcod byed 'phru byed pa/ /gshol ldan rmo glang khal klang dang/ /rgal dang khal pa khur 'dren pa/ /gnyis po gcig gi khur theg pa/ /tshig theg gcig pos 'dren pa'o/ /kun gyi khur
36b5(mdo 'grel): theg dul ma dang/ /khur kun 'dren par nus pa'o/ /ba mo bdag gau ru sA/ /mchod byed dang na ro ldan ma/ /mchod pa mchod yon ro hi Ni/ /ba lang mchog ni nai tsi kI/ kha dog la sogs dbye ba'i ming/ /khra mo dkar po la sogs pa/ /lo gnyis ma dang lo gnyis pa/ /lo
36b6(mdo 'grel): gcig ma dang lo gcig pa/ /be'u med dang ba skam mo/ /a? ba ta ka ba'u sho ra/ /de dang sha dang khyu mchog sbyor/ /de na lo be khur du ma/ /dus thob 'khor mang dus so/ /praShtho h+rI dang ba gsar ro/ /a tsaN+Da nI dul ma'o/ /be mdas ma dang lo be ma/ /be spun ring ba
36b7(mdo 'grel): baSh+ga a NI/ /d+he nu be'u gsar skyes so/ /sprin ba dang ni 'jo ba de ma/ /nu 'thung 'thung ba'i nu ma'o/ /dro Ne k+ShI ra bre chen pa nod/ /bdo bas thags 'thing thig stan byed pa/ /lo re zhing skye ba'o/ /lo btud skye dang slar skye ma/ /u d+ha ma ning mA bI naM/ /bted pa'i shing dang phur
37a1(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /mo min thag pa 'dogs thag go /phyug thag rkang thag dA ma ni/ /srub na srub shing man+thA na/ /srub ma dang ni zho skya'o/ /srub pa'i ka ba ku tha ro/ /zho rdza srub pa'i rdza ma mtshungs/ /rnga mo rin can rang bzhin lus chen po/ /rde'u dang ni rde phrug go /rde'u 'dogs
37a2(mdo 'grel): thag sh+riM kha la/ /shing la rkang pa 'dogs pa'o/ /ra dang ts+tsha gI tshe tshe dang/ /ra dang spa 'phyang ma skyes pa/ /yug dang lto 'phyang bal ldan dang/ /g.yang dkar dang ni e Da kA(mdo 'grel): rnga mo brang 'gro 'tshogs dang khyu/ /rnga khyu gsus 'phyang bong bu 'khor lo can stobs ldan//
37a3(mdo 'grel): sna chen skad chen kha ra'o/ /gzhan skyes ded dpon nges dgro dgar dang/ /tshong dpon tshong pa zong 'tshong dang/ /zod pa dang ni nyo tshong ngo/ /'tshong pa bi kra ko'o/ /nyo ba kra yi ka mtshungs/ /btsong bya ba Di dzyE yin no/ /rin dang gzhal bya ba kra ya/ /zod dang tshong dngos
37a4(mdo 'grel): rtsa nor dang/ /snyed pa lhag pa'i 'bras bu can/ /so sor bying dang yongs su bsgyur ba'o/ /brje ba dang ni bsgyur ba'o/ /skyes bus gtams pa bya ba'o/ /slar blangs dang ni gtang ba'o/ /tshong zong bkram pa byAM ngo/ /kre ya gzhal bar bya ba'o/ /tshong dang bsgyur ldog nyo
37a5(mdo 'grel): tshong sogs/ /gsum/ ma ning bden zong bden byed/ /bden byas mo 'tshong pa dang ni bi kra ya/ /bgang bya grangs bya bcu ni gsum mo/ /nyi shu la sogs thams cad gcig /bgrang bya la sogs pa/ /grangs don gnyis dang mang po'i tshig /dgu bcu pa ni ma yin no/ /phreng
37a6(mdo 'grel): ni brgya dang stong la sogs/ /go rim bcu yi yon tan gyi/ /'jal byed tshang byed mnyam byed cis/ /tshang? kyi don ni gsum yin no/ /'jal byed srad dang sor dang bre/ /ma ru lnga sogs mA sha ka /de rnams bcu drug zho gnyis te/ /mo man srad ni dkar Sha bzhi yin
37a7(mdo 'grel): no/ /gser 'jal zho cha gser mig go /ku ru bi ta rta yi srang/ /snyoms byang mo min srang brgya dang/ /khung yin nyi shu tham pa ni/ srang a'i tsa taM ni khur bcu'o/ /shing rta khur rta a tsi ta/ /kArSha pa na dong tsha yin/ /zangs ma'i dong tshe kArShi ka/ mo min pre
37b1(mdo 'grel): po che/ /bzhi cha bzhi pa bcu drug nyi shu ni/ /ni kuny+tsa ka/ gu Da kha dang brel sogs/ /yongs su 'jal byed so so'o/ /rkang pa dang ni gcig cha yin/ /cha dang cha shas 'god pa'o/ /rdzas dbal lo byang nor dang ni/ /'byor pa dngos 'od kar dang rdzas/ /rin chen zang zing
37b2(mdo 'grel): longs spyod don/ /nor bu dang dngos po nyid kyang ngo/ /mdzod dang rin chen gser gzugs dang/ /sgrom dang snod ces bya ba'o/ /de dag gang zhig gzhan mdzod dang/ /dngul dang de gnyis mA ha taM/ /mkha' lding gshog pa ma ra ka ta dang/ /rngo yi snying dang
37b3(mdo 'grel): nor bu ldang/ /rin chen dmar po hi taka /pad+ma rA ga de nas ni/ /mu tig dang ni mu kA'o/ /de nas be dru ma ni skyes bu ste/ /byi ru pho dang ma ning ngo/ /rin chen nor bu gnyis yin te/ /rdo skyes mu tig la sogs dang/ /gser dang mdog zangs ka na ka /rin chen he ma tshong dus
37b4(mdo 'grel): 'drim/ /bseg bya bum brgya gaM ga skyes/ /b+h+ra ma mdangs ldan sa le sbram/ /skyes gzugs kha dog chen po dang/ /mdog ldan 'od byed ma chu gser/ /rkang brgyad dang ni mo min no/ /rgyan gser gang zhig ra can dang/ /kan kaM ces pa 'di/ mdog ngan tshan dang dngul dang ni
37b5(mdo 'grel): kha ra dzu ri dkar po dang/ /rI rE ming dang ro gan ma yin/ /de nas zangs dang shu lI dang/ /kla klo kha dog zangs ma dang/ /du mIr+Na'o/ /lcags ni mo min 'tshon byed rno/ /gong bu nag po gar bu dang/ /rdo yi snying po de nas ni/ /so rdo lcags dreg dri ma'o/ /mdog can thams cad yang
37b6(mdo 'grel): dag lcags/ /lcags kyi bye brag gshol lcags dang/ /mching bu g.yu gser de nas ni/ /rgyug byed dngul chu 'ang nga byed dang/ /khu ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /brda ba? lam ni mA he'i rwa/ /lhang tshe ra ri skyes dri ma med/ /chu srol mig sman sau bI raM/ /mig sman kA pi ta kA
37b7(mdo 'grel): mu ni/ /spangs ma'i mig smon rtse can mgrin/ /sngon po dang ni rma bya'i mgrin/ /spangs ma rtul ba dA rbi kA/ /btsos pa las byung spangs ma'o/ /khu ba'i mig sman khu pa'i snying/ /'thing dri'i rdo mu zi dri ldan dang/ /shin tu dri/ mig sman rigs can ku lang thika/ dus
38a1(mdo 'grel): kyi me tog me tog nye?/ /me tog mig sman po Shpa kaM/ pa bla ser po tA la mA la/ /ha rita la ke/ brag zhun marthya ri skyes dang/ /rdo skyes shing lA dzA tu'o/ /'byor rtsi dri sprin srog can dang/ /gor bu gos ri bong mnyam/ /rgya mtsho spub phen spu/ /sindu ri
38a2(mdo 'grel): dang li khri'o/ /nA ga zho nye mtshon mo stengs/ /ro nyi tra bu pits+tsha Ta/ /tshon dang gsha' tse mkhar pa'i rgyu/ /de nas btsag ces bya ba'o/ /la rgan me lce tshon chen po/ /zhes pa'ang lug snam pa la gos/ /ri bong bal ni sha sha lo ma'o/ /sprang dang mngar ldan mA kAM?
38a3(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /sbrang snyigs dang ni spra tshil lo/ /ma na ri skyes ldong ros dang/ /ldong ros dang ni klu lce pa/ /ne bA lI ni kuN+tI go la/ /yA ba k+Sha nas sogs skyes/ /smin pa de nas/ rgya tshwa kA po ta/ su kha ba rtsa karya tshwa'o/ /shi tshwa baM sha ro tsa nA/ /myur skyes dkar po pho pa ri
38a4(mdo 'grel): mo tsha TaM rtsa ba bur shing/ /mdung can pa pya lI'i rtsa/ /rtswa TaM ka shir zhes pa yang ngo/ /go lo mi dang 'byung po'i skra/ /pho/ /pa trang ga dang tsan dmang mar/ /tshwa pa gsum dang uSh+Na byo Sha/ /'bras bu gsum ni pha la twi ka/ rje rigs kyi sde tshin no// //dmangs  
38a5(mdo 'grel): rigs dang ni phyis skyes dang/ /chos snum dang ni byin skyes so/ /kun gtum mthar thug 'dres ma'a/ /sman pa ri mo mkhan la sogs/ /dmangs dang rjes skyes ri mo mkhan/ /sman pa rje'u gnyis skyes las/ /dmangs dang rgyal 'dres drag pa'o/ /bya bas 'tsho ba
38a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal rjes 'dres/ /mA hi Sh+ya ni 'phags rgyal 'dres/ /kA ta 'phags pa dmangs mo'i bu/ /bram ze rgyal 'dres sU ta'o/ /de yi rjes 'bres bai de ha/ /shing rta mkhan po mA hA Sh+ya/ /ra mo mkhan las byung ba'o/ /kun gtum pa yi skye ba ni/ /bram ze mo dang chos snub las/ /byed mkhan dang ni
38a7(mdo 'grel): bzo bo dang/ /tshogs pa de rnams gnyis yin to/ /shes nyen mkhan dang bzo pa'i rigs/ /rigs ldan rigs kyi gtso bo dang/ /me tog mkhan po mA li ka/ bum pa mkhan dang rdza mkhan no/ /zhal ba mkhan po le pa ka /ta na trA bA ya thags mkhan no//
38b1(mdo 'grel): tshem bu ba dang gos bzo ba/ /ri mos 'tsho ba tsi tA ka ra/ /mtshon cha mkhan dang ral gri mkhan/ /lham mkhan dang ni ko spags mkhan/ /lcags bzo ba dang lcags mgar ro/ /gser mgar swar+Na ka ra dang/ /gser mkhan dang ni gser bzo ba/ /dung bzo ba dang
38b2(mdo 'grel): dung mkhan no/ /zangs mkhan dang ni zangs mgar ba/ /shin mkhan shing bzo shing 'jog pa/ /shing rta byed dang shing 'jog mkhan/ /phyu mkhan dang ni khyim shing mkhan/ /khyim gnas dang ni bza' mo'o/ /breg mkhan skra mkhan mtho ris grags/ /nA
38b3(mdo 'grel): pi te? dang mthar gnas pa/ /tshos ma dang btso rlag mkhan/ /chang 'tshong ma dang 'chang ma'o/ /ra rdzi dang ni ra skyod pa/ /lta yis 'tsho ma lha gnyer ba/ /sgyu ma ba dang sgyu ma mkhan/ /sgyu ma byed dang so sor 'phrog /gar ba dang ni gar mkhan no/ /bud med kyis 'tsho bud
38b4(mdo 'grel): med bskyangs/ /b+ha ra ta zhes gar dang ni/ /rkang ba ba dang gar gyi gtso/ /rnga pa dang ni rnga rdung ga /lag pa'i sgra dang thal mo rdeb/ /gling bu ba dang gling bu 'bud/ /pi wang ba dang pi wang mkhan/ /'tsho ba tha chang bya bshor ba/ /gnyis/ bya bsnyi ba dang bya rgya pa/ /rngon pa sI?
38b5(mdo 'grel): pa shan pa yings/ /gsum/ gla mi gla zan las byed pa/ /zho shas 'tsho ba zhes pa'o/ /bang chen pa dang phrin pa'o/ /khur 'dren ba dang khur ba'o/ /rigs med dman pa na rigs dang/ /phal pa dang ni so so skye/ /ngan pa dmangs rigs dzAlma dang/ /chung pa dang ni dman pa'i
38b6(mdo 'grel): khol dang g.yog dang bran dang ni/ /dA sa g.yog po tsi Taka? /zhabs 'bring snga 'jug pa sgo bya ba/ /zhabs thog pa dang yongs su smyong gzhan gsos dang ni btsal bu dang/ /gzhan skyes pa dang gzhan gyis bskyangs/ /tha shal lto 'gengs le la ba/ /lngar ba glan
38b7(mdo 'grel): glen mi gsal ba/ /mkhas pa khram pa sgrin po dang/ /gsal po grub po spyang po'o/ /gtum po skyang mkhan glang po dang/ /nye mtsho chos med sdig can dang/ /khrir mthar gnas gtum po dang/ /ngan thabs pa dang dbye ba ni/ /mon pa dang ni sha ba ri/ /shing shun pa
39a1(mdo 'grel): dang kla klo skyes/ /gshed ma dang ni ri dags gsod/ /rngon pas 'tsho dang lings pa'o/ /khyi dang khyi mo sgrogs byed do/ /ri dags za dang smra byed dang/ /khyi gal dang rngan thabs sbyor ba'o/ /rngos dang snyi thag ri dags rgya/ /mi dge ba
39a2(mdo 'grel): khyi mo dang ni shu nI'o/ /rkyag zan phag pa grong gnas so/ /brkar ni dud 'gro gzhon/ /kun zas ri dags pa dang ni/ /rngon pa ri dags mthar byed mo/ /g.yas phyogs rmas pa lus tha yo ga /yan lag ngan pa/ tshom po rkun pa rkun po dang/ /srang ba tshom
39a3(mdo 'grel): rkun 'jab bu ga /arba gzhan dngu rkun ma jag rkun nor rkun rdzas tshams dang ni/ /rkun rdzas lkog nor de nags na/ /rgya dang snyi dang/ 'ching bya ri dags bya rnams so/ /'bring zas ngan pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro/ /ri dags 'dzin dang ri dags 'ching/ /zhags
39a4(mdo 'grel): bsgril ma mo dang thag /gsum yin srang bu yin no/ /za chu khyung dang bum pa'i 'khrul/ /chu 'bab dang ni chu yi 'khrul/ /skyes bu thag bzangs stag ma'o/ /snal ma srad bu tan+ta pa/ /thags 'thag byu ti mo dag 'dra/ /byug pa zhal ba la sogs las/ /thugs brnyan
39a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni 'bag yin te/ /dngos po so la sogs las byas/ /sgrom dang mdzod dang snod ba dang/ /de nas khur shing gnya' shing ngo/ /de nas/ lham dang chags dang bcag lham mo/ /mo/ zhabs stegs dang ni rkang btegs so/ /'breng thag 'breng zhabs ko thag go /rta
39a6(mdo 'grel): sogs lcag ni kA shA'o/ /gtum po rnams kyi pi wang ni/ /tsaN+DA la dang bal+li kI/ /rA nA tsi dang zho cha'o/ /gser dpyod rngo ni ka Sha'o/ /chan gri pa tra pa ra shu/ ri Shi kA tU li kA sa me/ /'od can lugs skongs muShA'o/ /spung pa ko ba'i spung pa dang/ /gsor dang
39a7(mdo 'grel): 'bigs byed ces bya'o/ /chan gri karta ri ni 'dra/ /shing za bzong dang shing 'bigs dang/ /TaM ka rdo ba'i bzong yin no/ /sog le mo min gcod byed do/ /A ra ko ba 'bags byed smyung/ /lcags skam sbom po lcags gzugs so/ /bzong dang las dang cha la sogs
39b1(mdo 'grel): sku gzugs gzugs brnyan pra ti mA/ /lder so dang ni slar grib ma/ /slar byas 'dra dang po ni mtshungs/ /dpa' dang nye bar 'jal ba dang/ /brjod bya'i rtags can mnyam dang mtshungs/ /de 'dra de mnyam de dang mtshungs/ /de yi gzhi 'dzin de 'dra'o/ /phyi tshig nyer sbyor 'di
39b2(mdo 'grel): rnams ni/ /'dra ba mnyam pa mtshungs pa dang/ /lta bu dang ni dpe la sogs/ /las sla sgrub sla rngan pa dang/ /bya dga' gla dang dge dang ni/ /khur bla gla dang rin dang ni/ /yon dang rnyed pa 'ong/ /chang dang gshol ldan mnyes pa dang/ /hA la yongs 'bab chu bdag skyes/ /dri
39b3(mdo 'grel): mchog rab dangs e rA dang/ /kadampar yang yongs su thos/ /myos byed dag 'byed marya chad/ /a ba daM sha chang lpags so/ /chang tshang chang mal btung ba'i gnas/ /ma d+hU bA ra sprang gi chang/ /me tog sprang chang mA d+ha? ba/ /mngar ldan sbrang gi cha ni gnyis/ /mai re ya rang
39b4(mdo 'grel): me tog chang/ /bur chang me da ka dang ni/ /spyar chang mtshungs/ /sand+ha nam ni chang g.yos so/ /phabs dang pho ni chang rtsi'o/ /nying khu bdud rtsi'i snying po dang/ /chang ra chang thung gnas dang ni/ /chang skyogs mo min chang snod dang/ /kham phor dang ni tshim byed do/ /tshe? long rgyan
39b5(mdo 'grel): po sho dang ni/ /za rgyan rtsad rgyan mtshungs pa'o/ /khas len dang ni gnya' ba' o/ /mag 'thu ba dang cha 'dzin no/ /shing rtse mo min rgyab 'gyed dang/ /ke ta ba dang pa Na zhes/ /pa Na a k+Sha gla ha/ /sho dang tshe long pA sha kA/ yongs 'dren brkyang dang khyi dang rdo/ /mo min rkang
39b6(mdo 'grel): brgyad sho yi stan/ /srog chags lkugs dang sho rgyal po/ /rab tu mang po la sbyor phyir/ /gcig tu bshad pas 'dir gang sbyor/ /de las chos gzhan la yang 'jug /rtags kyi mdza' las bsgrub par bya/ /dmangs rigs kyi sde tshan no// //'dir 'chi ba
39b7(mdo 'grel): med pa'i seng ges sbyar ba'i ming dang rtags kyi rjes su bshad pa las sa gzhi'o? skabs te gnyis pa'o// //khyad par can gyi dbang byed pa/ /spel ma dang ni sna tshogs don/ /mi zad rtags sogs bsdus rnams kyis/ /sde tshan phyi snga 'dren ma rnams/ /mo dang
40a1(mdo 'grel): bud med la sogs kyis/ /khyad par can ni gang mthong bas/ /de yi skabs kyi tshogs kyis so/ /yon tan rdzas dang bya ba'i dgra/ /de bzhin de yi dbye ba rnams/ /legs byas bsod nams nor dang ldan/ /blo che ba dang bsam yangs so/ /snying
40a2(mdo 'grel): du sdug dang yid dga' 'o/ /spro ba che dang dga' ba che/ /shes can go can mngon par mkhyen/ /rnam mkhyen nges ldan bslabs shes can/ /nges shes kha byang goms can dang/ /dge ba zhes kyang bya ba'o/ /mchod pa dang ni rab tu sbyin/ /the tshom yid
40a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis ma nges pa/ /yon gnas dang ni mchod pa'i 'os/ /de la sbyin pa'i 'os zhes bya/ /gtong phod dang ni dpal stug dang/ /byin rlabs can dang rab tu ster/ /yun ring 'tsho dang tshe ldan no/ /shes nyen can dang stan bcos rigs/ /yongs su rtog dang
40a4(mdo 'grel): rgyu mtshan can/ /mchod sbyin dang ni rab tu sbyin/ /yid dga' mgu dang yid rab bde/ /sems dga' o/ /yid ngan sems ngan mi dga' ba/ blo chung zos dang sems myos pa/ /g.yo med drang dang skyu med pa/ /pu ka lA dang sbyin dang ster/ /de yi pha rol
40a5(mdo 'grel): chags dang zhen/ /don 'dod 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang/ /shes ldan rgya cher grags pa can/ /rigs ldan rnam shes rnam par thos/ /yon tan nor ldan/ /rang bzhin byas dang mtshan nyid can/ /nor ldan 'byor ldan yon tan can/ /bdag po
40a6(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug ba ti dang/ /phyug po dpon po gtso bo dang/ /dpon mgo mgo 'dren rje bo dang/ /lhag par 'phel dang chen por skyes/ /nyug rum nyams pa 'og mang dang/ /khyi khol srung ma skyes bu'o/ /yan lag mchog ldan gzugs ldan ma/ /mdzes
40a7(mdo 'grel): ldan dang ni bud med do/ /nges byed bya ba byed pa dang/ /gzhungs byed 'grus par byed pa'o/ /smra mi byed dang lkugs pa'o/ /yid la bcags dang pha lta bu/ /dga' bas rgyan byas bu mo dang/ /'ga' zhig sbyin byed 'phags pa'i gnas/ /dpal
40b1(mdo 'grel): ldan phun tshogs bkra shis dpal/ /mnyes gshin pa dang mthong chor dang/ /brtse ba thugs rje snying rje dang/ /dga' bar byed pa mtshungs pa'o/ /rang rgyud rang dbang bdag dbang dang/ /rang dbang gzhan gyis ma bzung ba/ /gzhan rgyud gzhan dbang pha rol dbang/ /rang
40b2(mdo 'grel): dbang med dag bdag dbang min/ /gzhan dang nga dbang med 'dzin pa can/ /phyags ma dang ni mang pos byed/ /shin tu thogs dang yun ring byed/ /'dres mar spyod dang ci grub byed/ /dman dang ngan dang byed 'khos chung/ /las nus las shogs che ba dang/ /byad
40b3(mdo 'grel): mkhas las pa'i ngang tshul dang/ /karmmA shi lo ya las dpa' ba dang/ /mgo thon byed gsos po las byed/ /las mi de yi byed pa can/ /skyes khrus dang ni shing khrus so/ /kums dang sha yi zas dang ni/ /lhogs dang bkres dang bru ba tshwa/ /zas
40b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod gzhan zas pha rol zas/ /lto che drong chen dang kha bde/ /snyoms las sgyid skyur dang ni 'jas po gnyis ni/ /bdag 'gengs rang drong 'gengs/ /bdag drod 'gengs pa'o/ /kun za kun gyis 'tsho ba'o/ /'dod can rngam can zhen
40b5(mdo 'grel): can dang/ /na ngan 'dod dang ni sred can dang/ /'dra ba 'dod chen yang yang 'dod/ /myos pa dang ni ra ro ba/ /mdul ba dang ma zhi ba/ /rgyags pa rgad pa g.yo ldan rengs/ /chags pa 'dod can sred pa can/ /rde can 'dod ldan sred ldan
40b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mngon 'dod can sgrub can dul 'dzin/ /tshigs rtan/ A sh+ra ba/ dbang dang rang dgar byed pa'o/ /zhi ba dul ba mnyen pa mtshungs/ /spyi brtol spobs can dpral sgo can/ /'tsher ba med dang skyangs pa med/ /'jam med dang ni
40b7(mdo 'grel): gdong nges med/ /mtshar can? dang ni ngo mtshar can/ /mi brtan srab pa bag tsha'o/ /'jigs can 'jigs rung ma rungs pa/ /brnab sems yid 'dod/ /khyim chags khyim zhen can/ /dad can dang chags can/ /ltung 'dod dang ni babs 'dod do/ /phyag byed
41a1(mdo 'grel): mngon par smra/ /gsod dang 'joms 'dod rnam par 'tshe/ /'phel 'dod dang ni mun skyes so/ /'phur 'dod ni steng 'gra 'dod/ /rgyal 'dod dang ni rgyan cha 'dod/ /'gyur 'dod yin 'dod/ /'khor 'dod 'jug 'dod 'dra ba'o//
41a2(mdo 'grel): kha 'gog pa dang nye bar mchu 'dod/ /ngag 'dod 'jam dang ni tshig 'jam pa/ /shes ldan rnam dpyod theg le dang/ /rnam par rgyas dang rnam par gsal/ /brkyang ba bdal ba rab tu brkyang/ /rnam par brkyang/ /mnag nus sron nus
41a3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa dang/ /rkyen thub tshugs thub bzod pa'o/ /gtum po shin tu khro ba'o/ /gnyid med dang ni gnyid chag go /gnyid yur ba dang rab tu 'thibs/ /gnyid 'dod gnyid 'dod gnyid log 'dod/ /'bab 'dod dang ni nyal 'dod mtshungs//
41a4(mdo 'grel): pha rol kha phyogs gzhan du phyogs/ /'og tu phyogs dang kha bub dang/ /lhar 'gro lha la phyogs pa'o/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba kun du 'gro/ gang zhig lhan cig dus gcig go/ dud 'gro dang ni 'phred la 'gro/ /smra ba brjod pa zlos pa'o/ /
41a5(mdo 'grel): ngag dbang ngag gi bdag po mtshungs/ /gsung ldan gsal po smra mkhas so/ /gtam dang lo rgyus lab bzangs dang/ /smra bzangs smra mang gtam mang po/ /kha ngan tshig ngan kha 'chings so/ /nus dang dga' bar smra byed pa/ /ma dag pa
41a6(mdo 'grel): dang gtam mi gsal/ /'dra ba kha ngan ngan smras so/ /'bras bu mi gsal gtam mi gsal/ /skad dang sgra/ bstod smra bsngags pa brjod pa mtshungs/ /dig pa lkugs pa glen pa dang/ /ma thos pa dang ma bslabs pa/ /mi smra ba dang kha rog pa//
41a7(mdo 'grel): gcer bu gos med phyogs kyi gos/ /smra ba ngan dang mi gsal ba/ /bton ba dang ni phyung ba'o/ /smod pa dang ni ngan smras so/ /kha rgyal ba dang shags rgyal ba/ /lag yangs dang ni ster 'bor 'dra/ /tshig sdeg dang ni slar smra ba/ /'ching byed phur bu 'gog
41b1(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /don med pa dang stong ba thob/ /nyam nga pa dang bag tsha ba/ /phyi shor sun 'byin k+ShA? ri ta/ /g.yo ba dang ni sems mi gnas/ /mnar dang gzhan gyis 'tshir ba gnyis/ /lag stong dang ni g.yo ba 'dra/ /bag tsha ba dang 'khyor ba'o/ /'chi ltas su ni
41b2(mdo 'grel): 'byin pa bde ba can/ /lcag gis bzhugs dang 'bral bar byed/ /tshig bzhus rta yis bsad bya dang/ /zhe sdang ni 'khrugs pa'o/ /bsang bya mgo gcod 'di gnyis mtshungs/ /dug ster dug gis bsad bya ba/ /gtun shing gtun gyis brdung ba
41b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /? sbyor ba ni dag po'i las/ /so mi gsod dang rnam g.yeng 'dra/ /skyon 'dzin pha rol nyes pa rtog/ sgyu can dang ni g.yo can ?/ rna bar zlos dang phra ma dang/ /phra ma dbyes dang bcugs mkhan zhes/ /rnam 'tshe 'joms byed 'tsho ba
41b4(mdo 'grel): sdig?/ ma rungs pa dang ma sgrungs pa/ /mi shes rmongs pa glen pa dang/ /'doms pa mi rig mi mtshon pa/ /'chums pa cha phra ser sna can/ /zhib mo 'dzangs ba sren mos pa/ /nor med bsgrubs ngan bkren po dang/ /dbul ba ngan 'gro phabs
41b5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /slong mo sbrang po lam pa dang/ /mul po dang ni don 'dod pa/ /nga rgyal can dang haM yung ngo/ /dge ldan dang ni bsod nams can/ /mtho ris skyes dang lha rnams so/ /mi dang phyugs sogs mngal nas skyes/ /drod gsher sha sbra srin bu sogs
41b6(mdo 'grel): bya dang sbrul sogs sgong skyes rnams/ /shing dang sngo sogs sa gzhi skyes/ /sas bskrun sas bskyed sa las 'khrungs/ /shin tu mdzes pa dang sdug pa dang/ /mdzes dang sdug dang legs pa dang/ /bzang po dang ni brjid can dang/ /yid 'ong
41b7(mdo 'grel): snying sdug mtshar ba dang/ /yid 'phrog 'jam dang mdzes pa'o/ /de ni shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /gang gis lta bas chog mi shes/ /mdza' bo snying sdug yid mthun dang/ /yid gcugs bag phebs mdza' bo'o/ /rigs dman ngan rigs mtshon
42a1(mdo 'grel): cha ba/ mthar gnas sdig can gshed ma dang/ /ngan pa tha shal bsham pa dang/ /g.yu dpo dang ni rigs ngan mtshungs/ /dri can mdog nag nyams dang sbres/ /gtsang dag dri ma med pa'o/ /ye dag rang bzhin dri med don//
42a2(mdo 'grel): bkrus dang spyangs dang bsangs ba dang/ /dag byas dri ma med par byas/ /snying po med pa 'bras stong dang/ /stong pa gsog gsob ya ma brla/ /ma ning gtso bo dang po'i sgo/ /dpon dang gong ma mchog dang ni/ /gdong dang mchog dang
42a3(mdo 'grel): rab cha shos/ /chen po phul byung rtse/ /dang por ba mchog gong ma dang/ /phul byung gya nom shin tu mchog /bla na med dang shin tu mdzes/ /phyis kyi tshig can stag dang ni/ /skyes bu khyu mchog glang chen dang/ /seng ge sA rdU la dang ni/ /glang
42a4(mdo 'grel): chen la sogs skyes bu ni/ /gtso bo'i don gyi spyod yul lo/ /gong ma ma yin dman pa gnyis/ /'og ma dang ni ma rabs so/ /rgya chen yangs dang chen po dang/ /rna chen rabs tshe ma hA ste/ /chen po/ rgyas dang mthug dang sbom dang che/ /chung
42a5(mdo 'grel): ba nyung ba cung zad dang/ /phra mo bag tsam nyung shas chung/ /mo ni cung zad nyung ba dang/ /skyes bu phra mo chung bzegs ma chung/ /rab mang mang po dpag tu med/ /tshan can ba hu laM ba hU/ /gang pa khengs pa mang po dang/ /bstan
42a6(mdo 'grel): pa mang po byur ba'o/ /brgya la sogs pa'i pha rol gyi/ /pha rol grangs kyi lhag bas brgya/ /bgrang bya gang zhag ga Na yaM/ /grangs kyi ga Ni taM de nas/ /'dra ba thams cad pa/ /sna tshogs ma lus zad par dang/ /mdza' dag
42a7(mdo 'grel): kun dang ril po dang/ /rangs pa yo ga ma lus pa/ /rdzogs pa cag ge gang ba dang/ /dus min pa dang khengs pa'o/ /stug po bar med phung pa'o/ /thor re ba dang col le ba/ /nye logs nye 'khor drung na mo/ /glo dang tho 'khor 'dra ba'o/ /phyogs mthun
42b1(mdo 'grel): mnyam byed mtshungs par spyod/ /byed bcas mgrin mnyam/ /mdza' gcig pa dang 'jug gcig pa/ /mi bzad pa dang a bya yaM/ /yang dag chags dang 'byar ba dang/ /shin tu 'thams pa zhes yang ngo/ /phyogs 'dra phyogs mtshungs ring dang 'gyangs
42b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu ring 'gyangs ches ring dang/ /ring po dang ni rgya che ba/ /zlum po ril po zur med sgong/ /mtho dang mthon po ring mo dang/ /ring dang rtse mo bsgreng dang mtho/ /de nas thung ba dma' ba dang/ /mi mtho thung thung 'phang dma' ba/ /rtse min dma' dang thung ba'o//
42b3(mdo 'grel): yon po kyog po bcu po dang/ /mi 'drang 'chus dang sgur pa dang/ /kyog ba kyog kyog dge sgu can/ mi drang ba dang kyog po'i ming/ /drang po thang ka srongs pa'o/ /'dres ma 'chol ba phyogs gcig min/ /rtag tu kun tu rgyun du dang/ /gtan du dang ni
42b4(mdo 'grel): chags med pa/ /brtan po mi 'gyur rang bzhin gnas/ /gzugs gcig dus khyab mi 'gyur ba/ /gnas gzhan spyod pa gzhan spyod 'dod/ /bya spyod byed pa spyod/ /bya byed dang ni bya spyod do/ /g.yo dang ldag pa 'gul ba'o/ /bskyod pa 'khyems
42b5(mdo 'grel): pa yam yom dang/ /ldag ldeg shag shig sag sig dang/ /yongs su 'gul ba zhes pa'o/ /stong pa dang ni tang 'dzin no/ /brtan po dang ni mi 'gyur ba/ /sra mkhregs mi shigs ka tho raM/ /mi 'jig mi phed sran dar ni/ /gong bu dang ni
42b6(mdo 'grel): gor ma'o/ /'phel ba rgan po chen po dang/ /rnying pa sngon skyes dang po pa/ /rnying ma dang ni yun ring ma/ /gsar ma so ma thog ma dang/ /yag ma gzhon nu gsar pa'o/ /rab gzhon shin tu gzhon pa dang/ /'jam pa dang ni mnyan dang 'bol/ /rjes 'gro
42b7(mdo 'grel): phyi 'breng rjes 'jug dang/ /rting 'brang ma ning mi zad pa/ /mngon sum dang ni dbang po'i yul/ /lkog tu gyur dang mngon sum min/ /gcig snga gcig sngon gcig rtse dang/ /gcig song gcig mtho gcig dang po/ /gcig rtse sngon du gcig
43a1(mdo 'grel): song ba/ /skyes bu la sogs dang po dang/ /thog ma dang po la sogs pa/ /de nas mo dang tha ma dang/ /phyi ma rting ma rjes ma dang/ /gsham ma dang ni 'phyi shos so/ /don med pa dang don stong dang/ /gsal dang rab gsal dri ma
43a2(mdo 'grel): med/ /gzhi 'dzin dang ni spyi yin no/ /re re rkyang rkyang gcig pu'o/ /tha dang don dang gzhan dang ni/ /gcig gnas gzhan pa so so ba/ /tshig mang gcig dbye ming pa dang/ /muN+Da mi 'phyang ba lugs dang tshul la reg pa dang/ /'gog med pa dang mi
43a3(mdo 'grel): 'gog pa/ /ldog pa dang ni phyir log ba/ /go bzlog dang ni phyin ci log/ lus kyi g.yon ni sa byaM ngo/ /a ba sa byaM ga las phyogs so/ /shing rta dang ni saM bA d+ha/ /'dres pa 'chol pa 'dra ba'o/ /bsres pa 'khrugs pa 'dres pa'o/ /skra
43a4(mdo 'grel): bregs pa dang bzhar ba'o/ /mnyes dang gsubs dang 'phur ba'o/ /rnam 'bab 'gro dang 'gyur ba'o/ /bar du song dang brjed pa dang/ /thob pa rnyed pa mtshungs pa'o/ /ldeg pa 'khyor ba 'gul ba dang/ /g.yog ldeg pa dang 'dar ba'o/ /'phul
43a5(mdo 'grel): ba 'dod pa bskul ba dang/ /bskyod ba 'phul ba 'phen pa mtshungs/ /yongs su 'phangs par ldog pa'o/ /brkus pa dang ni brkus pa'i don/ /'phel dang rab tu skye ba dang/ /mi 'bab pa dang mi ltung ba/ /rdeg pa dang ni bsnun pa'o/ /
43a6(mdo 'grel): smin pa tshos pa yib dang gab/ /g.yog pa dang ni byibs pa'o/ /zhu ba zhu nam/ sbrengs pa dang ni phyag ba'o/ /sgo ba dang ni slob pa'o/ /snom dang bsnams pa myug dang len/ /khron pa'i chu dang chu dong 'dra/ /bcings pa bsdams pa
43a7(mdo 'grel): bsris pa dang/ /'gog pa dang ni bcings pa'o/ /chags pa dang ni zhig pa'o/ /de nas mtshan mo k+Sh+NA rwA tA snang med do/ /rnam par nyams sgo chos pa dang/ /khrel dang ngo tsha 'dzem mdog dang/ /'khor ba 'jug pa 'khyil ba'o/ /yang dag 'byor pa
43b1(mdo 'grel): sdeb pa dang/ /thob bya 'gro bya bsdu ba sogs/ /'gro ba 'bab pa 'gyu dang 'jug/ bsdoms nas brjod dang bsdu yig go/ ngan pa dang ni dman par grags/ /rnam sgrub mang byed sna tshogs so/ /so sor sgrub/ de nas smod dang skyon brjod do/ /bcom pa dang ni phye mar
43b2(mdo 'grel): byas/ /gsher dang rlon/ /sgra byas sgrog byas 'dra ba'o/ /'ching ba 'khyig pa sdom dang mdogs/ /brtod pa dang ni dkris pa'o/ /skol pa dang ni bsdu ba'o/ /smin pa 'o mar 'o thug tshos/ /myang 'das thub pa'i me la sogs/ /rlung med dang ni rlung mi
43b3(mdo 'grel): 'jug/ chos pa yongs smin thul ba'o/ /gshang ba gci ba bcag byas pa/ /rgyas pa dang ni gang ba'o/ /bus nus pa ni bzod pa'o/ /rgyas btab pa dang ab btab pa/ /nyon mongs bzod pa dul bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni dul ba'o/ /slong ba dang ni zhu ba'o/ /bsgo ba
43b4(mdo 'grel): dang ni slob pa'o/ /g.yogs pa dang ni phug pa'o/ /mchod pa dang ni phul ba'o/ /gang ba dang ni rdzogs pa'o/ /nyon mongs dang ni sems sdug go /zin la khang pa/ /bsregs dang tshig ma tshig ma'o/ /gzhogs dang bzhur dang chung ngur byas/ /thug
43b5(mdo 'grel): dang brdol dang bug pa byas/ /rnam dpyad brtags dbyad rnam par phye/ /mdangs med bkrag mod mdog ngan no/ /stug po mthug po dru ta'o/ /grub pa zin pa rdzogs pa'o/ /gses pa phye ba dbye ba pa'o/ /dog pa snal ma ran pa
43b6(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /thags kyi rgyu rnams brkyang ba'o/ /mchod pa bkur sti rim gro dang/ /bsnyen bkur dang ni ri mor byas/ /zhabs thog zhabs 'bring bkur ba'o/ /rab tu tsha dang gdung ba dang/ /sems can sdug bsngal tsha ba dang/ /
43b7(mdo 'grel): yid dga' sems dga' tshim dang rangs/ /rab tu dga' dang mnyes pa'o/ /bcad pa btubs pa bregs pa dang/ /bkas pa phye ba bral ba dang/ /'thub pa dang ni gcod pa'o/ /bcom pa zhig pa nyams pa dang/ brlag pa chus zos zags
44a1(mdo 'grel): dang nyams/ /thob brnyed ba phrad pa dang/ /dngos rnyed thob pa rnyed pa'o/ /tshol ba rjes tshol lta ba dang/ /lam rtog pa dang nyul ba'o/ /sge'u gshes rlon pa rlan can dang/ /bangs po thag can sge gsher rlon/ /skyabs dang skyod pa
44a2(mdo 'grel): bsrung ba dang/ /sbed pa sgrib pa sbas pa'o/ /brnyas pa rngan can tsho khyod dang/ /khog chung dang ni yongs gcad do/ /btang ba por ba spangs pa dang/ /'phang pa bskur ba dor ba'o/ /smra ba brjod pa zlos pa gtam/ /grags pa lo rgyus bka' mching
44a3(mdo 'grel): de nyi go dang rtogs dang khong du chud/ /rig dang shes dang kun chub po/ /khas blangs dam bcas byed par byas/ /khas 'che chad byas zhal gyis bzhes/ /khas blangs blangs pa'i ming ngo/ /snyan pa bsngags pa legs par brjod/ /bstod
44a4(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa sgrogs pa dang/ /ngag snyan tshig snyan bsngags pa dang/ /legs brjod grags brjod yon tan brjod/ /zos pa 'chos pa myangs pa dang/ /ldang ba mid pa gsol dang zas/ /zos pa'i ming ngo/ /shin tu g.yo dang shin tu phra/ /shin tu
44a5(mdo 'grel): mchog tu rgya che yangs/ /myur pra mngon 'dod rgya che rgyas/ /mang po shin tu mthar thug don/ /sgrub pa phul phyin byed phul byin/ /mang ba'i phul/ phyin lci nga'i phul du phyin/ /thung ba'i phul phyin tshogs pa'i phul du phyin/ /sgrub khyab
44a6(mdo 'grel): mang lci thung ba dang/ /tshogs pa rnams ni phul phyin no/ /bye brag pa gzhan dbang gi sde tshan no/ //rang bzhin rkyen la sogs don gyis/ /'dres pa'i rtags rnams shes par bya/ /las dang bya ba de dag
44a7(mdo 'grel): tu/ /'gro ba'i phan tshun min pa rnams/ /tshogs pa zla yi tshig la ni/ /pha rol 'gro dang pha rol brten pa'o/ /dbang du byed dang rang dbang byed/ /rgyu stong gnas dang mtshan nyid bral/ /zhi dang dul dang nges pa'o/ /bzod dang
44b1(mdo 'grel): nus dang thub pa'o/ /rtogs brjod sngar gyi las 'jug go/ 'dod pa sbyin pa rab mchog go/ dbang byed dbang du sdud pa dang/ rtsa ba'i las dang las su bya/ /g.yo ba dang ni 'dar bar byed/ /doms pa dang ni tshim pa'o/ /chog pa yongs srung
