44b2(mdo 'grel): lag pa 'gebs/ /'tshem pa tshim bu sbyor ba dang/ /'gra ba gcod pa gtub pa'o/ /khro ba dang ni mngon par khro/ /tshor ba myong ba nyams su myong/ /brgyal dang mngon par khyab pa dang/ /slong pa bsod snyoms 'dod don slong/ /gcid ba
44b3(mdo 'grel): dang ni bse ba'o/ /de nas gnyis po dri smad dang/ /khams bde 'dri ba/ de nas man ngag sdoms ba'o/ /zad pa dang ni rdzogs pa'o/ /len pa dang ni blangs pa'o/ /mdangs can dang ni 'tshed ba'o/ /srung ba dang ni skyob pa'o/ /sgyu
44b4(mdo 'grel): dang mi gsal sgra'o/ /'bugs ba 'bigs ma chos pa smin/ /'bod pa dang ni spron pa'o/ /mchog rab bsregs dang tshig /'dun ma gros dang rgas 'khogs pa/ /nor 'khrul rgyas dang 'phel ba'o/ /rab tu grags
44b5(mdo 'grel): dang grags pa'o/ /reg pa dang ni 'byar ba'o/ /'bab ba ltung ba/ /'phel ba dang ni yang dag 'phel/ /'phro dang spro ba tshad ma tshad/ /rab sgyi 'byung dang ltang dang ltung/ /ngal ba dang ni dub pa'o/ /shin tu ba dang phul du
44b6(mdo 'grel): phyin/ /'byar ba dang ni 'khyud pa'o/ /yul 'dren/ 'ben pa dong ni 'phul ba'o/ /ri dang ri bo rnam 'tshe gnod/ /'degs pa bstod ba reg dren no/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba brjod pa dbyangs/ /rgyags pa khengs pa/ /gyen du bskyod pa steng du
44b7(mdo 'grel): bskyong/ /rnam par nye dang yongs su nyed/ /mngon par bskyed dang rjes su 'dzin/ /mi 'dzin de dang 'gal ba'o/ /mngon par sbyor dang mngon par 'dzin/ /khur tshur bcings dang yang dag bzung/ /tshom po thab pa srang ba'o/ /'brel pa skyes dang
45a1(mdo 'grel): spyod ba'o/ /nad pa reg bya rlung nad/ /gnod byed nyes pa byed pa'o/ /dgongs ba don len/ /spyod lam bzhi snod bskor ba'i rim/ /mngon par bsdus dang mngon par len/ /bsdus ni mngon par len/ /rjes su bgyid dang
45a2(mdo 'grel): rjes su sgrub/ /de nas song zin mi zad ba/ /'jug pa dang ni rab tu 'bab/ /'byung dang 'jug dang 'gyu ba'o/ /mtshe ma zung dang phrugs ma dang/ /don dang gnyis zung/ /rnam 'tshe'i las dang mngon spyod do/ /gnyid med gnyid chag
45a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis yin no/ /bgegs dang par chod grub pa'i gegs/ /'byung po nyer 'dus mchod cing 'dug/ /nges par 'jug dang nye bar spyod/ /rjes su byed dang yongs su byed/ /lhan cig mi gnas spangs te 'gal/ /dgongs can
45a4(mdo 'grel): 'dun pa nges don min/ /mdor bsdus pa dang bsdu ba'o/ /mi mthun pa dang 'gal ba'o/ /yongs su brkyang dang brkyang ba'o/ /'gro 'jug bstan gnas/ /rgya che yangs pa cher yangs so/ /de yang sgra yi bsti ra/ /byug pa dang ni bsku byug go /
45a5(mdo 'grel): nyams pa dang ni mthong pa med/ /shes pa dang ni yongs su 'dris/ /khyed pa dang ni rnam par khyed/ /nges tshig dang ni rab tu nges/ /nye 'khor nye logs dag dang ni/ /rnga ba 'breg pa 'bal pa'o/ /nges 'byed 'phyar dang 'khrab ba'o/ /gnas skabs
45a6(mdo 'grel): dang ni skabs yin no/ /thags spun dkri rdzong snal ma dkri/ she sbyor 'khrig ba/ tshogs pa sdom pa 'dra/ /blo nus dang ni chu slol lo/ /mo min/ zam pa 'grod dka' zam/ /khrug phyir 'jug dang rab sbyor don/ /rtsom pa dang ni mgo 'jug//
45a7(mdo 'grel): 'thu ba rtsom pa A ri b+ha/ /tam tam tur tur/ /bar chad dang ni gegs zhes so/ /'og min 'og tu lta ba'o/ /sngon shes slar yang 'phel ba'o/ /sku byug dang ni byug pa'o/ /rjes chags dang ni sbyar ba'o/ /sbyin ster rnam grangs rab tur
45b1(mdo 'grel): grags/ /mel tshe ba dang so ba'o/ /nges klog des brjod 'don pa'o/ /bangs dang gsher dang rlon pa'o/ /kun nas dman dang zag nyon mongs/ /'tshogs pa 'dus pa 'phungs pa'o/ /lta ba tshol ba nyul pa 'tshol lta'o/ /yongs 'khyud yongs 'byar
45b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag rig /nye bar 'dzin nye bar lta rtog pa gzigs pa dang/ /snang bar byed dang lta ba'o/ /phyir rgol zlog pa 'gog pa dang/ /'geg pa rnam grangs ming gzhan med rim don/ /skyug bro btsog pa skyug bro don/ /zlog pa phyir blo ba rnam zlog log /'gongs pa
45b3(mdo 'grel): 'chongs pa rgal dang 'phar/ /pre Sha Na ni gang bos nas/ /de la slar yang bsgo ba'o/ /mchod sbyin mchod pa/ bstod pa'i sa gzhi gnyis skyes rnams/ /shing stan shing stegs gar la/ /shing stan shing ni u g+ha na/ /stam+bo gang gis snying 'bigs
45b4(mdo 'grel): gsum mo/ /kun brdol mtho ba gang gis de la/ /bin d+ha ka sa me ni g+ha:/ /byur po phung po/ /so ba steng du 'dren pa'i don/ /skyegs pa gyen zlog gsus pa skyegs pa la sogs pa/ /nyer 'gro bar ti bi ra ta ya/ /u ma rA ma/ mo min glo lu yud pa lu//
45b5(mdo 'grel): glo 'khogs lud lud pa 'bod/ /'khogs pa zhes pa tha dang min/ /skyug pa skyu ba sA ti rig byed do/ /de na sA ri? dang tshad pa dang/ /u da dza ni phyugs bskul ba/ /bya min zhes sogs smod mo'o/ /rgyud mthar de yi tshogs pa/ /aau pa ga pa la
45b6(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /bems po sems med rig med dang/ de bzhin sems med la sogs pa/ /byis pa dang ni ? tsha'o/ /lhan cig 'gro dam dus gcig 'gro/ /gshol tshogs/ bram ze smra ba gnyis skyes/ /gnyis po rtsib
45b7(mdo 'grel): logs rnams kyis/ b+hI? /rgyab rnams kyi priShA? d+ha priShtha go rim bzhin/ /g.yul sa g.yul thang g.yul khang ngo/ /de nas mi tshams mi rnams kyis/ /grong tshong sa skye tshoms du ba mnam/ /zhags tshoms gaN+yA so so'o/ /
46a1(mdo 'grel): stong tshogs dang ni lci me tshogs/ /go tshogs rig byed la sogs pa/ /'dres ma'i sde tshan no// //sna tshogs don la ka mdza' sogs/ /sde mtshan gyis ni 'dir grags so//
46a2(mdo 'grel): mang po la sbyor gang gang la/ /rnam grangs gang la de dang de/ /nA ka nam ba'i skabs gsum la/ /lo ka sa gzhi skye bo la/ /rkang bcad grags pa shlo ka/ mda' dang ral gri sha ya ka /ce spyang/ chu bdag la dzamU kau/ rna ta ka/ byis
46a3(mdo 'grel): pa dag la pri thu kau/ mthong 'od dag la A lo ko/ rnga tshan rnga rings mA na go /phang ba rtags dag pi ka'o/ /rtags dang ngan sgra ka laM kau/ klu shing 'jog po ta k+Sha ka/ shel dang nyi mar arka'o/ /rlung dang tshangs pa nyi ma ka/ rlung dang rig byed
46a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang nyi ma ka/ pho'i rtags so/ /ki ni mgo dang chu la yin/ /pu la ka ni spun stong dang/ /nya dang zan changs rnams la'o/ /'ug pa glang chen mjug mi rtsa/ /glang po che'i/ rtse mo rnams la be tsa ka/ spyi lugs ser ba ka ra ka/ bder
46a5(mdo 'grel): gshegs log 'dren nA ya ka /kiSh+ku khru dang mtho la'o/ /shU ka srin bu tshang tshing ngo/ /mi mthun phyogs ni pra tI ka/ gsum yin phyogs gcig pho 'di yin/ /b+hA tI kaM ni ti ka ta dang/ /rA ma ka pur li ga dur/ /zla ba'i
46a6(mdo 'grel): 'od zer dag dang ni/ /ga bu sgra gcan ko shAt'ya/ /de nas ka Ta/ pha la seng ldeng dkar po/ /zla ba'i shun pa pha ma yin/ /de nas/ sel 'ba' cha dang pi n+ya ka/ /bA hlI gaM ni shing kun kyang/ /mchod pa gu gul sprul
46a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin rnams/ /kau shi ka'o/ /nad tsha brtag pa a tang+ga/ nyung chung klul+la ka gsum mo/ /yun ring 'tsho ba ri po mtshan/ /rta rmig zlum po bar ta ka/ gzig dang pad+ma dkar 'pho pho/ /som bal ka de nas ni/ /sman pa mi ni yang 'od
46b1(mdo 'grel): can/ /shA lA bri ka spre'u dang/ /lce spyad dang ni khyi yin no/ /gser la yang ngo sa dmar dang/ /'jir ba'i don yang rgyal sdud yin/ /a lI ka ni mi 'dza' brdzun/ /rang bzhin rjes gsu 'gro ba'o/ /gnyis/ shal ke mdza' dag
46b2(mdo 'grel): shang shun pa/ /gser srang brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /gser dang brang gi rgyan dang srang/ /tha snyad la yang Ni Sha ko 'o/ /mo min/ kalka mo min dri ma dang/ /sdig sems khengs pa rnams yang ngo/ /de nas pi nA ko/ mo min mdud
46b3(mdo 'grel): dang bde byed gzhu/ /ba bzhon glang mo d+he nu ka yang ngo/ /char sprin u ma kA li kA/ zug rngu rab tu byed pa mdo 'grel pa/ /kar+Ni ka ni sna rgyan dang/ /glang mo lag pa ser gdub dang/ /pad+ma'i sa bon ze 'bru'o/ /gsum po phyi ma
46b4(mdo 'grel): tshogs gzugs bzangs/ /gcig gtso gzhon dang ma 'dres pa/ /kau k+ku Ti ka tshul 'chos dang/ /gang zhig nye bar ma mthong ba la thang/ /la lA Tika gtso sems mthong/ /'ga' zhig mi nus pa la yang/ /mar me srin 'bar
46b5(mdo 'grel): ma yU kha/ /bung ba mnga' dug shi lI mu khau/ /shang kha gter dpral rus dung la/ /mo min/ khyo ni dbang po la yang ngo/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'ang shi khe'o/ /ri shing 'gro med a gau'o/ /A shu go ni rlung dang mnga' / /mnga' 
46b6(mdo 'grel): nyi 'dra ba kha ga'o/ /pa taM go na bya nyi ma/ /pU ka go yu tshogs pa dag /phyugs dang ri dags mri ga'o/ /be ga len dang rgyug pa la'ang/ /pA ra ga ni me tog ze/ /khrus chal dang ni rdul la yang/ /glang chen gtum po na ga'o//
46b7(mdo 'grel): mig zur dpral thig a pi ga /sarga rang bzhin des grol dang/ /nges pa le lu byas rnams la/ /yo ga go gyon pa dang thabs/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba rigs rnams la/ /b+ho ga bde dang bud med sogs/ /longs spyod sprul
47a1(mdo 'grel): gdengs lug dag la/ /khug rta ri dags skyes bu dang/ /khra bo rnams la shA rang+ga?/ gsum/ spre'u sbal can mtshong 'gro'o/ /a b+hi ShaM ga mna' dang smos/ /shing rta'i lus sogs yu ga'o/ /pho yu gaM rdzogs
47a2(mdo 'grel): ldan dus la sogs/ /mtho ris phyugs dang dag dang ni/ /rdo rje phyogs dang mig dang ni/ /'od zer sa dang phyugs rnams la/ /mtshan nyid lta zhing pho mo gau/ /ling+ga rtags dang she pha yo/ /sh+riM ga gtso bo rtse mo'o/ /mgo dang gsang gnas pa
47a3(mdo 'grel): raM gaM/ b+ha gaM dpal dang 'dod pa dang/ /bdag nyid che dang brtson 'grus dang/ /'dun pa nyi ma grags rnams la/ /pa ri g+ha ni yongs 'joms mtshon/ /o tshogs pa dang chu yi rgyun/ /rin dang mchod byed arg+ha'o/ /a g+haM sdig sdug
47a4(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs la/ /gsum/ 'dod dang nyung la la g+hu'o/ /kA tsA dra pa'i thag pa dang/ /'phyid bu dang ni ling thog go /phyir log rgya chen pra pany+tsa/ /shu tsi me dang zla ba dang/ /shin tu gnon pa dag dang ni/ /skyes bu rnam dag dkar po gsum
47a5(mdo 'grel): mngon 'khyud 'dod pa 'ong ru ci/ /mo ltos 'gro za rma bya khyung/ /so dang bram ze sgong gnyis skyes/ /a dzA khyab 'jug dbang phyug ra/ /'phrag? lhas lam dang tshogs pra dzA/ /chos rgyal rgyal ba gshin rje'o/ /kuny+tsa so dang phug pa'o//
47a6(mdo 'grel): mo min/ ba la dzi ni zhing grong khyer/ /la la dzA ni legs par mthong/ /sa mnyam g.yul gyi a dzi'o/ /pra dzA pu rgyud skye dgu'o/ /a ba dzo dang ri bong 'dzin/ /bdag po rtag pa ni dzaM gsum/ /skyes bu bdag dang legs rtogs pa/ /k+She ta
47a7(mdo 'grel): dz+nya'o brjod bya'i rtags/ /saM dz+nya 'du shes ming dang ni/ /lag sogs don byed brda la'o/ /nya'i mdza' can khya rog glang 'gram ka ra na/ /glang chen 'gram dang rked ka To/ /shi bi piSh+Ta nyams pa dang/ /lpags pa ngan dang dbang phyug che//
47b1(mdo 'grel): lha yi bzon twaSh+Ta'o/ /diSh+TaM lha gnyis 'dus la'o/ /ro bro ku Tu ka TU ni/ /don med gsum mo ser sna rno/ /riSh+Ti bde dang mi dge dngos/ /e riSh+Ti ni dge mi dge/ sgyu ma mi g.yo 'khrul 'khor dang/ /khengs pha bden log phung po dang//
47b2(mdo 'grel): lcags tho ris dang rtse mo dang/ /thong gshol rnams la ku Ta'o/ /mo min tru Ti sug smel dus dang ni/ /nyung ngu the tshom rnams la'o/ /rab dga' rten pa ko Ti'o/ /rtsa ba dus sbyor dzA TA'o/ /byu Sh+ni 'bras bu phun tshogs la/ /praSh+Ti mkhyen pa mig
47b3(mdo 'grel): dang mthong/ /iSh+Ti mchod sbyin 'dod pa'o/ /priSh+TaM nges dang mang po gsum/ /kaSh+Te sdug bsngal bskyod dka' o/ /mkhas dang mi dman nad med la/ /pa Tu gnyis te brjod bya'i rtags/ /nI la kaN+tha rma bya zhing/ /pho kaSh+Tha rgyu ma gsus ba dang
47b4(mdo 'grel): 'bru dong khang pa'i ma nas de bzhin/ /niShthA byas zin chud zos mdza' / /kASh+Tha dga' gnas phyogs la'o/ /dzyeSh+Tha rgan dang phul byung la/ /ka niSh+Thi na chung dang nyung/ /daN+Da khral dang dbyug ba'i gugs rdog pos bud shing btsos/ /byA Do sprul
47b5(mdo 'grel): dang sha zan phyugs/ /i Da sa phyugs dag zla bu/ /k+She Da smyug skas spa yi skas/ /nA rI dus dang skad cog drug /k+ShaN dbyug ba mnga' dang ni/ /ngan dang sde tshan gnas skabs chu/ /b+h+rU Na byas dang ngan gsher can/ /bA Na stobs ldan rtsa dang mda'/ /kaN shin tu
47b6(mdo 'grel): phra bo grogs/ /tshogs dang 'joms byed ga Na'o/ /pa Na shi sogs rgyal byas bla/ rin dang nor la yang de'o/ /yon stan dang ni dngos skyes dang/ /rten dang snying stobs dkar po dang/ /mtshams la sogs pa gu Na'o/ /byar med gnas? dang dus bye brag/ spo ba
47b7(mdo 'grel): dag lak+Sha na'o/ /par+Na gnyis skyes la sogs dang/ /dkar po la sogs kha dog bstod/ /khar+NaM yi ge la yang ngo/ /grA ma NI ni bre mkhan dang/ /skyes gsum mchog bdag rnams la'o/ /ur+Na lug sogs bal dang ni/ smin pa'i mtshams kyi 'khyil ba
48a1(mdo 'grel): la/ /ha ri Ni ni ri dags mo/ /gser gyi gzung sa brnyan ser po la'ang/ /gsum pa skye bo ta rin/ /lcags dang khyim gyi ka pa la/ /triSh+Ne 'dod pa skom pa la/ /smod pa snying rje b+h+ri Ne'o/ /tshod 'dus lam ni bi ba Ni//
48a2(mdo 'grel): chang dang nub phyogs bA ru NI/ /ka re Nu ni glang mo glang/ /dra bi Na na khrims dang skyabs/ /sh+rI par+Na ni pad+ma bum/ /dug g.yul lcags rno tAM k+ShaM/ /ma ning kha re gsum/ /bra mA Ni ni rgyu mtshan dang/ /yul lugs bstan bcos 'debs chad tshang//
48a3(mdo 'grel): ka ra NaM ni sgrub nus dang/ /zhing dang lus dbang rnams la yang/ /srog chags skye ba saM par Na/ /dpung tshogs rgyu dang grong khyer rtswa/ /sa mud+d+ha ra Na 'don dang 'khyer/ /'di nas gsum ste piShA NaM/ /phyugs kyi rwa dang tsum pa la/ /pra ba Na ni mi mnyam
48a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dga' dang bzhi mdo rnams la'o/ /saM kIr+Na ni dag ma dag /bI ri NaM stong tshwa sgo can/ /lha nyi ba swa na tau'o/ /sa ra swan to gtsang ngo mtsha'o/ /bya khyung ga rung man+tau dang/ /sha ku na ni khyim bya bya/ /me skyes du ba ke tU'o/ /dzI mu tau ni sprin dang ri//
48a5(mdo 'grel): hastau lag pa me bzhi'o/ /ma ra tau ni rlung 'chi med/ /yan+ta glang chen kha lo sgyur/ /b+hartA 'dzin gso ba po/ /gru dang byi bas pa po ta'o/ /pre ta srog chags mdza' ma ro/ /gza' bye rgyal mtshan ke tu'o/ /sa bdag bu dang bu ta'o/ /s+tha ba ti ni shing mkhan
48a6(mdo 'grel): dbye/ /sa 'dzin ri dang rgyal po'o/ /spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal rigs la'ang/ /ri tu bud med me tog dus/ /bya ba 'jug pham pa dyak+tau/ /sU ta/ /kha lo sbyar bya ka ta mkhas dang gsal ba'o/ /driSh+TA tA gnyis bstan bcos dpe/ /k+Shat+ta kha lo sgyur ba dang
48a7(mdo 'grel): sgong skyas rgyal rigs dmangs 'dres bu/ /brit+tan+ta ni rab dbye dang/ /bye brag tshogs pa gtam rnams so/ /a narta ni g.yul dang ni/ /gar gnas skye mdza' i bye brag la/ /kra tAM ta ni gshin dang/ /grub mdza' sngon gyi mi dga' i las/ /bad kan
48b1(mdo 'grel): la sogs ro dang ni/ /khrag sogs 'byung ba chen po dang/ /de yi yon tan dbang po rnams/ /rdo yi bye brag skra'i skyes gnas/ /d+hwa tu yin te khams zhes so/ /ka k+Shan+ta re btsun mo'i 'khor/ /mi dbang kun gyis spyod yul can/ /
48b2(mdo 'grel): kA su nus ba shak+ti'o/ /murti sra dang lus la'o/ /yangs pa 'khri shing pra ta ti/ /ba sa tI ni mtshan mo khyim/ /zad mchod a ba tsi ti'o/ /sI ti sbyin dang gnas dag la/ /arti zug rngu gzhu yi mchog /dzA ti spyi dang skye ba dag /rab
48b3(mdo 'grel): spyod bskyod pa a'i ti'o/ /rI ti mchod dang gnas dag go /shar dang thob pa prApti'o/ /ste ta me gsum gsum ldan dus/ /pi wang dbye ba ma ha tI/ /b+hU ti thal dang phun sum tshogs/ /gtsang po klu yi grong khyer rnams//
48b4(mdo 'grel): b+ho ga ba ti de nas ni/ /bde byed grogs po dag dang ni/ /g.yung 'du sa ni sa mi to/ /zad dang gnas la khyi ti'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha dang/ /me rtse 'bar ba he ti'o/ /dza ga tI ni 'gro ba dang/ /
48b5(mdo 'grel): sdeb sbyor bye brag sa gzhi la'ang/ /pik+ti gral dang yig bcu'i sdebs/ /'od dang chags pa a ti/ /pat+ti 'gyo dang skang thang ngo/ /rtsa ba gshog dbye pak+Sha ti/ /pak+Sha b+he ta yo(mdo 'grel): pra kri ti ni skye gnas brtags//
48b6(mdo 'grel): gar tshogs 'tsho ba bri ta'o/ /sika tA ni bye gyo dum/ /rig byed thos pa sh+ru ti'o/ /ba ni tA dang dza ni tA/ /ma dang rjes chags bud med la/ /gubti dong 'bru bug bcas gru/ /b+haM ti 'dzin dang blo gros so/ /pri ta tI ni bum sman dang/ /sdeb
48b7(mdo 'grel): sbyor dbye ba chen po la'ang/ /bud med glang po bA si tA/ /brta 'tsho ba skye bo'i gtam/ /bArta nad med snying po med/ /gsum/ zhun mar mar ni a mri te/ /ka la d+hau taM dngul dang gser/ /naM mi tAM ni rgyu mtshan nyid/ /sh+ru to bstan bcos pa 'dzin//
49a1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs ldan rnam grangs thob kri ti/ /a tyA hi rtaM 'jigs chen dang/ /las kyis 'tsho ba mi lta byed/ /rig pas sa sogs dus b+hu raM/ /srog chang sa 'das dus 'dra ba gsum/ /brit+te tshigs bcad spyod pa
49a2(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /'das dus bstan po zlum po la/ /ma ha ta ni rgyal srid dang/ /skyes pos smod dang chen po la/ /las kyis 'tsho ba mi lta byed/ /gsum shweta dngul dang dkar po la/ /ra dza taM ni do shal dang/ /dngul dang dkar po rnams la
49a3(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /gsum po de nas dza ga ta ni/ /'gro ba dang ni 'khor ba la/ /rak+taM sngo? sogs chags pa la/ /a ba da ta dkar po dang/ /ser po dang ni dag pa'o/ /ltag lus dkar po mi to/ /rigs dang mngon par legs sbyar dang/ /nus pa a
49a4(mdo 'grel): b+hi nI ta'o/ /de nas legs sbyar zin pa dang/ /mtshan nyid u pa te yang ngo/ /a nan+ta ni mdza' yas dga' / /grags dang yid 'ong pra tI to/ /a b+hi dzA ta rigs skyes blo/ /bi bi k+tau ni dag dang be na/ /mar? ts+tshi to ni rmongs dang mtho/ /gnyis dag skyur
49a5(mdo 'grel): rtsub shuk+tau/ /shi tI dkar dang dkar nag 'dres/ /sa tya legs dang rigs ldan dang/ /dge ba phan byed bden pa'o/ /pu ra skri ta mchod pa dang/ /dgra dang mngon par rig pa dang/ /mngon du bya ba rnams la'o/ /na pri taM ni rlung mer gnas/ /mtshon gyis mi
49a6(mdo 'grel): tshod go cha la'ang/ /dzA ta(mdo 'grel): skyes dang 'tsho ba thob/ /uts+tsha ta dang ut+thi ta 'di rnams/ /mtho dang shar phyogs spye ba rnams/ /A dri tau ni rtag mchod byed/ /artha brjod bya rin po che/ /dngos po dgos pa tsho rnams la/ /tinwa gleng gzhi lung dang ni/ /drang srong mu
49a7(mdo 'grel): stegs lci ba'o/ /sa ma rtha gsum nus pa dang/ /'dod pa 'brel 'dod phan pa la'ang/ /da sha mI s+tho chags nyams rgan/ /bI thI laM dang rtsig pa'o/ /A s+tha dma' ba gnas mthong ba/ /pra s+tha mo min sA nu dang/ /brel 'o/ /dgongs can dbang byed tstsaM da'o/ /a ba dau sprin dag
49b1(mdo 'grel): lo la'o/ /a ba bA dau mod dang rmongs/ /dA ya dau ni bu dang gnyen/ /bA dA 'od zer zhabs dang ni/ /bzhi cha zla med nyi mun sel/ /ni rbA da na skye bos smos/ /shA do lham dang myu gu'o/ /brkyang ba ru skad skyob pa rnams/ /A kranda'o drag po'i g.yul/ /bra sA da ni dngos pa'o/ /su dang
49b2(mdo 'grel): zas ster lpags pa yang/ /ru dbon pa rdzi go bandi/ /a mo da ni dga' dang chad/ /gtso bo dang ni rgyal po'o/ /rtags/ khyu mchog nog rnams ka ku do/ /mo min no/ /mo si bdi ni mkhyen pa dang/ /gsung dag bya byed g.yul ming rnams/ /chos dben
49b3(mdo 'grel): u pa ni Sha da/ /ston ka lo ni sha rad/ /pa dam bya ba skyob pa dang/ /gnas dang phun tshogs rkang pa dngos/ /goShpa de ni zhabs tog bre/ /rab gnas thob pa A ya pa naM/ /gsum/ yid de 'ong sbrang rtsi swA du'o/ /mri du rno dang 'jam pa dag /rmongs
49b4(mdo 'grel): dang nyung dang mi gsal dang/ /skal pa ngan rnams manda'o/ /gnyis shA rdau ni rtse mo gnyen pa'o/ /bi sA ra dau yongs can mkhas/ /nam mkha' dma' mo bya gro d+ha/ /u da se d+ha lus dang mtho/ /len byed la ni bI ba d+ho/ /bi ba d+ho yang de
49b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin no/ /pa ri b+hi ni mchod sbyin gyi/ /rtod phur shA khA nye 'khor ro/ /ta ma nyes pa sems nad dang/ /byin gyis brlabs pa a d+hi'o/ /mnyam don si bon dag dang ni/ /des pa rnams ni sa ma d+hi/ /nyes skyo a nu band+ha dang/ /
49b6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin la sogs dbyangs med dang/ /gtso bo rjes su 'gro ba dang/ /byis pa rang bzhin rjes 'gro'o/ /bi d+hu khyab 'jug zla ba'o/ /yongs gcod dus dag a b+ha d+hi/ /bi d+he sgrub dang sngon gyi las/ /pra ni d+hi ni slong mo spyod/ /
49b7(mdo 'grel): bud+d+ha rgan dang mkhas pa'o/ /skand+hA yang dag 'tshogs pa'o/ /yul gtsang po khyad a ba d+ho/ /siN+DU cha phran la'o mo/ /bi d+hi bi d+hi rnam pa'o/ /sA d+hu dga' ba dang legs pa la/ /ba ba d+hu bud med mna' ma chung/ su d+hwa byug pa bdud
50a1(mdo 'grel): rtsi sngon/ /sand+ha naM cha yul chos so/ /sh+ra d+hA blo dang 'dod pa'o/ /ma d+hU chad dang me tog rtsi dang sprad/ /an+ta long ba mun pa'o/ /'di nas gsum yin sa mund+ho/ /mkhas pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa'o/
50a2(mdo 'grel): tshangs mnyen shin du g.yo dang nges bstan pa/ /rten dang ring min mthong a baSh+Ta bau/ /bra si b+hi ni grags dang rgyan/ /nyi me tsi tra b+hA nu'o/ /b+hA nu 'od zer 'od kyi byed/ /b+hU tA dma nau/ /'byung po'i bdag nyid ma lus/ /rmongs
50a3(mdo 'grel): dang dman pa sau skye/ /gra ba Nau ni ra dang rdo/ /pa tri Na? ni sgro ldan ma dA dang bya dag go /shing dang rin rtse mo can/ /shi gi rnau ne me rma bya/ /pra ti ya ta na gnyis mnab sems/ /nyer 'dzin de nas sA di no/ /gnyis/ kha lo
50a4(mdo 'grel): sgyur dang rta ba'o/ /pA dzi na ni mda' dang bya/ /ku le bya b+hi dza na ni/ /skye ba dang ni skyes pa'i sa/ /de nas hA ya na zhes pa/ /lo dang 'od zer 'bru yi dbye/ /zla me nyi ma pi ro tsa nA/ skra 'khil bri dzi na yin no/ /sna tshogs las dang
50a5(mdo 'grel): nyi ma dang/ /lha dang bzo dag yin no/ /A da man? 'dun pa 'dzin pa dang/ /blo gros rang bzhin tshangs pa glang myos dang/ /char sprin g+ha na b+ha na'o/ /a b+hi ma na don sogs kyi/ /nga rgyal shes pa yid bcugs rnam 'tsho'o/ /g+ha na sprin dang gzugs
50a6(mdo 'grel): yon tan/ /gsum/ mkhregs pa dang ni bar med do/ /a'i na nyi ma 'od zer ro/ /ra dza nA ni ri dags mtshan/ rgyal rigs mi yi dbang po la/ /pA Ni byau ni gar ma myos/ /mnyan yod dmag ni bA hi nI/ /h+ra di byau ni gnam lcags glog /band+ha yA na chags
50a7(mdo 'grel): can ma/ /lpags dang lus dag lta na'o/ /shU nA 'og tu lce 'chad ba/ /me tog go /bI tA naM ni mchod sbyin dang/ /rgya chen mo min sgun stong dman/ /de nas ke ta nam byas zin/ /rgyal mtshan mnyan cog /brna de nyid dag ni/ /tshangs pa bram ze skye dgu'i
50b1(mdo 'grel): bdag /spro dang rnam 'tshe phra ma rnams/ /g+hand+ha naM do/ /A ta ny+tsa naM bskrun chu dang/ /bar dang rang nyid don la'o/ /byany+dza naM ni rtags dang ni/ /snar tshad ma cha shas rnams/ /kau lI naM ni skye bos smod/ /dud 'gro 'thab dang sprul bya la'ang/ /
50b2(mdo 'grel): u ryu na ni grong phyi rim/ /nags dbye dang ni ra ba dgos la/ /dben gnas gnas dag s+tha naM/ /gtse ba'i 'tshogs pa de ba naM/ /u t+tha naM ni skyes mthu can/ /dmag dang sdud nas langs pa la/ /byut+thA ni ting 'dzin zad/ /'gal bar spyod pa
50b3(mdo 'grel): rnams la'o/ /'chi dang ro bsreg 'gro ba dang/ rdzas dang sbyin pa slar 'od dang/ /phen byed rjes 'gro sA d+ha naM/ /naryA ta naM dwas dag pa/ /sbyin dang bcol ba gtad pa'o/ /bya sa naM ni phun tshogs min/ /nyams pa nyes pa 'dod skye
50b4(mdo 'grel): khro skye'o/ /pak+Sha na mig rdzi ke sar dang/ /taM twA ryA she bya chung ba/ /tshes dbye skad cig par ba na/ /brta mna mig lpags lam/ /don med gsang ba kau pI naM/ /mai thu naM ni 'dus dang dga' / /pra d+ha naM ni mchog bdag blo/ /pradz+nyA naM ni blo gros rtags//
50b5(mdo 'grel): pra sdu naM ni me tak 'bras/ /ni d+ha naM ni rigs dang nyams/ /kanda ne ni du dang 'bod/ /barSh+mA nA lus dang tshad/ /khyim dang 'od zer nus mthu dang/ /d+hA mA n+ya'o de nas ni/ /bzhin do grong sgo saM s+thA naM/ /phun tshogs rtags ni pra d+ha na/ /A ts+tsha da ne 'gebs sgrib  
50b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /A rA d+ha ni sgrub pa dang/ /tho ba dang tshim pa rnams la yang/ /a d+hiSh+Tha naM grong khyer dang/ /mthu dang gnas/ ratnaM rang rigs rin chen mchog /ba ne chu dang nags khrod do/ /ta li naM ni mthor dang nyung/ /brjod bya'i rtags can de bzhin phyi/ /sA mA
50b7(mdo 'grel): na ni mtshungs dang gcig /pi shu nau ni tha shal dbyen/ /hI nau ma gang dman tha shal/ /bang dang dpa' ba tar swI no/ /a b+hi pan+no nyes byas dang/ /dgra dbang song dang don med byas/ /ka lA sa ni rgyan dang ni/ /rma bya'i mdongs dang tshogs ba la'ang/ /pa rI bA sa yongs gcod dang
51a1(mdo 'grel): bardyu b+hau dang chu gnas pa/ /'dze ba la bdag go po/ /dbang khyab 'jug briSh+kA pI/ /bASh+ma blangs pa mig chu'o/ /ka shi pU ni sa gos gnyis/ /ta lbaM nyal pa khang steng chung ma/ /bi Ta po ni tshang tshing dang/ /mo min pra ta dU pa sa rU pa/ /i
51a2(mdo 'grel): rU pa ni/ mkhas pa dang ni yid 'ong ba/ /dbye ba rtags 'di rnams la ni/ /ru sbal mo dang dbyangs can mi'i/ /pi thAM? kats+tsha pI yin no/ /bar de bar srid sems can dang/ /rta dang lha yi glu gand+ha rba/ /kam+bu rgyan mangs dung la'o/ /lce gnyis sprul dang
51a3(mdo 'grel): skyu ma'o/ /pUrba gzhan gyi rtags can te/ /dang po mang tshig sngon la skyes/ /kun b+hau bum pa glang tshan mgo/ Di b+hau byis pa/ stam b+ho ska ba rengs byed la/ shaM b+hu tshangs dang spyan gsum pa/ /ragd+ha mngal dang sems can byis/ /bi shaM ba ni yid ches
51a4(mdo 'grel): mthun/ /rnga ni du sdu b+hi(mdo 'grel): skyes so/ /chos lo du ndu b+hi ste mo/ /tshen chen ma ning ku suM b+haM/ /spyi blugs la ni skyes bu'o/ /rgyal rigs lte ba na b+hi skyes/ /su ra b+hi ni ba lang mo/ /sa b+hA tshogs dang yid ches chas so/ /gsum bdag yid ches bal+la b+ha/ /lta'i'o/ /'od ner pra
51a5(mdo 'grel): ba ni raSh+me'o/ /spre'u spal ba mchod 'gro'o/ /'dod dang yid skyes kA mo'o/ /ba rA kra mo dpal phal gnon/ /d+harmA bsod nams gshin re digs/ /rang bzhin spyod dang zla ba'i btung/ /thabs dang sngon ma rtsom pa dang/ /go bim u pa kra mi'o/ /tshong lam grong khyer ris
51a6(mdo 'grel): byed dang/ /ni ga ma'o/ /zhi dang bzod pa k+Sha ma'o/ /ra mo stobs ldan dang ni sbo/ /mdzes dang dkar po gsum yin no/ /sgra sogs sngon sbyor tshogs gra ma/ /rnam par gnon pa bo kra ma/ /gul mA sra na dang yid ches dman/ /yA mi bu mo rigs ldan mo/ /
51a7(mdo 'grel): zhi dang/ bzod ma k+Sha ma'o/ /k+Sha mi rigs dang nus ldan phan/ /gsum/ gsum yin sh+yA mo 'phrog byed nag /sh+yA mA rUng dang mtshan ma'o/ /la lA maM ni mjug ma dang/ /mdongs dang rta rgyan gtso bo tog /su k+Sh+ma ma lhag pa'i 'dag kyang ngo/ /dang po gtso bo
51b1(mdo 'grel): pra ma tha/ /gsum bA mau skyogs so yid la/ /gnyis a d+ha mau ma gad ngan/ /rgas pa dang ni yongs su spyod/ /yA ta yA ma 'di gnyis so/ /myur 'gro 'das bzang tA ra k+Sh+yau'o/ /gnas dang nyams ba k+Sha yo'o/ /shwa shu ryau ni skud po gnyid mo/ /b+h+rA dri b+hyau ni spun skyes
51b2(mdo 'grel): sgra/ /sA rya byau ni 'brug sprin dbang/ /arya 'phags bdag rje rigs so/ /tiSh+ya rgyal dang rtsod ldan dus/ /pa ryU yo ni gnas skabs rim/ /pra tya ya ni gzhan dbang dang/ /mna' dang shes pa yid ches dang/ /rgyu dang bu ga sgra la'o/ /yun ring zhe
51b3(mdo 'grel): sdang rjes su gdung/ /s+thtsa lo ts+tsha ya ma tshang dang/ /glang chen 'bring du bskyod pa'o/ /sha ma yA ni mna' dang ni/ /spyod dus grub mdza' yang dag rig /nyes rgyu mi dge sngon las dang/ /pU dzya gyos po la yang ngo/ /san+na yo ni dpung rnams kyi/ /
51b4(mdo 'grel): phyir gdod rgyab na gnas rnams so/ /tshogs dang 'jug rtsom saM ptya ya/ /pra NA yA ni rnams te/ /yid ches slong ma yid bcugs rnams/ /sa mu ts+tsha 'gal med kyang/ /bi Sha yo ni shes bya yi/ /gang gi de la sgra sogs rnams/ /dur kha
51b5(mdo 'grel): bka' ba ka Sha yo/ /mo min 'du khang pra ti sh+ra ya'o/ /prA yo phal cher mthar 'byin dang/ /dman pa mchod sbyin khro ba la/ /gsang dang dben/ gnas gu hyaM do/ /sa tyAM dag tshangs bden pa'o/ /bI ryaM dpa' stobs nus pa'o/ /dra byi skal pa
51b6(mdo 'grel): yon tan gnas/ /d+hi Sha TyaM gnas dang khang pa dang/ /b+hA gyaM las dang dge mi dge /rta dang gser ni gau ri/ /a b+hi khyA ni ming dang mdzes/ /rtsom dang des byed slob pa dang//
51b7(mdo 'grel): mchod dang bsgrub bya thabs las sems/ /gso dpyad dgu la kri ya'o/ /tshA yA nyi chung mdzes pa dang/ /gzugs brnyan tsha ba med rnams la/ /ka k+Sha re mig byi ma la sogs/ /rked rgyan glang chen dbus su 'chid/ /kra tyA bya ba lha
52a1(mdo 'grel): dag gsum/ /dbye ba bsgrub bya la sogs kyis/ /dza bya skye bos dmod pa'o/ /dza g+ha n+yo ni mdza' sgrub byed/ /ngan pa gzhan dbang bak+ta byo/ /ka lyau nad med yon tan can/ /bdag ldan nor bral ar thyau'o/ /pu N+yaM
52a2(mdo 'grel): yid du 'ong ba'o/ /rU bya dga' dang gzugs bzang ngo/ /ba dA n+yo ni dag mnyan pa/ /rig pa dang ni ma d+hya'o/ /sau myaM gdu bu zla ba lha/ /tshogs dang re mongs bA rau'o/ /saM stA ro ni mchod sbyin la/ /gu ru phur bu pha la
52a3(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /d+hA ba ro ni dus the tshom/ /pra kA rau ni dbye dang dpe/ /A kA rA ni lus tshul byed/ /ki shA rU ni so rtser 'dod/ /ma rU mya daM thang dang ri/ /a dri shing dang ri nyi ma/ /mo/ nu mchu ni pa yo d+ha ro/ /d+hA d+hA ri ni lha min
52a4(mdo 'grel): 'khor/ /sdud dang lag pa 'od kA rA/ /bra dar ni 'dzems byed dang/ /bud med rked nad dang ni mda'/ /a bra skra dang zur yin no/ /rwa med ba lang dus dang ni/ /sma ra med pa tU ba rau/ /rin chen gser ni rA zhes so/ /pa ri ka ra
52a5(mdo 'grel): dkyil dkrungs 'khor/ /mu tig dag pa tA rA yin/ /khra bo rlung gsum karbu re/ /de nang dam 'cha' g.yul dang ni/ /rig pa gnod pa saM ga ra/ /rig byed dbye ba dag dang ni/ /gab tshig gsang sngags man+t+ra'o/ /mi tro
52a6(mdo 'grel): nyi ma la yang ngo/ /srog shing dum bu swA ru'o/ /tha shal dang ni ba ska ra/ /A DaM ba ra rda dang ni/ /nyi ma glang chen dbang sgrogs so/ /a b+hi hA ro mngon sbyor dang/ /rku dang go cha gyon pa la/ /pa rI bA ra dag pa yang dang/ /ral 
52a7(mdo 'grel): gri'i shubs dang gos la'o/ /biSh+Ta ro ni tshang tshing dang/ /ku sha tshangs pa khro sogs stan/ /sgo srungs sgor gnas bga tI hA ra/ /pra tI hA rya mdza' yas so/ /chen po ne'u le khyab 'jug dang/ /a b+h+ru yin te skya bo gsum
52b1(mdo 'grel): sA ra dbung gnas cha shas dang/ /bkod pa ma ning mchog gsum mo/ /du ring ro sho byed dang/ /sho rgyal du ro da rang ngo/ /g.yul chen 'grod dga' lam dang ni/ /skyes bu ma ning kAn+tA ra/ /mad sa ro gzhan dge la/ /zhe sdang de
52b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin ser sna gsum/ /ba ra lha yis spel ba dang/ /mchog gsum ma ning cung zad dga' / /baM shAM ku re smyug ma'i smyug /mo min shing dbye bum pa'o/ /dmag dpung dang ni dmag gi gzhis/ /lag skud pra ti sa ra'o/ /gshin
52b3(mdo 'grel): rje rlung dang dbang po dang/ /nyi zla khyab 'jug seng ge 'od/ /g.yul dang na tsho sprul dang ni/ /spre'u sbal pa ha ri ste/ /pho skya bo la ni rtags gsum mo/ /sharka ra ni gyo dum mo/ /yA trA ltad mo 'gro ba'o/ /a'i rA sa dang ngag chad
52b4(mdo 'grel): chu/ ta n+d+rI gnyid dang rmugs pa'i/ /d+hA tri ma ma zhing dang ma/ /k+Shu drA yon po gar mkhan ma/ /smad 'tshong sprad rtsi kA ri tA gsum/ /tha ngan smod nyung k+Shu dri ngo/ /mA traM? yo byad nyung dang mchod/ /mA traM kun dang 'dzin pa dang/ /tsi traM
52b5(mdo 'grel): kun bris ngo mtshar can/ /ka la traM ni chu bo chung/ /ma rigs ldan snad dag pA traM ngo/ /pa traM bzhon pa 'dab ma'o/ /nges bstan gzhung ni shA straM ngo/ /sha staM mchan dang lcags dag la/ /rtsa phran gos mig ne traM ngo/ /  
52b6(mdo 'grel): k+She traM chung ma lus dag go /go traM rigs dang ming la'o/ /sa traM gos dang mchod sbyin dang/ /rtag tu sbyin dang nags la'o/ /ardzi ra ni yul dang lus/ /aM pa ram ni nam mkha' gos/ /tsakraM pha rol dmag dang g.yul/ /ak+Sha
52b7(mdo 'grel): rin grol ba'o/ /k+ShI raM chu dang 'o ma'o/ /gser kyang b+hu ri tsan dro gnyis/ /sgo sdubs kyang ni ba lang khyim/ /gong bu re raM/ phug dang nga rgyal ga hwa re/ /dben mdza' u pa hU ro'o/ /sngon lag steng ni a gra'o//
53a1(mdo 'grel): khyim dang grong khyer pu rang ngo/ /'dus de nas raSh+Tyo ni/ /mo min yul dang bar du gcod/ da ra mo min 'jigs dang dong/ /badzra mo min pha laM thog /tan+t+raM gtso bo grub mdza' dang/ /thags
53a2(mdo 'grel): 'thag 'bris/ /aau shI raM ni rnga yab yum/ /aau shI raM ni nyal ba stan/ /puShA raM ni glang chen sna/ /rnga dang snod kha chu dang ni/ /mtshams dang sham thabs thibs po dang/ /dbye ba de don bu ga dang/ /bar gyi ma
53a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs la phyi gnas skab ma/ /dbus ma bar gyi bdag nyid dang/ /li ga bur ni pa tha raM/ /mon lug sga ni nA ga raM/ /shArba raM ni mun stug dang/ /'joms byed dbye ba rtags med do/ /go ra dmar dang dkar dang ser/ /
53a4(mdo 'grel): rma byed u sha ra yin no/ /dza tha ra ni sran dung gsus/ /a d+ha strA ni mchu yin no/ /'dres med gcig ni a gra'o/ /bya gro kun chags bags ma'o/ /steng byang mchog rnams u t+ta ra/ /a nu t+ta ra de rnams kyi/ /rnam par
53a5(mdo 'grel): log de gtso bo yi/ /rang dang pha rol mchog pa rA/ /zhim dang dga' ba ma d+hu ro/ /krU rau sra dang smod pa'o/ /u dA ra ni da dri che/ /i ta ra ni gzhan dang dman/ /dman dang rang 'dod sbai ra'o/ /shu b+h+ra snang gsal
53a6(mdo 'grel): dkar po'o/ /ra'i'o/ /gtsug pud cod pan skra dang ni/ /saM ya tA rnams mau la gsum/ /shing dang rab dbye glang po dang/ /tsher ma'i me tog pI la'o/ /mthar byed dus dag kA la'o/ /dus bzhi ldan pa ka le'o/ /ri dags
53a7(mdo 'grel): bye brag ka ma la/ /lab snam bu kampa la/ /rgyal sdud gtor ma skyes bu'o/ /ba li sogs chags lus skyes mo/ /stobs dang nus pa dmag dpung rnams/ /ba lam skyes bu bya rog thogs/ /bA du la ni skyes bu rlung/ /rlung gi tshogs
53b1(mdo 'grel): po rtags gsum mo/ /dbyer med rtags dang g.yo byA la/ /skyes bu gzig dang sbrul la'o/ /ma la mo min sdig pa dang/ /dri chen dang ni dri ma'o/ /tri shu la ni zug rdu mtshon/ /phur bu me lce k+Shi la'o/ /pA li zur rtags rna shal rnams/ /
53b2(mdo 'grel): ka lA bzod dang dus kyi dbye/ /a li spangs po phreng ba gral/ /be la chu yi rnam 'gyur 'phel/ /dus dang tshul lugs rnams kyang de/ /ba hu la ni smin drug dang/ /ba lan me dang nag po gsum/ /lI lA sgeg dang bya ba la/ /u ba la ni
53b3(mdo 'grel): gyo dum dang/ /khrag dang chu ni kI lA laM/ /mU la dang po rtsa ba'i don/ /dzA laM tshogs pa dra sgo dra ba/ /shOo laM rang bzhin tshul khrims so/ /'bru dang rgyu byas pha laM ngo/ /steng g.yogs mig dang nang dang ni/ /ma ning tshogs pa tra laM/ /
53b4(mdo 'grel): pho ma ning no/ /'og dang thil ni ta laM ngo/ /sha ni pa laM/ sa chu 'og ni pA tA laM/ /tse laM gos dang tshangs ma gsum/ /ku k+ku laM ni rtsang dang ni/ /kraM pa dong dang ri dags rgya/ /phub me 'ga' zhig dang ni ke ba la/ /rtags gsum
53b5(mdo 'grel): gcig dang ma lus pa/ /rnam grangs thob dang bde ba dang/ /bsod nams rnams la ku sha la/ /slob ma zhes pa gsum yin no/ /pra bla la ni myu gu'o/ /mo min gsum po sprul lam glen/ /kA la ni dma' dang mtho/ /
53b6(mdo 'grel): mdzes dang mkhas pa pe sha la/ /rmongs dang byis pa b+ha la ste/ /la'i'o/ /lo la g.yo dang 'ded chen po/ /da bau da bau nags 'phrog me/ /skye dang dbang phyug b+ha bau'o/ /blon po lhan cig sa rtsi bo/ /bdag po grogs mi d+ha bA 'o//
53b7(mdo 'grel): a pa ri lug nyi'o/ /bka' bsgo 'bod dang mchod sbyin rnams/ /A ha bA'o/ /b+hA ba sems can srid pa dang/ /dgongs pa sems dang bdag skye rnams/ /skye ba 'bras bu me tog rnams/ /pras pha 'o mngal grol la'ang/ /yid mi ches dang
54a1(mdo 'grel): ngan pa dang/ /nyes byas rnams kyang ni hU ba/ /mthor 'gro spro dang 'dod pa brkyang/ /mchod pa rnams ni uhas pa/ /a nu b+hA ba rtogs pa dang/ /dgongs pa'i blo gros nges pa la/ /pra b+ha ba ni skye dgu
54a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gnas dang don thob 'byung gnas so/ /d+h+ru ba rgyu skar dbye ba dang/ /ma ning nges dang dbugs pa gsum/ /swa ni gnyen dang bdag dang ni/ /swaM gsum ste bdag dang ni/ /swa ni mo min nor yin no/ /nI bi bud med rked gos
54a3(mdo 'grel): dung/ /tshong pa'i zod rnams la yang ngo/ /shi bA u ma lce spyang ngo/ /d+hwa na d+hwaM 'thab mo zur rang bzhin/ /dra byA zas dang rdzas la'o/ /swa twa mo min sems can no/ /klI baM ma nig za ma ste/ /brjod bya'i rtag can rnam par gnon//
54a4(mdo 'grel): wa'i 'o/ /gsum Da bi shau rje rigs mi dag go /gnyis /spyod pa mngon spyod sparsho/ /gnyis/ shA rI phung po lug sogs khyim/ /gnyis/ baM sho rigs dang 'od ma'o/ /dben dang gsal ba bI kA shau/ khyab bdag
54a5(mdo 'grel): longs spyod ra be sho/ mthar byed skyes bu kI nA sha/ ser sna dang ni 'khengs ba gsum/ /rgyu thabs mtshan nyid rtags a ba de sha/ ku sha rtsa dang chu yin no/ /da sha gnas skabs sum med do/ /A shA srid pa ring po'o/ /ba shA
54a6(mdo 'grel): glang mo dbang du byed/ /dri sha blo dang mig yin gsum/ /karka sha ni dpa' brtul dang/ /sra ba ngang ni gyod pa'o/ /pra kA sha ni rab gsal grags/ /byis dang blun po ba li sha shi'o/ /lha dang nya ni mig mi 'dzums/ /pha rU
54a7(mdo 'grel): sha ni bdag dang ming/ /bya rog nya dang mkha' 'gro d+hwaM k+Shau/ ka k+Shau rtswa dang 'khri shing ngo/ /a b+hI Shu ni pra ba 'od zer/ /pre sha 'gyed dang nyed pa'o/ /pak+Sha phyogs dang lhan cig go /yuSh+NI Sha ni gtsug tor dang/ /thod
54b1(mdo 'grel): dang cod pan dag la'o/ /brlig pa byi ba mchog dang ni/ /legs byas khyu mchog phri Sha'o/ /ko Sha mo min grol med dang/ /ral gri shugs dang don tshogs mna'/ /ak+She sho dang sho yi stan/ /'gugs pa la 'o de nas ni/ a k+Sha dbang po sho lus 'dren/
54b2(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo chos lugs rtsod pa'i shing/ /karShu bzhin dang lci ba'i me/ /karShU 'gram dang brjod bya'o/ /skyes bu dngos bzhin bya ba dang/ /pu ru Sha ngo/ /baM ShaM dug dang chu yin no/ /nyer 'bul sha dag a'i Shi/ /gnod byed sdig pa ki lwiSha/ /char dang
54b3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten khams cha lo rnams barSha mo min no/ /pre k+ShA gar lta shes rab bo/ /b+hi k+ShA gar lta shes rab bo/ /b+hi k+ShA zhabs thog slong dang sla/ /tri Sh+Ta mdzes dang 'od gsum gzhan/ /nyes kun dag ni kri Sh+Ta/ /mngon sum bka' lung a d+hya ka /ru k+Sha
54b4(mdo 'grel): mi mthun pa dang rtsub/ /Sha'i 'o/ /nyi ma dang skya haM sau so/ /nyi ma me 'od ba sU'o/ /bat+sau bye'u lo dag gnyis/ /khung rta mtho ri di bo kam/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ni/ /dug dang thig le yon tan chags/ /khu ba rnams la ra sa'o//
54b5(mdo 'grel): urg+haM? sa dang a taM sau/ /gnyis/ rna ba'i steng rgyan thod la'o/ /lha dang dbye ba rlung dang ni/ /'od zer dngos po rin chen dang/ /nor rnams la ni ba su'o/ /khyab 'jug kyang ni ba d+hA sa/ /mo nyid A shI sa nyid ni/ /phan sams
54b6(mdo 'grel): sprul gyi mtshe ba'o/ /la las ni slong dang sred/ /hi sa rku ba la sogs las/ /pra su ma dang rgod ma'o/ /sa dang nam mkha' ro dang syau/ /'od zer kyang ngo/ /b+hI sa 'bar dang ma ming ngo/ /a rtsis ni 'od snang mig/ sdig dang nyes pa a g+ha so/ /
54b7(mdo 'grel): mkha' 'gro na mnyam pa yas/ /'od dang bshang lam bats+tshas/ /chen po spro ba te dza sa/ /ra dzas yon tan mo zla mtshan/ /sgra gcan mun pa yon tan gtams/ /tsatshandas tshigs bcan mngon 'dod do/ /ta pas dka' thub la sogs las//
55a1(mdo 'grel): sa has stobs dang mnyam mgo zla/ /na b+has mkha' 'gro gro zhun na b+has/ /o kas khyim dang rten o kas/ /sa ya(mdo 'grel): 'o ma po so chu/ /o jas dang ni 'od dang stobs/ /sh+ro tas dbang po gtsang po khyim/ /te dzas nus
55a2(mdo 'grel): mthu sgron ma dang/ /stobs dang khu ba rnams la'o/ /b+hi d+his ni rig pa'o/ /bI b+hat+sa ni rnams 'tshe'o/ /'di rnams 'phel dang shis/ /ka nI yaM stu gzhon chung/ /ba rI yAM tu brla dang rab/ /sA d+hi yA na legs shin tu/ /sa'i 'o/ /'dab ma
55a3(mdo 'grel): rma bya'i mdongs brta/ /byis gdon gza' sogs gra hi'o/ /sgo khyud thod dang bskol dang ni/ /nor yu ha 'o glang chen so/ /srab thag rta la sogs pa'i srag /pra grA ha dang gra ha yang ngo/ /chung ma 'khor bcas len pa rtswa/ /mna'
55a4(mdo 'grel): rnams pa ri gra hA'o/ /bud med khyim bdag 'dzin pa'o/ /chu so dang ni bud med mchog /a ro he 'o byu ha tshogs/ /a hi sbrul dang lha min no/ /me zla nyi ma mun pa 'joms/ /yongs gcod mi dbang yo byad ni/ /pa ri brto mi zad phyi/ /
55a5(mdo 'grel): a nga chung dang mngon par khyab/ /mtshams don dbyibs dag sbyor las skyes/ /a ni mtshams mi sbyor ba dang/ /dran pa dang ni ngag la yang/ /A ni khro ba zug rdu dag /sdig dang ngan pa nyung ngu rku/ /d+hing ni bsdigs
55a6(mdo 'grel): tshig dmod ba dag /tsa ni zhar byung bsdu ba dang/ /re re ba dang kun las bsdus/ /swasti shis pa bde legs dang/ /bsod nams la sogs shin tu dga' / /mchongs pa la yang a ti'o/ /swi ta 'dri dang
55a7(mdo 'grel): rnam rtog go /tu ni dbye ba dmigs 'dzin pa/ /sa kri ta lhan du lhan cig par/ /rA ta ni ri dang sa gcig dag /nub phyogs phyi ma pashtsat do/ /u ta'i don ni brtag dpyad dag /yang dang rtag tu'i don sha
55b1(mdo 'grel): shtsata/ /sA k+ShA mngon sum dang mtshungs pa/ /sems sdug rjes su brtse ba dang/ /nye bar tshim pa ngo mtshar dang/ /snyan cog pa ni pa ta'o/ /han+ta dga' dang nyer brtse dang/ /ngag dang rtsom pa dug la sogs/ /pra ti mtshon byed khyab
55b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod dag/ /mtshan nyid la sogs rab 'byor la/ /i ti rgyu mtshan gnas skabs dang/ /gsal byed sogs pa rdzogs rnams la/ /pu ra stA ta ni shar phyogs dang/ /dang po sngon don mdun zhes pa'ang/ /ji snyed de
55b3(mdo 'grel): snyed sA ka lye/ /bar mtshams tshad dang dmigs 'dzin no/ /bkra shis rgyun mi 'chad dang rtsom/ /'dri dang kun la a tho 'o/ /de nas/ pri Sha don med bya ba min/ /nA nA sna tshogs gnyis don dag /nu ni dri ba rnam rtog dang/ /
55b4(mdo 'grel): phyi ma 'dra dag a nu'o/ /'dri ba dmigs 'dzin rjes sgo/ /yid gcugs 'bod pa na nu'o/ /smod dang kun bsdus 'dri ba dang/ /brtag pa 'byung 'gyur a pi'o/ /nyer 'jal 'am kha bA yin no/ /sA mi phyed dang smod pa'o/ /
55b5(mdo 'grel): a ma lhan cig sa gcig dang/ /kaM ni chu dang spyi bo la/ /dpe dang 'di yi don e baM/ /nu naM rtog don e baM/ /nu naM rtog don nges pa'o/ /mi smra'i don bde dzaM ShaM ngo/ /kiM ni dri dang smod pa la/ /nA ma ston byed 'byung
55b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /khro dang khas len ngan pa'o/ /a laM rgyan dang rnam grangs thob/ /mthung thung dang ni tsheg tshig la/ /hUM na rnam rtog yongs su 'dri/ /sa ma ya ni nye tshom dbus/ /pu na dang po ma yin dbye/ /ni(mdo 'grel): ni ngas tshig
55b7(mdo 'grel): dgag pa dag /yin/ pra band+ha ni dus ring 'das/ /nye 'khor 'byung 'gyur sngon la ring/ /u ra a'u ri tsa da rI/ /chu zheng khas len byas dag gsum/ /mtho ris pha rol 'jig rten swar/ /gtam dang 'byung ba dag gi la/ /dgag pa tshig gi rgyan
56a1(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ shes 'ded bcugs pa kha lu'o/ /sa gcig gnyis dang myur ba dang/ thams cad mngon gyur a b+hi ta/ ming dang gsal byed prA du ro/ /mi tho/ brdzun dang phan tshun dben pa yang/ /ti ro bsgribs dang dud 'gro'i don/ /hA ni sdug bsngal mya ngan la//
56a2(mdo 'grel): a ha ha ni rmad bu byung/ /sems sdug hi ni rgyu mtshan dmigs 'dzin ni/ don sna tshogs kyi sde tan no// //rgyun ring yun ring po dang/ /dus ring po la sogs pa'i don/ /yang dang yang dang slad dang ni/ /slar yang yang yang gcig min mtshungs/
56a3(mdo 'grel): mgyogs myur rkyen dang yud tsam dang/ /de ma dag dang mi sdod myur/ /shin tu nan tar ha las dang/ /su dang a ti shin tu'i don/ /so so re re mthar byas dang/ /tu da hi rug nA nA bor/ /yata tata gang las de las rgyu/ /thams cad ma yin kaM tsi tam/ /ka dA tsi ta
56a4(mdo 'grel): ni nam zhig go/ lhan gcig dus gcig mnyam mtshungs ldan/ /mthun phyogs don dang mthun pa'o/ /don med byar med don med do/ /rtog pa rnam rtog brtag pa dang/ /'dam kha ci zhig rnam par rtog/ tu hi tsa smra ha dang bai/ /tshig gi kha skong don yin no/ /sa dang
56a5(mdo 'grel): a ti mchod pa'i bya/ /nyin mo thun dang de nas ni/ /nye mtshon nam zhes bya ba'o/ /dud 'gro'i don dang sA tsi phyug/ de nas bod pa'i don yin no/ /byA ta DaM ga/ he hai b+ho rnams 'bod pa'o/ /lhan cig pa gcig nyes 'khor ro/ /ma brtags pa dang ma dpyad pa/ /sngan
56a6(mdo 'grel): ma snga ma mdun ma'o/ /swA hA lha yi bsreg rdzas sbyin/ /sh+rau Sha ta ba Sha ta rnams bdud rtsi sbyin pa'o/ /cung zad bag tsam nyung chung ngu/ /yi dags bar do srid ba bar/ /'dra dang ji ltar de ltar dang/ /de lta bu dang mnyam pa'o/ /a ho hi dang ngo mtshar ro/ /smra bcad mi smra huSh+NI kaM/
56a7(mdo 'grel): sarya cig car de ma thag/ bde dang dgyes pa mnyes dang dga' / /de nas bar dang dkyil dang ni/ /nang dang dbus ma zhes pa'o/ /mthu dang stobs kyi don yin no/ /zung dang phrugs dang da ltar gnas/ /slar dang yang yan drag tu'o/ /med dgag/ na hi/ a/ dang ni/ dag gi pa
56b1(mdo 'grel): med dgag tshogs tshig go/ phyogs phyi ma dang tse sogs tsa/ /de kho na nyid gnyis med dang/ /dbyer med gnyis su med pa'o/ /rab ston gsal dang rnam pa yin/ /oM dang e baM mchog tu 'dod/ /mdza' dag yongs su thams cad kun/ /mi 'dod khas len ki min ngo/ /bsting
56b2(mdo 'grel): tshig khas len a tu tsu/ /'gal dang mi mthun par smra ba/ /ka t+tsita myong bar 'dod/ /sdug pa ma rungs ngan pa dang/ /rang nyid ji lta ji bzhin ltar/ /shes bzhin brdzun dang mi bden pa/ /ji lta'i don dang ji de ltar/ /syu dang e ba tu/ pu/ na(mdo 'grel): be dang tsa dang i te ni/ /da ni Da
56b3(mdo 'grel): kyis dbye ba'i tshig yin no/ /prA ga 'das pa'i don yin no/ /nU na los kyang nges pa gnyis/ /lo dang lo'i phyi ma rting/ /a ma de bzhin rang dang bdag /nyung dang dma'o che dang mtho/ /mang po phal cher 'gro dang 'gul/ /rtag tu rgyun tu phyi dang phyi/ /'das dang mi mthong mi mngon
56b4(mdo 'grel): no/ /yod dang ba dog go khro tshig uM/ /uM ni dri dang mnyes gshin tshig/ hUM ni rtog ge u Sha ni/ /nam gyi cha smad phyag dang 'dud/ /bod pa yang don ang+ga'o/ /smod dang ngan smra bstod shes tshig/ dgongs ma nyi mdza' nam langs snga/ /sa gcig pa dang kan+ti ke /na ning
56b5(mdo 'grel): gzhe ning da? lo dang/ /lo sngon ma/ na ning gzhe ning pa lo'o/ /de ring 'od de ring gi'o/ /de nas sngon ming thun la sogs/ /sngon ma phyi ma gzhan dang ni/ /de bzhin du na gzhan dang gzhan/ /sngon ma'i nyi ma la sogs pa/ /nyi ma gnyis pa gnangs nyin mo/ /phyi dro'i thun ni
56b6(mdo 'grel): po? re brgya/ /kha rtsang 'das pa ma 'ongs pa/ /nyi mthun dang ni gnangs nang par/ /phyi thun de thun de dus tsam na/ /thabs gcig dang ni lhan gcig la/ /dus kun tu dang rtag tu dang/ ta lta dang ni de ltar dang/ /da dang da lta de bzhin du/ /phyogs dang yul dang dus yin no/ /shar la
56b7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa sngon ma dang/ /phyi ma dang ni gzhan la sogs/ /mi zad pa'i sde tshan no// //rtags dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos kyis/ /san la sogs pa kri ta tand+hi? ta/ /bsdu ba las skyes ma bshad pa/ /bsdus rtags 'dres bzhin 'di shes bya/ /rtags
57a1(mdo 'grel): kyi ltag ma khyab pa'i phyir/ /bye brag 'ga' zhig ma gtogs pa/ /u na'i rkyen can rnams ni mo/ /mo ni A dang a'u dang ni/ /ngal gso dbyangs gcig? las med dang/ /skye gnas ldan pa'i sems can rnams/ /ming dang glog dang mtshan
57a2(mdo 'grel): mo dang/ /'khri shing mda' dang phyogs dang sa/ /gtsang po blo gros rnams ni mo/ /a mdza' ba gnyis don gcig dang/ /snod dang dus sogs ma gtogs pa/ /tal tshogs ga ka Tya trA/ /'dras 'khrims la sogs tsU na'o/ /mo dang b+ha ba la sogs pa/ /
57a3(mdo 'grel): a ni kI NU la dang/ /tsa na kya ba a yu dza/ /a da i nya ni NA rnams/ /u NA la sogs pa ni rU rI/ /a di A nU u g.yo brtan/ /de la rtsed mo'i rdeg cha dang/ /bu tshur thal lcag Na ni mo'i rkyen/ /g+hA nyo nya ni de'i bya ba/ /chad pa ltung ba sbo zla dang/ /khra dang
57a4(mdo 'grel): ltung ba ri dags dang/ /mar khu 'thungs pa bdud rtsi mo/ /mo min cung zad bad rtsa sogs/ /brjod 'dod 'tshed pa'i rkyen/ /gal ta na/ lang kA she pA li kA dang/ TIka dang ni d+hA ta kI/ dka' 'grel dang ni bre po'o/ /si d+hwa'i shing dang smra byed bye'u/ /i ga
57a5(mdo 'grel): bu sbrang rtsi 'bar ba dang/ /drog ma til du ka'i shing/ /zhib mo bcom dang tshos legs dang/ /phra ma mA d+hi lo ma dang/ /'bras bu rgol ba phub dang ni/ /phyi ma shA NI gos/ /shin tu dga' dang bem dug dang/ /de bzhin stan lte rgyal po'i 'khor/ /dzha l+la rI/
57a6(mdo 'grel): tsa rtsa rI/ /'khar ba ri mo dus sbyor dang/ /nya rul tshos dang sro ma khrus/ /chad snod snag tsha gri d+ha sI/ /mo'i rtags kyi dbye ba'o// //skyes bu de dbye rjes su spyod/ /rnam grangs dang bcas lha lha min/ /mtho ris gnod sbyin ri dang sprin/ /rgya mtsho
57a7(mdo 'grel): shing dang dus dang ni/ /ral gri mda' dang dgra dang ni/ /lag pa 'gram mchu dbung bas so/ /mgrin skra sen mo nu ma dang/ /nyin mo ha yi mdza' can no/ /dug gi dbye ba/ mtshan mo mdza' dang dang po grangs/ /dpal 'dod la sogs tshon rtsi dang/ /dmigs
57b1(mdo 'grel): phye ma yin mon lug dang/ dngos po ma gtogs pa yi ni/ tu dang u la da le gso dang/ /'di rnams nye ba'i mdza' can/ /a'i mdza' can ni 'dir mo'o/ /ka Sha/ Na/ b+ha ra'i rkyen/ /pa yi mdza' can gang la ni/ /a/ tha/ pa/ tha/ na/ ya/ sa/ Ta dang pa yi mdza' 
57b2(mdo 'grel): can pho/ /rigs ba dgrags pa zhabs dang 'bod/ /ming dang byed pa ngo bo la/ /g+ha nya dza ya ni la g+ha/ /a thu tsa dang lyu dang byed/ /a ni tsa ni ngo bo nyid/ /ka g+ha ki ni dang po gzhan/ /zlas dbye rta dang rgod ma dang/ /rta dang rgod ma'i bsdu ba rnams/ /ka yi mdza' can
57b3(mdo 'grel): nyi zla dang/ a ya sngon du bzlog pa'o/ /sngon nyid kyang ngo/ /mi thung rjes brjod ba la dang/ /khyim dang mde' stong rig byed dang/ /thun po sdug can dar sra rtsa/ /mkhar dang khron pa snyan dngags mkhan/ /changs pa rigs ngan mngal stag sba/ /lo ma bsngags pa
57b4(mdo 'grel): shing srin bu/ /za ma tog dang dbyug pa dang/ /chu skyal skra mtshams ljang khu dang/ /skyug ldan skegs pa chu bur dang/ /'gri shing 'gro slong bzang dang ni/ /sbu ba mchod rten gting tshig dang/ /nye 'ong rgyal rigs lte ba dang/ /mnga' dang sbu grigs pa dang/ /chu 'phel
57b5(mdo 'grel): rmig pa skyur mo dang/ /byi phrug tshal dang gang zag dang/ /ro langs gyad dang sta ri dang/ /mchod sbyin pa pa TTi sha dang/ /tsab ma dga' ba de bzhin du/ /shing rta bshad pa so sor 'dod/ /phe'i rtags kyi dbye ba'o// //gnyis dman gzhan no mkhas dang
57b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dgon pa 'dab ma dod dang ni/ /khab chu dang grang dro dang/ /sha khrag kha mig khu ba dang/ /stabs dang gom dang gser zangs lhabs? bde sdug dge dang mi dge dang/ /chu dang me tog rnams dang ni/ /tshe dang rlung yab rjes byug ga/ bye ba brgya la sogs pa'i grangs/ /gzhan yang
57b7(mdo 'grel): 'bum dang sa ya dang/ /ka gnyis/ ma si su sa n+ni taM/ gang la a ni can dang/ /byed po ma go gas tra mdza' dang/ /sa la nye sngon shi Sh+Ta dang/ /mtshan mo grangs dang ldan pa dang/ /snod la sogs pa a mdza' can/ /don gcig gong du grangs ldan pa/ kha gnyis mtshan
58a1(mdo 'grel): nyid rjes 'brang ba/ /zlas dbye gcig nyid mi zad dngos/ /lam grangs mi zad pha rol lo/ /ma ning ngo/ /drug cu grib ma mang gnyis grib/ /tshogs pa dang ni 'dus pa dang/ /shA lA don gyi pha rol tu/ /rgyal po mi don rA dza spangs/ /ga mog 'dus dang
58a2(mdo 'grel): mi dbang 'du/ /srung ba 'dus 'dir phyogs min/ /nyer shes nye bar bgrod pa'i mdza' / /de la gnyis nyid rab tu gsal/ /tshangs shes tshangs pa'i go rim sogs/ /dug po sI na rA nA ma su/ /b+hA ba na dang Na dang ka/ tsa ta rnams dang gzhan la'o/ /tshogs pa ngo bo
58a3(mdo 'grel): nyid dang las/ /a yi mdza' can rkyen rnams so/ /bsod nams nyi bzang nyi ma'i pha rol/ /bya ba mi zad rnams kyi ni/ /dbye ba gzhan dang gcig nyid do/ /rig byed dang ni gar bye brag/ ta la'i 'bras bu rma bya'i mdongs/ /khyim dang ska ba thod dang ni/ /srog
58a4(mdo 'grel): gi gnas dang dpag tshad do/ /rgyal po mchod sbyin bA dza pe paM/ /tshigs bcad rkang ldan mkhas pas byas/ /nor bu rkang dang sin du rA/ /gos rnying gos dang gur dang ni/ /'jig rten 'gro dang bab la dang/ /bdug rdzas ster ma gur gum mo/ /skyes bu ma
58a5(mdo 'grel): ning lhag ma ni/ /phyed mtshang 'ba' cha tsher ma dang/ /zas dbye rgyun chags mthun bral dang/ /gos dang brgya grong shar dang ni/ /lhung ba nyer spyod sman dpyad dang/ /ta mA lA dang grong mdza' dang/ /ldum ra rus rta mgo dang chang/ /pu ti seng sgra bde dang bum//
58a6(mdo 'grel): grogs ba brgya tshang mig nad dang/ /rgyags dang mi zad gar dang ni/ /kha'i sgye las dang ras bal dang/ /pha rol tshu rol mnya' shing 'dzin/ /khyed rnams pra gI pa dang ni/ /lhung bzed ga'u zla chang snod do/ /byed mchod la sogs mar sogs rnams//
58a7(mdo 'grel): skyes bu la sogs rig byed ngas/ /de 'dir ma bshad 'jig rten la/ /de yod na yang lhag mi bzhin// //pho mo bu rgyud mdza' can dang/ /gnyis bzhi drug tshig ltos 'gro rnams/ /rigs kyi dbye dang skye bur grags/ /bud med sbyor bas lhan cig gyad
58b1(mdo 'grel): thub ba mdzes dang sa ring dang/ /kha dog dzA Ta li dang mthun/ /gser skong bre yi bye brag dang/ /khrag 'dzin mchod sdong dang/ /gos dang rked po du lu'o/ /mo dang ma ning b+hA ba dang/ bya ba Sh+ya nya 'ga' zhig bunya/ /rigs dang mi rigs byams mi byams/ /bu nya dang por dper brjod pa/ /drug
58b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mdza' dang dang po'i tshig /dmag dang grib mar ba dang/ /chang dang mtshan mo yin pa'am/ /mi dmag sang dgongs ba lang rwa/ /gzhan yang phyogs yin no min no/ /a yi mdza' can yin pa/ /phyi tshig ba gnyis skyes bu'o/ /na yang phyis shing khyogs khri gsum//
58b3(mdo 'grel): khri gsum gsum 'jog gsum 'jog kyang/ /gsum po snod dang thub po khur/ /sgrom dang utpal se 'bru'o/ /gzhan gyi rtags can rang nyid gtso/ /zlas dbye de yi skyes bu de/ /don gyi mdza' can sngon sbyar rgyan/ /thob pa rnyed pa snga phyir 'gro/ /ta di ta don pa gnyis pa/ /grangs
58b4(mdo 'grel): dang ming ni thams cad pa/ /mdza' can 'bru mang po/ /phyogs min ming ni dper brjod shes/ /yon tan rdzas dang bya sbyor ba/ /sngon ma nye ba pha rol 'gro/ /kri ta byed bya ming med dang/ /kri tyA byed po las la'o/ /a Na la sogs mdza' can ni/ /de yis dmar po la sogs don/ /sna tshogs
58b5(mdo 'grel): don gyi dbye ba rnams/ /drug gi ming can mtshungs pa gsum/ /bdag dang gzhan gting mi bzad rnams/ /'gal ba rnams ni phyi ma la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rab sbyar las/ /lhag ma rnams ni shes par bya/ /rtags bsdus ba'i sde chen no// //pad+ma rnams ni nyi mas
58b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas/ /snyan dngags rnams ni mkhas pa yis/ /de yi dri bzang rlung gis 'dod/ /de bzhin mkhas pas de yon tan/ /'chi ba med pa'i seng ge zhes bya bas brjod pa'i ming dang rtags kyi rjes su bshad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po kIrtI
58b7(mdo 'grel): tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas/ /yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis/ /bal yul yi bu'i grong khyer du bsgyur ro/ // */ (/'chi med mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel ba 'dod 'jo'i ba mo zhes bya ba bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ a ma ra
59a1(mdo 'grel): Sha TI ka kA ma d+he nu nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'chi ba med pa'i mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa 'dod 'jo'i ba mo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa yi mchog dang chen po thob/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i
59a2(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam shing/ /bdud rtsi rdzu 'phrul yal 'dab rgyas/ /khyod la me tog 'bras bur shog/ gang gA'i chu bo rab 'bab bzhin/ /gang zhig brtse bas lan gsum 'gro/ dpal gyi rgya mtsho bdud rtsi'i gter/ /srid ba'i zla phyed bdag phyag 'tshal/ /srid
59a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgya mtshor yum gyur sgrol pa'i dge gru ni/ /snying rje'i dpag bsam ljon shing dag las grub gyur pa/ /rab dang sems kyi dad pas skye ba rab bskyod nas/ /pha rol byin gyur mngon 'dod rin chen thob par shog /sbrang mas me tog rtsi blangs thigs pa rab
59a4(mdo 'grel): bsags ltar/ /gang zhig blo gros bzang po'i btung ba 'jo zhing ster/ /snyan ngag gcig nyid kun gyi gtsug gi me tog bzhin/ /dpal ldan 'chi med gsung de rnam par rgyal gyur cig/ mthas rgyud de mngon brjod chu gter rin chen gyi/ /snyan ngag ngo shal
59a5(mdo 'grel): phreng bas khar mdzod rnam brgyan pa/ /dpal ldan tsan+d+re go mis sbyar gyur phul byung mod/ /de ni mngon par rab bsgrub bya ba dag gis brtsams/ /de nas gzhan la phan pa rjes su ston pas sdig pa rab tu zhi ba dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs phun sum tshogs
59a6(mdo 'grel): pa bsags pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la 'dir mchod par brjod nas/ /gang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mkhyen pa ni/ /yul gyi dngos po mdza' dag yongs su shes pa'o/ /brtse ba ni/ sdug bsngal las yang dag par bsgral
59a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'dod pa'o/ /de gnyis kyi rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ rgya mtsho ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i rgya mtsho'o/ /'dir rgya mtsho'i sgras gting med de la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa nye bar 'jal ba'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse bas
59b1(mdo 'grel): byas pa dang/ de ni gting med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa byed pa po mang po'i bsdu ba'o/ /bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i don yin pas 'dir dgos pa med do/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag ni rgya mtsho zhes bshad de/ byed pa po sgrub pa ste/ de'i tshig mi mngon pa'am/ /drug pa
59b2(mdo 'grel): 'grel pa'i bsdu pa'o/ /mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dag gis rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ /rgya mtsho ni gzhi yangs pa'o/ /gting mdza' med pa ni/ gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ste/ gang gi mkhyen pa dang brtse ba'i pha rol zab mo yongs su spyod mi nus pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni
59b3(mdo 'grel): thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor mdza' dag la mkhyen pa dang brtse bas khyab pas gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho gting mdza' med pa ni/ skyabs med pa'i 'gro ba rnams mngon par khyab cing gang ba de la gang gis mthar thug par sgrol nus pa de bzhin du gyur pa yin
59b4(mdo 'grel): pa de ni sdig pa dang bral nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams spangs pa'o/ /byams pa dang bzod pa dang nye bar zhi ba la sogs pa'i yon tan no/ /dpal dang bdud rtsi dang bcas phyir zhes te/ tshad med pa'i ched du 'jug pa bzhin du bzhi pa'i don te/ /rang
59b5(mdo 'grel): gi yi ge ni phan tshun du bsdu ba'i tshig go/ dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /bdud rtsi ni thar pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /mchog gi snying rje la sogs pa yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu ni/ gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams ral
59b6(mdo 'grel): zad pa med de snyel ba mi mda' ba' o/ /khyad par du byung ba don dam pa sgrub pa ni blo dang ldan pa'o/ /bsten par bya ba ni dpal dang bdud rtsi'i phyir ro/ /'dir mkhyen pa dang brtse ba la sogs pa'i rgya mtshos sems can rnams la rgyu med par mchog tu mnyes
59b7(mdo 'grel): shing phan pa'i rang bzhin can de lta bus ni bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa nye bar mtshon te/ rtags kyi rab tu gsal ba zhes pa ni/ snyan ngag gi yon tan te/ dbyangs can gyi mgul rgyan gyi snyan ngag gi rgyan las/ /gang zhig don gang rab gsal
60a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ rab mdzes de yi mngon brjod de/ dper na 'dir shar gyur pas rgya grol pad+ma shar gyur ri bo dang/ nags tshal phreng pa manda ra ba'i me tog gzhon nu ltar/ /dur ba lhan cig mi gnas rab tu rtsom zhing gnyis gnyis
60a2(mdo 'grel): gnyen/ /spre'u rab tu khros pas mkhur tshos 'gram pa zangs mdog bzhin/ /zhes bshad do/ /'dir mun pa bsam pas dur pa'i mya ngan bsal te dur pa pho mo lhan cig mi gnas pa yin pa/ /de la sogs pa bsal nas nyi ma'i mtshan nyid ma
60a3(mdo 'grel): bshad kyang nyi ma nye bar mtshon pa bzhin no/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa las thar pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis mchod par brjod nas/ de nas
60a4(mdo 'grel): bstan chos gang zhig la brten pa yang skyes bu rnams don grub pa'i phyed du gsungs pas/ de la mtho ris la sogs pa'i ming rnams dang/ pho mo la sogs pa'i rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/ rgyud gzhan rnams las bsdus nas ni zhes pa ni/
60a5(mdo 'grel): sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'o/ /'dir ci'i phyir bshad ce na/ rgyud gzhan rnams las bsdus pa'i phyir te/ /de la phan tshun du rgyud rnams dang/ skabs gsum gyi mngon brjod kyi bstan chos utpa la la sogs pa dang/ bya Di
60a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ mchog sred/ tsan+d+ra go mi dang/ nA ma na la sogs pa'i ming dang rtags kyi bstan bcos rnams kyi bsdu ba'i tshogs pa rnams 'dir brjod pa ste/ de'i phyir na yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /gal te rgyud gzhan rnams las bsdus nas 'dir brjod pa
60a7(mdo 'grel): yin na mang por 'gyur ro zhe na/ mi 'gyur te sde tshan gyi khyad par gyis tshogs yongs su la sogs pa'i tshig phrad rnams spangs nas slar yang rjod byed nyung shes su bsdus pa'i gzhung gis bshad do/ /brjod bya sde tshan du bsdebs pas
60b1(mdo 'grel): skabs kyi bstan chos kyi ming rnams bde blag du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshungs pa rnams bsdus pa'i phyir na sde tshan te/ rigs dang yon tan dang bya ba dang ngo bo rnams mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /slar yang mdor bsdus dgos pa ni/ utpa la la sogs pa la bsdu ba med pa dang/ ming
60b2(mdo 'grel): gi 'phreng ba la sogs pa la rtags med pa dang/ rgyud kyi rab tu dbye ba la sogs pa la ming med pa dang/ 'chi ba med pa'i 'phreng ba la sogs pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang/ bo sta li ta la sogs pa la sde tshan gyi stong pa zhes ste/ de rnams las khyad par du gyur pas
60b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/ /ci ste ming rnams kyi rtags dang brjod bya la slar yang ming don ni du brjod na ni gzhan rnams la yongs su rdzogs pa dgag pa'i phyir dang/ de bzhin du yang ming ji snyed pa'i tshig dang/ de snyed kyi rtags kyi tshig rnams su byas na
60b4(mdo 'grel): ni mangs par thal bar 'gyur bas 'dir bshad pa/ skyes po mo ma ning la zhes pa ni/ pho'i rtags can dang/ mo'i rtags can dang/ ma ning gi rtags can dang gsum ste/ de shes par bya ba'i gzhi'o/ /shes byed ni phal cher gzugs kyi dbye ba ste/ de yang
60b5(mdo 'grel): ming rnams dang/ ming gi khyad par rnams dang/ pha rol gyi ming shes pas ming thams cad pa'i sgra yang rab tu dbye ba gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /de la gzugs kyi dbye ba ni dper na/ ki mi da ki ra kha sgo na nra kA sa la pad+ma/ laM mA laM/ dza la mi ti zhes so/ /ming gi khyad par
60b6(mdo 'grel): gyi 'gyur ba ni dper na/ gaN+Dau ka so lau ta ta sar ha nu/ pha rol gyi ming bos pas ming thams cad gyur pa ni/ dper na kut+tu(mdo 'grel): ku t+te/ sne ha bA tra sen khya ku ru ya(mdo 'grel): zhes so/ /'ga' zhig lhan cig spyod pas nges pa ni/ gang la gzugs kyi dbye ba med pa 'ga' 
60b7(mdo 'grel): zhig ste/ dper na/ a sha yug shi b+hA nu/ ka ra b+hi yartriSh+Na pa daM/ gzugs kyi dbye ba med pa'i phyir mtho'i rtags kyi nges par bya'o/ /de'i khyad par sgrub ces pa ni/ pho mo ma ning de'i khyad par nye bar len pas 'grig pho mo ma ning du shes pa ni/ gang la gzugs kyi dbye
61a1(mdo 'grel): bas nges pa'i rtags med pa dang/ lhan cig spyod pas nges pa'i rtags kyang med pa'i mngon par 'dod pa dpag tu med pa rnams de bzhin du rtags kyi khyad par gyis te/ dper na/ paN+Da rimmany+dza ri(mdo 'grel): sti yo/ sti ya su ma na sa(mdo 'grel): bu sha saM/ kha na/
61a2(mdo 'grel): mo dang 'byung khungs yin no/ /bi Da skaM skyes bu dang ma ning ngo/ /dbye ba bshad pa'i phyir na tha dad pa'i bsdu ba dang/ gcig gis lhag par ma bsdus so/ /bsdu ba zhes pa ni tshig la bsdu ba dang/ rtags gcig la bsdu ba'o/ /ci ste rig 'dzin chu skyes
61a3(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dra za mi'am ci/ zhes pa la sogs pa bsdu ba bshad pa ma yin zhe na/ yongs su grags pa las gzhan pa'i bsdu ba ma byas pa'o/ /'dir ni rtags bkag pa dang/ go rim spangs pa ma bshad pa ni/ rtags kyi bsdu ba ma byas shing/
61a4(mdo 'grel): go rim las gzhan pa yang ma bshad do/ /de ltar khyad par sgrub pa gzugs kyi dbye ba la sogs pa byas na gzhung chen ches par gyur pas de yongs su dor nas bshad pa yin gyi rim pa sgangs nas ma bsdus so/ /'dir ni mtho ris dang nam mkha' dang phyogs
61a5(mdo 'grel): dang dus la sogs pa ji lta ba'i go rim byis de dang 'brel pa'i lta ba la sogs pa'i don rang rang gi 'brel pa lhan cig pa rnams ji ltar gtso bo'i rang gzugs kyi brjod bya'i don rtogs pa'i phyir te/ de la gang gi rnam grangs rnams dang 'brel ba rnams dang/
61a6(mdo 'grel): ming rnams de'i brjod pa'i gnas skabs kyis gang dang gang la brten pa dang de dang de'i go rim bstan pas/ gcig gnyis dang mdo ba'i tshig rnams bde blag tu stong ba ste/ rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /gsum gyi rtags la gsum
61a7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ pho mo mo ning gsum gyi rtags dang ldan pa las/ trilTa zhes 'byung ste gsum zhes bya ste/ dper na/ Ta TaM taM Shu zhes bya ste/ ta DaM ni 'gram la/ ta Shu ni gsum mo/ /pho mo dag sbyor ba ni 'khrig pa'o/ /de gnyis zhes bya ste/ 'dir
61b1(mdo 'grel): yang rtags gnyis dang ldan pa la gnyis zhes bya ste/ dper na/ a sha ni d+hA yo zhes bya ste/ a sha ni zhes bya ni gnam lcags la/ d+ha yo ni gnyis so/ /rtags bkag lhag ma'i don la zhes pa ni/ ma'i rtags kyis shes par byed de/ dper na/ nad+hi po la sti yAM zhes bya
61b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ dI bo ni gling ngo/ /asti yaM ma yin pa'o/ /de bzhin du mo'i rtags bkag pas lhag ma pho dang ma ning du shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin du pho'i rtags la sogs pa bkag pa yang ngo/ /da ni gzhung nyung dus rtogs pa'i don bshad pa/ stu mdza' a tha sngon cha
61b3(mdo 'grel): min zhes pa ni/ stu mdza' tshig dang a tha la sogs pa'i ming dang rtags kyi tshig rnams sngon ma'i tshig 'phrol mi sbyor zhing don gzhan phyi ma gcig ston pa'o/ /dper na sho b+hA kIn+ta g+hU tiShtsha pa ra ba sh+yA ya tu ni ha ra/ pra le ya ba hi kA tsa la tha hi mA la tha don
61b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan ston pas/ hi mA nI hi ma saM ha ri/ zhes pa ni kha ba'i phung po'o/ /de ltar na bstan bcos rnam par bzhag pa'i nges tshig mdor bstan nas/ da ni mtho ris zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi bstan bcos rtsam bar mdzad de/ 'dir bstan bcos kyi brjod bya ni sa gsum mo/ /de la dang
61b5(mdo 'grel): po gtso bo dang mtho ris rnams brjod par bya ste/ lha rnams de dang de la brten pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar de'i khyad par gtso bo'i brjod bya ni/ sangs rgyas dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dag po rnams brjod par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po ni brjod pa nyid te/ de yang dang po
61b6(mdo 'grel): phyogs zhes de'i go rims nges pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su/ shar dang ma la sogs pa lus ngan gyi mthar thug pa'i phyogs kyi bdag po rnams go rim nges pa'i phyir ro/ /steng gi phyogs nam la'i bdag po ni zla ba yang yin te/ rgyu skar rgyal po'o/ /de'i go rim
61b7(mdo 'grel): nges pas gza' dang skar ma'i bdag po ni nyi ma yang yin no/ /de'i 'og tu zhar las byung ba snga dro la sogs pa dus kyi go rim gyis bskal pa brjod pa dang 'jig pa'i bskal ba dang shar ba dag kyang bshad do/ /de la chos la sogs pa'i byed pa po ma mthong ba'i bdag lha
62a1(mdo 'grel): du 'gro ba thams cad kyi byed pa po ni thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'o/ /grangs can gyi 'dod pas skyes bu longs spyod par byed pa'i so gsum po 'dir rang bzhin spyi gtso bos bskyed cing chos la sogs pa'i byed pa po 'dod/ de
62a2(mdo 'grel): nas lus dang ble dang yul dang dbang po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa dang/ yul rnam par spyod pa byed pa dang sgra'i go rim nges pa'i glu dang/ de'i zhar las byung ba'i sil snyan dang/ gar zhes pa rnams kyang dang po'i sde tshan la yongs su rdzogs pa zhar la
62a3(mdo 'grel): thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa 'og gi bdag po la sogs pa rnams kyang dang po'i skabs su bshad do/ /phyogs kyi go rim nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /gnyis pa sa'i sde mtshan gyi go rim la grong khyer dang grong gi go rim nges pa'i grong rdal dang/
62a4(mdo 'grel): sha ba ri'i gnas grong gi bye brag ste/ de yang ri dang nags la brten pa'o/ /de'i rjes su ri dang nags la gnas pa'i seng ge la sogs pa gzhan mdza' dag kyang de'i zhar la thob pa'o/ /mi spyi rnams dang de'i khyad par bram ze dang rgyal rigs
62a5(mdo 'grel): dang rje rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang bshad do/ /sde tshan gsum pa sngon du gsungs pa'i skabs gnyis po la brten nas de bzhin du bshad de/ /de dang 'brel ba'i bde ba la sogs pa dang/ las la sogs pa bya ba byed pa rnams dang/ do na
62a6(mdo 'grel): dpag tu med pa'i tshig rnams kyang bshad/ bsten bcos kyi don gyi cha shas mdor bsdus pa'i go rim brjod nas/ lha gnas zhes pa nas bzhi gsum pa zhes pa'i bar du lha'i gnas kyi ming ngo/ /lha'i gnas kyi swa zhes 'byung ste/ mtho ris dang lhan
62a7(mdo 'grel): cig spyod pa'i rtags kyis pho'i rtags can no/ /mi zad ces pa ni/ tshig 'dis rtags kyi grangs su byas pa rnams la zad med ste sna tshogs pa'i rtags su 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gcig tu chad pa ni zad pa'o/ /skyo med ces pa ni mi dga' ba med pa'o
62b1(mdo 'grel): sum rtse ni lha'i gtso bo tshangs pa dang/ khyab mjug dang/ dbang phyug sum rtse pa'i gnas so/ /skabs gsum ni lha rnams la skye ba ni yod de/ lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi lon pa lta bu skye'o/ /gzhon nu dang dar la bab pa dang/ rgas pa la sogs pa ni med do/ /yang gnas pa
62b2(mdo 'grel): dang 'chi ba ni yod do/ /des na skabs gsum gnas so/ /lha'i 'jig rten dang/ rol pa'i gnas dang/ mkha' zhes bya bas kyang lha'i yul du go'o/ /gnyis mo zhes pa ni/ rol pa'i gnas dang/ mkha' gnyis mo'i rtogs can no/ /ma ning bzhi gsum pa
62b3(mdo 'grel): mi de nyid ma ning gi rtags can no/ /bzhi gsum pa ni skabs gsum mo/ /gzhan rnams ni pho'i rtags can no/ /de rnams kyis lha'i yul lam gnas kyi ming gi rnam grangs so/ /de na gnas pa'i lha spyi tsam gyi rnam grangs ni/ 'chi med ces pa nas/ lha
62b4(mdo 'grel): nyid ming zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis so/ /'chi ba med pa ni/ dus ring ba la bya'o/ /rgas med ni lha la de med do/ /skabs gsum lha ni/ skye ba gnas pa 'chi ba gsum yod do/ /rnam par sad pa ni gnyid med pa ste/ rtag tu sad pa'o/ /bcud ldan
62b5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa ni lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyis rgya mtsho bsrubs te/ lik+Sh+ma byung ba khyab 'jug gis khyar/ zla ba phyed pa byung ba dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i rgyan du byas/ dug bum pa gang byung ba dbang phyug gi mgrin par bzhag pas mgrin pa sngon por song/ /chang bum pa gang byung ba de lha
62b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi khyer bas su ra su ra zhes grags/ chang? ngam mtsho'i bcud dam/ bdud rtsir yang rung ngo/ /tshig bzang ba ni lha'i tshig rnams 'jam zhing mnyen pa'o/ /yid bzang ni yid la bsams pa tsam gyis dgos 'dod 'grub pa'o/ /sum rtse'i gnas na gnas pas
62b7(mdo 'grel): sum rtse'o/ /dbang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /mtho ris kyi don dang ldan pas mtho ris gnas so/ /mi sbyin ni/ drang srong kA sh+yA pa zhes pa'i chung ma la di ti zhes pa lha rnams kyi dang po'i mdo? a di ti ni mi sbyin ni/ ma'i ming las dpes na btags so/ /mkha' spyod ba yang ngo//
63a1(mdo 'grel): legs bris ni lha rnams kyi mgrin pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa rnams la bkra shis kyi ri mos mtshan pas legs par bris so/ /mi sbyin dga' ni/ ma dga' bar byed pa'o/ /a di'i bu ni sgra'i sgrub tshul lo/ /ri yig ni lha'i ma'i ming
63a2(mdo 'grel): ste skabs gsum gyi lha mo las byung ba'o/ /gnyis med pas rmi lam med do/ /mi 'chi ba ni sgra'i sgrub tshul lo/ /bdud rtsi las longs spyod pas bdud rtsi zas so/ /me'i zhal ni me lha la sbyin sreg byas pa lha'i zhal du 'gro'o/ mchod sbyin za ba zhes kyang bya'o/ /dag
63a3(mdo 'grel): gi mda' can ni lha rnams kyi gang smos pa de grub pas dag gi mda' can no/ /lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir na lha min dgra'o/ /tshogs bzang pa ni thams cad legs pa'i phyir na tshogs bzang ngo/ /lha rnams nyid mi yang na pho'i rtags so/ /lha mo
63a4(mdo 'grel): nyid ces pa ni rtags dang ldan pa'o/ /de rnams thams cad lha spyi tsam gyi ming ngo/ /nyi ma sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshogs pa'i lha ste/ 'dus par gyur pa'i lha rnams so/ /de ni lha rnams 'dus pa'i bye brag tu bshad pa'i tshogs kyi lha rnams kyi sgras
63a5(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /de la nyi ma bcu gnyis sogs/ sna tshogs lha rnams bcu gnyis zhes/ nor gyi lha rnams brgyad du grags/ /dga' ldan de bzhin sum cu drug/ 'od gsal drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ rlung zhes bya ba bzhi bcu dgu/ de bzhin nyis brgya
63a6(mdo 'grel): nyi shu'o/ /bsgrub bya zhes bya bcu gnyis grags/ /drag po bcu gcig shes par bya/ /'di rnams tshogs kyi lha rnams te/ de la sogs pa rang ming ngo/ /de la nyi ma bcu gnyis ni/ dbang po byed pa lam pa dang/ char 'bebs bstod byed sngon min
63a7(mdo 'grel): 'phags/ /mig gzugs khyab 'jug 'od can dang/ chu bdag ba shes gnyen zhes bya'o/ /nor dang sems pa mchog sbyin dang/ gsal dus 'dod khur mig dang ni/ skyes bu dang ni g.yon dngos so/ /de rnams sna tshogs lha ru grags/ /chu dang brtan pa
63b1(mdo 'grel): zla ba dang/ 'dzin byed rlung dang me dang ni/ nam langs 'od byed ces bya ba/ /brgyad po nor gyi lha zhes bya/ /shes dang yid rjes khyab 'jug dang/ shed bra mi yi bu dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni dka' thub gter/ /dad pa dang ni chos dang grags/ /nyin mtshan mnyam byed legs
63b2(mdo 'grel): skyes te/ grub pa'i lha rnams bcu gnyis grags/ /ma skyes rkang gcig 'phel dang bstod/ /drag po dang ni brtsom 'grub ldan/ /'phrog byed de nas de byung dang/ /spyan gsum gzhan las rgyal ba dang/ /dbang ldan dang ni sa gsum pa/ /drag po bcu gcig shes
63b3(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /lhag pa rnams ni lung las shes par bya ste/ 'dir ni mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bris so/ /rig 'dzin zhes pa ni mig sman dang sngags la sogs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rnam grangs ni/ ra b+ha sa'i mdzod las/ rig pa 'dzin dang 'dod gzugs dang/
63b4(mdo 'grel): mkha' spyod bden dpal las mtsho'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /chu skyes ni lha rnams kyi btsun mo ste/ lha'i smad 'tshong ma urba shi la sogs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin ni mchod sbyin te lha rnams kyi mchod pa byed mkhan no/ /srin po ni 'jigs su rung ba la sogs pa'o/ /dri za
63b5(mdo 'grel): ni lha'i klu mkhan ste gand+harbA zhes pa glu la yang 'jug ste/ de ni? sgra ngan spangs dang dbyangs 'dem zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /mi 'am ci ni mi'i lus po la rta'i gdong ba can la sogs pa glu dbyangs kyis rtse ba'o/ /sha za ni sems can gyi bye brag sha rjen pa za ba lus
63b6(mdo 'grel): ngan pa'i rjes su spyod pa'o/ /gsang ba ni gter 'dzin pa ste/ gsang ba nor bu bzang po la sogs pa lus ngan po'i rjes su spyod pa'o/ /grub pa ni chung ngu la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'o/ /'byung po ni 'gig skad chen po smra ba ste sha za'i rab tu dbye bas kha
63b7(mdo 'grel): 'og tu lta ba dang/ kha steng du lta ba la sogs pa'o/ /de rnams lha'i sgras brjod par bya ste/ de rnams dang po lha las skyes pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /yang na lha rnams bzhin du skye gnas las ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis lha ma yin rnams kyi ming
64a1(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /sbyin skyes ni ma di ti zhes pa'i phu'o/ /rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las byung ba'i su ra lha rnams kyis khyer nas lha ma yin rnams kyis ma thob pas a su ra zhes bya ba ste/ don ni bcu dang mi ldan pa'o/ /gzhu skyes ni/ da nu dza zhes 'byung
64a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ gzhu skyes zhes bya'o/ /sbyin 'byung zhes kyang bya ste/ sgra'i sgrub tshul lo/ /de rnams mi'i ming las grangs te/ drang srong dak+Sha zhes pa la bu mo bcu gsum yod pa las/ di ti zhes pa ni lha ma yin rnams kyi dang po'i ma'o/ /dbang po'i sgra zhes
64a3(mdo 'grel): kyang bya'o/ /pa sangs slob ma ni lha ma yin gyi bla ma gza' pa sangs so/ /sngon gyi lha ni lha'i gnas lha ma yin rnams kyi yin pa la/ de las lha rnams kyis phrogs nas/ lha ma yin rnams ri rab kyi rmad na mar skyod zhes grag go/ lta rnams smod ni/
64a4(mdo 'grel): lha la ngan smras brjod pa'o/ /de rnams lha ma yin spyi tsam gyi ming ngo/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci tsam gyi mtshan no/ /bde gshegs ni/ ye shes kyis legs par gshegs pa la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
64a5(mdo 'grel): ni shes bya mdza' dag khong du chud pa la sogs pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ni ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ chos kyi rgyal po ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bas chos kyi rgyal po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar byon pa
64a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dbang phyug la sogs pa drug dang ldan pa'o/ /bdud 'dul ba ni nyon mongs pa la
64a7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa bzhi 'dul ba'o/ /'jig rten rgyal ba po ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa la byams pa'o/ /mngon shes drug ldan ni/ /lha yi spyan dang rna ba dang/ /gzhan sems shes dang sngon gnas dran/ /zag pa zad shes rdzu
64b1(mdo 'grel): 'phrul shes/ zhes so stobs bcu pa ni/ gnas dang gnas ma yin mkhyen pa la sogs pa ste/ lung rnams las shes par bya ste/ 'dir gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bshad do/ /gnyis med gsung ni/ mdza' gnyis dang bral bar gsung ba'o/ /rnam
64b2(mdo 'grel): par 'dren pa ni sems can rnams 'dul zhing phan pa'i chos gsungs pa'o/ /thub pa'i dbang po ni thub pa rnams kyi rgyal po'o/ /dpal stug ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang/ rin po che'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid ni dpal lo/ /sdug pa ni
64b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa'o/ /ston pa ni sems can 'dul zhing chos ston pa'o/ /thub pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi chos mdza' dag gsung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa rnams ni lung las shes par bya ste/ 'di rnams sangs rgyas spyi tsam gyi rnam grangs so/ /tshigs su
64b4(mdo 'grel): bcad pa gcig gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i mtshan no/ /shAkya'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i phyir na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ shAkya ni bu ram shing pa'i rigs las byung ba'i rgyal po ka tsa na zhes bya ba'i bu phas nags su skrad pas/
64b5(mdo 'grel): sngags der thub ba ser skya zhes bya ba la brten nas de na shing shAkya zhes pa'i drung na gnas te/ ser skya'i slob mar gyur te rig pa dang ldan no/ /de ni shAkya zhes grags so/ /shAkya'i seng ge ni gtso bo'o/ /don rnams grub ces pa ni/ 'di 'khrungs pa'i dus
64b6(mdo 'grel): su rin po che'i gter dpag tu med pa byung zhing/ thams cad kyi don rnams grub pas don grub ces grags so/ /zas gtsang sras ne skyon dang ma 'dres pa'i kha zas la spyod pa ste de'i sras so/ /gau tam ni thub pa ser skya'i rigs su skyes pa'o/ /de'i slob ma ni shAkya
64b7(mdo 'grel): gau ta ma ste/ go tra ni rigs la/ uta ma ni mchog go/ des na bla ma'i rigs dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /zas gter 'jigs skyob rigs sbyin dang/ /skyed byed bag gter lnga bo pha/ zhes grangs can pa'i gzhung las so/ /nyi ma'i gnyen dang/ lha mo sgyu
65a1(mdo 'grel): 'phrul sras rnams te/ rgyas par ni lung las shes par bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi tshangs pa'o/ /'di la lus khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ gang zag gi lus tshad med pa'i tshad yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bri ha ta zhes pa'i khams las
65a2(mdo 'grel): /brahma zhes 'byung ste/ de ni tshangs pa zhes btags te/ de'i lus kyi tshad khyab 'jug gi steng nas bltas/ 'og mar dbang phyug gis bltas kyang ma mthong zhes grag go /bdag skyes zhes pa ni las kyi rlung gis ma phangs pa'o/ /lha las rgan pa ni lha
65a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi che shos yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gnas rnams kyi mchog la gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi dang po'i pha rnams kyis skyed pas mes pho'o/ /gser kyi mngal ni/ dran pa'i gzhung las/ khyab 'jug rang byung bcom ldan gyis/ /skye dgu sna tshogs
65a4(mdo 'grel): sgrub don pas/ der ni chu rnams bskyed byas nas/ de las sa bon rab tu 'phangs/ /gser gyi mdog rab mdzes pa yi/ /sgo nga chu las rab byung ste/ /de las mchod sbyin rab byung ba/ /tshangs pa rang byung rnam par grags/ /gser gyi mdog can de nyid
65a5(mdo 'grel): la/ /bcom ldan de ni lo gcig nas/ /sgo nga dum bu gnyis gyur pas/ /steng dang 'og tu de las chags/ zhes so/ /des na steng dang 'og gi 'jig rten no/ /des na gser gyi mngal lo/ /'jig rten dbang gi gtso bo'o/ /rang byung zhes kyang bya'o/ /gdong
65a6(mdo 'grel): bzhi ni tshangs pas theg le mchog ma zhes pa'i bu mo zhig sprul pas/ /de la rang yid cags ste bu mo phyogs bzhir song ba la bltas bas/ gdong pa bzhi byung ngo/ /steng gi phyogs su song ba la bltas pas steng gi gdod pa dang lnga byung ngo/ /dbang
65a7(mdo 'grel): phyug gis nam mkha' nas bltas pas mthong nas der ngo tsha ba'i tshad las la steng gi gdod pa bcad de/ des gdong pa bzhi par grags so/ /byed pa po zhes kyang grags so/ /khyab mjug gi lte ba'i pad+ma las skyes so zhes kyang 'byung bas pad+ma'i skye gnas so//
65b1(mdo 'grel): nyes can ni/ rang gis sprul ba'i bu mo la chags pas na/ steng gi gdod pa'ang bcad pas nyes can no/ /sna tshogs sgrub byed de ni khams gsum thams cad kyi byed 'phor 'dod do/ /pad+ma'i gdan zhes kyang bya'o/ /'byin byed ni/ 'gro ba thams cad de las
65b2(mdo 'grel): byung bar 'dod do/ /skye dgu'i bdag po ni/ skye 'gro thams cad kyi gtso bo'o/ /rig byed pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /rnam byed ni khams gsum gyi sgrub pa la'o/ /sna tshogs byed ni lha tshangs pas bskal ba chags pa'i dus su skye bo gzhan yang bdag gis
65b3(mdo 'grel): bskyed par bya'o bsams pa las byung ba'o/ /de rnams kyis tshangs pa'i ming rnams so/ /phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhis khyab 'jug go /khyab 'jug ces pa ni 'gro ba mdza' dag de yis khyab cing bcings pa'i phyir na khyab 'jug go /nag po ni
65b4(mdo 'grel): kha dog gi yon tan sbyor bas nag po'o/ /mi'i bu mo zhes pa ni lam sna brten pa de lam thams cad kyi byed pa por 'dod pas mi'i bu mo'o/ /a shwat+tha thos ni baSh+Ti ra'i shing drung na gnas par thos so/ /rtul mo'i bu ni khyab 'jug gi ma'i ming gis te
65b5(mdo 'grel): pi kun tha zhes pa las skyes so/ /dbang po'i dbang phyug ni dbang po lnga rnams kyi bdag po'o/ /me tog lto ni lha mo grags ma zhes pa khyab 'jug gi chung ma'o/ /des me tog gi phreng ba mgo la 'jog par 'dod pa la ma bsleb par lto bar gzhag go /des
65b6(mdo 'grel): mtshon pa ste me tog lto can no/ /sgra can gsod ni/ lha ma yin sgra can zhes pa khyab 'jug gi gsod zhes grag go /skyes bu sbrang rtsi zhes pa'i rigs las rgyud nas byung bas sbrang rtsi'i bu zhes grag go /skye bo rnams rang gis bsad cing bdag nyid kyis
65b7(mdo 'grel): 'don pa'i phyir na bdag skyes so/ /sbyin sgra ni lha ma yin sbyin byed de yis bsad pas na sbyin dgra'o/ /pad dkar mig ni khyab 'jug gi drag po mchod pa'i phyir pad+ma dkar po stong gis gtor ma'i gzugs byas la/ drag pos gcig spas pa la 'dis rang gi
66a1(mdo 'grel): mig gcig phyung te/ pad+ma dkar po'i gnas su bzhag pas/ des na pad+ma dkar po'i mig ces grags so/ /mkha' lding rgyal po'i mtshan ni/ bya khyung gi rgyal mtshan no/ /glang rdzi ni/ ba lang skyong ba'i rigs su gyur pa na char
66a2(mdo 'grel): chen po bab pas 'dis ri bo bteg nas bsrungs pas/ de'i 'og tu bram ze rnams kyi ba lang skyong ba'i dpon du brkos so/ /mi 'dzag ces pa ni khyab 'jug gi go 'phang thob nas mi ltung pa'o/ /gos ser can ni de'i gos ser po'o/ /rwa gzhu can ni
66a3(mdo 'grel): shAM gi zhes bya ste/ khyab mjug kho na'i gzhu'i ming ste/ bdag po nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /sna tshogs sde ni 'gro ba mdza' dag khyab 'jug gi byas pa'i phyir sna tshogs sde'o/ /'gro ba 'joms pa ni rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i lha ma yin 'dis bsad
66a4(mdo 'grel): pas ngan 'gro 'joms pa'o/ /yang na 'dis bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus su 'gro ba mthag 'dis chad ces gzhan dag 'dod do/ /steng gi dbang po ni/ sa gzhi'i steng gi bdag po zhes 'jig rten na grags so/ /lha'i dbang pos kyang bdag gi steng na
66a5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i dbang phyug ni steng? gi dbang po'o zhes grags so/ /dbang gzhan skyes ni/ lha'i dbang po'i nu bo ste/ lha rnams kyis dgra zhes lha ma yin rnams bsad pas dbang po gzhan skyes so zhes grags so/ /lag pa ni bzhi'o/ /'khor lo'i
66a6(mdo 'grel): phyag ni g.yas dang po na 'khor lo'o/ /pad+ma'i lte ba ni khyab 'jug gi lte ba'o/ /de rnams nye bar spyod pas mtshon pa'o/ /sprang rtsi'i sgra ni lha ma yin sbrang rtsi'i dgra'o/ /gnas gang dang gang du gnas pa kyang khyab 'jug gis khyab pas 'dug gnas lha'o//
66a7(mdo 'grel): gom gsum gnon zhes pa ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan la khyab 'jug gis mi'u thung ngu byas te/ sa gzhi gom pa ngo blangs pas/ gsum yang khyer zer bas lus bskyed de ri rab dang rgya mtsho'i mthil la rkang pa gnyis bzhag nas/
