87a6(mdo 'grel): ni tsu la yang rgyas pa mthong/ /bdag shi min pa 'di ni ci/ /de gyu chu 'dzin bgrod pa ni/ /mi bzang pa dag nyer bkod nas/ /'bras bu 'chi ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /de ni 'bras bu 'gog pa'o/ /gal te gshegs na gshegs par mdzod/ /khyod kyi bgrod pas
87a7(mdo 'grel): bdag la ni/ gdung ba yun ring 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'di la khyod ni dogs mi 'tshal/ /zhes pas 'chi ba gsal byed pas/ /rjes gnang nyid kyi sgo nas ni/ /mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/ /de ni rjes gnang 'gog pa'o/ /nor ni mang po rnyed 'gyur zhing/ /lam phu yang ni bde
87b1(mdo 'grel): zhing dge bdag srog la yang the tshom med/ /'on kyang mdza' bo 'gro mi bya/ /mdza' bo 'gro bar sbyor ba yi/ /rgyu rnams dag ni rab bshad nas/ /dbang nyid kyis ni de 'gog pa/ /'di 'dra dbang gis 'gog pa'o/ /bdag ni gson re stobs dang ldan/ /nor gyis bsam pa
87b2(mdo 'grel): stobs ldan min/ /mdza' bo gshegs sam bzhugs lags sam/ /rang gi gnas skabs smos pa lags/ /gang phyir 'di ni chags ldan mas/ /mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed cing/ /ma gus bzhin du tshig sbyar ba/ /'di ni ma gus pas 'gog pa'o/ /
87b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo gal te gshegs na bzhud/ /khyod kyi lam ni shis gyur cig /gang du khyod ni gshegs pa der/ /bdag kyang skye ba nyid gyur cig /de ltar shes brjod lam gyis gang/ /rang gi gnas skabs gsal byed mas/ /mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa/ /
87b4(mdo 'grel): 'di ni shis brjod kyis 'gog pa'o/ /gal te khyod 'gro bden nyid na/ /khyod kyis gzhan yang 'ga' zhig tshol/ /bdag ni glags tshol 'chi ba yis/ /de ring nyid du 'gog par 'gyur/ /gang phyir mdza' ba'i dbang gyur mas/ /mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa//
87b5(mdo 'grel): tshig rtsub yi ge sngon 'gro can/ /'di ni rtsub mos 'gog pa'o/ /gal te gshegs na myur du bzhud/ /phyi nas gnyen 'dun 'khrugs pa'i khas/ /bsgrags pa'i tshong 'gro ba yi/ /bgegs gyur khyod kyi rna bar 'ong/ /gang phyir 'dir ni shin tu ni/ /chags ma
87b6(mdo 'grel): grogs nyid byed pa yis/ /mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog pa 'di/ /grogs nyid kyis ni 'gog pa'o/ /bzhud ces khyod dgyes brjod 'dod de/ /bdag nyid dga' bar byed pa'i tshig /ma gshegs zhes pa kha nas ni/ /byung bar gyur la bdag ci byed/ /mi 'dod
87b7(mdo 'grel): dngos la 'bad byas pa'i/ /'bras bu phyin ci log skyes pas/ /don med nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ /de ni 'bad pas 'gog pa'o/ /skad cig lta ba'i gegs byed pa'i/ /rdzi ma bskyod pa la khro ba/ /khyod kyi mdza' bo 'gro bo smras/ /bdag ni de yi 'dod pa 'dod//
88a1(mdo 'grel): gang phyir mdza' bo'i gzhan dbang ma/ /de yid bgrod pa 'gog byed pa'i/ /don 'di nye bar gsal byed phyir/ /'di ni gzhan dbang 'gog pa'o/ /mgon po 'bral ba bzod par bgyi/ /gang gis mig bgos bdag la ni/ /'dod pas bsnun du mi
88a2(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i/ /mthong min mig sman bdag la stsol/ /'tsho ba'i thabs ni dka' ba dag /nye bar bkod nas bdag po ni/ /'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'i phyir/ /'di 'dra thabs kyi 'gog par brjod/ /jo bo khyod kyi zhal nas tshig /bdag 'gro zhes pa nges par 'byung//
88a3(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo dman pa khyod kyis de/ ma'i? phyin na yang bdag la ci/ /mdza' ba rgyas pas ma bsdams pa'i/ /bdag nyid khro bas mdza' bo yi/ /'gro bar tsom pa bzlog pa dang/ /'di ni khro bas 'gog pa'o/ /ma bsnos bu mos rna ba la/ /ma byas chang la ma btab par/ /khyod kyi
88a4(mdo 'grel): dgra yi rdzing nyid du/ /utpal sngon po zegs par gyur/ /mya ngan bcas bzhin utpa la/ /de 'os las ni bzlog byas nas/ /mya ngan 'os pa'i skabs ston phyir/ /'di ni mya ngan gyis 'gog pa'o/ /don ni 'ga' yang tshogs ma byas/ /rigs pa 'ga' yang ma bsgrubs
88a5(mdo 'grel): shing/ /dka' thub 'ga' yang ma bsags par/ /ne tshod mdza' dag song bar gyur/ /gang gi phyir 'dir ni tshe song bas/ /don sgrub la sogs log pa ni/ /'gyod pa gtso bor ston byed pa/ /'di ni 'gyod pas 'gog pa'o/ /ci 'di ston gyi chu 'dzin nam/ /yang na dad? pa'i
88a6(mdo 'grel): tshogs sam ci/ /sgra ni skad gdub kyi 'dra ba/ /thos pas de ni chu 'dzin min/ /chos ni dad pa la yod cing/ /sprin gyi rigs la ma rag pas/ /gang zhig the tshom zlog byed pa/ 'di ni the tshom 'geg pa'o/ /bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid pad+ma la/ /sdang zhing snun pa'i dkar 'bras can/ /
88a7(mdo 'grel): khyod gdong zla ba 'di yod bzhin/ /zla ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ /phal pa'i zla ba la brten pa/ de mtshungs yon tan bstan byas nas/ /gtso bo'i zla ba 'gog byed pa/ /rnam pa de ltar sbyar bas 'gog /thams cad mnan yang khyod kyi ni/ /rnam gnon tshim pa med pa mtshar//
88b1(mdo 'grel): yang na bsrag za 'bar ba la/ /tshim pa dag ni nam zhig mthong/ /gang phyir 'dir ni don gzhan dag /de yis chos mtshungs bstan byas nas/ /yang mtshan rtsom pa 'gog byed pa/ /'di ni don gzhan 'gog pa'o/ /sbyin pa po zhes nam yang ni/ /mi dbang khyod la ma bstod de/ /gang phyir
88b2(mdo 'grel): slong bas khyod kyi nor/ /rang gi nyid du bsams nas len/ /zhes pa la sogs 'gog pa yi/ /rgyu 'gog pa zhes bshad pa ste/ /phyogs 'di nyid kyis rnam par rtog/ /gzhan rnams dag kyang dpag par nus/ /gang zhig dngos dga' rab bkod nas/ /de yi sgrub byed nus pa can/ /dngos po
88b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag 'god pa de/ /don gzhan bgod par shes par bya/ /kun khyab khyad par la gnas dang/ /sbyar ba can dang 'gal ba can/ /mi 'os byed dang 'os pa'i bdag /'os dang mi 'os bzlog pa'o/ /'di yi dbye ba de lta sogs/ /sbyor ba rnams la rab tu mtshon/ /'di rnams rang bzhin
88b4(mdo 'grel): gsal bya'i phyir/ /dper brjod phreng ba bstan par bya/ /legs ldan 'gro ba rnams kyi mig /nyi ma dang ni zla ba yang/ /nub par 'gyur ba nyid la ltos/ /nges pa la ni su yis 'gongs/ /chu 'dzin 'di dag lus can gyi/ /yongs su gdong pa 'phrog par byed/ /bdag thob min
88b5(mdo 'grel): nam chen po rnams/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi slad du'o/ /ma la ya yi rlung gi ni/ /'jig rten dga' ba skyed par byed/ /dA k+Shi n+ya ni phun tshogs pa/ /kun gyi snying sdug ma yin nam/ /mtshan mor byed 'di dri ma dang/ /ldan yang 'gro ba dga' ba bskyed/ /gnyis skyes dbang po
88b6(mdo 'grel): skyon ldan yang/ /gzhan dag rjes su 'dzin par nus/ /sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa'i mgrin snyan las/ /byung ba bud ba'i sgra dag kyang/ rna bar rtsub pa nyid 'gyur ba/ /'dod ldan rnams kyi sdig 'di 'dra/ /chu skyes 'dab ma'i mal stan 'dis/ /bdag gi lus ni gdung bar byed//
88b7(mdo 'grel): sreg pa'i bdag nyid sreg za dang/ /'dra bas rigs pa ma yin nam/ /bsil zer can gyis nyams byed mod/ dpyid kyi bdag ni ci la gdung/ /dri ma can gyis spyod pa'i las/ /dag pas mi 'os pa yin nam/ /ku mud ldan yang sreg byed na/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas cis mi byed de//
89a1(mdo 'grel): zla bas bzung rnams rtsub pa ma/ nyi mas bzung ba 'jam mi 'gyur/ /sgras zin pa 'am rtogs pa yis/ /dngos po gnyis ni mtshungs gyur pa/ /der ni g.yo ba brjod pa gang/ /der ni bzlog pa can zhes brjod/ /brten dang che ba'i bdag nyid dang/ /lA ba N+ya sogs
89a2(mdo 'grel): yon tan gyis/ /khyod dang rgya mtsho mtshungs tha dad/ /khyod lus 'di 'dra nyid kyis so/ /gcig la gnas pa'i chos kyis ni/ /gnyi ga la gnas tha dad dag /rtogs pa'i yul du gyur pa'i phyir/ /'di ni gcig gi ldog pa can/ /chu yi phung po dag dang khyod/ /mtshams las
89a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'da' zab pa ste/ /'di ni mig sman dang mtshungs la/ /khyod ni gser gyi 'od can no/ /gang phyir 'di ni gnyi ga yi/ /'byed byed yon tan nag po dang/ /ser po gnyis gas tha dad bstan/ /'di ni gnyi ga'i sdog pa can/ /khyod dang rgya mtsho du nA ro/ /sems can chen
89a4(mdo 'grel): po brjid dang bcas/ /'di yis khyed gnyis tha dad de/ /de ni chung bdag khyed mkhas so/ /'di ni sbyar ba'i tshul ldan phyir/ /sbyar ba can zhes bzung bar mdzod/ /'gog pa can dang gtan tshigs can/ /gnyis po de yang bstan par bya/ /lugs dang ldan zhing brtan pa dang//
89a5(mdo 'grel): rin chen 'byung gnas yin mod kyang/ /dri ma ldan pa chu srin gnas/ /khyod kyi 'gran zlar gyur ma yin/ /ri gling rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/ /sa ni mdza' dga' 'dzin mod kyang/ /lag 'gro rnams kyi rjer gyur phyir/ /lhag ma can ni khyod pas dam na/ /sgra dag 'jug par
89a6(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa yi/ /lhog pa can ni 'di 'dra ste/ /rtogs par gyur ba mtshungs pa yang/ /yod pa de ni rjes su sgrub/ /khyod kyi gdong dang pad+ma ste/ /'di gnyis kyi ni khyad par yang/ /pad+ma chu las skyes pa dang/ /khyod gdong khyod la brten pa'o/ /ri dags mig la smin
89a7(mdo 'grel): sgeg dang/ /myos pa'i dmar bas reg pa med/ /khyod kyi mig ni gnyis po 'di/ /yon tan de dag nyid kyis brgyan/ /snga mar dbye ba tsam zhig brjod/ /'dir ni lhag pa nyid bstan to/ /slar yang mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can/ /gzhan dag rab tu bstan par bya/ /
89b1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi gdong dang pad+ma dang/ rgyas shing dri bzang ldan pa ste/ /pad+ma la ni bur ba 'khor/ /khyod kyi gdong la mig rab g.yo/ /zla ba 'di ni mkha' i brgyan/ /ngang pa 'di ni chu yi rgyan/ /mkha' 'di rgyu skar phreng ba can/ /chu 'di ku mud rgyas pa can/ /'dir ni zla ba dad pa dag/ dkar ba nyid sogs
89b2(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa dang/ /mkha' dang chu ni dag par yang/ /rtogs byar mtshungs pa'i dbye ba byas/ /snga ma la ni sgra ldan mtshungs/ /gnyis ka yang ni tha dad byed/ /bud ba meg la sogs pa mtshungs so/ /de phyir mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can/ /rin chen snang bas mi 'phrogs shing/ /nyi ma'i 'od
89b3(mdo 'grel): kyis mi ldog pa/ /lang tsho las byung na chung gi /mun pas lta ba 'gog par byed/ /mun pa'i rigs las mun pa 'di/ /lta ba 'gog pa nyid kyis mtshungs/ /gzhan dag gis ni tha dad bstan/ /'di ni rigs mthun ldog pa can/ /rab tu zags pa'i rgyu bzlog nas/ /gang zhig rgyu gzhan
89b4(mdo 'grel): cung zad dam/ /gang du gang gis ngo bo nyid/ /ston pa de ni srid pa can/ /ma 'thungs myos pa'i kA dam pa/ /ma phyis dri ma med pa'i mkha' / /drungs par ma byas dang ba'i chu/ /'gro ba'i yid ni 'phyog par gyur/ /sman ma bskus par dkar min mig/ /mnan pa min par smin mang ma'/ /tshon ma
89b5(mdo 'grel): bsgos par dmar ni/ /mdzes ma khyod kyi chu 'di'o/ /gang zhig ma 'thungs la sogs skyes/ /myos pa nyid sogs rgyu gzhan can/ /rgyu med dag kyang brjod 'dod pa/ /de la 'dir ni 'gal ba med/ /bgos pa min par kha dri zhim/ /bcos pa min par lus po mdzes/ /rgyu med dag tu zla ba dgra/ /rgyu
89b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan med par de dag grogs/ /bgos pa med tshig gis 'dir/ /rgyu ni dngos su rab bzlog cing/ /dri zhim nyid srogs 'bras bu brjod/ /de phyir de ni srid pa can/ /dngos po 'ga' zhig nyer bkod nas/ /de dang mtshungs pa'i dngos po gzhan/ /bsdus pa'i tshul gyis brjod byed
89b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de ni bsdus pa brjod par 'dod/ /byung ba ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /pad+ma rgyas la sbrang rtsi 'thungs/ /dri zhim rgyas pa ma yin yang/ /me tog kha ma bye sbyor ltos/ /chags ldan bud med dar ma la/ /dga' ba'i rtse dga' bcings pa dag/ bu mo 'ga' zhig dag la 'dir/ /'dir la 'phel
90a1(mdo 'grel): ba ston par byed/ /khyad par can tsam tha dad cing/ /khyad par rnam pa mtshungs pa'ang yod/ /khyad par tha dad tha dad min/ /'di ni gzhan pa dag kyang yod/ /rtsa brtan 'bras bu'i khur gyis ni/ /slong rnams rtag tu rgyas par byed/ /grib ma snun pa'i
90a2(mdo 'grel): ljon pa che/ /'di ni bdag gi yang dag thob/ /yal ga'i khyon ni mi chung zhing/ me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /dam pa'i grib bsil brtan ldan ba'i/ /shing 'di skal bas bdag gis rnyed/ /gnyi ga la yang skyes bu 'ga' / /ljon ba nyid kyis nye bar bsngags
90a3(mdo 'grel): ches rnams thams cad snga ma la/ /thun mong gzhan la rnam pa gnyis/ /sprul ngan 'grogs pa dang bral zhing/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mngar ba'i nang/ /kye ma chu yi gter 'di ni/ /dus kyis yongs su skam par gyur/ /rgya mtsho la ni dam tshungs pa/ /skyes bu'i ldog
90a4(mdo 'grel): pa gsal byed cing/ /snga ma'i chos ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /'di ni sngon med bsdus par brjod/ /khyad par gyi ni brjod 'dod gang/ /'jig rten mtshams las brgal gyur pa/ /phul du byung bas brjod pa 'di/ /rgyan gyi dam pa yin te dper/ /mal+li kA ya phreng tshogs
90a5(mdo 'grel): can/ /lus kun khyab pa'i tsandan gshar/ /dkar ba'i gos can sngon 'gro ma/ /zla ba'i 'od ni mtshon ma yin/ /zla ba'i 'od ni lhag pa nyid/ /khyad 'phags ldan brjod de bzhin du/ /the tshom phul byung la sogs kyang/ /gsal byed cung zad bstan par bya/ /dga' 
90a6(mdo 'grel): ma khyod kyi nu ma dang/ /dbyi yi bar na skeng pa ni/ /yod dam med ces bdag gi ni/ /the tshom da dung bzlog ma gyur/ /ni taM ba ni khyod la ni/ /rked pa yod ces nges par nus/ /'o ma 'dzin pa'i khur gnas pa/ /rnam pa gzhan du srid pa min/ /khyod kyi grags pa'i phung
90a7(mdo 'grel): po ni/ /dpag nus min yang 'dir shong ba/ /sa skyong srid pa gsum gyi ni/ /khongs ngag e ma shin tu yangs/ /rgyan ni gzhan pa rnams kyi yang/ /ngag gi dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /phul byung zhes ni brjod pa 'di/ /gcig pu nyid ni dpung gnyen brjod/ /
90b1(mdo 'grel): sems ldan dag gam cig shos kyi/ /rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i tshul/ /gang du rnam gzhan rab rtog pa/ /nga ni rab rtog du rig dper/ /ti gung nyi mas gdungs pa yi/ /glang po dag ni mtshor 'jug pa/ /nyi ma'i phyogs gyur pad+ma rnams/ /gzhom par 'dod pa yin nam snyam//
90b2(mdo 'grel): khras dang btung dang bang rtsa dag /bza' phyir lag ldan chur 'jug pa/ /de ni khon lan glan phyir zhes/ /snyan ngags mkhan gyis rab brtags brjod/ /'di ni bdag gi ring ba dag/ 'gog byed rna ba'i rgyan zhes te/ /khyod kyi mig gi rna ba yi/ /utpal dag las 'gongs pa
90b3(mdo 'grel): 'dra/ /mig zur char ni ltang gyur pa/ /mig gi 'od kyi utpa la/ /reg gam min yang snyan ngag mkhan/ /de ltar rab tu brtags te brjod/ /mun pa lus la 'byug go bzhin/ /mkha' ni mig sman char 'bebs bzhin/ /zhes 'di yang ngo rab rtog pa'i/ /mtshan nyid ldan
90b4(mdo 'grel): pa shin tu mang/ /'dir ni gzhan gyi sgra yis 'ga' / /ting ba'i mdza' yis dpe ma yin/ /zhes pa yid ches su 'das nas/ /dpe nyid du ni 'khrul pa bskyed/ /dpe dang dper bya nyid dag ni/ /mtshungs pa'i chos la bltos pas na/ /'byug go dang ni mun pa'i?/ /chos 'di
90b5(mdo 'grel): mthong bar gyur ci/ /gal te 'byug pa nyid 'dod na/ /'jug go ces pa gzhan pa ci/ /de nyid chos dang chos can yang/ /zhes pa ma bsnyos 'chad ma yin/ /gal te byed po dpe yin na/ /bya tshig la 'di dbang bral 'gyur/ /rang gi bya sgrub mi nus pa/ /gzhan gyi
90b6(mdo 'grel): bltos byar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gi 'byug go 'di dang ni/ /mun pa mtshungs zhes smra na yang/ /lus la zhes pa ma 'bral to/ /de yang yon tan mtshungs par blta/ /dper na khyod gdong zla ba bzhin/ /zhes pas mdzes pa rtogs 'gyur te/ /de bzhin 'byug pa 'di la
90b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /'byug pa las gzhan rtogs ma yin/ /de phyir 'byug pa 'di dang ni/ /mun pa byed po lus kyang las/ /nye bar sbyar don skyes bu yis/ /de ltar rab brtags zhes 'dod bya/ /snyam dang dogs dang nges dang 'dra/ /min nam zhes pa la sogs pa'i//
91a1(mdo 'grel): sgra yis rab brtags gsal bar byed/ /bzhin 'di sgra yang de 'dra ba'o/ /rgyu dang phra mo cha dag ni/ /tshig rnams dag ni rgyan gyi mchog/ rgyu ni byed po shes byed de/ /de dag rnam pa du ma dper/ /ma la ya yi rlung dag ni/ /reg cing tsandan ljon
91a2(mdo 'grel): pa sar pa yi/ /yal 'dab skyong par byed pa 'di/ /kun gyi dga' ba skyed par byed/ /dga' ba skyed par 'os pa yi/ /rang bzhin nye bar sbyar ba 'dir/ /rgyan nyid du ni rab bstan te/ /ldog pa la yang de dang mtshungs/ /ma la ya yi chu rgyun la/ /reg cing tsandan
91a3(mdo 'grel): nags bskyod nas/ /rlung 'di 'gron pa rnams dag ni/ /nyams par bya phyir nye bar gnas/ /de ltar gyur pa'i rlung gis ni/ /'bral ba'i rim las byung gyur pa/ /skye bo yid 'ong ma sred la/ /nyams pa sgrub par byed par nus/ /'grub par byed dang rnam 'gyur la/ /
91a4(mdo 'grel): de nyid ltos rgyu nyid de/ /'thob bya'i las la phal cher ni/ /bya ba la ltos sgra nyid do/ /'grub par byed pa'i rgyu dag ni/ /bstan te lhag ma gnyis po ni/ /dper brjod gnyis ni bkod byas nas/ /shes par byed pa bstan par bya/ /lo 'dab gsar
91a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrungs nags tshal dang/ /dam skyes rab tu rgyas pa'i rdzing/ /zla ba rgyas pa 'dod pa yis/ /'gron po lta ba'i dug tu byas/ /khengs pa goms par bya'o zhes/ /grogs mo mdza' ba'i gnas bkod la/ /bu mo smin 'khyog mig yon gyi/ /mchu ni g.yo
91a6(mdo 'grel): zhing lta bar byed/ /nyi ma nub gyur zla ba mdzes/ /'dab chags rnams ni gnas su song/ /zhes pa 'di yang dus kyi skabs/ /go bar byed pa legs pa nyid/ /grogs mo khyod yid 'dod gzir ba/ /zla ba'i zer gyis mi bzlog cing/ /tsandan chu yis mi bzod
91a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /lus kyi drod kyi rtogs par bzla/ /zhes pa'i sbyor ba rnams la ni/ /yid 'ong shes byed rgyu dag mtshon/ /dngos med rgyu ni yid 'phrog pa/ /'ga' zhig rab tu bstan par bya/ /rigs pa dag ni ma goms dang/ /blo ldan rnams dang ma 'grogs dang
91b1(mdo 'grel): dbang po dag ni ma bsdams pas/ /mi rnams rab tu gdung par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i btam gyis nyos pa song/ /lang tsho yi ni rims dag nyams/ /rmongs pa zad cing sred pa 'phos/ /bsod nams gnas la yi dag byas/ /nags tshal 'di dag khyim ma yin/ /chu klung 'di
91b2(mdo 'grel): dag bud med min/ /ri dags 'di dag bu tsha min/ /de phyir bdag ni yid dga' 'o/ /shin tu ma brtags spyod pa ni/ /'phags pa rnams la yod ma yin/ /de phyir de dag rnams kyi ni/ /phun tshogs thams cad rtag tu 'phel/ /skyed tshal sahA kA ra rnams/ /snye ma ma
91b3(mdo 'grel): 'khrungs pa min na/ /'gron po rnams kyi med ni/ /til bcas khyor chu sbyin byar 'gyur/ /yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /'bras bu bskyed pa dag la 'dir/ /sngar med la sogs rang bzhin gyis/ /dngos po yi ni rgyu nyid do/ /ring 'bras de dang lhan cig skyes/ /de
91b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'bras ma thag skyes dang/ /rig min rigs pa byed ces pa/ /mtshar pa'i rgyu rnams grangs med do/ /'di dag sbyor ba'i lam rnams la/ /btags pa'i tshul la brten pa ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa dag mthong ste/ /de yi dper brjod ji ltar na/ /lus can khyod
91b5(mdo 'grel): mig zur zhes pa/ /rgyal byed lus skyes dag gi mtshon/ /gang de gzhan la rab 'phangs pa/ /de yis bdag gi yid kyang bcom/ /skyes bu lus skyes kyis myos pa'i/ /rnam 'phrul sna tshogs lhan cig nyid/ /bud med rnams la bu mo ni/ /yongs su nub pa'i na tshod skyes//
91b6(mdo 'grel): phyi nas 'od zer phar 'phros pas/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor shar/ /sngar nyid ri dags mig can gyi/ /chags pa'i rgya mtsho rgyas par gyur/ /lha gcig khyod kyi zhabs gnyis pa/ /dmar pa nyi gzhon gyis reg pas/ /rgyal po rnams kyi lag pa yi/ /pad+ma zum par byed
91b7(mdo 'grel): pa ci/ /khyod kyi zhabs sen zla ba yi/ /'od zer kun da dri med rnams/ /sa skyong rnams kyi lag pa yi/ /pad+ma zum par byed la dbang/ /zhes pa rgyu yi rnam rtog gi/ lugs ni 'di 'dra dag tu bstan/ /zur dang rnam pas mtshon pa'i don/ /phra phyir phra mo zhes pa bshad//
92a1(mdo 'grel): nam zhig 'u cag 'grogs 'gyur zhes/ /tshogs su brjod par ma bzod pa'i/ /mdza' bo reg nas bud med kyis/ /rtse dga' i pad+ma zum par byas/ /lus skyes dag gis gzir ba yi/ /mdza' bo dbugs dbyung 'dod pa yis/ /pad+ma
92a2(mdo 'grel): zum par byas pa las/ /'dir ni mtshan mo 'grogs par bstan/ /glu yi mdun sar khyod la mig/ gtad pa de gdong chu skyes la/ /chags pa rgyas par gsal ba yi/ /mdzes pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur/ /'dir yang rang bzhin ma brjod par//
92a3(mdo 'grel): dga' ba'i dga' ston 'dod pa dag/ nges par gnas pa nyid gyur pa/ /phra ma nyid las brgal ma yin/ cha ni cha yis dngos po yi/ /rang bzhin nges par gsal ba bsgrib/ /dper brjod nyid kyis 'di yi ni/ /rang bzhin nges par gsal bar bya/ /rgyal
92a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i bu mo la chags pa dang/ /slu long rgyas pas srung ba pos/ /rig par 'gyur la e ma mtshar/ /bsil ba'i rlung ldan yin par shes/ /ji ltar bu mo mthong nyid na/ /bdag la dga' ba'i mchi ma byung/ /rlung gis btsugs pa me tog gi rdul gyis
92a5(mdo 'grel): bdag mig sun phyung ngo/ /zhes pa la sogs skabs su ni/ /rgyan 'di shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /kha cig cha las smad pa 'am/ bstod pa byas pa cha zhes brjod/ /gang yid g.yul gyi dga' ston la/ /'dod ba'i dga' las kyang ma chags/ /gzi ldan
92a6(mdo 'grel): lang tsho yon tan can/ /rgyal 'di khyod kyi bdag por 'os/ /brtson 'grus khyad 'phags bstod pa 'dir/ /smad pa nyid de longs spyod la/ /rgyun tu spyod 'dod bu mo yi/ /bsam pa dag ni bzlog par nus/ /gnod pa rab zhil nyid kyi phyir/ /gang gis
92a7(mdo 'grel): snyan par smra ba bslabs/ /skye bo 'di ni brtse med g.yo/ /grogs mo de yis bdag la ci/ /skye bo grogs mos rab bstan khengs/ /chags phyir byed par ma nus nas/ /skyon ltar snang bas yon tan gang/ /snyan par smra ba nyid kyang bstan/ /dngos po rab tu
92b1(mdo 'grel): bstan pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du rjes ston pa/ /grangs dang rim pa bzhin zhes pa/ /grangs bzhin zhes pa rab tu brjod/ /khrus la tshur ni rab zhugs ma/ /khyod kyi 'dzum mig gdong mdzes ni/ /ku mud utpal pad+ma yi/ /brkus par nges so gzugs can ma/ /dga' ba mchog tu dga' 
92b2(mdo 'grel): bar bstod/ /nyams ldan yid 'ong nyams dang ldan/ /gzi brjid nga rgyal skyes pa ste/ /de gsum khyad 'phags dag dang ldan/ /go bandi khyod khyim 'ongs la/ /ding bdag dga' ba skyes pa gang/ /dga' ba 'di ni slar yang khyod/ /dus kyi 'ongs nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i dga' 
92b3(mdo 'grel): ba be du ngas/ /gzhan las min zhes rigs par smras/ /de las gus pa tsam gyis ni/ /rab bstan 'phrog byed shin tu bgyes/ /zla ba nyi ma rlung sa mkha' / /sbyin sreg byed pa'i me dang chu/ /zhes pa'i gzugs rnams bar rab bzlas nas/ /lha khyod lta bar ded kyis ci/ /mngon sum
92b4(mdo 'grel): byas ba'i lha la ni/ /rgyal po rgyal po'i go cha yis/ /dga' ba rab tu gsal byas gang/ /de yang dga' bar rjes rtogs bya// //shi 'o zhes ba pha rol tu/ /gang dang 'grogs phyir bdag 'chi 'dod/ /a bin+ta de bdag gis ni/ /skye 'di nyid la thob ci ltar/ /dga' 
92b5(mdo 'grel): ba nyid ni sngar bstan nye/ /ngo bo che ba nyid ldan pas/ /dga' ba sgog pa nyid 'gyur 'di'o/ /de phyir 'di ni nyams ldan tshig/ gang gis nag mo bdag mdun nas/ /skra nas bzung ste drangs gyur ba/ /bstan dga' sdig can thob pa 'di/ /skad cig 'tsho bar 'gyur ral ci/ /zhes
92b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'jigs sde dgra dag la/ /lta ba'i khro ba mchog gi mthar/ /'jebs pa drag po bdag nyid gyur/ /'di ni ro dang ldan pa'i tshig/ mtshor bcas sa las ma rgyal zhing/ /rnam mang mchod sbyin ma byas la/ /slong la nor rnams ma byin par/ /sa skyong du bdag ci ltar 'gyur/ zhes
92b7(mdo 'grel): pa spro ba khyad 'phags bdag/ dpa' bo'i nyams kyi bdag nyid gnas/ /nyams ldan nyid du gnas pa la/ /tshig 'di dag ni dbang ba yin/ /lus 'jam gang la pad+ma yi/ /mal stan dag kyang rtsub byed ma/ /lha mo de ni ro khang dag/ bsreg za ldan par ji ltar nyams/ /zhes pa snying rje 'os
93a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa/ /rgyan nyid du ni rab tu bshad/ /de bzhin gzhan yang dam pa dang/ /bzhad gang rmad byang 'jigs rung ngo/ /rgyu mas brgyan pa'i srin po rnams/ /mgro? med ro dang lhan cig tu/ /lag pa sbyar bas khyod dgra'i khra/ 'thungs shing 'thungs shing gar
93a2(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /grogs mo me tog ma rnying ma/ /khyod kyi nu ma'i ngos la ni/ /sen rjes sar pa chags pa di/ /stod g.yogs dag gis sgrib par mdzod/ /dga' tshal ljon pa 'di rnams kyi/ /'dab ma gsar pa gos bzang dang/ /me tog do shal la sogs brgyan/ /a la 'dab khang
93a3(mdo 'grel): bar gyur ba mtshar/ /de rtsom mo dag la me gnas pa/ /brgya byin gyi ni rdo rje gang/ /'di ni dran na lha min gyi/ /bud med mngal ni lhung byed pa/ /snyan la klong pa nyid min skyes/ /brjod bya yi ni nyams dag bstan/ /'dir ni nyams brgyad dbang byas te/ /tshig rnams nyams dang ldan
93a4(mdo 'grel): par bshad/ /bdag ni gnod pa byed po zhes/ /khyod kyi snying la 'jigs ma byed/ /bdag gi ral gri phyir phyogs rnams/ /nam yang 'joms par 'dod ma yin/ /zhes pa skyes bu dregs ldan 'gas/ /g.yul du gzhan ni bkag byas nas/ /gtong ba de lta bu la sogs//
93a5(mdo 'grel): gzi brjid ldan par shes par bya// //'dod na dngos su ma brjod par/ /de nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnam ba gzhan dag brjod pa gang/ /de ni rnam grangs brjod par 'dod/ /sa hAkA ra'i snye ma ni/ /gzhan gyi so 'di za bar byed/ /de ni bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /khyed
93a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis rang dgar 'dug par mdzod/ /grogs mo skyes phran phrang byas nas/ /de dag dus sar dga' ba yi/ /dga' ston sgrub tu gzhug 'dod pas/ /'ga' zhig de nas song bar gyur/ /bya ba 'ga' zhig rtsom pa la/ /skal pa yi ni stobs las kyang/ /de yi sgrub byed phun
93a7(mdo 'grel): tshogs gang/ /de ni kun tu phan par brjod/ /khengs pa gzhom phyir de yi ni/ /rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal ba/ /bdag la phan phyir dga' ba yi/ /'brug gi sgra ni grag par gyur/ /bsam pa 'am ni 'byor ba yi/ /chen po nyid ni bla med gang/ /de ni rgya chen zhes pa yi/ /rgyan
93b1(mdo 'grel): du mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod/ rlab Na yi mgo gcod pa'i/ /bya ba'i khur yang bzod pa gang/ /ra g+hu'i bu des bla ma yi/ /bka' las 'da' bar nus ma gyur/ /rin chen rtsig pa la 'phos? pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan brgya yis bskor gyur pa/ /langka'i dbang phyug de kho na/ /any+dza na bus dka' bas shes/ /snga mar
93b2(mdo 'grel): bsam pa'i bdag nyid che/ /'dir ni mngon par 'byor pa brling/ /rgya che gnyis po 'di dag kyang/ /gsal bar rab tu mtshon pa yin/ /bsnyon pa dag ni bsnyon byas nas/ /don gzhan cung zad ston ba ste/ /'dod pa dag ni mnga' lnga pa/ /ma yin sgro ldan stong phrag yod/ /tsandan zla 'od
93b3(mdo 'grel): de la du yi/ /lho phyogs dri yi bzhon pa 'di/ /ma yi rang bzhin sgro ba ste/ /gzhan gyi dor ni bsil zhes grags/ /'dod ldan gyis zhi gzhan la de/ /bsil bar khas blangs bdag nyid la/ /tsha ba nyid du rab bstan phyir/ /'di ni yul la bsnyon pa'o/ /bdud rtsi zag pa'i 'od zer can/ /zla ba zhes bar
93b4(mdo 'grel): bdag cag 'dod/ /don gyi bdag nyid 'di ni gzhan/ /dug zag zer dang ldan pa nyid/ /ces pa zla ba'i zla ba nyid/ /bzlog nas don gzhan bdag nyid ni/ /'dod pas gzir bas brjod pa'i phyir/ /'di ni rang bzhin bsnyon par 'dod/ /dpe yi bsnyon pa sngar nyid du/ /dpe rnams la ni rab bstan to//
93b5(mdo 'grel): de yis bston pa'i dbye ba rnams/ /mtshon bya dag la rgya cher mtshon// //sbyar ba gzugs gcig ldan pa'i tshig/ du ma'i don can yin par 'dod/ /de tshig tha dad min pa dang/ /tha dad tshig mda' rnam pa gnyis/ /'char ba la gnas mdzes pa can/ /dkyil 'khor la chags
93b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po 'di/ /'jam pa'i dbya yis 'jig rten gyi/ /yid ni rab tu 'phrog par byed/ /rgyal rigs lam lnga mi gnas pa/ /rgyal po skyon gyi 'byung gnas dang/ /bsdongs nas skyon mang dag gis bdag/ dga' med 'di ltar cis ma mnar/ /rgyu skar lam la gnas pa dang/ /mtshan
93b7(mdo 'grel): mor byed pa dang bsdongs nas/ /srod la yis ni bdag 'di ltar/ /dga' ba med par cis ma mnar/ /ang? k+Sha ta rgyal rigs na dgag ba yin pas dpe dang gzugs can 'gog pa dang/ /ldog ba can sogs spyod yul can/ /sbyar ba gong du bstan zin te/ /gzhan pa 'ga' zhig bstan
94a1(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /'ga' zhig bya ba tha dad min/ /gzhan pa bya ba 'gal min yod/ /'gal ba'i las can dag kyang gzhan/ /sbyar ba nges pa can yang yod/ /nges pa 'gog pa'i gzugs brjod dang/ /'gal min 'gal ba can yang ste/ /de
94a2(mdo 'grel): dag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /dper brjod dag la gsal bar 'gyur/ /'khyog cing yid 'ong rang bzhin can/ /chags pa gsal bar ston byed ma/ /bdzes mas bskul ba'i mig dang ni/ /pho nya mos kyang mdza' bo 'gugs/ /yid 'ong chags pa 'brel bar
94a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /'jam zhing myos pa'i gdangs snyan cing/ /khu byug sgra ni thos byas ste/ /dkar min mig can dag la 'khyung/ /chu ma dang sbyar 'phel ba yi/ /dmar ba rab tu ston byed cing/ /tsha zer can ni nub gyur te/ /lus skyes dag ni rnam par rgyal/ /ral gri nyid
94a4(mdo 'grel): la nis trid sha/ gzhu nyid la ni 'khyog po nyid/ /mi dbang 'di yi mArga Na/ /mda' rnams nyid la gnas pa yin/ /khyod kyis bsrungs la 'tsher ma ni/ /pad+ma'i yu ba nyid la'o/ /'on kyang chags can 'khrig pa la/ /'khyung par gyur pa rnams la'ang mthong
94a5(mdo 'grel): sa 'dzin ka Ta ka mang zhing/ /gzi brjid ldan pa nges par dar/ /mkhas pa skye rgyu'i bdag byung ste/ /rje bo nus pa 'dzin yang de/ /nyams med yin kyang chos spyod min/ /rgyal po yin yang zad mi shes/ /bde byed yin yang lag 'gro med/ /shes so
94a6(mdo 'grel): lha yang mkhas bral min/ /khyad par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ /yon tan rigs dang bya ba sogs/ /gang zhig ma tshang nyid ston pa/ /de ni khyad par brjod par 'dod/ /me tog gzhu can dag gi mtshon/ /rtsub ma yin rno 'ang min/ /de lta na yang 'di yis ni/
94a7(mdo 'grel): sa gsum rnams las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'di dag lha yi bu mo min/ /dri za'i rigs las byung ba'ang min/ /de lta mod kyi tshangs pa'i yang/ /dka' thub gzhom pa sgrub par nus/ /khro gnyer dag ni ma bsdus shing/ /so yi g.yogs kyang ma bskyod la//
94b1(mdo 'grel): mig kyang dmar por ma gyur par/ /dag yi rigs ni nyams par byas/ /shing rta med cing glang po'ang med/ /rta med rkang thang med par yang/ /zur mig nyid kyis bud med rnams/ /'gro ba gsum po dag las rgyal/ /shing rta 'khor lo gcig pa dang/ /kha lo ba nyams
94b2(mdo 'grel): rta mi mnyam/ /de lta na yang gzi brjid can/ /nyi mas 'gro ba gsum po mnan/ /gzi byin can zhes khyad par las/ /'di ni rgyu yi khyad par brjod/ /rim pa 'di yis gzhan gyi ni/ /dbye ba rnams kyang brtag par bya/ /brjod 'dod yon tan khyad 'phags dang/ /mtshungs par
94b3(mdo 'grel): byas nas 'gal zhig ni/ /stod smad la sogs bsgrags pa gang/ /de ni mtshungs par sbyor bar bshad/ /gshin rje lus ngan chu lha dang/ /mig stong pa dang khyod nyid kyang/ /'jig rten skyong ba zhes pa'i sgra/ /yul gzhan med pa rnam par 'dzin/ /ri dags mig dang
94b4(mdo 'grel): 'grogs pa dang/ /glog gi rtse dga' dag dang ni/ /sprin gyi rtsom pa'ang rang bzhin gyis/ /skad cig gnyis par mi gnas so/ /khyad par sgrub byed slad du ni/ /gang du dngos po 'gal ba rnams/ /yang dag 'grogs par rab bstan pa/ /de ni 'gal bar bshad de dper/ /dad pa'i
94b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal po rnam dag gi/ myos pa'i gdangs snyan ca co 'phel/ /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag ni/ /yid 'ong nyid dang bral ba nyams/ /dbyar skyes chu 'dzin dag gis ni/ /nam mkha' yul ngan lta bur spyod/ /chags pa yis kyang 'gro ba yi/ /yid ni kun tu chags par 'gyur/ /rked pa pra zhing ro smad sbom
94b6(mdo 'grel): mchu dmar mig ni dkar pa min/ /lte ba dma' zhing nu ma mtho/ /bud med lus kyis su ma bcom/ /pad rtsa'i lag pa chu shing brla/ /pad+ma'i gdong dang utpal mig/ khyod kyi gzugs kyis bdag cag rnams/ /gdung nus min nam lus can ma/ /skyes tshal rlung gis rab
94b7(mdo 'grel): bskyod pa/ /tsu ta tsa mra ka yi rdul/ /reg pa min yang 'gron po yi/ /mig la mchim rab zag byed/ /snyan par sgrogs na khyod kyi mig/ nag dkar rjes su dmar ba yang/ /rna ba dag la brten pa ni/ /su yi yid brtan nyid du 'gyur/ /de ltar rgyan 'di rnam pa ni/ /du ma
95a1(mdo 'grel): nyid du rab tu rtogs bya/ /skabs min 'dod pa bstong pa ni/ /skabs su ma bab bstod pa yi/ /gzhan mi bsten pa'i ri dags rnams/ /'bad med rnyed pa sla ba'i nor/ /chu dang rtswa yi myug sogs kyis/ /nags rnams su ni bde bar 'tsho//
95a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i rjes 'brang nyon mongs pas/ /yid 'byung yid dang ldan pas ni/ /skabs su ma bab nyid du 'dir/ /ri dags spyod tshul 'di dag bsngags/ /gal te smad pa bzhin bstod nas/ /skyon ltar snang ba'i yon tan nyid/ /gang du nye bar thob gyur pa/ /'di
95a3(mdo 'grel): na zol gyis bstod par bshad/ /rA ma dka' thub pa yis kyang/ /'byung po 'dzin pa 'di las rgyan/ /de nyid rgyal po khyod kyis kyang/ /'di la khyod ni rgyags ma mdzad/ /sngon gyi skyes bu las bcad nas/ /dpal ni khyod kyi yongs spyod pa/ /rgyal po bu ram shing
95a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgyud/ /khyod kyi 'di ni rigs ma tsi/ /khyod kyi btsun mo sa gzhi ni/ /lag 'gro longs spyod dag la chags/ /ci slang khyod kyi da rgyal ni/ /mchog gi mdza' ru 'dzegs par gyur/ /de ltar nye bar mtshon pa las/ /sbyar ba can dang gzhan dag gi/
95a5(mdo 'grel): zol gyis bstod pa'i rnam pa ni/ /rab tu rgya che ba mdza' dang bral/ /gal te don gzhan 'jug pa yi/ /de dang mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu 'ga' / /mchog gam mchog mi ston byed pa/ /de ni nges par bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma 'char pa nyid kyis ni/ /phun
95a6(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams kyi 'bras bu dang/ /grogs po rjes 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir/ /pad+ma rnams la dpal? ster byed/ /zla ba'i grer? gyis reg pa na/ /'phral la rgyal po dang 'gral? rnams/ /phan? pa'i mthar 'gyur bsal byed cing/ /mun pa'i phreng ba
95a7(mdo 'grel): nub bar 'gyur/ /yon tan las rnams lhan cig gi/ dngos po brjod pa lhan cig brjod/ /don rnams bsnal? ba gang yin pa/ /yongs rjes yin te de dgra? dper?/ /da ni mtshan mo 'di dag rnams/ /bdag gi dbugs dang lhan cig ring/ /zla ba'i rgyan ldan pa rnams
95b1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /bdag lus nyid dang lhan cig skya/ /'gron po rnams kyi rmongs pa dang/ /lhan cig tsu ta'i dog pa rgyas?/ /de dag dbugs rnams dang mnyam du/ /ma la ya yi rlung dag 'bag/ khu byug sgrogs pa'i skal bzang dang/ /nags kyi rlung ni dri bzang dang/ /dpyid nyin skye bo'i kun
95b2(mdo 'grel): dga' dang/ /lhan cig dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de ltar lhan cig brjod pa yi/ /dper brjod 'ga' zhig 'dir bas te/ /yongs su brjes pa'i rang bzhin yang/ /nges par bstan pa cung zad bya/ /so spyad rnams la mtshon bsnun pa/ /ster byed khyod kyi lag pa yis/
95b3(mdo 'grel): de dag grags pa ku mud dkar/ /yun ring dag tu bsgrub pa phrogs/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po la/ /smon pa shis pa zhes bya dper/ /ngag yid spyod yul ma yin pa'i/ /snang ba dam pas khyed la srungs/ /rjes 'gro med dang the tshom can/ /dag ni dpe rnams nyid la bstan/ /dpe
95b4(mdo 'grel): yi gzugs can dag kyang ni/ /gzugs can rnams la nges par bsgrags/ /rab rtog cha shas 'di yang ni/ /rab rtog dag gi dbye ba nyid/ /tha dad rgyan rnams bsres pa ni/ /spel ma dag tu brjod pa ste/ /yan lag yan lag can dngos kyi/ /skabs dang thams cad stobs
95b5(mdo 'grel): mtshungs nyid/ /ces pa'i lugs gnyis spel ma yi/ /rgyan dag la ni mtshon par bya/ /mdzes ma khyod kyi bzhin gyi dpal/ /pad+ma dag gis 'gog par byed/ /mdzod dang yu ba phun tshogs pa/ /'di la bya dka' ci zhig yod/ /rang bzhin brjod dang 'khyog brjod ces/ /dag gi
95b6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin tha dad gnyis/ /'khyog por brjod pa thams cad la/ /phal cher sbyar bas dpal rgyal byed/ /snyan ngag mkhan bsam dgongs pa ste/ /snyan dngags grub par gang gnas pa/ /rgyun gyi yul yod yon tan can/ /de ni dgongs pa can zhes brjod/ /dngos po yi ni
95b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams kun/ /phan tshun phan par byed pa nyid/ /don dang bral ba'i khyad par rnams/ /ma byas gnas su bsngags pa dang/ /brjod rim stobs las dngos po rnams/ /zas mo dag kyang gsal ba ste/ /de kun dgongs pa'i dbang gyur phyir/ /de dag dgongs pa can
96a1(mdo 'grel): zhes rigs/ /gang yang mtshams sbyor yan lag dang/ /'jug pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid sogs/ /lung gzhan dag tu brjod 'di yang/ /rgyan nyid du ni bdag cag 'dod/ /rgya che mdza' yas rab bsdus tshad du gyur pa yi/ /rgyan rnams dag gi lam
96a2(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid ni rnam par phye/ /rjod pa'i yul las 'das par yongs su gnas pa yi/ /khyad par rnams ni goms pa nyid kyi dbye ba nus/ /snyan dngags kyi me long las don gyi rgyan gyi yongs su bcad pa ste gnyis pa'o/ / //bar mchod dang bar chod dag/ yi ge tshogs pa
96a3(mdo 'grel): bskor ba ni //zung ldan de yang rkang pa yi/ /dang po bar mdza' spyod yul can/ /gcig nyis gsum bzhi rkang pa yi/ /zung ldan rnams kyi rnam rtog ni/ /thog ma bar mdza' bar dang mdza' / /bar dang thog ma thog mdza' kun/ /yang dag dbye ba las skyes ba/ /de rnams
96a4(mdo 'grel): dbye ba shin tu mang/ /de la bya sla bya dka' yang/ /'ga' zhig dag ni bstan par bya/ /grogs mo mdzad po'i skye bo la/ /khengs pa 'di dang bgrogs ma byed/ /bslus pa'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa'i/ /de nyid ngo tsha ldan par gyis/ /dad pa rnams kyi dregs 'dzems? pa//
96a5(mdo 'grel): sprin gyi sgra yis myos byed ni/ /dga' ma dang bcas bud med kyi/ /khengs bral yid la 'jug par byed/ chu gter bzhi yi ska rags can/ /sa yi lag dpya 'dzin la mkhas/ /khyod nyid thob nas da lta ni/ /skye dgu rgyal po bzang ldan gyur/ /rkang thang shing rta glang po dang/ /rta dang
96a6(mdo 'grel): bral ba khyod kyi dgra/ /'ga' zhig nags dang gzhan dag ni/ /lha rnams dag gi gnas su song/ /chu skyes gdong ldan mig gnyis kyi/ /rnam 'phrul yid 'ong 'di la ni/ /dpyid? gyi bud ba'i rnam 'phrul gyi/ /tso 'dri byed ba ci yin smos/ /'dod pa g.yul du dpa' ba yi/ /glang po
96a7(mdo 'grel): 'am gzung dka' rta med kyis/ /gang phyir bdag cag mthar byas pa/ /de phyir khyod kyi rnam gnon char/ /g.yul du rno bas mdzes pa yi/ /mi bdag khyod 'dras nor 'dzin ni/ /rgyal bar gyur te nor rgyun gyis/ /tshim pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /sa hA kA ra'i me tog
96b1(mdo 'grel): gsar/ /bdag yid mchog tu sred ldan byed/ /bu byug myos pa dag gi sgra/ /yid du 'ong ba 'dis kyang ngo/ /khyod la dmigs pa'i re ba dag/ ma bral 'di la de 'dra yi/ /gnas skabs lus ni 'jig byed pas/ /bud med 'dzeg nus ji ltar min/ /yal 'dab gsar pas mdzes pa yi/ /ljon pas
96b2(mdo 'grel): drangs pa'i gzhon nu rnams/ /pad+mar mngon phyogs bung ba yi/ /mig nas bzung ste 'gugs par byed/ /myos pa'i bzhad ni rab 'jug pa/ /rdzing gi chu la dkar ba yi/ /dang mo 'di yi ca co yis/ /bdag ni mthar byed zas su byed/ /dri bral zla ba'i cha dag dang/ /lhan cig ma la ya yi?
96b3(mdo 'grel): rlung/ /bdag dga' mi byed 'dod pa ni/ /mi zad dug gi rjes su 'gro/ /bdag bsten mi 'dod khengs pa can/ /do shal dang ldan 'phrog byed ma/ /lus med khyod kyi dong ba nyid/ /bdag 'gro bde bas phra mor mdzod/ /khyod kyi gdong gis bdag las rgyal/ /chu yi rgyun gyur bung pa can//
96b4(mdo 'grel): 'dab ldan pad+ma gtam med las/ /ji ltar mi rgyal bdag dga' ma/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis dmar gyur pa'i/ /tshu lha mo bzhin pA Ta la/ /dmar ba'i gos can dri bzang gnas/ /bdag gi dga' ma dga' bar byas/ /de ltar rkang pa'i thog ma yi/ /zung ldan rnam rtog bar chad med/ /da ni
96b5(mdo 'grel): bar du chod pa de'i/ /rnam rtog 'ga' yang bstan par bya/ /sa hA kA ra las 'khrungs nyid/ /yid 'ong dri bzang ldan pa yi/ /dbyid kyi e na'i mig can gyis/ /khengs pa sgra yi lhag mar byed/ /dga' ma'i lag pa shin tu dmar/ /rgyud mangs la bsnun rnam 'phrul dang/ /phrag
96b6(mdo 'grel): dog ldan par dgra po la'ang/ /rna ba'i utpal gyis bsnun byed/ /rlung gis gar bsgyur sprin gyi phreng/ /mdza' dag chu ni rnam par 'thor/ /de rjes mjug ma rab bslang ba'i/ /mjug sgro ldan ma gar dag byed/ /'dor ldan ma dag khyod kyi yid/ /khengs rtsod rang nyid nyams
96b7(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /nI pa'i ka li ka mthong nas/ /gnas skabs ci lo reg 'gyur ram/ /rtse dga' i ri la zla shel gyi/ /thang 'di la ni rab 'dzegs na/ /mdongs mdza' sgeg cing rab mdzes pa'i/ /gtsug phud can 'di gar byed do/ /gang zhig sprul mchog steng gnas shing/ /phag
97a1(mdo 'grel): pas phyung pa'i sa 'di ni/ /rgyal po'i tshogs las rab blangs nas/ da lta khyod kyi lag pas bzung/ /g.yul du dgra yi glang po rnams/ /byed kyi lag pa mthar byed kyis/ /bsnun pas khrag ni rab zags pa/ /thun mtshams dag gi
97a2(mdo 'grel): sprin bzhin snang/ /rlung gis ri yi shing phreng bzhin/ /gzhan gyi sde ni dpa' bos bcom/ /mdza' ni ga sheng mong ba bzhin/ /rdul gyis nam mkha' khyab par gyur/ /legs ldan chu 'dzin gsar pa'i 'od?/ /lha min dag gis rigs nyams phyed/ /myos
97a3(mdo 'grel): ldan glang po mchog bcom pa/ /khyab 'jug des khyod rtag tu srungs/ /khyed kyi mgo skra bung ba 'dra/ /gdong ni pad+mar phrag dog byed/ /dpal gyis bzhin du rab myos la/ /khyod kyi su zhig ci mi byed/ /rgya che rin chen rgyan dang ldan/ /myos pas mig 'khor dza g+ha na/ /chung ba min pas
97a4(mdo 'grel): mdza' bo ni/ /dga' ba ldan pa bya bar bzod/ gzhan gsos rnams kyis bsgrags pa dang/ /khyod kyi brjod pa'i sgra dang ni/ /lho yi phyogs kyi rlung gis kyang/ /bdag yid phrogs so pho nya mo/ /rked pa phra zhing rdul zags pas/ /gdong gi zla ba rab mdzes pa'i/ /bud med chang
97a5(mdo 'grel): gis ngo tsha bcom/ /skyes pa'i lus la 'jig par byed/ /de ltar bar tshod zung ldan gyi/ /rab tu dbye ba 'di yang bstan/ /bar chod ma chod bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam rtog kyang yod 'di lta ste/ /kA li ka 'phyang yal ga can/ /sA la blta bar nges mi nus/ /ba ku lar
97a6(mdo 'grel): chags bung ba dang/ /grogs mos pad+ma can yang min/ /sprin nag chen po ldan pa'i dus/ /snang dang rgyu skar kun mi mtshan/ /gsang mthor dga' ba sog byed pa/ /dus 'dra blta bar su yis nus/ thun gsum dbang gyur ring ba yi/ /mtshan mo yis ni bdag 'chir 'gro//
97a7(mdo 'grel): gang la bdag po srog gzir 'gro/ /de ni blo med bdag gis bcom/ /zhes rkang dang po zung ldan gyi/ /rnam rtog lug ni 'di 'dra ste/ /'di ltar kho na zung ldan gyi/ /rnam rtog gzhan pa rnams kyang ngo/ /spros pas 'jigs phyir dbye ba ni/ /mdza' dag brjod par
97b1(mdo 'grel): mi 'dod de/ /de la bya dkar mngon 'dod nyid/ /'ga' zhig yang ni bstan par bya/ /bstan rgyas dbang po rab bsdams pa/ /khyod ni sdom rtson phyir mi nyams/ /rgyu med gyur kyang khyod kyi bde// /'jig par mi 'gyur de snyed slang/ /rgyal po mdun sar sa yi lha
97b2(mdo 'grel): rnams dag gi zhal/ /chang gis ma bcom nor gyis mdzes pas rab bstod pa'i/ /khyod kyi yon tan rab gsal chags bdag skye dgu la/ /phung po nyid gyur lha rnams su ni mi 'gro min/ /dam pa'i spyod la bag med khyod kyi dga' ma gang/ /dga' 
97b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i dga' ston dga' pa'i khyed par gyis myos ma/ /de yis 'dir ni 'od ldan rgyan rnams bzung bar 'os/ /bdag la mdzes ldan nyid kyis 'bras bu 'ga' yang med/ /mgon po khyod ltas mdung pa'i ro ni mi mkhyen te/ /dman pa nyid dang
97b4(mdo 'grel): mchog nyid dag ni nges par 'gal/ /gang zhig dman pa rnams kyis khyod la mgos mdud cing/ /de dag kho na dman pa'i ro des mchog tu rgyu// /rol pa'i mdzum dkar ngag dang 'jam por smra ba dang/ /chung ngu'i lta ba dang ni lci ba'i
97b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba dang/ /rnam par rgyas pa'i dza g+ha na dag ston pas des/ /bsnun pa des na bdag ni 'tshe bas dman par gyur/ /dpal mo ldan mo shong khyab bdag brtan ldan gang gis bdag nyid ni/ /'chi med lam dang mnyam pa'i tshad ldan rab
97b6(mdo 'grel): 'dud pa'i/ /'gro ba rgyas byed la 'gro bas mchod par ldan tshad med ming can ni/ /mtshungs med khangs ldan sa 'dal zhes/ khyab 'jug gi ming ngo/ sos bzhi gcig du rtags gnas bya thob pa de la phyag mdzod/ /? nam mkha' dang gus cir
97b7(mdo 'grel): bcud la zhugs te la phan thogs? pas brang gis dga' byed cing/ kun gyi rang bzhin yin pas/ gang dang yang snying por ? zhes pa gyur pa'i bcud mang rab tu 'dzin/ gzhad kyi rjes mcha? lham yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan slus nas 'ching ba'i dus su sa gzhi goms pas 'dal bas
98a1(mdo 'grel): mtshungs sgra ldan 'og bag can/ /des ni bcud len snying po min par rig/ brtan rgyas tshul dang tshul min brtag pa 'di yis ni/ /tshul med dge ba thob la long rnams rnam par thul/ /bzhon pas mi 'gro rgyal ba'i theg 'gro dag gis gang/ /tshul mthob de
98a2(mdo 'grel): thob pa dag la brten pa bskyed/ /mtshungs med lci ba'i mtshon ldan g.yul du sa skyes ni/ /rgyal mtshan la gnas dpa' bo bya yi sgro yis bros/ /nyi ma bzhin du drag po'i 'phrog byed 'di mdun du /'jigs rung g.yul la dgra ni lug dang mtshungs par rig/ mtshan mo tshad med
98a3(mdo 'grel): thun ldan dpal med tshad med cing/ /mdza' ni bgrod bya min pas zang nang la brten nam/ /cha yi rang bzhin nang can 'bral ba'i nang kyis gzir/ /skal ldan ma 'di snying rje'i rang bzhin 'bral med mdzod/ /blo lang la med khyod kyi mnyam nyid bzlog pa nyid/ /ma yin bla med rjes su mi
98a4(mdo 'grel): mthun rjes su 'gro ma yin/ /gdung med khyod kyis thob pa mchog gi rjes su mthun pa nyid/ /dga' med 'dod med rnams kyi bzhed pa dag las rgyal/ /dus kyi dus kyi mgrin nag po nag nag po nyid dag 'dzin/ /snyan sgrog dag gi sgrog byed bung tshogs sprin nag dus ltar nag/ dus kyis
98a5(mdo 'grel): bzung min dus cha'i gtso bo chu 'dzin gyis mdzes su/ /dka' bas 'tsho ba'i bud med lan bu'i phrad bas mgo nag bsten/ /rkang pa gnyis kyis mdza' thog ni/ /rab sbyar zung ldan gnas skabs 'di/ /brjod pa'i khongs su 'dus mod kyang/ /rang dbang nyid kyis 'dir bshad do/ /myos pas
98a6(mdo 'grel): chags pa nye bar gnas kyang bud med des/ /bdag nyid ma sbyar bdag gi sdig pas khro ba yi/ /ro dang sbyar te lus med dag gis gdungs gyur kyang/ /bdag ni 'di snyed gdung ba'i slad du ma bsdad do/ /phyed bzlas yang dag sbyar ba yin/ 'di la dbye ba gsum du 'dod/ rkang pa zlas pa
98a7(mdo 'grel): 'ang du ma yi/ /bdag nyid de dag dpes gsal bya/ /skyes bu gtan gang spang bya ste/ /khengs pa rab spangs snying stobs can/ /khyed kyi mchog tu 'bad pa yi/ /yid brtan bya'o smod brtson nam/ /khyod kyi bgrod pa khyab bdag gzi byin gyis/ /yang yang rab sbyar mdzes pa med pa yi//
98b1(mdo 'grel): mi rnams tshul dang nga rgyal nyams byas nas/ /bcom zhing kyem byas bzos rnam par zhig /sgra yis sprin bgrod dbyar skyes rma bya yi/ /tshogs rnams mdzes pa nyid du nye bar gyur/ /rlung gi tshogs sdug bral ba chur sgrogs kyi/ /tshogs kyi sgra dngos bral ba nyid du gyur/ /'tsho ba'i dbang phyug
98b2(mdo 'grel): dud pa'i brang la kho ma ni/ /dman zhing khengs pa nges par bsgrub pa'i dbang gyur ma/ /brtse ba spangs pa'i bdag nyid yid kyi 'o ma 'dzin/ /gnyis po nye bar gtad nas kun tu ma 'khyud do/ /lha rnams 'dun pa stobs med khyab bdag gnas par ni/ /khyod kyi yon tan yang rtsa dri ma med pas
98b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzegs/ /de ni phyi nas grong bzang rnams kyi phun sum tshogs/ /brgyan pa'i bud med dag dang rnam par rtse zhing spyod/ /snyan smra lus skyed dud dang nu gnyis sam/ khyod las gzhan ba su zhig ma bcom de yi phyir/ /'byung po lus ldan skyon las grol ba khyod la sogs/ /bgrang ba la ni ming
98b4(mdo 'grel): med nye bar 'gro ba ma yin/ /khyod kyi dmag dpung khyab 'jug lta bu go bgos pa/ /mtshon rnon ldan pa dpa' bo dag gis phyogs rnams su/ /grags pa dang ni rdul dag rgyas byed g.yul gyis ni/ /dgra rigs lus bral gzi med rgyags la nyams par byed/ /dran ldan bdag las phan pa'i
98b5(mdo 'grel): tshig gcig mnyan par mdzod/ /khyod kyi lag pa dpal dang lhan cig lag 'gro yis/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor rnam 'dzin de phyir sa gzhi 'dzin/ /rang lag rig nas rgyags pa rgyas par yongs ma byed/ /'dod pa'i me gang khengs pas rab sgrubs pa/ /skad cig dang mnyam rgyas
98b6(mdo 'grel): des pad+ma'i mig/ ngo med khyod kyi bde ba de dag ni/ /kun nas nyams pa nyid du cis mi byed/ /ma dung khyod ni 'jig rten bdag gyur tshe/ /mthu yis mthu ldan rin chen mang 'dud byed/ /de phyir sar pa'i ltung ldan mchod sbyin ni/ /nges pa nyid du chang par ma gyur to/ /dpung gi glang po rnams ni
98b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dang gzhan/ /stobs ldan sgra sgrogs rab tu rgyud pa yis/ /thang las rdul bsgrubs nam mkha' 'gog byed cing/ /g.yul gyi stobs bzlog mchog tu gzhan la rgyug/ khyod lta mnyam par ma gzhag srid par ni/ /rnam gnyis mi mnyam phan pa med kyi tshig /leg par
99a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa sgrub byed mi mnyam pa/ /sgrul? bgrod mtshungs la mi dang ngo tsha med/ /dgra yi mdzes nyams rgyal po'i sde yis btud/ /u mas phan zhing dpal med min zla can/ /sde ldan mi btung rdul gyi min rje bo/ /skyes mchog mchod thob gyur pa/
99a2(mdo 'grel): go bgos mi mdzes min/ /de ltar rkang pa lhan cig dang/ gnyis dang gsum yang bzlas pa bstan/ /tshigs bcad gnyis ni don ldan pa/ /tshigs bcad bzlas pa yin te dper/ /zlum zhing rgyas pa'i dpung pa can/ /grogs min rab tu 'joms byed pa/ /rnam 'dren
99a3(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis bsten pa yi/ /mi mtshungs sa 'di 'jigs pa mang/ /'dren pa dag dang bral gyur cing/ /lag pa sreg khang nye gyur pa/ /rang grogs kyis btang dgra yis ni/ /mtshungs med sa 'di mngon par bsten/ /rkang bzhi rnam pa gcig pa gang/ /zung ldan chen por
99a4(mdo 'grel): brjod pa yin/ /de la'ang bzlas pa mthong ste de/ /zung ldan bya ba gzhan yin no/ /mnyam med dpal ldan mtshungs med mo/ /khengs ldan ngal ba dag dang ni/ /khengs pa mnyam ldan tshul min dag /dor ba'i tshang 'dris 'grogs par mdzod/ /'dzin ma 'dzin pa'i
99a5(mdo 'grel): rnam 'dzin 'dzin ma spyod rnams kyi/ /lag pa rnam gnon mi dman 'phral la dgra 'joms ma/ /myur ba dang ldan mchod pa'i khur 'di bsten pa yis/ /sa gzhi dag ni rim pas bsrung bar bzod pa yin/ /rkang phyed tshigs bcad spyod yul can/ /lugs
99a6(mdo 'grel): las bzlog pas bskar ba ni/ /zung ldan lugs las bzlog pa'i phyir/ /lugs las bzlog pa zhes par bshad/ /gang la 'dod? byas phra mo nyid/ /de ni bdag gis thob mdza' ? bo re re 'dod med pa byed med lha/ /bstad pa thob khyod 'gra gyur cig /nA da ldan bdag
99a7(mdo 'grel): rang gi blo/ /myos min 'dod pa 'ga' yang med/ /dul ba 'joms pa'i 'dod pa yi/ /rang dbang gdung ba dag kyang med/ /yid 'gro bdud sbyong? lcags mi dman/ /gang zhig dbang gyur skye bo 'joms/ /gang la bdag song yid 'ong brgya'i/ /dbang gyur de la byon
99b1(mdo 'grel): zhes smras/ /ston 'di yis ni gzir gyur cing/ /gtan 'di shes ba 'di yis ni/ /nyin ma'i nad kun mthob min/ /mya ngan bral slad khengs mi byed/ /gal te phyed kyi yi ge rnams/ /gcig gis bar tshed gzugs gcig nyid/ /de nyid bya dga' i de nyid rig/ ba lang gcin zhes smra ste/
99b2(mdo 'grel): dper/ /chang 'dra'i mig ldan zur mig gi/ mtshon can 'dod pa 'di rgyal te/ /gal te bdag kyang ldog bzad na/ /'dod pa la ni thal mo sbyar/ /gal te tshigs bcad phyed 'khor na/ /phyed du 'khor ba zhes par brjod/ /gal te kun tu 'khor ba na/ /kun du bzang po zhes par
99b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /mdung yang byung khyad par phyir/ /sde ni khengs ldan ma yin min/ /'jigs las dpag med nad med ma'am/ /bdag cag sdig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /zla dang lhan cig nad ring min/ /dga' ma bdud kyi rgyar ma ltung/ /bgrod bzlog sgra med stobs ldan ma/
99b4(mdo 'grel): skam rtse rnam de 'chi slad du'o/ /dbyangs dang gnas dang yi ge rnams/ /nges pa dang 'di bya dka' la/ /bzhi la sogs pa rab bstan 'di/ /gzhan ni bya sla dag tu 'dod/ /rig byed rnam thar tshig smras pas/ /glu dang bgegs 'jigs dga' ba yis/ /longs
99b5(mdo 'grel): spyod na? da? dang dga' ba dang rmongs/ /dge ba'i yul du sems 'dod gzung/ /sa las rnam rgyal lugs ni sgrub byed pa'i/ /brtul zhugs la dga' mchog rtogs rgyal po ku ru pas/ /g.yul du rang gi dgra yi rigs rnams ni/ /mche bar bkag cing
99b6(mdo 'grel): lce bar 'dar bar byas/ /dpal gzi ngo che grags dang/ /blo lugs tshig dang dga' dag khyod la 'phel ba gnyis? gang/ /'di gnyis lha dbang la med/ /? dang nad rim cis min gang/ /dga' ma bdud kyi rgyal ma ltung/ /bgrod bzlog dgra med dpal
99b7(mdo 'grel): nad ma/ /stobs ldan rgyu gnas 'chi smad du'o/ /'dren byed kun dga' skyed byed pa/ /rgyu skar tshogs rnams dag gi gnas/ /sprin med mkhar la lus can ma/ /lhan cig mig ni sbyin par mdzod/ /mu? sdug khyod gdong lan bu yi/ /'khri shing bung ba ltar sngo
100a1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /'dren byed pad+ma'i gzugs brnyan can/ /zla ltar mdzes pas su ma bcom/ /rtag tu sdig med kun dga' mchog /lus dud dag dang 'grogs la chags/ /btsun mo lus med kyis dgongs te/ /'jigs pa du mas reg pa
100a2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /ha ha mi 'grogs mkha' 'gros mtshan/ /ri 'gro dbang 'khyog ldan ma chags/ /'khyog sgrogs gang+gA'i chur 'jug sdig /bya rog 'joms pa mtho ris 'gro/ /kye kye sgra sgrog ru ru'i brang/ /'joms sdig ba ri ri cher 'gro/ /nga can ma 'ong bdag gi can/ /bya rog
100a3(mdo 'grel): rma bya'i sgra sgyur ci/ /lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i lha/ /rig byed la smod 'gog pa pos/ /lha min dga' byed bcom pa na/ /sgra yis mtho ris gang bar gyur/ /mkhas pa lha dang lha min la/ /'gro stobs ldan pa byin legs can/ /chang gi ro ldan bshol
100a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin de/ /bzhad kyi sgra ldan mtsho ru song/ /'di yis bdag cag rnams kyi bzhin/ /bzhin gyis nges bar ma bcom min/ /bdag sgrog dman med dang sbyor zhing/ /rje bo skyes min sdig med min/ /de ltar bya dka' i lam la yang/ /rim pa cung zad kun tu bstan
100a5(mdo 'grel): gab tshig dag gi rnam pa yi/ /lugs kyang rab tu bstan par bya/ /rtsed mo'i 'dud sar bzhad gang dang/ /de shes tshogs su gsang smra dang/ /pha rol kun tu rmongs byad la/ /gab tshig dag ni nyer mkho ldan/ /tshig mtshams sbyar bas don sbas pa/ /kun tu tshogs
100a6(mdo 'grel): ba zhes par brjod/ /gzhan la grags pa'i sgra dag gis/ /gang du slu ba slu byed nyid/ /sbyor ba shin tu 'khrugs pa yis/ /rmongs byed rim pa bral ba ste/ /gang la don rtogs dka' ba yi/ /tshig phreng ri ni rab bcom yin/ /phal pa'i don bkod tshig dag
100a7(mdo 'grel): gis/ /sdebs pa dag ni mthun ba'i gzugs/ /mtshan nyid yod tsam nges tshig dang/ /ldan pa'i tshig ni rtsub mo'o/ /gang du grangs kyi kun rmongs par/ /byed pa grangs nyid ces bya ste/ /gang du dag don rnam pa gzhan/ /snang ba de ni rab brtags nyid/
100b1(mdo 'grel): gang du ming la sna tshogs don/ /brtags te ming du 'dus pa nyid/ /tshig ni chos mtshungs pa reg pas/ /don gzhan bsgribs pa bsgrib pa'o/ /sgra yis rnam grangs bkod pa yis/ /bsgrub pa dag ni mthun pa'i sgra/ /gang zhig dngos su don bstan yang/ /rmongs ched de ni
100b2(mdo 'grel): rmongs zhes bya/ /gang la sbyor phreng bdag nyid kyi/ /ming can de ni yongs su 'phrog /gang du rten ni rab sbas te/ /brten pa gsal byas gcig bsgrims pa'o/ /gang du gnyi ga spos gyur pa/ /de ni gnyi ga sgribs pa yin/ /gang zhig mtshan nyid sna tshogs 'dres/
100b3(mdo 'grel): de ni yongs su 'dres zhes bya/ /'di dag gab tshig bcu drug ste/ /sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bstan/ /gab tshig ngan pa gzhan dag kyang/ /bcu bzhi de dag rnams kyis brjod/ /ngan pa mtshan nyid med gang de/ /skyon ni yongs bgrangs bya min par/ /rig
100b4(mdo 'grel): nas slar yang bdag cag gis/ /legs pa kho na brjod par bya/ /mA yA(mdo 'grel): go ro sems kyis ni/ /shes pa med la ci slad khro/ /gnas yin du ba 'di yis ni/ /ci byed kun tu mig dmar ma/ kugdza? bsten pa khyod kyi ni/ /dga' ba ji ltar 'phel bar
100b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /'chi med bud med co 'dri ma/ /mi mo spyad pas de lta min/ /yu bar 'o byed pad can gyi/ /dang pa tsher ma rtsub mo can/ /bzhin la sgra snyan sgrig byed cing/ /lus ni mngar bar byed cing mchus/ /bu mo khyod kyi rkang mdzes la/ /rkang gdub rgyas pa
100b6(mdo 'grel): sgra snyan sgrogs/ /mngon sum nyid du gyur ba 'dir/ /bdag gi srog ni bstan ma yin/ /gang gi yal 'dab la/ /me tog dog pa snum pa can/ /'khri shing yal 'dab lnga pa ni/ /skyed mos tshal 'dir bdag gis mthong/ /chang ma rnams ni chang khang
100b7(mdo 'grel): du/ /sa yi 'od kyis dzi gar 'khyam/ /de ni myos par gyur de rnams/ /chang ba ltar? rdzing bur bying ba bzhin/ /sna ldan dbus ni gsal byed bzhis/ /yongs su rnam par brgyan pa yi/ /grong khyer 'ga' yong gang zhig na/ /mi bdag mdog brgyad
101a1(mdo 'grel): ming can yod/ /tshig rnams rab tu 'khrul pa dang/ /mgo bo dung cing mig dman pa/ /'dug kyang 'dar ldan bdag la ni/ /rgan mo rjes su mi brtse'am/ /mig mi brtan mas ldan 'ga' / /dang po rA dza zhes pa sgrogs/ /sa nA ta na yang ste 'di/
101a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po ma yin khyab 'jug min/ /rdzas bral mi ni btang byas nas/ /nor ldan rnams can bgrod pa gang/ /sna tshogs thabs rgyas 'jig rten 'gugs/ /bzug dka' smad 'tshong ma yin no/ /khyod kyis min ming mthun gang/ /rab gyur sgra min can las rgyal/ /de yi
101a3(mdo 'grel): ding bdag mchog tu ni/ /sred ldan byed do snyan sgrogs ma/ /'dod ldan dag ni mal stan la/ /khro bas phyir bzlog nyal bar 'gyur/ /chags las de bzhin nyid nyal te/ /dal bu yis ni kha dag sbyar/ khya rgyal zas skyes dgra yis ni/ /bla ma'i 'od kyis bcom skye bo//
101a4(mdo 'grel): kha 'joms grogs min 'dzin pa yis/ /khyab pa'i mkha' la mngon par dga' / /nam yang mtshon dang bud med kyi/ /nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la ma reg/ mi ma yin pa 'ga' zhig gi/ lag 'di 'bras med yin no lo/ /su zhig gang dang 'grogs pa yis/ /bya
101a5(mdo 'grel): ba thams cad nye bar ni/ /thob cing zas kyi dus rtag tu/ /gal te mthong na 'dor bar byed/ ha ya ga dza g+ha Ta can/ /sde 'di gal te ma rgyal na/ /mA tri ka med nged kyi bu/ /'di ni yi ge shes kyang blan/ /de ni ming du 'dus pa bsres/ /bslus pa yis ni gzugs
101a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan/ /de bzhin nyid du gzhan gyi yang/ /'dres pa'i rim pa shes par bya/ /don nyams don bral don gcig pa/ /the tshom can dang rim pa nyams/ /sgra dman gcod mtshams nyams pa dang/ /sdeb sbyor nyams dang mtshams sbyor bral/ /yul dus sgya rtsal 'jig
101a7(mdo 'grel): rten dang/ /lung rigs dag dang 'gal ba ste/ /skyon bcu de dag snyan dngags la/ /snyan dngags mkhan gyis spang bar bya/ /dam bca' gtan tshig dpe nyams pa/ /skyon nam ma yin zhes pa 'di/ /phal cher dpyad pa dka' ba nyid/ /sbyar ba de yi 'bras bus ci/ /tshogs
101b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i don gyis stong pa gang/ /de ni don nyams zhes par 'dod/ /myos pa bsnyon pa byis pa yi/ /brjod las gzhan la de skyon no/ /'di ni rgya mtsho 'thung byed de/ /bdag ni de ring rga bas gzir/ /sprin 'di rab tu sgrog pa ste/ /'phrog byed sa bsrung dag la dga' / /'di sems rnal
101b2(mdo 'grel): du mi gnas pa'i/ /mngon par brjod la smad min ste/ /gzhan du de lta bu la sogs/ /snyan dngags mkhan po su zhig sbyor/ /dag gcig gam na rab sbyar la/ /snga ma phyi ma gzhan 'joms pa/ /'gal ba'i don can nyid kyi skyon/ /don bral zhes pa rab tu brjod/ /dgra
101b3(mdo 'grel): rigs mdza' dag 'joms pa dang/ /sna tshogs khur 'di rgyal gyur cig/ 'byung po kun la brtse ba can/ /khyod la dgra ni su yang med/ /mngon par chags ldan sems la ni/ /skabs de 'ga' zhig yod pa na/ /gang la 'gal pa'i don can gyi/ /tshig kyang mngon
101b4(mdo 'grel): par 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi bud med la sred pa/ /'phags pa dag gis ga la rigs/ /de yi so sgrib g.yo ba dag /bdag ni nam zhig 'thung 'gyur ram/ /don nyid dam ni sgra la yang/ /khyad par med pa sngar brjod pa/ /gal te slar yang rab bsgrags pa//
101b5(mdo 'grel): de ni don gcig par 'dod dper/ /sred pa srid byed bu mo rnams/ /de yi lan bu'i 'od zer can/ /chu 'dzin glog dang ldan pa ni/ /zab mo sgra sgrogs 'di dag go/ rjes su brtse sogs khyad par las/ /gal te 'ga' zhig brjod 'dod na/ /yang brjod la yang skyon med de/ /'di ni rgyun du
101b6(mdo 'grel): rigs pa yin/ /'dod pa skabs min 'khon pa yis/ /bud med mchog de bcom par gyur/ /yan lag kun mdzes bcom par gyur/ /'jam par sgrogs ma bcom par gyur/ /nges pa'i don du rab sbyar ba'i/ /tshig rnams kyis na gal te na/ /the tshom skyed par byed na 'di
101b7(mdo 'grel): the tshom can zhes rab tu bshad/ /re 'dod dga' ba blta ba yi/ /ro la mig g.yo grogs mo dag/ rgyang ni 'dug pa'i ma ma 'dis/ /'di 'dra blta bar bzod ma yin/ /'di 'dra the tshom slad nyid du/ /gal te 'ga' zhig du sbyar na/ /'di ni rgyan nyid du gyur gyi/ /de la skyon med
102a1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ ma smad de ni lus min skyes/ /'jigs bas gzir cing rtsub mo yi/ /dus gnyis kyis ni gzung ba mthong/ /bdag cag khyod la re ba med/ /'dod pas gzir ram tsha bas gdungs/ /zhes pa nges med byed pa'i tshig/
102a2(mdo 'grel): rtse 'joms skyes bu 'khrug par ni/ /bya phyir pho nya mos smras so/ /mdor bstan rjes su mthun par don/ /gal te rjes bstan ma byas na/ /rim pa nyams par mngon brjod pa'i/ /skyon du de ni bshad de dper/ /'gro ba rnams kyi gnas pa dang/ /sbrul
102a3(mdo 'grel): dang 'jig rgyu ma skyes pa/ /bde 'byung sred med chu skyes kyi/ /skye gnas can gyi khyed rnams srungs/ /'brel ba nges par shes pa'i rgyur/ /gang yang gal te 'bad byas na/ /rim pa 'das kyang skyon med par/ /mkhas pa rnams ni smra ste dper/ /gnyen
102a4(mdo 'grel): gtong ba dang lus gtor dang/ /yul gtong zhes pa gsum po la/ /dang po tha ma nyon mongs ri/ /bar pa skad cig gdung ba'o/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid lam ma mtshon/ /tshig sbyor mchog min 'dod pa ni/ /sgra nyams yin te mchog rnams dag /'dod pa nyid ni
102a5(mdo 'grel): skyon ma yin/ /sa gzhi rgya mtsho'i ske rags can/ /rgyal chen khyod la dpung bas srungs/ /zhes pa shes 'dod med pas na/ /tshig 'di la ni nyams yod min/ /lho yi ri las nyer btung pa'i/ /rlung gis tsu ta'i rkang 'thung ni/ /yal 'dab rol
102a6(mdo 'grel): bar bskyod pa yi/ /myu gu mdzes dang ldan par byed/ /ces sogs bstan bcos bdag nyid che/ /lha la g.yel ba'i sems ldan pa/ /sgra nyams bzhin du snang mod kyi/ /skal bzang nyid ni gtor ma yin/ /tshigs bcad rnams la nges pa'i
102a7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /tshig gi gcod mtshams gcod mtshams rig/ /de nyams gcod mtshams nyams pa ste/ /nyan pa dga' min bskyed pa dper/ /bud med rnams kyis yang dag brjod pa'i cho ga ro nyams med la 'dir/ /mchog rnams dang
102b1(mdo 'grel): grogs mi dbang nyi ma'i rigs 'di lta byed ces sog skyen/ /bya dang bya min ma tshang med la lung nyod kyis ni lta byed cing/ /mi bdag 'di yi dbang gyur sa 'dzin zhes pa de ltar sbyor ba yod/ /ji ltar tshig mdza' phyis pa la/ /lhag ma tshig nyid du nges pa/ /de bzhin mtshams sbyor rnam
102b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur mdza' / /tshig nyid ces ni brjod pa yin/ /de lta na yang rna bar tsub/ /snyan dngags mkhan rnams mi sbyor te/ /rgyal po de yi rgyal mtshan can/ /tog gi chu 'dzin bskul zhes 'di'o/ /gang du yi ge chad lhag dang/ /lci yang ji lta bzhin mi gnas/ /de ni sdebs sbyor
102b3(mdo 'grel): nyams pa ste/ /skyon 'di shin tu smad pa'o/ /zla ba'i 'od zer rab gsil bas/ /reg ces yi ge nyung ba nyid/ /sa ha ka rI lo 'dab gsar/ /snum zhes yi ge lhag pa'o/ /'dod pas mda' rnon ri dags mig can la/ /rnam par 'phangs zhes lji ba ji bzhin min/ /mdzes
102b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mig can dag la myos byed kyi/ /mda' rnon lhung zhes yang ba ji bzhin min/ /bsdus ba brjod par mi 'dod ces/ /tshig la mtshams sbyor med pa gang/ /yang phyis la sogs rgyu med ba?/ /de ni mtshams sbyor bral zhes bstan/ /mkha' dang bdag gi yid la yang/ /rlung ni dal
102b5(mdo 'grel): bu rgyu ba yis/ /bud med 'gyan pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdul gyi chu rgyas sel bar byed/ /mtshan mo 'di la zhes 'di 'dra/ /mkhas pas nyams par rig mi byed/ /ri nags yul 'khor la sogs yul/ /nyin mtshan dus drug la sogs dus/ /'dod pa'i nor la brtan pa yi/ /
102b6(mdo 'grel): gar dang glu sogs sgyu rtsal te/ /'byung po rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /'jug pa 'jig rten ming can no/ /rigs pa gtan tshigs rig bdag nyid/ /thos bcas gsungs pa lung nyid de/ /snyan dngags mkhan po bag med las/ /de der ji ltar grags pa bzhin/ /min par gal te rab zhugs na//
102b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni yul sogs 'gal zhes brjod/ /ga bur rkang la reg pa yi/ /ma la ya rlung dri bzangs can/ /ka ling+ga yi nags skyes pa'i/ /glang po dag ni ri dags rigs/ /tso la kA de ri degs sa/ /a ka ru ni nag pos sngo/ /zhes pa yul dang 'gal ba yi/ /tshig gi 'jug pa 'di
103a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra ste/ /pad+ma can ni mtshen mo rgyas/ /nyin par ku mud ldan pa gsal/ /dpyid ni ni tsu la rab rgyas/ /so ka dag ni sprin gyis gtibs/ /dad pa'i sgra ni dbyar nyan 'os/ /ston ni rma bya myos pa ste/ /dgun stong nyi ma dri ma med/ /dgun ni tsandan
103a2(mdo 'grel): bsngags par 'os/ /zhes pa 'di 'dra dus dang ni/ /'gal pa'i lugs dag bstan pa yin/ /sgyu rtsal dag dang 'gal ba'i lam/ /cung zad bstan par bya ste dper/ /dpa' ba sgeg pa dag gi dngos/ /brtan pa khro dang ya mtshan no/ /dbyangs bdun rdzogs pa 'di dag
103a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /tha dad lam du rab tu 'jug /'di ltar sgyu rtsal drug cu bzhir/ /'gal ba legs par rtogs par bya/ /sgyu rtsal yongs su bcad pa la/ /de yi rang bzhin gsal bar 'gyur/ /glang po dag ni ral pa g.ye/ /rta ya rwa ni rno ba yin/ /e raN+Da 'di snying po lci/ /seng ldeng ljon pa
103a4(mdo 'grel): snying po med/ /ces pa 'di ni 'jig rten pa/ /nyid dang 'gal ba kun gyis smad/ /rigs pa zhes bya gtan tshigs kyi/ /rigs pa dang 'gal bstan par bya/ /bde gshegs 'dus byas 'jig par ni/ /gsung pa bden mod de lta na 'ang/ /tsa ko ra yi mig can de/ /bdag gi
103a5(mdo 'grel): snying la da dung gnas/ /ser skyas gnas la yod pa nyid/ /rab tu skye bar nye bar brjod/ /med pa nyid ni bdag cag gis/ /rab tu skye bar gang phyir mthong/ /rigs pa dag dang 'gal ba yi/ /lugs 'di kun tu blta bar bya/ /de nas lung dang 'gal ba yi/ /'jug pa dag ni
103a6(mdo 'grel): bstan par bya/ /me ni bzhag pa ma yin yang/ /bu skyes bram ze ma nyams pa'i/ /spyod pas brgyan pa 'di dag ni/ /be shwa na ri mchod sbyin byed/ /de ni cho ga ma byas kyang/ /bla ma dag las rig byed bklags/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i shel dag ni/ /'du byed gzhan la ltos pa med//
103a7(mdo 'grel): 'gal ba mdza' dag 'di la yang/ /res 'ga' snyan dngags mkhan mkhas pas/ /skyon gyis grangs las rab bzlas na/ /yon tan lam ni rnam par 'dzin/ /rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni/ /de yi skyed tshal lha rnams kyi/ /ljon pa yal 'dab gos
103b1(mdo 'grel): dmar dang/ /ldan pa dag ni gnas su gyur/ /rgyal po 'jigs pa gsal byed pa/ /ka dampa yi rdul dang 'grogs/ /'dab bdun las 'khrubs skyod byed cing/ /drag po yi ni rlung dag rgyu/ /khyogs kyi rab bskul skrag pa yi/ /skye bo bud med las brjod glu/ /stobs mi mnyam pas
103b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod ldan gyi/ /chags pa dag ni 'phel bar byed/ /zla ba'i 'od zer las bsil na/ /bsreg bya 'dzin par 'dod ldan ni/ /bud med dang bral nyon mongs kyi/ /'khrugs pa 'di yis rtsi bar byed/ /gzhan bya yin yang gzhal bya min/ /cha ldan yin yang cha ldan min/ /gcig nyid
103b3(mdo 'grel): yin yang gcig nyid min/ /sna tshogs gzugs khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /skya bser bu lnga dag gi ni/ /chung ma lnga len bu mo ste/ /dag pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ /'di 'dra lha yi sgrub byed do/ /sgra don rgyan gyis bkra ba dang/ /bya sla bya dka' dag dang lam/ /snyan dngags dag ni
103b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan skyon/ /de ltar mdor bsdus rab tu bstan/ /sgrub byed bstan pa'i lam 'dis skyon dang yon tan dag/ rab tu rtogs pa'i blo can skal bzang dbang gyur pa'i/ /tshig dang mngon par 'grogs byas chad mig ma dag dang/ /lang tsho can bzhin dga' dang grags pa thob par
103b5(mdo 'grel): gyur// //snyan dngags kyi me long las bya dka' i rnam par bcad ba ste gsum pa'o// //snyan dngags kyi me long/ /slob dpon dbyug pa can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //phul du byung ba'i yon tan dpag tu med pas spras ba/ /bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che ba dang/ /dpon
103b6(mdo 'grel): chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan dngags mkhan chen po sh+ri lak+Sh+mi ka ra dang/ /bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shong ston gyis/ dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /slar yang shong ston de nyid kyi bka' drin
103b7(mdo 'grel): gyis legs par sbyar ba la brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa dbang lots+tsha ba dpal ldan blo 'gros brtan pas/ slob dpon chen po ratna sh+rI yis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par 'gyur bcas su rung ba rnams bsgyur te/ zhus chen cung zad g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o/
104a1(mdo 'grel): sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas bzhugs so// // ` rjes bsngags la/ 'dra mtshungs/ gzhan dpag/ rkang bkra/ glog phreng/ bram ze'i bya dang lnga 'dir bshad do/ /dgu pa priha tI la gshol gdong dang lag 'gro /khyi'u'i bu gnyis so/ /bcu pa phreng ldan la/ dag pa'i snang ba/ 'khar rnga/ rma bya'i 'gros/ gser ldan/ myos ma dang lnga'o/ /bcu gcig pa gsum bsngags la/ nyer 'khod/ dbang po rdo rje
104a2(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshanda ratnA ka ra nA ma/ oM na mo wA gI shwa rA ya/ dzi nA ya mu ni sUryA ya pa ra ma dzyo ti rAt+ma ne/ an+ta rni shi bi mi trA NA man+ta rdi na kri te na ma:/ /pa rgyaM tsa tuShpa dI tatstsa/ brit+ta dzA ti
104a3(mdo 'grel): bod skad du/ sdeb sbyor rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ oM ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ rgyal ba thub pa nyi ma ni snang ba mchog gi bdag nyid can/ nang gi mtshan mo bshes bral gyis/ nang gi nyin byed la phyag 'tshal/ tshigs bcad rkang bzhi de yang ni/ brit+ta dzA ti/
104a4(mdo 'grel): pra b+he da to dwi bi d+haM/ ak+Sha ra saM khyaM bri t+taM/ mA trA saM khyA b+ha ba ti dzA ti:/ h+ra swa(mdo 'grel): sa ro la g+hu mri dzu:/ pa dAn+te Shu ba hu laM gu rugpa kra:/ pUrba(mdo 'grel): swA ra ra hi ta byany+dza nAtstsa/ dIrg+ha plu tau tsai ba/ b+hA di gu ru tri ka miSh+Ta ma /
104a5(mdo 'grel): rnam gnyis dbye/ yi ge bgrang ba brit+ta yin/ phyi mo bgrang ba dzA tir 'gyur/ dbyangs thung ngu ni yang ba dang la ste drang po'o/ /rkang pa'i mdza' rnams su mang po zhig lci ba dang ga dang 'khyog pa'o/ /dbyangs dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma'o/ /ring po dang blu ta nyid kyang ngo/ /gsum gyi thog ma lci ba b+ha bu 'dod
104a6(mdo 'grel): dzan+ta rgu ru/ san+ta gu ru/ ma she Sha gu ru/ yA di la g+hu tsa/ ran+ta rma g+hu/ tan+ta la g+hu/ na she Sha la g+hu/ ts+tshandAM si bi du(mdo 'grel): ShaTkai rA ra b+hyai kai ka brid+d+hi b+haM(mdo 'grel): pA dai:/ /gA ya tryuSh+Ni ga nu Sh+Tu pha bri ha tI paM k+ti sta thA tri Sh+Tu pa/ dza ga tI
104a7(mdo 'grel): dza dbus lci ba/ sa mdza' lci ba/ ma kun lci/ la thog yang ba/ ra dbus yang/ ta mdza' yang ba/ na kun yang/ drug pa nas brtsams te re re 'phel ba'i rkang bas sdeb sbyor rnams rtogs par byed do/ /dbyangs sgrogs rab dga' rjes bsngags bri ha tI/ phreng ldan dang na de bzhin gsum bsngags so/ /
104b1(mdo 'grel): shatka rya Sh+Ni d+h+ri ta ya:/ pri thak+ke ba lA a ti pa rA shtsa/ shud+d+hA prA bi sa ma b+hyu ta pa rA tsa kri ti:/ i ti Sha DaSh+Ta he yA:/ sa ma ma rd+ha sa maM b+hi Sha maM tsi ti tri bi d+haM pra tsak+Sha te brit+taM/ ta nu ma d+hyA di ka mu pa tsi tra kA di bak+ta di ta tkra ma sha:/ /
104b2(mdo 'grel): skye 'gro nus ldan legs spyod bstan 'dzin rnams/ so so rai phyi ma shin tu ba'o/ khyed ldan dag pa rab kun rnam legs shin tu lhag par las phyi ma'o?/ /de ltar drug brgyad rta rnams so/ /mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam zhes bya ba/ brit+ta rnam pa gsum du rab bshad bya/ de ni dbus phra sogs dang nyer bkra sogs/ kha sgo la sogs rnams dang/ go rim bzhin/
104b3(mdo 'grel): s+thA naM ya ti riSh+Tai:/ an+te tsa ra NA nAM/ tad+dA nu ti b+hA di:/ gwa:/ lka:/ pra ti pA daM/ tyaM tsaM t+ta nu ma d+hyA/ /ku mA re la li tA dzse ga/ ^ glau tse tu(mdo 'grel): so mA n+ya sau hi/ /la gau tsa tu(mdo 'grel): pra mA N+ye sau/ /tsi tra pe dA ye di b+hau gau /
104b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas pa sdong/ rkang pa rnams gyi mdza' o/ /b+ha sogs uta la de ldan no/ /lci ba wa/ yang ba ka/ rkang pa so so la'o/ gal te ta ya dbus phra'o/ /gzhon nu rol pa dza sa ga/ lci yang bzhi pa de ni 'dra mtshungs/ la ga bzhi pa de gzhal dpag go/ gal te b+ha ga gdag rkang bkra/
104b5(mdo 'grel): mau gau tsa t+sA ba dyu nmA lA/ /b+hA t+ta la gA mA Na ba ka/ /rAn+na sau ya di ha la mu khI/ /b+hu dza ga shi shu su tra nau ma:/ /dz+nya yA shud+d+ha baM rA Nma sau dze gau/ mnau yA dga(mdo 'grel): kha lu pa Na ba(mdo 'grel): khyA ta:/ syA nme yu ra sA ri NI ra dzau gau /
104b6(mdo 'grel): gal te ma dag ga dag glog phreng/ b+ha las ta la ga bram ze'i bu/ gal te ra las na sa dag gshol gdong/ na dag ma ni lag 'gro khye'u'i bu/ ma sa dza ga dag pa'i snang bar shes par bya/ ma na ya las lci nges 'khar rdar bshad/ /ra dza ra dang ga ni rma bya'i 'gros yin /
104b7(mdo 'grel): ` /nye dbang rdo rje/ ris bcu bzhi yod pa'i nyer bskyed/ 'jo ba po/ shA li nI/ chu rlabs phreng ba/ bung ba rol pa/ shing rta dregs pa/ legs 'ongs/ zlum go bzang ldam dkar mo/ nyer gnas te bcu gnyis so/ /bcu gnyis pa skye 'gro la/ zla ba'i lam/ rigs gnas/ dbang po'i rgyur/ sbyor ba/ chu 'thor 'gro/ 'gro byed/ dal myur/ lag 'bro ltung ba/
105a1(mdo 'grel): me tog phreng can/ rugma pa tI sA ya tra b+ha mau sgau/ dz+nye yA mat+tA ma b+ha sa ga sraSh+TI/ /tA dzdzau ga gi tI ya mu pa s+thi tA syA te/ syA din+d+ra badzrA ya da to dza go ga:/ 'dul ba sum brgya ba la yod/ u pen+d+ra badzrA hi dza tau dza go ga:/ a nan+ta rodb+hA bi ta lak+Sha NA dyo/ pA dau b+ha ba twI be bi
105a2(mdo 'grel): d+hai rbi kalpai:/ gang la b+ha ma pa ga de ni gser ldan/ ma b+ha pa gas bskyed pa myos mar shes par bya/ ta las dza gnyis ga ga zhes 'di nyer 'khod 'gyur/ gal te dbang po rdo rje ta gnyis dza lci gnyis/ dza ta dza lci gnyis ni nye dbang rdo rje ste/ de ma thag tu brjod zin la sogs mtshan nyid dag /sna tshogs rnam rtog rnams kyis rkang pa dag tu 'gyur/
105a3(mdo 'grel): yA sA mu b+hau sh+ra bya ya ti pra pany+tsa smri tA(mdo 'grel): smri tI shai ru pa dzA te ya stA:/ /do d+he ka mits+tsha ti b+ho tri te yA dga?/ mo pA ro bA shA li nI ba de lo kai:/ mo bE(mdo 'grel): srau bA ya di bA to rmi ma lA/ mo bA nau bA b+h+ra ma ra bi le si tA/ rA tpa re na ra la gA ra thod+d+ha tA/
105a4(mdo 'grel): gang de gnyi ga mnyan 'os ngal bso'i/ /spros pa can/ de rnams nyer bskyed rnams su dran pa'i dbang pos bshad/ b+ha gsum las ni ga dag 'jo ba bor dod do/ /ma ba ra gnyis pa rig 'jig rten shA li nI/ gal te ba wa wa ra wa ni chu rlubs phreng/ ma wa na dag wa ni bud pa rol pa'o/ /ra las pha rol na ral ga shing rta dregs/
105a5(mdo 'grel): swA ga tA ra na b+ha ba/? rgu ru NA tsa/ na na sa ga gi ti tsa b+ha be dbrat+tA/ na na re la gi ti tsa be b+ha dri kA/ sh+ya nyu? dA ri tA ra dzau ra lau gu ru:/ dza sau tsa ta ga gA shtso pa s+thi taM syA ta/ tsan+d+ra wart+ma tsa ra ya nu? ra na b+ha sai:/ u shan+ti ba sha
105a6(mdo 'grel): ran b+ha ga rnams dang lci bas legs 'ongs so/ /na na sa ga ga zhes bya ba zlum por 'gyur/ na na ra la ga zhes bya ba bzang ltan nyid/ ra dza ral dang ni lci ba dkar mor brjod/ dzas ta dang ga ga rnams ni nyer gnas 'gyur/ ra na b+ha sas rgyu zhing 'khor ba zla ba'i lam/ dza ta dza ra 'di ni rigs/
105a7(mdo 'grel): ` yi ge nyung ngu/ sna tshogs lha mo/ chu 'dzin phreng ba/ dal gyis 'bab pa/ ya mu nA/ phreng ba gsar pa ste bco lnga'o/ /bcu gsum pa shin tu skye 'gro ba? rab dga' can/ mdzes pa/ rma bya myos pa/ snyan pa'i ngang pa/ 'jam pa'i ngag dang lnga'o/ /bcu bzhi pa nus ldan la/ gnod med/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ mtshon cha kha 'bus/ dpyid kyi thig le/
105b1(mdo 'grel): s+tha mi da dza ta dza ro/ /syA di n+d+ra baM shA kha lu ya tra tau dza rau/ pu Ta i ha ba su ba dA nau ga bau rbau/ ri tu dza su dzeM su dze lod+d+he ta ga ti:/ a tha to Te ka ma bd+hi sa kA re kri taM/ 'di po bstod la yod/ dru te pi lam+bi te mA he na
105b2(mdo 'grel): gnas nyid du 'dod/ gang la ta gnyis dza ra nges par dbang po'i rgyud 'gyur/ na dag ga wa ra wa nor rig byed 'dir sbyor ba'o/ /dus dag la ni dza su dza su chu 'thor 'gro/ /sa yig chu gnyer byas pa de nas 'gro byed do/ /na dang b+ha dang b+ha ra ngal myur yin pa ra
105b3(mdo 'grel): b+hau b+ha rau/ b+hu dzad+ga pra yA tam tsa tu rb+hirya kA ro:/ kI rti ta ShA tsa tU ra phi kA sra gdi N+Ti/ pra mi tA k+Sha rA sa dza sa so(mdo 'grel): ka thi tA/ ma gwA re phau ba ba shwa da bI she rA shwe:/ mo bA n+ya gwA dza la d+ha ra mA lA bd+hya dgai:/ na na ra ra g+ha Ti tA tsa
105b4(mdo 'grel): smra/ /ya yig bzhi rnams kyis ni lag 'gro ltung ba yin/ /ra yig bzhi pa de ni me tog phreng can grags/ /sa dza sa pa rnams kyis yi ge nyung ngur grags/ /ma ga wa ra ra mda' rtas sna tshogs lha mo'o/ /ma wa na ya ga wa rgya mtsho yan lag chu 'dzin phreng/ /na na ra ra 'dus pa dal gyis
105b5(mdo 'grel): man+d+ra ki nI/ ba da ti mu ni rya mu nA na dzau dza rau/ i ha na ba mA li nI ya di na dzau b+hyau/ trA shA b+hi rmu na dze ra bA(mdo 'grel): pre hirShe NI syA ta/ dze bo na dza ri ti tu tsi ra tse tu rga he:/ mo ba b+ha tyA(mdo 'grel): sa ba ya hi rmat+ta ma yU ra(mdo 'grel): sa dza sA(mdo 'grel): sa go rtsa ka thi ta(mdo 'grel): ka la haM sa(mdo 'grel): sadza
105b6(mdo 'grel): 'bab pa yin/ /na dza dza ra ya mu nA tu thub par smra/ /gal te 'dir ni na dza b+ha ya phreng ba gsar ba'o/ /mu na dza ra wa rnams gsum dang phyogs kyis rab dga' can/ /dza wa na dza ra zhes bzhi dang gza' yis mdzes pa yin/ /na wa b+ha ta ya rnams re nyid ngal bso rma bya myos gal te/ sa dza pa dang sa ga rnams ni snyan pa'i ngang par bshad
105b7(mdo 'grel): ` nor 'dzin te lnga'o/ /bco lnga pa shin tu nus ldan la/ ri bong can gyi cha/ phreng ba/ yon tan nor bu'i tshogs phreng ldan ma rgya mtsho can te lnga'i/ /bcu drug pa legs sbyor la/ khyu mchog glang chen rtsen pa dag leb rgan rtsi gnyis so/ /bcu bdun ba shin tu legs spyod la/ gtsug phud can/ yangs ldan ma//
106a1(mdo 'grel): sA dze go tse ye di ma ny+dze b+hA Shi Ni/ mA? gA bA no mA(mdo 'grel): sha ra na ba b+hi ra sa bA d+hI/ /na na bi dza dza bi tsa swa rai ra pa rA dza tA/ /pre he re Ne ke li tA ne ne bi ne ne te:/ dz+nyaM ya ba san+te ti le ka te b+ha dzA dze gau ga:/ ba su d+hA sma ba ni
106a2(mdo 'grel): sa dza pa rnams dang ni dza ga 'jam pa'i dag /ma ga wa dang na gnyis ma rnams mda' dang dgu yis gnod med do/ /na na wa dang dza dza ba rnams dbyangs kyis gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /na na wa dang na na wa rnams de yis mtshon cha kha 'bus so/ /ta b+ha dza dza ga ga dpyid kyi thig ler shes par bya/ /sa la wa na gzhan
106a3(mdo 'grel): pi tse rau tse pany+tsa gre hai(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /gu ru ni d+ha na ma nu le g+hu ri he she shi ke lE/ /pa'o/ /sra ga ye me pi tse re sa ne be ke pi re me NA/ /ba su mu ni ye ta ri hi me Ni gu Na ni ke ra// /na na ga pa ra ra bA(mdo 'grel): syurmE li nI tASh+Te la kai:/ pa'o/ na
106a4(mdo 'grel): yang ra dag lnga dang gza' yis nor 'dzin no/ /lci ba tha ma yang ba ma lus 'di rin bong can gyi cha/ /'di ni gzhan yang ro dang dgu yis ngal bsor gyur na phreng ba'o/ /de lta bu la nor dang thub par ngal bso yon tan nor bu'i tshogs/ /na na ga wa ra ra wa rnams brgyad dang 'jig rten phreng ldan ma/ na dza
106a5(mdo 'grel): dza b+ha dze ra rbi rA dzi ta mi dam sa mu dre kaM/ /b+h+ra kna na sA mu ne(mdo 'grel): kha mri Sha b+ha ga dze bi la si taM/ /na dze b+he dza rA gu tu shtsa ya di ta t+te dA ku su m+b+haM/ /ya mU nA sA b+hA lwA ra sa ha ra bi rA ma shi kha ri NI/ pa'o/ dza sa lwa na ra rA ba su gre
106a6(mdo 'grel): b+ha dza ra rnams rnam par spel ba 'di ni rgya mtsho can/ /b+ha ra ka nad sa thub las mkha' la khyu mchog glang chen can/ /gal te na dza b+ha dza ra lci de ni de tshe leb rgan rtsi/ /ya mu nas b+ha la wa rnams ro dang 'phrog byed ngal bso gtsug phud can/ /dza sa la wa na ra ra rnams nor dang
106a7(mdo 'grel): ` 'od ma'i 'dab la lhung ga ri dags mo/ ral gyis gnon/ bum pa can/ khu byug can te bdun no/ /bco brgyad pa brtan 'dzin la/ me tog g.yo ba'i 'khri shing dang/ lcags mda' gnyis so/ /bcu dgu pa shin tu brtan 'dzin la/ sprin rnam par sgrogs pa dang/ stag rnam par rtsen pa gnyis so/ /nyi shu pa byed ldan la/ kha mdzes dang/ zlum po gnyis so// //
106b1(mdo 'grel): ha ye ti ptu pri thI ma hA/ di dmu ni baM sha pa tra pi te tam b+ha ra na ba na na bai:/ /na su ma ba dzA? dzA ba(mdo 'grel): swA dA bd+d+hi? swA ra rta ri NI ma hA/ ma n+d+ra krAn+tA ma ba na su ra rA ba:/ sa mu dra rtu? lo gai:/ na dzE b+he dze dzA la
106b2(mdo 'grel): gza' la sdod pa yangs ldan ma/ /b+ha ra na ba na na wa rnams phyog dang thub par 'od ma'i 'dab ma lhung/ /na su ma wa dza dza wa rnams ro chu dbyangs la ri dags mo ru 'dod/ /ma wa na su ra ra wa rnams mtsho dus 'jig rten dal gyis gnon/ /gal te na dza b+ha dza dza la
106b3(mdo 'grel): gau tse ya di na rku Ta kan+tu ta dA/ pa'o/ /na dze bi na b+hA b+ha bau mu ni re so de d+hi ko ki le kaM/ pa'o/ ma gwA nsu ro ba(mdo 'grel): ku su mi ta le tA bal+li tA k+Sha rtu lo ka(mdo 'grel): a ha na na ra tsa tuSh+ka sriSh+Ta n+tu nA rA tse mA tsak+Sha ta/ /ya mU nsU ra pho ba(mdo 'grel): Sha Dri tu tu re
106b4(mdo 'grel): ka rnams de tshe bum pa can/ /na dza ba na b+hu dang b+hi wa thub par dang chu gter khu byug can/ /mA gA wa na su dang ra gnyis pa rnams dbang dus 'jig rten me tog g.yo ba'i 'khri shing ngo/ /'dir ni na gnyis ra bzhi bsgrigs pa lcags kyi mda' ru 'chang bar byed/ /ya mu na su ra ra wa rnams drug dus mgyogs
106b5(mdo 'grel): gai rme g+ha bi sphu rdza tA syA ta/ a rkA shwi rya da ma(mdo 'grel): sa dzo su te he bA:/ shwa? rdu? la ba krI Ti taM/ sa ptA shwa swA da b+hi n+nA ma ra ba na na ba tA(mdo 'grel): su shtsa t+su ba da nA/ /prat+te mI di shan+tu nA ma to ra dzo ra dzo ra dzo gu turla g+hu shtsa/ mro bo nau ba shtsa rau ba sti b+hi
106b6(mdo 'grel): 'gros sprin rnams sgrogs su 'gyur/ /gal te ma sa dza su ta ta wa rnams nyi ma rta yis stag rnams can/ /gal te ma ra ba na na ba nya su rnams la bdun rta ra yis phye ba kha mdzes so// //ra dza ra dza ra dza lci ba yang ba 'di lta bu rnams zlum po zhes byar 'dod/ /ma ra wa na na wa ra ra wa rnams bdun
106b7(mdo 'grel): ` nyer gcig pa rab byed ldan la/ /phreng 'dzin gcig pu'o/ /nyer gnyis pa kun byed ldan la/ zab mo'i dbyangs so/ /nyri gsum pa rnam byed ldan/ rta rol pa dang/ myos ma rtsen pa gnyis so/ /nyer bzhi pa legs byed ldan la/ lus phra'o/ /nyer lnga pa shin tu byed ldan la/ khrung khrung rkang ngo/ /nyre drug pa lhag par byed ldan la/ lag 'gro rnam bsgyid rang
107a1(mdo 'grel): ri ti ba ri ti(mdo 'grel): sapta ka(mdo 'grel): sra gd+ha rA syA hi/ ya h+ra b+ha ro na bau dza sa dza sA da shoSh+Na gu bi rA mi mi dra ka mi da/ ha ra ra bi b+hin+na mi shwa la li taM na dzo tsa b+ha la bA dza sau tsa dza su tsa/ ma d+ha krI Di ba swak+ShA shA la di ma mi tse ga bi tsa na la?
107a2(mdo 'grel): sa gsum gyis sdod pa phreng 'dzin zhes byar 'gyur/ /gang la b+ha ra na ba dza sa dza sa phyogs dang nyi mar ngal bso 'di ni zab mo'i dbyangs/ /na dza b+ha la wa dang dza sa dag dang dza suAng 'phrog byed nyi mar tha dad pa ni rta rol pa/ /gal te ma ma ga wa na la ka na na na ba rnams nor dbang phyogs kyis
107a3(mdo 'grel): ka na na na bAM:/ syA di ha ta nwI b+ha ga ba tha na na bA b+ho nyu? sha ra swa ra ta ra Ni bi rA mA/ krau ny+tsa pa dA b+ha gwA b+ha ga bA no? lka na na ba i Shu sha ra ba su mu ni bi ra ti:/ mau gwau nau lkau su rdzau bA(mdo 'grel): syA dbe su ma da na da ha na mu ni b+hi rb+hu
107a4(mdo 'grel): myos ma rtsen pa'o/ /'dir b+ha lci ba wa dang de nas na na wa dang? b+ha gang na yu mda' dbyangs sgrol byed ngal bso lus prar 'gyur/ /b+ha ga wa b+ha ga wa na dag la ka na na ba rnams mda' mda' nor dang thub par ngal bso khrung khrung rkang/ /ma dag ga wa na dag la ka su dang dza dag wa rnams nor lha myos byed
107a5(mdo 'grel): dza ga bi dzri m+b+hi ta/ pa'o mnau nu rdi rna nu sa ga bi ta na ba ra sa ra sa ka ra/ Na bi ra ti ra pa b+ha ha(mdo 'grel): syA ta/ pra tha ma ka i he daN+Da ka shtsa N+Da braM Sh+Ti pra yA to b+ha ban+na dwa ye nA thA rai(mdo 'grel): sa b+ha b+hi:/ pra ti pa da mi he re pha brid+d+hA(mdo 'grel): syu ra r+N+Na r+N+Na
107a6(mdo 'grel): me dang thub pa rnams kyis lag 'gro rnams bsgyings so/ /ma na nu dang na nu rnam gnyis pa ga wa zhes bya rnams dgu dang ro ro byed par ngal bso bzlog phyogs 'bab tu 'gyur/ /'di nyid du ni rgyun chags dang po gtum pa'i char 'bebs dag tu 'gyur te na gnyis dang ni de nas ra bdun rnams kyis so/ /'dir ni rkang pa so sor ra pha 'phel bar gyur rnams chu
107a7(mdo 'grel): ` bzlog phyogs 'bab gnyis so/ /nyer bdun nas rgyun chags dang/ rab gsal gnyis su dbye ste/ na gnyis las ra bdun gyis rgyun chags gtul pa'i char 'bebs so/ /ra brgyad kyi chu rgyan/ dgus rgya mtsho/ /bcus sprul/ bcu gcig gis char sprin/ bcu gnyis kyi pha rol pa'i 'byung gnas bcu gsum gyis shin tu klubs bcu bzhis bu nga'o/ /de bzhin du na
107b1(mdo 'grel): pa byA la dzI mU ta mI lA ka ro d+d+hA ma shadkhA da ya(mdo 'grel): pra tsi ta i ha na yu gA dye ste thA tsa N+Da priSh+Ta bra yA tA da yo yairya thA daN+Da ko ra(mdo 'grel): sa ma brit+tA ni// ` //u ba tsi tra ka mA hu ra yu gma yu ksau sa la gA ya da b+ha tri ta yA dgau/
